El apartamento a dos pasos de la playa, del Mall y del Metro con el cual podes ir al Centro Histórico, mucho mejor que quedarte en el mismo ya que ni dormirías... Recomendable !!!!

David est un hôte particulièrement accueillant et arrangeant. Il nous a grandement conseillé mes amis et moi sur la ville de Barcelone. Son appartement est très propre et cocooning. Merci encore à lui pour ce séjour je le recommande.

Booking a holiday at this lovely apartment affords the luxury of two vacations rolled into one -- to easily explore the vibrant city of Barcelona, plus relax and unwind at the beach.  That's reason enough to chose to stay at Centric Boutique at the Beach.  What comes as a bonus is David, a host who takes pride in what he does and who understands that "goodwill is everything".  It is no surprise that the owner has been awarded the Tripadvisor Certificate of Excellence.  

David keeps in touch, checking in to see if/what there is anything we need, in addition to recommending places to visit.  It's not just lip service.  For example, we suggested he consider adding a mat in the bathtub, which could be a bit slippery.  Later that day, DONE.

For example, when it was was time to vacate after our ten-day stay, we asked if would do us the favour of arranging for a mini-van to pick us up at 5:30am, as we were taking a train on to San Sebastian, and couldn't risk any misunderstanding if we tried booking this ourselves.  After checking around, David came back with an answer.  The going rate was too high and he was still looking to find us much more reasonable transportation.  He DID.

This beautifully decorated, two-bedroom apartment is everything as described, well-equipped, well-stocked, clean and comfortable with a lovely balcony and close to all amenities.  

Do we recommend it, most definitely YES.

Our stay at David's apartment was everything it was supposed to be and so much more.  One of the main reasons we chose the apartment was the great reviews that David received as a host.  It turned out that those reviews didn't do him justice.  From the moment I booked, David made sure to stay in contact with us to ensure that we would be fully prepared for our Barcelona experience.  He even offered to pick us up at the airport!  Upon arrival, David gave us a car tour of the city and took us to some out of the way sights that we would have otherwise missed.  The day before we were leaving, I received a message from David offering to drop us back at the  airport.   He went above and beyond to make sure that our time in Barcelona was as wonderful as possible.  David is the ultimate host and I can't recommend him highly enough.

Tout d'abord 
L'appartement été très propre dans un endroit calme  a côté de la plage ça traversant un rue pour arriver à la plage ,,

Dans l'appartement y'a tous ce qu'il faut pour la cuisine,,
Le toilette aussi y'a tous ce qu'il faut de Serviettes et savon ،، 
Je me sentais comme si je suis  dans mon appartement.
 
David est un personne  merveilleuse il a bien nos accueillir dans son appartement,, il a nous donné toutes les informations touristiques sur la ville.
Et il était en contact avec nous Pendant notre séjour pour savoir si on besoin de qqch ou pas .

David is truly a wonderful host. He really took his time to make sure we had all information about the apartment, the area, restaurants, public transport etc. That was wonderful. We felt David was there to help if anything. We had a great weekend!

name: Clean, comfortable and convenient
summary: Great apartment centrally located within 5 mins walking distance to Causeway Bay and Tin Hau MTR's.  Times Square, SOGO Dept store and various other shops within walking distance. Lots of restaurants to choose from in the area.
interaction: Although will not be in Hong Kong at the time of your stay, I will be available via email or (Hidden by Airbnb) for any queries/questions you have during your stay. Key will be given to you on arrival by my sister and then collected at the end of your stay.
houseRules: Please be clean and respectful and treat home as if it were your own. No parties or events. No smoking inside the house Please remember to turn off air conditioners when not in use.

host.about: I am a 33 year old Australian expat living with another 31 year old female. Have lived in Hong Kong for 13 years. As we are both teachers, we usually travel during the school holidays therefore will be renting our flat during these times.

address.street: Hong Kong , Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Dominique's flat was fantastic. The welcome book was full of wonderful information on Causeway Bay as well as everything Hong Kong had to offer. The flat was much bigger than we had anticipated and had all the amenities required for a medium term stay.  Although we didn't actually get to meet Dominique, she answered all our queries and was very helpful. I would highly recommend Dominique's place for anyone looking for a place in Hong Kong.

The apartment was at a very convenient location. It was a very safe neighbourhood and we had many choices of food/cafes around Causeway Bay area. Transportation like tram/bus/MTR a stone's throw away. 

Thank you Dominique, it had been a pleasant stay!

The place is accessible to all public transportation. It is spacious and good enough for big family to stay. The host was accommodating and we didn't have a hard time looking for the place and communicating with them. I would definitely recommend this place for an enjoyable and stress-free trip in Hong Kong!

Dominique's place is very clean and spacious. It's got everything you need. She was very helpful and thoughtful. I was travelling with two elders and one child and the location made it easy for us to move around.

name: Beautiful 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: This one bedroom apartment in Sheung Wan/Central is the perfect hideaway for a young couple or single person looking to explore everything that Hong Kong has to offer.
interaction: I will most likely be out of town when the flat is available, thus the reason for renting it out. However, I will be available via email or phone to provide you with any assitance you need. I am more than happy to help in any way I can to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
houseRules: Please treat the house and its content as you would expect someone to treat your own.

host.about: Hong Kong is a beautiful city, so vibrant and diverse. I have been living in Hong Kong since 2010. I enjoy traveling and use my personal experience to point you to fantastic restaurants, exciting cafes and bars, the best shopping areas and of course to the local grocer and great supermarkets.

address.street: Sheung Wan, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mai's apartment is really nice. Lovely decor. Nice and bright with lots of natural sunlight.. and the balcony is cool :) The location is great. Very close to both Sheung Wan and Central. Mai responded quickly to all messages. Thank you Mai!

Mai-Britt's flat is so lovely and clean. I can find everything in her flat. I prefer to stay in Mai-Britt's house than hotel. And the bed is so comfortable i can have a deep sleep. I never seen Mai in person but she send message and take some pictures. I can easily connect with her and easily find her place. the flat is located on Gough street. From central about 7mins to walk. close to SheungWan. Everything is perfect. And this nice flat i can't easily find in HK. If i back to HK, i will stay in her flat again. thank you so much!

Clean & still very new! Location is pretty good, it's about 10 mins walk to the MTR, but it's the major Hong Kong & Central stations, from which you can access many lines! Lots of great eateries & convenience stores nearby as well, including the famous Kau Kee Beef Brisket Noodles! Do note the small details like that there is (currently) no wifi & no lift, but we knew about these so we were prepared for it. One small thing, the curtains are quite sheer over the full-length windows which makes the whole place bright & airy, but if you're used to sleeping in darkness then I recommend bringing eyeshades.
Mai was a super friendly host the apt was clean had everything you needed to make for a comfortable stay - can't beat the location close to everything you want to be near in Hong Kong.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Fantastic location with a couple of renowned local eateries a stone's throw away, Airport Express and Central MTR station within easy walking distance, yet quietly nestled away from the hustle and bustle of the nearby financial district. Apartment itself is spacious enough for one (and I reckon up to two) and has most essentials required - although this being HK, didn't get to spend much time in it. The lack of a lift in this block means legging it up several flights of stairs (as host has made known to her credit) but even that is a perfect antidote to the great food and drink the city has to offer. Mai-Britt was most friendly and welcoming, and the whole experience (as a first-time user) was smoother than I'd expected.

Located in the heart of Hong Kong, this apartment is perfect for a weekend in Hong Kong. Mai-Britt is the perfect host, and her apartment is set up to feel spacious and bright despite the tight space common in Hong Kong.

The spot is close to restaurants, shops and the MTR.

Super stay at Mai-Britt's place. Great and clear communication through out. The tasteful apartment is quiet, yet in the middle of the hippest neighborhood, in the center of everything. 
Thank you for a wonderful stay.
I couldn’t ask for more Perfect location and accommodations for living like a hip local!

name: PORTO DOWNTOWN FLATS-RIBEIRA STUDIO
summary: Porto Downtown Flats RIBEIRA STUDIO is a newly remodelled apartment, located in the most beautiful area of Porto. It is situated in Rua São Joao, in the old Ribeira of Porto, an area classified as World´s heritage. Fully equiped kitchen and wi-fi.
interaction: I´m an easy going person and my goal is to make your stay as pleasant as possible.  You´re welcome to ask everything you want at anytime. If you are happy i will be happy!
houseRules: No big rules, just treat the house like it was your home!

host.about:
I´M EAGER TO BE YOUR HOST
ANSIOSO POR SER O SEU ANFITRIÃO

reviews.txt: Teresa was very welcoming and took time to explain whatever was necessary and answer questions about Porto.  The apartment was very nice - just like the photos.  When I mentioned that the apartment hadn't warmed up as much as I'd hoped, she had an additional heater brought by within hours.  The location was so easy, a block and a half from the waterfront restaurant scene, and almost as close to one of the train stations.  We were really happy with our stay!

Apartamento conforme descrito, muito bom.
Fomos bem recebidos e aconselha-se a quem queira conhecer o Porto

This is a very good location for exploring Porto. The studio is excellent - close to all the important city attractions as well to good restaurants and bars. Teresa is a great host. Although we did not meet her personally she made sure that we have everything we need plus we got excellent advice for what to do and see in Porto.
Very functional studio, great location, warm welcoming from the host.
Très bon accueil, logement agréable et très bien situé dans le centre de porto, à quelques mètres du Douro ! Super appartement pour passer un we prolongé, voir une semaine à deux !

We have had an excellent stay in this apartment. 

It is situated just a few steps from the lively historic heart of the beautiful city of Porto. Most of the things you'd like to do are within walking distance: a lot of cultural highlights, shopping, bus/metro/train and of course many Port-houses.

The apartment sits in a somewhat old building which is a contrast to the apartment itself. It has been nicely renovated and has the comfort you would want. It's spacious for a stay with two people. Most of the interior is new and functions properly. This is complemented by nice (and some antique) decorative details.
A pleasant surprise was the smell of freshly baked bread every morning in the staircase. The downstairs neighbour is a bakery where you can get good and cheap bread and your morning espresso.

We have had contact with Teresa through AirBNB, she has been helpful and kind. Tim welcomed us with a gastronomic surprise and even a list of suggestions for our stay in Porto. They are a very hospitable and helpful couple!

Thank you Teresa and Tim!

Teresa and her friend were very kind and welcomed us with a delicate surprise. They were helpful with telling us the best places to visit. The flat is very nice furnished, well equipped an next to a lively street direct in the city centre. We enjoyed our stay and would like to comeback somewhen.
Great place, so clean, great host, easy to reach and happy to please us !

This place is awesome!!
The location is great. Just a couple of mins walk downhill to Cai da Riberia on the river and all the great restaurants and bars there.
The flat itself was spotless and spacious. Perfect for the 2 of us.
Teresa's partner was there to meet us it 12.30am. Let us in, showed us around and offered us a small glass of port and a pastille de nada as a welcome. Very nice.
The bed is extremely comfortable too. Always a bonus. 
Loved this place!
One small drawback was the noise of passing partygoers in the small hours as the flat is on the a bit of a thoroughfare but seriously not a real problem as the bed was so comfortable we just dozed straight off again.
The owners checked in with us via test several times over our 3 day stay to make sure we had everything we needed and were all ok.
Can't fault it. We had a great time here. Hope to come back and stay here again sometime very soon

El departamento es hermoso, la ubicacion privilegiada y el trato de los anfitriones excelente. No se puede pedir mas cuando alguien contrata este servicio. Si alguien piensa viajar a Oporto no dude en que el departamento de Teresa sea una de las mejores opciones para contratar.

name: Large well-lit & quiet room in the Plateau
summary: Fully furnished.  The room has lots of natural light through the day New windows = great insulation from the cold Meshed windows = almost no bugs Each room has its own heating The kitchen has its own balcony and fire exit Anything you need, please don't hesitate to ask!
interaction: Naomi and I will be around to give you advice, tips and any help you need. If there is anything you would like or anything not to your liking, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you! We know the area very well so don't hesitate to ask about anything!
houseRules: Smoking is allowed on the balcony, just not in the house. No shoes when walking around the house unless during a party. We can give you house slippers/flipflops/thongs.  Please leave things the way you found them.  Do not feed the cat, or the squirrels and birds in the balcony. Do not let the cat outside unless you are willing to wait till he comes back in.

host.about: Hello, my housemate Naomi and I are looking forward to hosting you! Montreal has been our home for atleast few years now so we know Montreal very well to be able to give you insider suggestions ;).We can communicate in French, English, German, Hindi. We love to travel and move around ourselves, and understand your needs as a visitor. Search for us on Face book and Couchsurfing if you would like to know more. We are involved in Science, Psychology, Engineering and Entrepreneurship and are familiar with different types of dance, martial arts, sports, and music. We are easygoing although we like being active, and can easily find a way to relate to you!  If you need anything at all, please don't hesitate to let us know during your stay, and we'd be happy to provide it.

reviews.txt: Yannick était en voyage donc nous avons rencontré ses colocataires. Elles sont fort sympathiques. Draps et  serviettes étaient fournies. L'appartement est propre, silencieux et bien placé. On a même eu droit à une part de gâteau de pendaison de crémaillère ! Je recommande.

the time in yannick's place was really nice. his roommates welcomed us perfectly and his room had lots of space for all our luggage. the area has a lot to offer, shops, bars and restaurants and the park is close by. we can only recommend the place.

Yannick's roommates were perfect hosts! The area was great as it was walking distance to Mont Royal with tons of coffee shops and everything you can imagine. It was also only a 5 min walk to the Mont Royal subway station so it was very easy to get around to anywhere. The apartment was exactly as described on the photos.
Le logement est super bien placé à 5/10 min du métro Mont Royal au coeur du Plateau ! Audrey et Johanna les colloques de Yannick nous ont super bien accueilli et mis à l'aise.
Nous avons fait 3 airbnb à Montréal avant d'arriver chez Yannick et nous pouvons dire qu'une chose : c'est définitivement le meilleur !

Yannick is a helpful host for local events, eateries and getting around. The apt is a classic third floor walk up in the "Plateau", on the rise near Mt Royal. Great location. Easy access to metro subways, buses and very walkable.  Close to restaurants and shopping. He is on a one way, quiet street. If youre driving parking can be limited or unavailable so scope the neighborhood and watch the signs! There is a Montreal parking app and Metro Transit app that are very helpful, and Yannick can help you strategize for a spot.

Yannick is a helpful, warm host, and responds to queries quickly. The location is great - walking to cafes, restaurants and shops and there is lots of character in this part of Montreal. The bed is comfortable and the apartment is tasteful and interesting. Highly recommend.

name: Luxury 1-Bdrm in Downtown Brooklyn
summary: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings.
interaction: The host will be available by telephone, text, email or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to help you during your stay.
houseRules: RESPECT IT & ENJOY IT! NO SMOKING -- this building, per the on-site management and the individual lease agreements, is a 100% SMOKE-FREE ZONE including both private and communal roof-top areas, the unit itself, and any other public areas within the building and the communal property regardless of whether inside or out. You must be totally off of the premises and on public property to smoke. If you're a regular smoker and feel you'll have a hard time following this rule, then we kindly suggest you look into another property. Evidence of smoking will result in a complete forfeit of your security deposit. NOISE: We have a zero-tolerance policy with noise complaints. We ask that you please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. QUIET HOURS are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM (week) and 11:00 PM to 9:00 AM (weekends). NO LARGE GATHERINGS/PARTIES VISITORS: We ask that all guests let us know in advance if you plan on having any visitors during your stay. We do ask that the number of visi

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about:
I'm an executive at a wellness company in New York City. Educated in Fashion at Parsons, I'm into fitness and nutrition. I've lived in the city since enrolling at Parsons in the late 90s.

If you're looking for restaurant reservations, boutique fitness studios, or things to do in the city, then just let me know what you're interested in. I'd love to offer some suggestions and help you have a wonderful stay in New York City.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Modern West Kowloon Based Apartment
summary: single bedroom available for rent. Good for people on business or have lay overs in Hong Kong or family holidays Safe, Convenient, Accessible, Cosy apartment.  This apartment is located in west Kowloon Tai Kok Tsui Area. it is very easy to access the MTR (Train) stations and get to Hong Kong Island or the new territories, also great to relax in doors. can provide a list of help items if required.
interaction: I can be contacted with (Hidden by Airbnb) messager, WE Chat, email, (Hidden by Airbnb) .

address.street: Tai Kok Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: this was my first experience to visit Hongkong with my family. wr are 3 person includr a toddler... we really enjoyed our stay in Govinda's apartment during our trip in HK... this room maybe not spacious, but already good enough for us since you cant meet such a comfortable place if you stay in hotel at HK.... there are 2 rooms but unfortunately I can only use 1 room since the weather is really cold there on december so I decided to sleep on the living room. the room is really cool since its near to the window, but still we still so happy coz we can put our things on that empty room. there are also a kitchen with very complete utensil and ingredients, and the owner are generous enough to let us use them. the bathroom is quite small but it's doesnt matter at all coz there are hot water so we can warm up our body. my conclusion is we are so happy to live there and hope we can stay there again if we come back to HK. the neighbourhood is really good too, you can put your laundry on the shopping mall neat the apartment. there are some nice restaurants too nearby and dont worry the transportation is really easy too. there are so many stand by taxis in front of the lobby of the apartment.

Apart from the two hiccups involving the metal gate that locked me out (since govinda didn't mention any instructions on how to open it i assumed it was going to remain unlocked) the rest of the stay was ok. Govinda was friendly and the place comfortable.
Quite and beautiful
Amazing host! Recommend for short stays.

Govinda was gracious to accept my request for accommodation at a very short notice. In spite of his busy schedule he also took out some time to spend with me and helped me in getting around. 
The building is very nice with a lot of security for the safety and comfort of the residents. There’s a nice park right outside the building for relaxing and for walking. A small Thai restaurant across the park serves very good food. Must try. A convenience store next to the building and availability of taxi and public transport close by makes it very easy to commute. Over all a nice neighbourhood to stay.

name: Vista magnifica mar,lagoa,montanha.
summary: Sol da manhã,andar alto, aconchegante,cheio de charme , perto aos eventos Rio 2016 e shoppings como Barra Shopping, New York e casas de show. Rodoviaria BRT.Metrô direto para Copacabana.Onibus na porta para Zona Sul.Predio com total seguranca.
interaction: Recepcionando os hóspedes dando dicas sobre o bairro, comodidades do prédio e o condominio. Entrarei sempre em contato para alguma ajuda, se necessária e  telefone para alguma emergência.
houseRules: O Hóspede não poderá levar mais de tres pessoas além  dele ,pois o apartamento só comporta 04 pessoas confortavelmente. Na chegada ele assinará um Termo de Estadia da Administração do prédio e nele constará o nome das 04  pessoas que serão hospedadas, caso haja uma quinta pessoas , não será permitida a entrada dela, por esse motivo que não é cobrada a taxa extra para hóspede a mais. O preço da diária  é só para 04 pessoas.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: I stayed for the Olympics, and the apartment was great.  I mostly just slept there, but it was very comfortable.  The host and her family were very welcoming.  I would recommend staying here!

Aluguei o apartamento da Ana durante as olimpíadas e foi super bacana a experiência. Ana e Wladimir são pessoas muito queridas,  de fácil trato e sempre dispostos a ajudar no que fosse preciso. A vista do apto é deslumbrante e a localização ótima, na beira da praia. fiquei super satisfeito! Recomendo a todos que quiserem um espaço acolhedor na barra!

El departamento de Ana es muy amplio y cómodo. Mis 3 amigos y yo pasamos una estadía excelente. Ana y su esposo contestaron inmediatamente todas nuestras dudas y fueron muy amables. /// Ana's apartment its so big and  confortable. Muy 3 friends and i spend an exelent time there. Ana and her husband answered our request inmediatly anda they were kind.
Otima localizacao, limpo e conveniente.

Apartamento funcional, caprichoso na decoração e de fato com uma vista incrível. Está no posto 8 da Barra, só atravessar a avenida para praia. Para ir à região mais badalada da Barra é necessário o carro. Anfitriões simpáticos e comunicação fluida.

name: Elegance and Peace in Potts Point
summary: My beautifully renovated Art Deco studio apartment is in the heart of Kings Cross, yet so peaceful and quiet. New bathroom and modern kitchen, in the Art Deco tradition, are stunning to be in. A Sleeping Duck queen bed which is absolutely fabulous, 4G unlimited wifi, high quality washer/dryer and dishwasher. Fully self contained!
interaction: Either I or my partner Don will meet you with the keys and show you the apartment and how to use the appliances. Please ask us any questions about the area and we are not far away if you need anything.
houseRules: Please enter and leave the building quietly. This is a non smoking home. Be respectful of my home with care and consideration. Please take your trash out to the bins in front of the building and leave my place as you found it!

host.location: Elizabeth Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host.about: I love Sydney and all her natural beauty.  I immigrated here many years ago and still get excited every time I step out the door. I know this city well and can help you with information and tips. Bird watching and snorkelling are high on my list of things to do. I also love hosting people and making sure they feel at home in my home. Mi casa es su casa.

reviews.txt:
Mariana was a great host.She was kind,warm, and always helpful.
I had a great 3 month stay at Mariana's (Website hidden by Airbnb) location,it was clean,well equipped,everything was well prepared.And clean big bathtub,I was enjoyed every bath time.
The studio apartment was exactly what I needed. It was quiet, and had a very comfy new bed. Thank you Mariana for your assistance and the flowers throughout the apartment made it so homely.

Mariana's place is great!  It's in a fantastic location off Macleay Street with lots of cafes and restaurants on the doorstep as well as easy access to the City via train at KingsX and buses.  It also is an easy walk down to Rushcutters Bay park and the water if you're looking for a bit of peace and tranquility. The apartment itself is very quiet  at the back of the buildings and well away from the buzz of Macleay St.  It has also been brilliantly and neatly designed by Mariana with a great bathroom and kitchen with high quality appliances and a really comfortable bed as well as lots of nice  Art Deco touches.  Mariana is a fantastic host - really open and friendly,  and generously invited us to use anything in the kitchen and bathroom cupboards.  We would highly recommend Mariana's apartment and Mariana as a host - and would definitely stay here again.
Great central location of the apartment. It's perfect for two people for a few nights. It's truly a studio but Mariana has done a great job putting all the basics in.

Well decorated studio apartment great for couples or single travelers. The apartment is newer and has a great efficiency kitchen with all appliances you need in addition to a nice bathroom.

The view looks into an inner space in between apartments and you can see into the neighbors kitchen, but nothing new if you have stayed in big city airbnbs.

The apartment did not have A/C at the time of stay, I would recommend this place as long as it's cooler outside or more fans were brought in.

The location is phenomenal. Lots of restaurants and a few coffee shops nearby with easy access to Kings Cross Station for your metro needs.

Great stay overall!
Great find in a charming building. The apartment is well appointed and the communication and service was fantastic. Will definitely stay again!

Beautiful apartment, very central location (I walked to the city one day) in fabulous Potts Point. The apartment had everything I needed (including a bathtub!) and the host was delightful. Highly recommended and I would definitely come back here.

the apartment is perfectly located. It is located within walking distance of the city center. public transport is also very close to the apartment. everything that was needed was a in the equipment flat. everything was very well organized. I would heartily recommend!
Beautiful place close to everything, quiet and clean with very nice touches and a super comfortable bed. Really enjoyed our stay!

Mariana is a fantastic host. She is very friendly and it was very easy to communicate with her.  We love her (Website hidden by Airbnb) is  well equipped and very clean.  There were many cafes nearby and King Cross Stn was a short walk away. We highly recommend this apartment.

name: Unit 414 Luxurious Top Floor Condo Great Views
summary: If you prefer high-end living, this condo is for you!  It is fully renovated and gorgeous with amazing ocean and courtyard views!   Kana'i A Nalu is a quiet resort on the ocean front away from the road.  This complex sits  on a 3-mile stretch of white sand beach that spans almost the entire Ma'alaea Bay. Wonderful for romantic sunset strolls or for a beach run.   This property is located less than a mile walking distance to Ma'alaea Harbor and centrally located between South and North Maui.
interaction: We live here on Maui and are available by telephone and e-mail Please follow the rules in the check-in documents that you will receive by email less than 60 days prior to check-in date
houseRules: MVFA LLC dba Maui Vision Rentals (Agent) Cancellation, Deposit & Booking Policies Rental Rules: Guest agrees to abide by the Rental Rules.  Guest shall cause all members of the rental party and anyone else Guest permits on the property to abide by the following rules at all times while at the property including rules posted at the condominium complex.  By accepting this reservation and paying for the rental, guest enters the condo agreeing to all terms and conditions of this agreement and accepts responsibility for all guests of the property. Guest shall not permit any use of the pool by unsupervised children.  An adult Guest must accompany children and be present at all times. Guest and other invitees shall use the pool at their own risk.  Please respect the posted rules. Mandatory Occupancy Disclosures: You must disclose to us the exact number and names of guests (subject to maximum) who will be occupying the Property during the rental term.  You must immediately notify us, by phone

host.about:
I am the owner of Maui Vision Rental. Maui Vision became a reality and a business starting with my personal condo at the Kihei Akahi Resort C618.

Maui Vision is a business I love because I get to share the Aloha Spirit, the beauty of the land, and talk story with people from around the world. It is nice to know that we can contribute to someone’s Hawaiian vacation experience in a positive way. We love to hear back from our happy guests.

I used to live on the island of Oahu with my US Navy family when I was young.  We later moved to Southern California.  I knew one day I would return to Hawaii, the place I fell in love with long ago. I took a leap of faith and purchased my Maui condo June 2002 this was the beginning of fulfilling her prophecy to once again return to Hawaii soil.

I am a tropical expression artist who paints on canvas and etched metal.  My work is inspired by the beauty of the islands and has been displayed in several Maui art galleries over the years.  I am a writer and have my first book on Amazon.  I recently took up hula dancing and love to immerse myself in the culture and grace of this island.

I have over 25 years of business administration and customer service experience working for large corporations and high tech startups.

If you are in need of a caring Realtor here on Maui, please contact Kathy McCartney RS#77317 of La Costa Realty Hawai’i, LLC Brokerage Lic #18349 .

reviews.txt: This is a beautiful condo!  The unit is exactly as seen in the pictures.  Very nicely renovated with all the needed condiments and supplies.  Unit is on the 4th floor so it has a beautiful view.  Location is perfect.  Right in the middle of the island and central to all the things we wanted to see and do.  Building is nice and quiet.  Beach is beautiful for taking long walks and the breeze keeps things nice and cool.  Kathy was fantastic to work with.  She provided everything we needed in advance along with recommendations for things to see and do and places to eat.  She responded extremely quickly to any questions or concerns during our stay.  Would highly recommend and would definitely return!  Thank you for making our stay in Maui so enjoyable!
Description was spot on, quiet building, excellent aminities. Will stay again!

The house is simply amazing. The location is perfect, in the middle of th Island, and the condo is literally by he ocean. The sound of the ocean at night... We'll miss that! 

It's also fully equipped. I can't think of anything we needed that wasn't already there: beach towels, swimming pool noodles, picnic bag, kickboards... You name it! 

Same thing with the kitchen. High-end appliances and enough pans and tableware to cook and serve a full thanksgiving meal.

100% recommended!

Beautiful condo, location is great for anything you want to do on Maui, kitchen has everything you could possibly need to prepare meals.  We had extra towels and blankets.  Towels for the beach and pool.  Kathy has thought of everything.  Wifi access and TV were also awesome when we returned from  a fun filled day to relax.

Excellent Property and Excellent location.  I secured this property for a client.  They enjoyed their stay immensely.  Host reported a carpet stain afterward, however I cannot pursue compensation without photos.  So other than that----excellent experience.

This was my first trip to Hawaii and having used Airbnb successfully before, I was looking forward to our stay! While I can usually overlook most shortcomings, the list was too many to ignore here. Wide angle pictures & professionally written listing descriptions will impress most - however, here are some takes from my REAL customer experience at the 414 condo:

"We will provide you with a special code to access the condo after you are booked and paid in full."

- After a 13 day stay, we were charged a "half day rate" for a late checkout for 5 hours over our contracted stay. During our last day, we ended up being locked out of the condo. Thankfully the late checkout fee was refunded due to this situation. Not quite the goodbye from our paradise as we hoped for.

"This unit includes a window A/C in the living room should you need it although we find it is rarely needed because the tradewinds keep you comfortable."

- The AC unit is a measly 12" by 32" window unit that had trouble keeping even the living room & kitchen areas cool. If 86 degrees in your bedroom while sleeping is "comfortable", then this might be the place for you.

"This setting is wonderful for romantic sunset strolls. For the more active person this is a great beach to run on as you can do so for miles in peace away from the crowds."  -- "Three miles of quiet sandy beach will entice you to walk, run, or build sand castles."

- Haycraft Park is roughly 500 feet away from the beach directly in front of this condo, and it was filled with people every day. Half the time we were here, there were campers there who stayed all day and over night with big fish lines across the entire beach. There may be other listings with better seclusion. 

"This unit is spacious and bright."

- Spacious? That's a stretch. But bright? You're absolutely spot on. If you enjoy sleeping in the dark, this place might NOT be for you. Waking up at 530am is ideal for the lighting of this condo, ever with the window shades (which many times had trouble coming down since they are on automatic motors). 

A POSITIVE NOTE:
One thing I cannot get over is the real Mahalo spirit of everyone staying and living at the Kana'i A Nalu resort. While my mother in law and 16 month old daughter got locked out on the last day, many guests there offered help, water, and to hang in their condos while we tried to wait patiently to get back in. The resort has an amazing location and even better spirit within its guests.
Beautiful condo. Fully renovated. Very responsive. Wonderfully stay

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. It is just as pictured and so much more!  I couldn’t imagine staying anywhere else when visiting Maui. The location is convenient to get to many of the must-sees in Maui. The beds are amazingly comfortable. Kathy was great to work with. I highly recommend you consider staying here.

This unit was very cozy and had a great location.  It has been updated and was very nice in the accommodations!  The host was great to work with and the overall experience was a vacation of a life-time!

The condo is set up very nice. The kitchen is equipped very well and has all amenities. Bedrooms and bathrooms have a good size for a vacation. It would be nice to have a full size dining table, but we've used the kitchen counter instead, which worked for us.
Note that Maalaea is probably the most windy spot on the island and you'll have wind noises from the trees all day and night long. The condo complex features a nice courtyard with grass and a small pool and direct access to the beach and ocean.

name: 1 sunny bedroom in large St-Henri appartment
summary: The apartment  is located in the  up and coming neighbourhood St. Henri. Close to new hip cafés and restaurants, as well as Canal Lachine and metro station. The apartment is very spacious, with two closed bedrooms and a shared backyard.
interaction: We would like to welcome our guests when they arrive.  As people who love travelling, we'd be very happy to have dinner together and share tips about Montreal! We value friendly and respectful relationship with airbnb guests. Please let us know if you have any question.
houseRules: We'd like to have friendly and respectful guests.

reviews.txt:
Nous avons passer un excellent séjour chez Kim! Son appartement est genial, propre et très proche du centre ville. La rue est tout de même calme le soir pour bien se reposer! Merci encore Kim, tu es quelqu'un d'adorable!

N'hesitez pas à faire affaire avec Kim, vous serez pas déçu.:)

el apartamento era justo como ella lo describió y nos gusto mucho. 
el barrio fue seguro y conveniente para los restaurantes y el transporte. Kim fue muy amable y comunicativa. Kim tiene una colección de discos y escuche mucho a los strokes. Les recomiendo este apartamento si se van a quedar en montreal.

name: Downtown Exposed Brick Studio
summary: Amazing loft style apartment in the heart of the action  in downtown Montréal with a private patio and shared backyard. Come stay on the doorstep of some of Montréal's top restaurants with all of the top attractions within a hop a skip and a jump.
interaction: I will do my best to greet my guests if they would like upon their arrival. In case I cannot make it, however, I of course will ensure sure to be available by communication (either through Airbnb or phone) should they have any needs to be addressed and/or questions!
houseRules: Check-in time is 3:00pm, check-out is 11:00am. Please remove your shoes while inside. Please don't use our towels to remove makeup - you'd think this was obvious and not worth mentioning, but you'd be wrong. And of course, no smoking inside the apartment; kindly head onto the patio (and use the ashtray).

host.about:
Once someone described me as "without guile". Best compliment I've ever received. 

I'm a native Vancouverite and a current Montréalais. Je suis à l'aise dans les langues de Molière et de Shakespeare. I'm pretty easy going, and like most everyone I love a beer on a hot day.

reviews.txt: Tyler was a great host and gave very prompt replies. The apartment was quite clean and in an amazing neighbourhood that was close to many stores, restaurants and subway stations. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone!

Tyler was amazing, friendly and very accommodating! The apartment was clean and in an excellent location, walking distance to restaurants and all areas of the city. We really felt at home and we would definitely love to stay here again our next time in Montreal! Tyler ensured that we were happy during our stay and we would definitely recommend to anyone!

Good location and great apartment; just as described. Didn't meet Tyler but information was clear and check in went smoothly. Small issue with the parking spot but in the end we managed to leave the car there during our stay. Think we managed to pick out the coldest day of the week so after exploring the city we enjoyed a cosy night in, watching Netflix :) Would definitely stay here again if we return to Montréal.

Tyler's apartment is located in downtown Montreal at a very convenient location. There are numerous bars and restaurants in the area. And the metro is only a few blocks away. This made getting around really easy. 

The apartment itself is lovely. Spacious, well lit and clean. It even has Netflix for the time you spend indoors. All this helped to make our visit pleasurable. 

While Tyler was not around, he provided all the details required for us to access the apartment via text. This went off without a hiccup. 

Oh yes, there is a dedicated parking space too. Which is always a bonus when you have a car in the city.

Overall, I would definitely chose to stay here again when I visit Montreal. Thanks Tyler!

Tyler was very friendly and welcoming. he's prompt in his replies and provides very good dining and drinks suggestions. 

His apartment was great as well. Clean and tidy. The location is perfect too. There were many eateries and bars around. The parking provided was very near the apartment too. 

Thanks for having us!

Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Tyler, son logement est très bien situé, tt est facile d'accès à pieds ou en transports... L'appartement a apparemment été rénové eecemment et a une déco sonre et contemporaine.

Our stay at Tyler's place was great. He made sure that his friend meets us upon our arrival, shows us the parking and the apartment, even though we arrived quite late.
The apartment itself is very nice, with lots of character and effort put in its renovation and decoration. It is located on a quiet street, but just steps from Rue St Catherine where all the shops and restaurants are. Having an assigned parking spot was amazing.
Overall, we would definitely stay at Tyler's place again should we need a place in Downtown Montreal in the future.

This was our first time in Montréal and the apartment location, space, and value could not have been more perfect. The space itself is cozy, clean, minimal but with with character, with a parking space nearby and a little back porch. It's in the middle of the action, near restaurants and centrally located to all the things we wanted to do in Montréal. Kitchen was well appointed. Tyler was very helpful and responsive. We will be back for sure!

Spent a lovely few days in Montreal, in Tyler's studio. The apartment was precisely as described. Clean and beautifully set. The neighbourhood was perfect for what we were looking for. Located minutes from all the shops and awesome restaurants. And quite a close reach to all the sights; Port and Plateau was a short Uber away. All in all, the perfect weekend at a lovely Studio. Thanks much, Tyler!

Tyler did a wonderful job of accommodating our late arrival time. He got us our keys quickly, and the apartment was in wonderful condition! It looked exactly like the photos. The building was in a very trendy area within walking distance of shops, bars, restaurants and metro stops.

name: BEACH ESCAPE
summary: Summer is here enjoy the beach on your door step, work on that tan or simply unwind .Perfect for Winter getaways also enjoy a nice glass of wine by the open fire, or Perhaps a soak in the spa overlooking Pittwater. Located on the beach, you'll feel like your miles away from anywhere a tranquil setting for any holiday.  Drift off to sleep with the sound of the waves lapping up on the beach.  The House is spilt over 4 levels with a lounge room on each level , lots of space for adults & children.
interaction: Guest will be left alone to enjoythe space, should they require any help I'm only a text message away.

host.about:
I Like to make sure that all guests are comfortable and can get the most out of what Sydney and the northern Beaches has to offer.

Love the finer things in life , the best of the best.

My motto is try to be the best person you can and look after one another
 "Life's too short"

reviews.txt: Amazing place, very clean on arrival. They were always available for any questions we had. It was a great stay!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay, Bailey was a fantastic host, extremely accommodating. The property and location was better than we expected.
Bailey had stocked the fridge and pantry with a few of the essentials for our arrival, a very welcoming touch. Bedrooms and living areas were large and very comfortable. Tranquil location, with beautiful views of Pittwater.
Looking forward to our next stay at Bailey's place.
we loved our stay in avalon. place was amazing. views were great and the community was just lovely

Amazing house with direct access to the beach and private jetty. We had a ball! (Website hidden by Airbnb) you can think of IS in the house. This is not one of those properties that have "RENTAL" written all over it, this is a HOME. 
Breakfasts on the verandah overlooking  the water and the sound of waves crashing against the shore is something special. 
The house is large enough for a large group, where everyone is comfortably accommodated yet have enough privacy to feel completely disconnected from the group due to the bedrooms being located over three different levels. 
Tip: you might want to grab a sleeping eye mask as it get pretty bright in the house once the sun is up.

Loved our stay at Bailey amazing home in Avalon! The quality of decor and all his pieces throughout the house very tastefully done. Didn't want to leave and the view from the deck is breathtaking. Down a few steps off the deck and you are swimming in the clear waters of Pittwater.
Accommodated our large group very well and hope to return again. 
Thanks Bailey for the starter pack in the kitchen. Yummy! Great host! 
Cheers Liz

An awesome and amazing house that just made for such a relaxing and easy weekend away. The view is just stunning and the house is very nicely decorated with all the essentials. Loved that the house had access to a private beach. Bailey was so easy to communicate with and always replied promptly to any questions. Thank you for making our stay so lovely.

Bailey was a great host! 
He responded immediately to the reservation and got us out of a sticky situation! 
The house is absolutely amazing! Has beach acess and the best view of Pittwater! We had the best backdrop and wedding photos! 
The house is super clean! Modern and comfortable beds. The 4 levels and total of 14 bedroom just gave everyone that extra room to breath and space to move! 
We will definitely be back!
Great place, very special spot. Private access to the beach and spacious home, great for large groups. Go for it!!
Beautiful, tranquil location on beach. Excellent for entertaining and kids. Place was very clean and well-appointed.
One of the most amazing places I have been to. 100% recommend it

name: LUXURY! 3BR ,Bathtub, 1min MTR 4-9ppl
summary: NEWLY (JULY 2016) and LUXURY Bathtub apartment with 3-Bedrooms and Kitchen in the very center of HK.  It fit 4-9 people and is centrally located close to Causeway Bay MTR (1 min by walk) and Airport Bus A11 (1 min by walk) **We have also list other apartment.**    Contact us to know more :)
interaction: Please contact us through Airbnb, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), SMS or local call if you have any queries. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 如果您有任何疑问 欢迎使用的Airbnb,(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN),短信或本地电话联系我们
houseRules: 1. Please do not put towels on the floor as floor carpets. 2. Please turn off the water heater after finish to prevent to be over-heated. 3. For safety and energy saving concerns, please turn off the lights, water heater, and air conditioning after you leave. 4. Please open the door with the handle gentlely. 5. NO smoking 6. Please leave re-mote controls on the table when you check-out.  Early check-in or late check-out can be arranged without charges. It will depend on the booking on that day availability and must alert me up-front. I will arrange a place for you to leave your luggage if requested. If you need to check-in late or check-out early, please inform me ahead of time.

host.about: I LOVE HONG KONG. I LOVE traveling.:)

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: 房源地理位置頗佳,無論購物或用餐都非常方便｡房源剛新裝修,家具､裝潢新簇,牙刷､毛巾準備齊全,房東還蠻細心連雨傘都準備好｡好幾次碰到問題,房東也會儘快回覆及即時處理!
房间真的很不错,今后会介绍给朋友
My host Wilson was really helpful and nice. The accommodation was pretty good and it is actually superb for Hong Kong standards.
房间很新,很漂亮,整洁,很棒

房东人非常nice,早早就和我联系,全程沟通顺畅｡房源地理位置极佳,去时代广场､希慎广场5分钟路程｡内部装修一新､整洁｡

缺点:我们原先6个人入住因此选了这套房源,最终4个人入住｡个人认为最多6人已饱和｡当晚恰逢下大雨,雨水打在空调板上的声音非常大,特别是小房,因此睡得不算舒适｡洗澡时,花洒的水过小,马桶冲一次水要等很久｡

总而言之,若是6人入住,算是性价比高的选择｡也谢谢房东的帮忙｡
Great place, very clean and Wilson is a superb host.

This is our first experience to book an accommodation with Airbnb and it's fantastic! Best location for anyone who wants the easiest access to all types of transportation for work or for leisure. As for parents like us travelling with an elderly and two active young children, Wilson's apartment is the best to meet our needs. Not only it is so clean and safe for kids, its convenient location allows us to return for nap and rest when kids are tired between our busy holiday schedules. Wilson is so approachable and very thoughtful in many details.
Clean linens, towels, kitchenware, clothes washing powder, indoor storable clothes liner, refills of every consumable daily essential items eg toilet papers, tissues etc.
There are some stairs upon entry into lobby/lift of the building but it is a very common feature in Hong Kong. You can open the French-door-type glass doors fully before you enter with big luggages. The building guards/administrators on duty are very friendly too.
Surprisingly, it's so quiet and comfortable to sleep, considering its prime location in one of the busiest parts of Hong Kong. Eating, shopping, sightseeing...all within walking distance or so easy for additional transportation when preferred.
Thank you for making our stay in Hong Kong so memorable.
Strongly recommended!

We didn't meet Wilson but he made things easy the day before checking in Wilson had sent me a email with all the info I needed to get into his place which was awesome. The location was great it was close to the MTR/public transportation, restaurants, market, etc... The only con to the location is that it was a little hard to get a taxi because coming out of the building cars are not allowed to stop in that area so you would have to walk a bit when taking/coming from a taxi. This has nothing to do with wilson but I thought I would mention it anyways the elevator in this building is extremely slow. The apartment was decent, it didn't wow me or anything but as expected places in HK are small. For a group of 9 it was a bit tight but that didn't bother us since we were out most of the time. The apartment looks pretty much like the pictures there is one thing I would like to say is I wish Wilson would have taken pictures of the second bathroom to his place kus it was tiny. I'm a really tiny girl and even I had a hard time in there. So that probably would have changed my mind on picking his place to stay because we were really looking for a 2 bathroom place. I mean yes the small restroom is considered as 1 but it was so tiny that we didnt even use the shower in it kus it  was tiny but oh wells. Overall our stay was fine but I did feel like the floors could have been a bit more clean.
非常棒的地段,交通非常方便,房间非常整洁,格局也比较合理,但提醒有一间最小的卧室床比较小,需要考虑好尺寸,整个房子不大,个人觉得最大的房间可以住一家三口或者四口,上下铺的,大小一样的双人床,中间房间是一张双人床,最小的房间适合比较娇小的人,客厅住人的话应该睡得不太舒服,是沙发,房东的提示一直非常清楚,我们入住退房都非常顺利,附近还有好吃的饭店,很赞｡
地理位置非常棒!两个正常房间,一个单人位,两个沙发床,厨房和卫生间都还不错!唯一的不足就是床品不是很充裕,而且偏硬｡但是房东沟通无障碍,还在最后一天给我们延长至12点退房,感谢!妈妈很满意!

name: Cozy place in Hong Kong Island
summary: Great location near to Wan Chai and Admiralty MTR station. Walkable distance to many fabulous restaurants in town. Good for both business or leisure traveller.
interaction: I have a day job, but I work relatively close to home. I can offer help by call or in person if needed.
houseRules: - No shoes in the house - Do not open the windows in the kitchen

host.about: Frequent traveler who likes to know more about the locals in addition to the sightseeing.

address.street: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: It's really a great and sweet house. Carmen is so nice lady. The last day we went out buying tickets and forgot checkout time. Carmen reminded us won't be worry and wait in patience.

It's very clear and quiet.

Very good

房主的房间非常的整洁,同时也非常的温馨 周边环境也很好｡
    房间地点离地铁站不远,步行5分钟即可到达｡离铜锣湾只要一个地铁站,也可以步行前往金紫荆广场｡
    房主很友好也很热情,向我们简单交代了一些注意事项,还提供了一些游览建议｡
    总之,这是一次非常好的住宿体验｡
Carmen’s apartment is cosy, clean and well located. Carmen did her best to help us every time we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Carmen is a nice and warm host. Her place is small but cosy and very convenient. The location is perfect to visit HK : both close to lively areas at night, and to nature paths for an early jogging.

The flat is cosy and very well located, and Carmen was really helpful throughout our stay! Just be aware that the apartment may not be suitable for 3 tall adults (as it was our case), as beds are very small.

There are 2 types of AirBnBs - one feels like a hotel and the other is someone's actual home. This is the latter - do not expect a hotel experience. Location is great (Star St in Wanchai has boutique shops & nice restaurants, you're less than 5 min walk from the MTR and less than 30 min walk to Central). Building is more modern than most in the area, with a doorman and elevator. Apartment has an open view (not easy to come by on HK island!) Carmen keeps her place tidy and well equipped with everything you need. Bed is short (as others have noted) and the sofa is small too. Bathroom is basic but shower has hot water and ok pressure. Kitchen is tiny but there is plenty of space in the fridge and a water boiler. Carmen is friendly and super responsive! Bottom line: Great for a couple of nights only.

I stayed with my parents and it was great to have a separated bedroom from them. The apartment was not huge because of HongKong's high population density, but it was simply decorated and comfortable enough!  Some of visitors were too tall for the bed but with my 155cm height, I had no problem sleeping on it.  Hot water from shower was abundant. The view of skyscrapers from windows was good. I could even partly see New Years fireworks from windows. 

Apartment concierges were at a ground floor 24 hours. They open the entrance door when you come home. Some of them can communicate in English. They are all kind and helpful.

Carmen was super kind and communicative host. Her indication was accurate and helpful. She kindly left an octopus card for visitors to charge and use. 

There is a washing machine in a listing but HongKong was too humid to dry laundry fast.  You can use a laundry shop next to the apartment. They wash and clean your laundry in a day.

The location was only a few minutes from a tram station. 
Walkable distance from Central and Causeway Bay. 

There are many towns in HongKong but I am totally satisfied with staying in Wanchai. 
Wanchai has modern skyscrapers, hipster attractions, and daily local markets and small restaurants.  St Francis street looked very sophisticated and I didn’t feel unsafe. In front of the apartment, there are rainbow stairs which looks like an Instagram shooting spot and a lot of foreign people were taking photos. If you are a vegetarian, I strongly recommend a restaurant “天然齋 Green Veggie” 15min from the apartment.

name: Vacances de reve à Espinho (Porto)
summary: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal.
interaction: En cas de besoin, mon amie Maria (qui parle français, portugais et anglais) est disponible sur place pour vous apporter toute l'aide nécessaire.  Elle vous donnera de précieux conseils pour votre séjour.  Nous sommes nous mêmes disponibles par téléphone tout au long de votre séjour.
houseRules: Nous vous remercions de ne pas fumer à l'interieur de l'appartement.

host.about:
Habitant en Charente Maritime, nous sommes tombés amoureux du nord du Portugal.
Nous souhaitons vous faire decouvrir ce magnifique pays.

reviews.txt: Logement situé dans un quartier typique à proximité des activités de pêche. L'appartement est spacieux, fonctionnel, proche de toutes les commodités et dispose de tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer de très bonnes vacances. Marie est une excellente hôte, attentive au bien-être des locataires. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Espinho, d'où nous avons rayonné sur tout le centre et le nord du pays. La proximité de la plage à moins de 5 minutes à pied permet également de très belles soirées estivales. Hôte que je te recommande pleinement!

Logement très propre, Maria nous a super bien accueillis avec des boissons fraîches dans le frigo comme cadeau de bienvenue. Marie est très facilement joignable.


Superbe expérience AirBnb, je recommande vivement ce logement. Très bon quartier pour découvrir la pêche portugaise.

Un appartement plus que parfait, une hôte   très å l écoute disponible, un accueil chaleureux de la part de Maria nous a fait nous sentir en très å l aise.nous recommandons fortement cet appartement pour son emplacement idéal, son calme, sa propreté et son prix plus que correct. Il est très bien équipé de la table à repasser å la machine à laver et sèche linge enfin liste trop (Website hidden by Airbnb) terminerai en remerciant les propriétaires pour ces vacances formidables.
Muy buen sitio

The apartment is really nice. All you need is there.
Maria is very beautiful. Thanks
Peter
Marie and Maria were very helpful. The apartment was clean and we found everything we needed. Just as described.
Una casa muy amplia con un trato muy bueno. Estancia muy amplia y limpia, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La playa está a dos minutos andando, pueblo muy tranquilo. Hemos estado muy agusto.

Une semaine très agréable ! Un appartement très bien situez ! Avec une hôte très a l'écoute ! Un petit hic mais tout petit minuscule il manquais les première nécessité gel douche papier toilette etc ! C'est toujours mieux pour se sentir vraiment à l'aise ! A part sa rien à redire et propriétaire très gentille aussi au passage !
El alojamiento está bien, suficientemente equipado pero lejos del centro de la ciudad.

name: The Porto Concierge - Beach Manor
summary: Totally renovated and fully furnished apartment with sea view in vibrant Porto beach area. Lots of bars, restaurants and shops are just around the corner.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Porto Concierge Service will be 24/7 available for you during all your stay.
houseRules: - Smoking is not allowed inside the apartment.  Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out.  We request that guests leave the dishes and the kitchen clean and empty out the trash, there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby.  The apartment is cleaned prior to each arrival. Please, keep the apartment tidy and clean as reasonably possible during all the time of your occupancy. If you require extra cleaning during your stay, please contact us - we will arrange it.  PLEASE TAKE CARE of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please call.  The neighbors appreciate some peace and quiet as do our guest, please keep the noise level to a minimum between 22h and 8h.  Use the place as if it were your own.  Check out time is at 11h.  The person that made the reservation will be responsible for any

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

reviews.txt:
A estadia no Beach Manor excedeu as expectativas. O apartamento tem condições ótimas de habitabilidade, é espaçoso e apresenta bons acabamentos de reconstrução. Os equipamentos de cozinha são de boa qualidade, o mobiliário e a decoração de bom gosto.
A localização do apartamento na Foz do Douro, o passeio marítimo, os seus jardins, as esplanadas e as praias, tornam este lugar privilegiado.
Voltaremos por todas estas razões e pela simpatia da assistente que nos recebeu, o diligente apoio telefónico do Jorge e o profissionalismo da Concierge.

We enjoyed our stay here very much!  The place was very clean and comfortable.  It was right by the ocean, shops, grocery store, restaurants and bars.  The flat was modern and new.  Highly recommended.  Transportation (bus) nearby.   Wonderful!

We stayed at the appartment for 5 days and had a nice stay. It's nearby the sea in a quiet area of porto. You find everthing you need, even for a longer stay. There's a washing maschine, dish washer, mirco wave etc. 
We enjoyed our time there and would go book again! The only negative point: we had to wait a long time in front of the appartment to get our keys, because of an organisational missunderstanding - annoying but I guess it isn't usual.

The apartment is exactly like on the photos: clean, modern, right next to the beach and spacious enough for a family of four. The bathroom and bedrooms are very nice and big. Super market is two minutes walking from the apartment. Porto city center is a 15 minute bus ride away. Communication with the host was always fast and clear. We were even provided with a welcoming gift! 
There are, however, two downsides: the apartment is not equipped with an airconditioner or fan (which is not disastrous, but it can get pretty hot if you're not used to Portugese summers), and sounds from upstairs neighbours and the busy road it lies on can be heard at night. If you're a light sleeper, I suggest taking soundproof earplugs with you. 
Otherwise, it's a beautiful apartment if you want to enjoy both the city center of Porto and the beach!

Beautiful appartement on a great spot very close to the beach. Just a 1 minute walk. Unfortunately the noise of the traffic near the house was load. Take the historical tram to the old city of Porto,  it is very convenient. Many good restaurants in the neighborhood. The interior of the apartment is very new.  Good beds, bathroom nice and clean. Great. We loved our stay in this great place.

Très bel appartement, propre, spacieux, bien situé et très bien équipé.  Stationnement pour la voiture toujours disponible à proximité. Nous sommes enchantés et le recommandons vivement à tous. Merci à Jorge. Si nous séjournons une nouvelle fois à Porto, nous y reviendrons avec beaucoup de plaisir. Merci  à Jorge pour tout.

The apartment is really spacious and new with a dishwasher and a washing machine. It is although quite noisy mainly because of the road. As we were staying already in Porto we asked if it was possible to drop off our luggage before 14 o clock which wasn't possible and check in wasn't complety easy but overall it was good.

I stayed only 2 days but the way I was welcomed was perfect with on top of it a big bottle of wine, of water and a map of Porto... What more can you ask for?
The apartment was very nice and as described on the pictures :
with 2 rooms with double beds. 
A nice bathroom with a big shower and a toilet 
+ an additional separate toilet .
The kitchen was well equipped with everything needed .
The neighborhood was very nice and really close to the beach ( 1 minute walk true a little tunnel) 
Perfect for running or biking along the coast 
At least 2 supermarkets in the same street and bakeries+
Less than 15' minutes drive to the airport and 15' to city center .
Many different buses + the old tramway and double decks hop on hop off buses .
The perfect place to stay if you want to combine beach holidays and visits .
Le quartier est très sympa, à 100m de la plage. L'appartement est grand et lumineux, avec vue sur l'océan. Nous avons vraiment beaucoup apprécié cette expérience !

We met Renato at exactly the time that we had planned. He was very helpful and explained all the necessary information to us, supermarket, bakery,cafés, transport into the Centre of Porto etc. The place is in a great location just one minute from a very pretty beach and the local people nearby were very friendly and helpful.
Jorge and his team were great. Thank you for a lovely relaxing time.

name: Peaceful Apartment near Casa da Música
summary: Our apartment is in the city center and one of the noblest areas of Porto. It is next door (about 50m) to Casa da Música of architect Rem Koolhaas authorship where you can see building uniqueness as well as benefit from quality, diverse and constant programming . It is very close to public transport, shopping and access to and from the city. Despite being very well located and central it is extremely quiet and peaceful, ideal for vacation for two or for a some family days.
interaction: We will be available to receive our guests and to give them the necessary information to a good and comfortable stay!
houseRules: É proibido fumar e ter animais. Entre as 22h00m e as 09h00m é proibido fazer barulho e incomodar os vizinhos já que é a sua hora de descanço. It is a non-smoking house and it's not allowed to have animals. Between 22:00 and 09h00m is forbidden to make noise and disturb the neighbours since it is their time to rest.

reviews.txt: It was great to stay at this place, it looks like the pictures show, works well for one or 2 people, very comfortable and in a good location. I was able to easily get to where I needed to go, and was also easy to just walk around. The apartment itself was clean and cozy, Rita was very friendly upon arrival and always responsive when I had any questions, before, during and after my stay. Definitely recommend staying here!
very nice and available

Rita no pudo recibirnos en casa, pero envío a una compañera muy amable que nos ayudó en todo lo posible.
La casa es muy acogedora y llena de detalles que la hacen especial (como la fruta o el café)
El barrio es tranquilo y queda a una media hora andando de las zonas más turísticas.
La recomiendo!

Rita fue muy amable y comprensiva ante nuestras necesidades en todo momento ! El apartamento es muy acogedor, está todo muy limpio y en perfecto estado. Se sitúa en una zona muy buena con todos los servicios necesarios próximos.Totalmente recomendable.
The apartment was so well-located and cosy, we loved it! Rita was very nice and attentive. Would definitely repeat!
干净利落的小房子,面积不大,但很温馨,用具用品齐全,房主热情,出行方便,红色大巴站离得很近,音乐厅广场很适合孩子玩,如果有洗衣机就更好了｡

Nos alojamos mi familia y yo, en total tres personas, en el apartamento de Rita durante tres noches.
Rita no pudo recibirnos, pero vino Cristina, que fue muy amable y nos explicó todo con claridad.
El apartamento estaba limpio y provisto de todo lo necesario para el día a día teniendo de todo para cocinar:vajilla, aceite, sal...
A su vez tenía productos de limpieza y de higiene personal.
Está ubicado a menos de cinco minutos andando de la parada de metro de Casa de Música.
Si volviéramos a Porto, repetiremos.

Vérifier s'il n'y a pas de travaux en cours dans l'édifice
Si les lumières de passages fonctionnent bien ?
Ótimo lugar para passar as férias.
Petit appartement, propre, endroit calme pas très loin du métro, mais à une bonne distance des principaux attraits touristiques de Porto.

name: SUPERHOST-LARGE&CLEAN-Near Pierloti
summary: You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul I'll help you all your travel. ADVANTAGES: 1-Safe place-metro-bus every 6 minutes 2-24 Hour help desk 3-Istanbulcard for transportation 4-Pick up from airport,taxi drivers cant cheat 5-Unlimited wifi, Big kitchen and living room for you 6-Breakfast, fruits, tea, coffee, deserts, nuts all free 7. Towels, shampoo
interaction: Every night i make black tea or rosehip tea or coffee. You can eat fruits, regional Turkish foods, desert  free !!
houseRules: You can smoke and drink everywhere

host.about:
I'm from İstanbul.I'm industrial engineer at Istanbul Technical University. I like meeting with new people from different countries so I believe that sharing my apartment with my guest is a good opportunity to know more people all around the world. I like travelling. (I visited Sevilla, Granada, Madrid, Barselona, Athens, Skopje, Sofia, Beograd, Budapest, Prag, Moscow, Krakow, Sarajevo, Chisinau, Lisbon, Napels, Amsterdam, Wienna, Milano, Foggia, Rome, Frenze, Venice, Thaossaloniki, Kavala, Thassos, Beirut, Lviv, Gent, Brussels)
You will never forget this holiday. If you want really enjoyable holiday you should choose my home. At first read my all reviews and ask me all questions what you want to learn about Istanbul and other things. I'll help you all your travel.

reviews.txt: Kubilay K. est une personne tres aimable vous etes chez lui bien plus que chez vous. Cette experience a ete un vrai plaisir et je repartirais chez lui des que possible. Il prend soin de vous sur tous les plans. En plus le logement est dans un quartier tres vivant et anime. Ce sejour a ete une reussite et je me demande comment voyager sans airbnb. Si vous venez a Istanbul allez chez Kubilay et vous toucherez du doigt cette realite.

Kubilay is now my best friend in Turkey :) I can't exagerate for his hospitibilty. Despite of my insistance he paid for my dinner, dessert a nice tea afterward and paid for the minibus to the shisha place. Frankly, it might have exceeded the rent I paid. I wanted to go to Kurdistan but non of information was available in English he called the bus company for me and then he came with me to the bus terminal then he barganed on my behalf and I got a cheaper ticket as the result. He didn't leave until he made sure I went on my bus safely. In my return also his friend came with me to Taksim to make sure that I'm getting the right bus to Sabiha airport. I highly recommand him if you want a host who is also your tour guide and freind. Also the prices in the shops are considerably cheaper near his place rather than touristic area like Taksim and you are a 2 TL away from Taksim, so his place is ideal in any sense.

Большое спасибо Кубилаю от всей нашей семьи за тёплый радушный приём, удивительную прогулку по Стамбулу, щедрость, внимательность и гостеприимство! Мы очень хорошо отдохнули в его чистой, светлой квартире. Если получится, с радостью приедем ещё раз.

Kubilay. Thank you very much from all of my family for the warm welcome, amazing trip through Istanbul, generosity, care and hospitality! We really enjoyed our time in your clean and cozy apartment. If this works out, happy to come again.

Oleg, Alena and Egor.

Kubilay est un hote tres agreabe, qui se soucie de vous, vous donne de bon conseil. Il nous avait prevu le petit dejeuner et tous les soirs nous etions acceuillis par du the et des fruits secs.
il est tres facile de se rendre dans les differents lieux interessants de la ville.
a ce prix la, nous ne pouvions rever mieux. n hesitez pas a le contacter.

If you choose an apartment Kubilay - you heard right!
Kubilay a wonderful person with a big heart!
Our little son really loved it!
He has prepared for us a wonderful breakfast! :) Helped us to find the way to the historic center of Istanbul, gave us IstanbulKart to travel around the city.
In his apartment, we feel at home :)

We stayed at Kubilay's home for 3 nights with my boyfriend.
Kubilay has been a great host, very kind and helpful, he made us tea, breakfast and we even had dinner with (so we could discover some delicious specialities).
It's a very nice person and he makes his best to make you enjoy your stay.
The room is very clean and tidy, the bathroom too, nothing to complain about.
The flat is not in the center of the city, so you'll have to take the bus for 15/20 minuts to get to Sultanahmet, but it's worth it because Kubilay's neighborhood is nice, not turistic it's more like a typical turkish area, so you can taste real turkish food (and it's really, really cheap, and delicious).

We really enjoyed our stay in Istanbul, don't hesitate and book this room!

Woooooowww!!! Kubilay is the best host you can find in Istambul, we spend a great time in his house and in the city. He´s so kind, attentive and you can talk any topic with him. Also his breakfast and teas are the best, considering we went in winter. We ask a lot of things and he always  help and response us what we need. We highly recommend 100 % to stay with him. Kubilay, the best experiencie,  thanks for everything!!!!

W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) wwww!!! Kubilay es el mejor anfitrion que puedes tener en Estambul, pasamos un agradable tiempo en su casa y en la ciudad. Es muy amable, atento y ouedes hablar de cualquier cosa con el. Sus desayunos y sus tes son lo mejor, considerando que fuimos en invierno. Le preguntamos un monton de cosas y siempre nos ayudo y nos respondio lo que necesitabamos. Recomendamos 100% alojarse con Kubilay, la mejor experiencia! Gracias por todo!!!

Kubilay is really good host! Welcoming, gentle and polite. Our baby loves to play with him!:) The apartment itself is clean and calm. It takes a bit time to get to the city centre (Taksim or Eminonu) but it's ok for us. I definitely would recommend everyone to stay with Kubilay.

anyone going to instanbul and looking for a beautiful place to stay at and make a friend then please stay at kubilay HIGHLY RECOMEND
EVERYONE to stay at his place thanks a lot kubilay u r the best if u ever come to visit punjab please stay with us

The stay at Kubilays place was very nice. Everything was clean and the check in worked very good. Kubilay is very nice and helpful. A perfect opportunity to visit a non touristic part of Istanbul. Thank you.

name: Charming and cozy condo Plateau Mt-Royal/ McGill
summary: Charming and cozy ground floor studio condo in Plateau Mont-Royal. Steps from McGill University (3 min) or trendy St-Laurent Street (5-7 min). Located right on Prince Arthur. Easy access to public transportation, groceries, restaurants, cafes, bars.
interaction: I'm available to answer any and all questions you might have.
houseRules: No smoking. No pets. Maximum 3 people.

host.about: Great food, that's what Montreal is all about!

reviews.txt: This studio is really really well located, comfortable and well equipped. I needed to spend a night away from home running around Montreal, and being on the cusp of downtown and the plateau made it easy for me to reach most places I needed to go on foot. Saint Laurent is right around the corner too. Tarek is a friendly and funny guy, and was easy to coordinate with (he actually checked me in personally at 11pm). Oh, and the bed has been replaced by a full one! Definitely would recommend this place to tourists who want a cosy space and central location.

My husband and I had a great time staying at this studio for our daughters graduation. The location is one block away from McGill Downtown campus. The host was very kind to help us find free parking right next to the house upon arrival. The facade of the house looks like a heritage site, very beautiful. The studio has all new facilities, the bathroom is large for a studio and fully renovated. Kitchen is nice, it also had some breakfast items. This place is great for a couple. The only downside is the mattress, not the most comfortable. Otherwise an A+ place and host. Would highly recommend.

We absolutely loved staying at Tarek's charming place which is just how he described it -- a cozy ground floor studio condo that is perfectly situated. We were just steps from the scenic McGill University, a short walk to the vibrants bars & restaurants on St-Laurent Street, and were conveniently able to walk to many other places during our stay. The exterior of the building is beautiful and historical looking while the interior is updated, comfortable, and super clean... all while being very peaceful and serene when we needed a break from sightseeing. 

Tarek was a superb host -- he was very kind and communicative with us from the get-go and was flexible to some logistical issues we had. He even gave us "must-see" and "must-eat" tips and overall made us feel very welcome on our first visit to Montreal. We would definitely stay here again in the future. Highly recommend!

We had a great experience staying at Tarek's apartment.  It was very clean and spacious for a studio, and the location was fantastic.  We hit quite a bit of unexpected traffic and were about an hour and a half late arriving, and he was extremely accommodating for us.  He helped us find parking, and was available for questions throughout our stay.  Check out was a bit cumbersome because of an unforeseen conflict, but Tarek was very accommodating to make it as easy as possible for us.

We had a really nice stay at Tarek's place. The room is very clean and cozy. Location is perfect too. It is close to McGill University and few minute walk from rue St Laurent. Bus stop is just around the corner too. Tarek is also an amazing host and really accommodating. Would highly recommend!

My fiancé and I arrived on a Thursday afternoon. Tarek met and welcomed us kindly. He showed us the apartment and even gave us some local restaurants and areas we should visit during our week long stay. He was an excellent host.
