There's a little market and cleaners downstairs, which is super convenient, and a Duane Read/Walgreens a couple of blocks away. You'll be 1 block from Central Park and the apt itself is incredibly cozy. You'll feel at home. Thank you!

The location and service was outstanding. However, be aware that the apartment is old and therefore not well isolated. You hear traffic from Madison Avenue, your neighbours and noisy radiators. Sometimes the water will never get hot, forcing you to take cold showers. Radiators may not work on cold days.
We stayed for two months in a nice location but the apartment disappointed us, especially when we considered the high price of our 2 months stay.

The apartment is located at UES, one block from Central Park and within close proximity within several museums (The Met, Guggenheim, Copper Hewitt). Nearest subway station is on either 96th street (6 train) or 86th street (4,5,6 trains).

The apartment is on the third floor of the building. The neighbourhood is generally quiet with the exception of traffic noises and bus noises (there's a bus stop right below) but apart from that it's generally quiet at night. 

It's a cosy apartment, and has everything you would typically need. The small First aid kit works well, however do note that the freezer section doesn't work, so avoid purchasing items that require freezing. Wifi and cable TV works well too.

I had no problems with the hot water in the shower, but do note that it does take a few minutes for it to get hot. 

Communication was great and the host, he was always quick to respond to questions or any problems. I found them incredibly communicative and helpful. 

I stayed for a period of two months. I am seldom around during the day as I am at work, and am usually only around at night. 

Overall I am satisfied with the apartment and my stay. 

Thank you very much!

We do NOT recommend to stay in this apartment for several reasons. First, there are cockroaches. First thing we saw upon entering were cockroaches in the kitchen area - without even having any food around or cooking. This was not properly disclosed before arrival. Although they sent somebody over who laid out baits, the roaches did not disappear. Second, (at least) two times there were unannounced strangers entering the apartment in order to look at it or to even take pictures. We know because we were at the apartment at this time. Third, the apartment faces Madison Ave, so it is rather loud. In addition, the windows are not well sealed so it gets cold/hot easily. Overall, considering what you get, the apartment is overpriced. In addition to get the key, you have to travel across the city to pick it up - very inconveniently.

El sitio me pareció inmejorable, ni muy céntrico, ni muy alejado, y muy buenos transportes públicos, metro a 10 min. y autobus a piede casa.
El edificio es antiguo, escalera de madera y sin ascensor, pero muy bonito y con balconcillo, tipo Friends. Yo mismo vivo en un edificio antiguo.el apartamento estaba limpio excepto por la nevera, que tuvimos que limpiarla a fondo
Calefacción y aire acondicionado. Muy necesarios los dos porque las temperaturas son un poco extremas.
WiFi muy bueno, Potente (llegaba hasta la parada del autobús) y muy veloz. Televisión con múltiples canales
Los quince primeros días estuvimos cuatro personas (mis dos hijos) y estuvimos un poco justos (sofá-cama) pero después una pareja, y perfecto.
Le vendría bien al apartamento una mano de pintura.
Es tuvimos mes y medio y NYC es maravilloso, el sitio y el apartamento me encanto, salvo pequeñas cosas, y el anfitrion fue muy amable ya que nos dejó hacer el check out a la 1:00 pm.
La comunicación fue siempre por email
Good location & vintage interior

name: Wellyet Guest House@Room 2
summary: Located at the heart of city Tsim Sha Tsui area, MTR, Bus Stop at door front; minutes walking distance to Star Ferry. All amenities near by, includes 7-Eleven, Bakery, Starbucks, shopping centers, restaurants, pubs etc.
interaction: We have almost 24 hours Assistance just a phone call away. I've you need travel recommendation, travel assistance, ticketing, we are phone call away. We also provide Towels, tooth brush, toothpaste,  shower gel and all-in-one shampoo for your convenient (free of charge, but one request per day for environment).
houseRules: 1､住客入住,應到服務台辦理手續,請出示護照､身份證或有關证件｡ 2､住客辦理入住時,請依據您預訂的天數及房間數預付全數入住房費,及房卡鑰匙按金港元HKD$100元｡如住客遺失房卡鑰匙,按金將不予退還,作爲賠償金｡ 3､旅客外出,請關閉所有用電設備,鎖好房門及大門｡ 4､請保管好自已的财物,若有遺失本旅館概不負責｡ 5､住客請於晚上十一時至竪日八時保持室內安靜以免影響他人休息｡若有朋友前來探訪,請於晚上十一時離開,若帶來不便,敬請原諒｡ 6､旅館退房時間在中午十二時前,十二時後退房加半天房租,晚上五時退房按全日計收房租｡ 7､若住客在退房後需行李保管服務,請將行李搬至前臺辦理寄存｡只提供退房當天的免費寄存服務,若逾期,賓館將收取費用｡ 8､請住客保護房內各項設備及床上用品,如有損壞或遺失,照價賠償｡ 9､請住客保持房內整潔衛生,請勿隨地吐痰､亂丟煙頭､果皮､雜物等｡ 10､嚴禁住客在房內賭博､酗酒､鬧事等,如有違者將移交警方處理｡ 11､若住客提前退房或取消訂房,預付的當天及竪日房費將不予退還｡ 12､房間內嚴禁吸煙,違者案例罰款港幣HKD$1500 13､房間內不得烹煮食物

host.about: Taking life break after 15 years studying and working in Australia. Enjoy and love to travel around and meet people, share culture differences. Learn new recipes, try on different kind of delicious food.

address.street: Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
The Host was cheerful and helpful on arrival and the room was clean and ready upon arrival. The Flats were quiet during the stay which was great as I really needed the rest after a long day of Business meeting. 
Highly recommended.
It was indeed a wonderful experience. Natalie was so accomodating and she helped us a lot, especially for us first timers! We highly recommend her. And the room was so clean! :)
虽然房间系比较细,但好在够干净,而且员工的服务好好,态度够热情｡两晚住得好开心(●°u°●) ｣房间里面有一个插座转换器,方便充电,梳洗用具全部都准备有,要热水同冻水可以出去装,随时都有噶,好方便的(✪▽✪)性价比算系比较高的!

Natalie's guest house was a really small room in the tourist-center of Hong Kong. The room and the guest house provided everything one needs for a short visit in Hong Kong: WiFi, Shower, bed, and a safe place to stow your stuff away.
The air-con is quite loud during the night, but turning it of will lead to quite a hot room!

Although I haven't seen Natalie, her "ladies" were extremely friendly and helpful, even there was a language-barrier. BUT the airbnb experience - talking to locals - was missing.

The only thing, which is offended me, were the watch/stuff-salesmen right out of the guest house.

Natalie is a welcoming host, friendly and helpful. Her place is located at a convenient location just a couple of minute's walk to the MTR station. The room is as it describes, clean and everything is handy to get. Would recommend travellers to have a short stay at Natalie's place.

I had a very pleasant stay at Natalies guesthouse. It's in a great location from where you can reach everything easily (the MTR station is right next to the building). One part of the guesthouse was under renovation but Natalie gave me a bigger better room without charging me extra. The room itself was super clean, comfortable and perfect for a short holiday in Hong Kong. It had everything I needed - AC, little bathroom with shower, fresh towel everyday, shampoo and a big comfortable bed. You also feel really safe as you can only get into the guesthouse and room with a special keycard. The staff was super helpful too and so was Natalie. I only met her in person once, but she is incredibly friendly and really makes sure you have a pleasant stay. I can recommend the guesthouse for those who travel by themselves and need a quiet room to come back to in the midst of bustling Hong Kong. Thanks a lot, Natalie! All the best, Juliana
The place is clear
房东姐姐很可爱,很耐心的给我指路,房间很干净!
1泊しました｡値段が安い｡その割には安全です｡女性の受付で親切でした｡ﾊﾞｽﾀｵﾙ1枚と歯ﾌﾞﾗｼがｻｰﾋﾞｽでありました｡
The place is clean and the crew is adorable! Very well situed in downtown HK. I stayed 5 nights in this tiny room without any problem. Recommended!

name: ☼☼ Lovely Colorful Studio ☼☼ Tsim Sha Tsui
summary: My Lovely Colorful Studio is in the center of the popular district Tsim Sha Tsui. There are many Yummy restaurants and shops, it's a very good location, It's the real Hong Kong. With 200 sqft and good design you will feel like home. It's located in a walk up building (2nd floor), right in the center of TST, less than 2min by walk from Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★
interaction: We can communicate through Airbnb, if you need information, you can contact me. If you book my studio, i will send you an email with all the information you need to know, and contact information.
houseRules: . Earliest Check in time is 2 pm and latest Check out time is 10 am, not negotiable due to cleaning schedule. If needed, I will let you know all luggage storage options near my building. . Remember that you are staying in someone’s home, not hotel, so please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. . Be respectful of the place and quiet as I let my own apartment to travelers when I’m away, and I don’t want to have any trouble with neighborhood. . If smoking, please open windows, or turn on ventilation in the bathroom. . For shower, water heater, need to turn ON red button at entrance of the bathroom, then wait 10 min before shower. . Leave dehumidifier ON as often as you can, to avoid humidity in the apartment. . ALWAYS close the entrance gate door of the studio. . TURN OFF AIR CONDITION and LIGHTS EACH TIME YOU LEAVE THE APARTMENT.

host.about:
Hello i'm Hester, i'm from Hong Kong, I love my country and i hope you will like it!

I listed my studio in Airbnb cause i'm not often in Hong Kong as i work as an translator assistant, i have to travel in different place in the world. 

I love to travel, my favorite destination is Italy, I've been to Rome, Milan.. I love the food there.
I also often go to Singapore, i also live there, few weeks a month, it's amazing there..

reviews.txt: 房东很nice,屋子很舒服,交通位置非常便利｡

Amazing room in the center of Hong Kong. It was perfect for my stay. Hester and her friends were very responsive. I had issues entering the room at first, and Hester immediately took care of it. I'll choose this place again on my next visit.
第一次体验民宿感觉非常棒,房间也很好,很干净整洁,就是稍微小了点,不过性价比还是很高,位置去哪里都很方便
是来到香港之前做的最好的准备之一!很棒的体验!房子地段很好,就在尖沙咀的闹市里,是很有香港味道的地方,房间很干净,很新,各种设备也都很齐全,周围吃的东西也很多,茶餐厅,小吃,离便利店隔地铁都不远!房东人也很nice,帮了我们很多!下次还有机会来香港还会来这里!

It's a small but clean and comfortable studio. Convenient to public transportation and easy access to local restaurants. The owner gave us clean instructions to get here and replied quickly on any question. But if you have big luggage, it's a bit different to climb the narrow stairs as there is no elevator.

Very good communication and directions.
Bed so comfy after a long flight as was good hot shower.
Apartment air conditioned if needed, and quiet.
Enjoyed exploring the area very much, big variety of shops, cafes and walks etc.

Very central location easy to get to by A21 bus from the airport, stop at Kimberley rd. Place is small, Hong Kong standards, very clean, good shower and large flat screen. I definitly recommend this place.
入住前沟通很顺畅,房东和她朋友介绍指引耐心到位,房间干净安静,周围交通方便!
It is a very good
Good! 좁지만아늑한공간이었습니다

name: Big Private BR Steps to Barnard Columbia & Subways
summary: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. You will be just steps from Columbia and Barnard Universities and a few blocks from the Manhattan School of Music, Jewish and Union Theological Seminaries, and Riverside, Morningside and Central Parks. With high-speed wifi, cable TV, printer, dishwasher, microwave, a/c, 24-hour laundry room and evening doorman
interaction: I will be here sharing the apartment in another private bedroom and am happy to interact as much or as little as you like. You will have your own set of keys and  direct access to the front door of the apartment and your bedroom, so you can come and go as much as you please at any hour without disturbing me and I can do the same without disturbing you.
houseRules: Additional guest fees apply.  Minimum stay of 3 nights if booking Friday or Saturday.  Long-term stays welcome Please be respectful of my neighbors and my living space Thanks

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hi - I'm a freelance writer and producer for TV and film, a native New Yorker, and the proud father of an amazing teenager.

reviews.txt: Great experience staying at this beautiful apartment. Sunny all day and cozy at night.  The neighborhood, right by Columbia, was perfect—especially with all the flowers in bloom on  campus and in nearby Riverside Park. Paul was an awesome host, super-accommodating, with lots of tips about great places to eat. Can't wait to stay here again!
Paul was generous with an early check-in and helped us settle in to his cozy apartment.

We found the place serendipitously when another booking fell through and couldn't be happier. Not only was the place exactly what we needed but Paul is a genuinely nice, kind, interesting human being and it has been a pleasure to get to know him. We stayed as a couple for just over a month and miss it already. Paul showed us around the neighbourhood when we first got there and was easily contactable thereafter.

Paul's place is a unique gem decorated with his quirky eye for colour, style and collectible treasures. It has a cozy well decked out living room, a bedroom with a closet and a comfortable bed, spacious bathroom and a nice, sunny, open-plan kitchen surrounded by windows. It is neat and well organised. There is cooling and heating in every room (plus fans), and the kitchen is well stocked with pots, pans, and other requirements along with a nice big fridge and freezer.  We found the place had everything we needed for a comfortable long-term stay.

For us, the location so close to three big parks (incl. Central Park), Columbia and Harlem, was just right. There are transport options aplenty: bikes up and down Riverside Park, the 1 MTA line two blocks away and frequent Broadway buses.  Paul kindly lent us his two bikes which was a fab way to get around the city. Being located on the border of UWS is great as it is a relatively quiet area to stay but the rest of Manhattan is readily accessible through the 1 line meaning we got the best of Manhattan action combined with good sleeping! Would stay again in a flash!
I had a great stay! Paul was a great host, with helpful recommendations in the area. Definitely book with him if you can.

Classic Upper West Side apartment in a quiet residential building very close to Columbia University. Comfortable bed, well-equipped kitchen, sitting room, good water pressure. Paul was a great host with friendly and proactive communication.  We met him to receive the key and instructions, and then had the place to ourselves for the rest of the weekend. Would stay again!

A beautiful eat in kitchen which has clearly been recently upgraded.
Vistas of the church steeples was novel. The breezes from Riverside Park kept it cool as did AC units in each room.

Paul's place was perfectly located! I came into town for a conference at Columbia and was mere blocks away. Riverside park was also a nice surprise, as well as an abundance of grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops and bookstores. The subway was one block away. 
The apartment was cozy and fully stocked. It had everything I needed and then some!
Great location and Paul is very helpful an accommodating.

I hate to start out with such a great review because I'd like to keep this hidden gem for myself!  Paul's place is awesome! Great space and great location! I was in NYC for 2 weeks at Columbia and the location was just a few blocks away. I didn't want to deal with transit in the AM, although that would not have been a big issue anyway.  Plus, it's right off broadway (the broadway that has shows) so subways access was great. Since it's a college town, I felt super safe and there were minimal tourists and minimal bums also. A couple things to note: this is actually Paul's residence so there are some personal affects to be mindful of.  I really appreciated that though because I was able to tap into the Tylenol and bandaids in the medicine cabinet over the course of 2 weeks. Hey, anything can happen!  He was totally respectful of my privacy and wasn't popping in or out during my stay.  I'm hopeful that if Teachers college has anymore trainings that I get to go to, Paul's place is available!
Very safe and close to Columbia University!

name: L'IDÉAL, ( à 2 min du métro Pie-IX ).
summary: Newly furnished appartment. You will feel the comfort and warmth as you walk in. Everything has been designed to make your stay as pleasant as possible. This apartment is ideal for its location and security (keypad lock). It is perfect for couples, or for passing travelers. Can accommodate a maximum of 4 with the sofa-bed. For your convenience will will also supply you with my private parking for one car.
interaction: I live on first floor and will always be there to meet your needs.
houseRules: Le son de la musique ou de la TV, doit être à un niveau raisonnable en tout temps, pour ne pas nuire au voisin. Il y a un autre logement à coté du votre. Ne pas admettre d'inviter après 22 heures Ne pas oublier d'enlever vos souliers. Merci

host.about: Je possède cette maison depuis plus de 40 ans, mes enfants ont tous habités un moment ou l’autre en haut ainsi que quelque locataire, mais maintenant tout à été refait et c’est devenu un hébergement touristique bien meublé et complet maintenant c’est à vous d’en profiter.

reviews.txt: Très propre et confortable .
Very comfortable, and professional, very clean and homey. Thank you for hospitality.
We had an excellent stay at William's place. He did everything to make us welcome and his apartment is the nicest we have ever stayed in.

Appartement très bien situé, bien équipé et très convivial. Propriétaire très disponible et à l'écoute des besoins des locataires. Nous avons, entre autres, beaucoup apprécié l'attention du propriétaire pour les choses du quotidien tels que du lait et de la crème pour le café, d'est K-Cup pour la keurig, jus d'orange, muffins.
Tout a été parfait pour Nous William a été tres accommodant nous avons tres apprécié .

Perfect place to stay - very clean, spacious, and modern. It's also newly renovated so everything is very new. Right near the metro station and a free private parking spot is available if you need it. It was very relaxing. The communication with William and Susan was great. I would receive a reply within minutes whenever I needed to know something. When I arrived, William came out to help me find his parking spot and offered to help me with my things. I would definitely stay here again.
A wonderful place to stay. Very clean and a fairly convenient location.

Endroit hyper propre, confortable, tranquille et très facile d'accès.  Nos hôtes s'assure de notre confort et de notre satisfaction.
À recommander sans hésiter !

N'hésitez surtout pas , difficile de trouver mieux  :)
Do not hesitate , book, , not easy to find a such cosy place.

This place is awesome! It is very clean and spacious. The parking spot was very useful. William is a great host, very easy to communicate with and message. I will definitely be back! Highly recommend.

name: Cheerful new renovated central apt
summary: The full equipped apartment located in the heritage district of Istanbul, colorful Tarlabaşı. If you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.
interaction: I will always respect your privacy. If you book the entire apartment I will bring you the keys on the day of your arrival and will take them from you on the day you leave or you can leave them at home on the table:)  However, if it is possible for both of us, we can always have a walk or drink coffee/tea/beer. For any sort of problem like technical or just a trip advise you can always call and ask for help.
houseRules: • Please lock the doors and close the windows when you leave the flat. • Please don´t change the heat controller settings. • Please be respectful to the neighbors regarding noise levels. • If you are a smoker please smoke by the window  or at the balcony Welcome to your home!

host.about: My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighbourhood,  and enjoy the city with walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. I know how it is important to be able to feel the city you are visiting from my experiences. So if you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.

reviews.txt:
We rented Aybike's apartment as a group of four. We were met by Aybike on arrival, she is a great host, very welcoming, responsive and attentive. We even got some sweets prepared by her mother, which was extremely sweet. Even though we only were the first guests for her, I am sure Aybike will be a great host. 
The apartment itself is cozy and bright. Although more people could potentially stay there we felt that it was perfect for four. It is fully equipped with everything necessary. We couldn't think of anything we would need that was missing. The location is great close to Istiklal street and a walking distance to many major attrcations. 
We can warmly recommend Aybike and her apartment!
Best regards,
Oksana, Victor, Liuda, Stas

The apartment was the cutest thing and so comfortable, Aybike was extremely prepared with everything and she's really nice, the apartment had everything we needed. Good location, it has a very friendly restaurant right in front of it, that is open 24/7. We had such a great experience!
Het appartement ligt in een goede buurt, dicht bij alles. Aybike is zeer gastvrij en leuk. Appartement zelf had ook alles.

We had an great time staying in Aybike's flat, it was the perfect flat in the perfect location for us. There was three of us staying in this flat and it was just right for us. The flat was clean and tidy, it had everything we need, plenty towels and bedding available for us. The flat is situated in the perfect location for you to get the real sense of Istanbul with its locals and the culture. It's so central, 2 mins walk away from Istikal Street, 10 mins walk away Galata and Cihangir and 10 mins on the public transport to Old City. 
Aybike was great she was very attentive to all our needs and very friendly and warm, any problem she was there. We had a lot of fun this flat it was great!!

We had a really wonderful time at Aybike's apartment- it was very well equipped with everything we needed (and more!) and was a great base from which to explore the city. It's in a busy and fun area but still quiet enough at night for good sleep. Aybike was a brilliant host- very accommodating and warm. We'd come back in a heartbeat!

Aybike made us feel very welcome, she was very nice and as our flight was changed to a later flight she waited in the apartement for us, thanks again! The apartement is equiped with everything you need, the bars outside and the hole area was always with a lot of people, we never felt unsafe at night walking in the streets.  we can recommend it!

Aybike was the nicest host you can imagine. She provided us with maps from Istambul and recommended some sightseeing points. She let us use her metro card during our stay. Her flat is clean, tidy and within a walkable distance from Taksim Square, where you can move to any part of the city. I definitely recommend her for your stay in Istambul.

We rented Aybike's appartment for 6 adults and 3 children! we easily fitted to this cosy flat. It had enough sleeping places for all of us. The flat is realy well equipted with everything needed for travelers and even some food left for the first snack. The location is good, near Istiklal street. Aybike was quick responcive. We had problems with hot water but it was solved quickly. Her mother was very polite and met us with  homemade sweet cookies. Every person were provided with set of towels for face and body. They were new, soft and clean. The streets are very nosy but when tired it doesn't metter :). I would like to come again and highly recommend it. Good luck and thank you Aybike!

Aybike's apartment truly is at the heart of Istanbul. We were able to walk to Taksim Street in minutes and use that find transport anywhere else. Shops and a 24-hour local eatery were seconds away. Her apartment was clean, cosy, and packed with everything one would need - all kinds of household items, maps and tourist guides, Internet, snacks, etc. We were five adults, including 2 elderly. Aybike catered to all of us wonderfully, even dropping off a fan when we mentioned that the elders were feeling a bit hot. Throughout our stay she was always responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and regularly gave advice regarding our Istanbul adventures. Even after we left, she informed us of an item we had left behind, and offered to help send it to us. Please visit us in Dhaka, Aybike!

We love that Place, just 3 min. walk to Istiklal street, 1 min. to Bus stataion and 5 to 10 min. to Shishane subway station, so I really cant think of a better location.
Aybike is a very professional Host and helped us all the way at everything we needed, starting from basic orientation to arranging Transfer to Airport, we loved the Apt. and really felt Home and will always stay there when we visit Istanbul Again.
Thank you Aybike

name: Sunny Room (for One) Minutes from Coogee Beach!
summary: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb.
interaction: The flat has 3 bedrooms and fixed residents are a couple: Cindy from Brazil and Claudio from Italy. There is your bedroom (Airbnb) and a guest bedroom we plan to turn to a home office soon. We both work full time during the week and have busy schedules, but when home we like to cook, chat and watch TV together. We rarely party at home and our place is nice and quiet. If we do have friends over, we will advice Airbnb guest in advance. We're looking forward to meeting you and will do our best to welcome you so that you feel as staying with friends.
houseRules: > Guests are not allowed to bring their own guests into our home.  > No parties allowed. > To ensure we keep the carpet clean for our guests’ enjoyment, we have a NO SHOES policy inside our home. > Guests will be responsible for the cost of having the lock replaced in case of lost key. > Whilst we do a thorough professional clean between each guest stay, we kindly ask that you clean and put away any dishes or kitchenware used. It helps us get through our cleaning process quicker. > Since this is a share house we kindly ask guests to refrain from entering the hosts' bedroom and varanda. We’ll ensure your space is likewise respected in return. > To prevent plumbing problems, we kindly ask you to please place things other than toilet paper in the sanitary bin we’ve provided in the bathroom.  > What you do in your personal time is entirely up to you, but when staying at our place we have a strict no drug use policy. This is just the law… not so much one of our rules. > To keep our costs do

host.about:
Me:
I'm Brazilian living in Australia since 2010. I speak Portuguese and English and I love meeting new people from different cultures and languages!

As host:
I hosted over 80 people in 2 years of Airbnb and we earned Super Hosts status 2 years in a row! 
My husband Claudio is Italian and I'm Brazilian. We work from home and we are very fast replying guest messages when we are not here to answer in person. Despite our apartment being small, we have a comfortable size bedroom with a double bed and many cosy pillows so you can relax and rest after exploring Sydney! Also, we are 15 minutes walking distance to Coogee Beach (our favourite!).

As a traveller: 
I prefer quiet and relaxing homes and when travelling I barely stay on my Airbnb room as I am constantly exploring. I like to chat with my hosts to find out the best places to eat and see from a local's point of view as well as building friendship with my hosts.
I either travel alone or with my Italian husband Claudio.

reviews.txt: This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !

Ich habe der Aufenthalt bei Cindy und Miki total genossen. Obwohl wir uns in den 3 Tagen kaum gesehen und gesprochen haben, hatte ich immer das Gefühl willkommen zu sein und habe mich total wohlgefühlt. Ein schöner Aufenthalt. Die Stadt ist schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen und trotzdem liegt die Unterkunft ruhig. Alles in allem ein sehr schönes wenn auch einfach eingerichtetes Zimmer. Alles sauber und gemütlich. Vielen Dank nochmals.
This was a lovely home for a short stay. Cindy and Miki were welcoming, nice and informative. Cindy is punctual with her responses to messages.
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.
A nice place to stay. well equipped:)

This place is great!
Cindy & Miki are lovely hosts and make their guests welcome.
The room is very nice & the location of the apartment is good because Coogee beach is approx 20 mins walk away & bus stops outside lead to the City & Coogee beach.
I recommend this place for your stay in Randwick :-)

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!

name: Mike's House- Hina Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older rustic style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with queen size bed and own bathroom.  We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat.  There is off street parking and WIFI.
interaction: I do live on property in a separate dwelling on the property.  You may contact me via phone, text, or email.  I do provide a landline in the house that you can use to contact me.  Upon confirmation of booking I will send an email prior to arrival with directions and passwords to the house and location of room in house if I am not there when you arrive.  Remember I am usually  a phone call away if there are any problems.
houseRules: No Smoking or E-cigs in House (You are welcome to smoke outside, please dispose of cigarette butts in the trash) All guests are to park in their designated onsite parking areas provided to them prior to there arrival. ALL PARKING STALLS ARE ASSIGNED. Please turn off AC when not home.. No Loud House parties or gatherings at the house. House slippers okay in house  Quiet hours  from 9pm - 7am during which time the noise shall not unreasonably disturb adjacent neighbors and other guests staying in the house. No sleepovers of unregistered guests Please rinse sand off before entering house. It clogs our pipes and creates plumbing problems. Please unplug all small appliances in the kitchen when not in use such as coffee maker, toaster, etc. Coin operated Laundry facility is available on the premises. Please make sure you shake the sand out of all clothes and towels before putting them into the washing machine. Do not overload the machine. If there is anything you find lacking in the HOUSE, l

host.about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.txt: This house was AWESOME!! Rina, the owner is very cool. She is very laid back, friendly, and helpful!! Any question I had or if I needed anything, text her and she was there!! The house is very clean and comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with anything you would need. The water pressure in the shower was AMAZING!! We had a wonderful visit and my experience  at Mikes House exceeded all expectations!! Thank you Rina!! I guess in Hawaiian language that is.. Mahalo!! ;)

It was a wonderful time. Rina makes you feel right at home and the house has all the amenities you'll want. Paia is a great little town, with a super organic food store, restaurants, and coffee shops.
The town is kinda surfer central for the north shore area, with none of the condo sprawl one might find on the west side of the island.
It's also doable to stay there without renting a vehicle, but some excursions are better with a rental..
All in all, it was a very positive experience staying at "Mikes House".

Rina is a very welcoming and helpful hostess.  The house is a five-minute walk from downtown Paia but is much bustling with lots of space inside and plenty of parking.  The rooms are spacious and well appointed.

Light sleepers should know that the house is located on Baldwin Avenue, which is a busy road in the early morning, and there are chickens in the area, so you won't need an alarm clock.

Rina's place is a nicest one, situated in a most beautiful place, it is very so cozy, that it feels just like home. Rina is absolutely nice, too, and it is mostly due to her friendliness that you start feeling so at home there the moment you enter the house. Thank you so much, it was a pleasure for us to stay at you place, Rina, hope to see you again!

Aloha, Mike's place was exactly what we expected: friendly, helpful, clean! Once, before our arrival, I mentioned that I like Lilikoi (Passionfruit). When we arrived, Rina had Lilikoi Tea and Jam for us. After couple of days I asked if we could borrow 2 beach chairs, she didn't have any, but guess what? Next day she knocked and had 2 beach chairs on her shoulder, not the flimsy ones, the good ones....we thought that was incredible. The place is not the Hyatt, but comfy and clean. Our room was big enough for us,shower and toilet in the room, all was perfect. We could use the kitchen, which we did every morning. Well, what else is there to say? I told her, whenever we visit Maui, we will stay with her. She gave me/us a bye-bye present: Lilikoi candle, soap and body wash....a Hyatt would not do that !!
Mahalo Rina, you are a wonderful Host, Franz and Renate
Rina is a wonderful hostess and her place was very clean and welcoming!

rina is a very nice host. the house is great, close to the shops in piha. the kitchen is very big and well equipped: i had a very good time there and rina always checked whether everything is alright or if we were needing something .

This is a great place to stay! Starting with Rina and her helpful, relaxed and kind ways. The house is perfectly located half way between Hana and Haleakala. It is a 15 minutes drive from the airport, less than 10 minutes walk to Paia-Center with all its shops, restaurants and galleries. Beaches are also nearby. 
You can keep yourself for yourself or meet other guests from all over the world in the full equiped, handy kitchen or in the spacious TV-room. My room was comfortably large and very clean. Wifi worked well. I was provided with a parkingspace on the property. 
I can`t wait to come back again.

I exteneded my stay on Maui for a few days and wanted a simple, clean, comfortable place to stay in Paia and Mike's House suited my needs very well. Rina is very nice; very kind and helpful. I was able to leave my stuff in room on last day and picked it up early evening before catching flight home. Hana room is clean and comfortable with closed-in porch area with nice view of beach and mountains. Secure locks on doors with personalized codes. Well equipped, shared kitchen and living room. Opportunities to meet other nice travellers. Location is central and active with traffic on Baldwin Ave, roosters crowing and neighbours watching TV at night. Felt like every day, Hawaiian life and a nice way to end my visit.

We had a great stay at the Hina Room. It's very very clean and comfortable. You meet other people in the kitchen and can have a small talk. Rina is a lovely host who really care about her guests. Especially the very useful things like beachtowels and beachchairs makes it diffrent to other rooms. Highly recommend this place

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929
interaction: Direct contact with the owner via email or phone.
houseRules: Check-in: from 14:00 pm.  Check-out: till 11:00 am. Charges for electricity, gas, water and community included. Any noises that could disturb the neighbors is not allowed. Certainly from the 22: 00h.  Smoking in the apartment is not allowed. Any parties are strictly prohibited.

host.about:
Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

reviews.txt:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

La casa esta muy bien equipada y es realmente muy linda (solo funciona muy mal la conectividad de wife) y queda un poco alejada de los centros turísticos.  El único inconveniente fue que nuestro vuelo se demoro dos horas y al llegar 2 horas mas tarde del horario acordado, pasada las 20.00 se nos cobro 30 euro en el chec kin

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.

SUCIO Y MUY POCO RECOMENDABLE.
Bajo con difícil accesibilidad, absoluta falta de limpieza y con fuerte olor a humedad provocada por guardar las sábanas mojadas dentro del único armario de la casa, recubierto de moho por dentro. Falta de limpieza absoluta en toda la casa que hacía muy incómoda su estancia y más con niños pequeños. El sofá donde supuestamente se podía dormir, tenía una gran mancha que ni se habían molestado en intentar limpiarla. Solo había un único armario recubierto de moho para guardar la ropa, que evidentemente no pudimos utilizar. La ducha estaba negra, picada y oxidada, lo que nos tocó limpiar a nosotros y desinfectarla un poco para poderla utilizar. La cocina llena cubierta por una capa de grasa que la hacía inútil para cocinar cualquier cosa. Escaleras hacia abajo completamente empinadas y estrechas.  Nada más llegar ni rastro de Regina o Juan, nos atendió una persona que ni siquiera sabía hablar bien castellano, por lo que dudo mucho de la existencia de Juan y Regina. Es absolutamente indignante que cuando pagas el apartamento te cobran unos gastos de limpieza que no han efectuado. Para colmo nos cobraron 30 € en concepto de checking. La zona es tranquila aunque bastante alejada del metro, dado que tienes unas cuestas muy empinadas desde la parada más cernada de metro y luego toca subir cuesta arriba unos 15 minutos. De cara a los esfuerzos por parte del anfitrión, absolutamente ninguno. La persona que nos recibió ni siquiera sabía indicarnos donde estaba la tienda más cercana, un parking donde poder dejar el coche e incluso la parada de metro más cernada. Soy usuario de esta web desde hace tiempo, he visitado otros países de Europa usándola y ha sido con creces la peor experiencia que he tenido. Me siento completamente estafado.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

L'appartement est sympa et bien équipé, dans un quartier charmant. Il correspond assez bien à l'annonce Airbnb. Il a malheureusement une odeur d'humidité constante et il est tout de même un peu loin du métro ainsi que du parking public. L'hôte nous a donné beaucoup d'informations avant notre arrivée mais nous l'avons pas vu du tout pendant le séjour. J'ai également fait une demande de modification pour la quelle je n'ai jamais reçu un retour. Dans l'ensemble c'était une bonne expérience.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.

L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions. C'est sympa on s'y sent presque chez soi. Une légère odeur d'humidité qui est un peu désagréable. Cependant avec les fenêtres grandes ouvertes l'odeur s'en va rapidement.

Au départ le concierge était sensé nous recevoir. Une fois arrivées, ni l'hôte, ni le concierge n'ont répondu à nos appels. Heureusement une jeune fille attendait devant le logement qui nous a expliqué que c'était elle qui était sensée nous recevoir mais nous n'étions pas au courant.
Heureusement elle était très gentille, nous a très bien reçu et nous a expliqué le déroulement du séjour.
Une fois dans le logement nous nous sommes aperçus que celui-ci était très poussiéreux et nous avons donc dû faire le ménage car une des personnes était allergique aux acariens. Nous avons également dû acheter des produits pour faire le ménage, car les produits ménagers sur place étaient très limités.
Au niveau des équipements, beaucoup de choses étaient fournies (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, fer à repasser, sèche cheveux, etc) mais la vaisselle était très limitée pour 3 personnes (manque de verres et de couverts).
Attention il n'y a pas de volets ni de rideaux opaques sur 2 chambres sur 3. Cependant draps de lit et serviettes de toilette sont fournies. Il manque cependant un tapis de douche pour la baignoire.
Les matelas étaient confortables et le quartier très calme mis à part un voisin qui mettait parfois de la musique à fond.
Au niveau de l'emplacement, le logement est très bien situé car à 10 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro qui dessert tous les endroits importants de la ville (plage, centre ville, quartier gothique, etc).
Par contre, attention pour les personnes qui ont des difficultés à se déplacer car le logement est tout en haut d'une côte très raide.
Malgré tout, nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce logement et avons apprécié la terrasse ombragée.

name: Lachine room+Free parking+Airport
summary: A nice room with King size bed in a new condo, free parking, near to Montreal International airport. By car 1m get into highway 20,13,easy go to Downtown,Dorval,St-Laurent,Laval, include breakfast GYM,  summer pool,BBQ; Dinner,car service possible.
interaction: CAR SERVICE POSSIBLE, DINNRE WITH PRICE NEGOCIABLE.

host.about: A mother and son

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Bright room in Spacious house close to Airport
summary: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You’ll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift.
interaction: My son (7) and I live here so can be on hand most days to help out with questions.
houseRules: If using - please hide the key safe numbers for security. If you could keep the noise level to a minimum after my son goes to bed, closing the bedroom door when making phone calls, chatting or watching tv and closing hallway doors quietly (they are noisy doors and the handles need to be pushed all the way down to close quietly) that would be great. After 11pm please refrain from using the shower, running the bathroom taps for too long, loud phone calls or banging doors as I am a light sleeper and these do wake me. Turn off  bedroom/bathroom ceiling fan and lights when going out to conserve electricity. Keep kitchen tidy, dishes washed etc.I have recently had new wood floors in the apartment, please be aware they cannot get wet so if an accident happens please wipe up asap and ALL laundry/swim wear to be dried on the clothes lines outside. No unortherised visitors to enter the apartment day or night, thank you. $150 will be charged if the key is lost as I will need to change the locks o

host.about: Hi, I am from New Zealand, Steve is from Malta, Coby is our son. We love living here in Australia and the beach nearby is a big plus for us. Coby and I love travelling, I have been to over 50 countries and Coby to 7 (not bad for a 7 yr old!)  We love the Airbnb accomodation, doing little road trips within Australia and meeting people. Steve lives close by with his two sons and is looking forward to travelling more with us when they get older.

reviews.txt: Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Angela's place was very close to the beach, and whisper quiet from road and airport noise.

Angela keeps a beautifully kept place. It is extremely well set up for guests and very comfortable.

Coby is a real sweetie, was well behaved, and good fun.

Thanks guys for being good hosts. I would love to come back.

Angela is a great and friendly host! Had a wonderful, comfortable stay at her place. Its very clean, bed is comfortable, and the room is spacious. The room is quite with fast internet access. Very powerful hot shower, good street parking. I would definitely stay here again and caanot recommend it enough! Thank you Angela!
Very happy with my stay. Very clean and quiet. Would recommend.
Angela's house was very good. The room is clean and nice better than the pictures. And angela and her son were very kind! Nearby here, there is the brighton le sands beach. That was great also.

Angela's apartment is a great place to stay, very close to the beach, super clean, with all the convenient appliances on cooking and cleaning. Angela has good tastes on apartment decoration, such as the sweet fragrant candles and the tiny lights spread on flowers and comfortable sofa.... Angela is also a very considerate host and would like share everything with me. It's so lucky of me to meet her  when I try airbnb for the first time. Thank you, Angela
Angela is very nice. The room is very clean and the bed is very soft. Thanks for ur warm welcome. Strong recommend. I had a very nice trip in Sydney.
房东非常热情,房间非常非常干净,舒服,离海边很近,非常好,Very gool.

Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!

Der beste Ort, indem wir auf den Prinzeninseln bis jetzt sein konnten.

name: Amazing NEW Food Lover Balcony, close to FIRA, MWC
summary: Set in a prized area for tapas and vermouth, you'll get the best of Barcelona and sunset views in your very own Poble Sec pad. Enjoy the cool local vibe nestled below Montjuïc and fast transport connections to beach (10 mins) and airport (30 mins). Perfectly located, close to Mobile World Congress
interaction: We enjoy playing tourist just as much as you, and are available by Whatspp to help you make smart restaurant choices and organize day tripping.
houseRules: NO PARTIES. NO SMOKING INSIDE. NO PETS. Respect the neighbors and keep quiet on the stairways. No extra guests; parties are not permitted. Please clean up after yourself. You may smoke on the balcony but not inside the apartment, or in the building stairway.  Check-in time is 3pm. Alternative check-in times can be arranged by mutual agreement. If you plan to arrive after 8pm you should discuss arrival PRIOR to making the INSTANT BOOKING reservation. Check-in after 22.00h has a 30€ surcharge. Check-ins after 2400 have a surcharge of 50 euros. PRIOR to check-in, all guests MUST provide the host with valid Government issued Identification Numbers, Full Names, and Birth Dates. To help us comply with local licensing regulations. We can enter the property without notification in the event of Emergency,  or during events threatening to risk damage to the property. Storing bicycles inside the flat not permitted We reserve the right to refuse adding additional guests to an existing reservation.

host.about:
Hi,

We are a very small company that is using Airbnb to share our lovely apartments with travelers and adventurers heading to Barcelona. Our  company's journey began in 2013, when we carefully selected and purchased these apartments in barrio PobleSec. Each apartment has been renovated with our own hands, with careful attention to preserving some of the original features that make Barcelona architecture, and style famous. These apartments and the PobleSec barrio will make for a perfect base, for your own Barcelona adventure. 

Barcelona is a fantastic city with a dazzling combination of beach, culture, fascinating people, architecture, unique cuisine and artisans. This is a very rewarding place to live and an exciting city to visit. There is so much to see, taste and experience.  We are excited to host your stay in Barcelona, provide recommendations and help you to have the best experience this great city has to offer!


Safe travels :)

reviews.txt: Thank you very much, Jon, for your great job, warm welcome of my co-workers Amichai and Daniel! Your apartment is situated in a comfortable place, it took them not for a long time to get Fira Gran Via . I advise this apartment especially with such good owner to everybody!

We stayed here 9 nights in April. Oscar  (the host) was great. He helped us carry our luggage to the apartment  (4th floor) and gave us plenty of Tipps and suggestions what to do during our stay. The apartment itself was nice, clean and very new. Unfortunately the recent renovation caused some inconvenience. The hallways had a strong chemical smell due to the fresh paint. Also you could still hear some construction going 0 in other parts of the building. These initial problems are likely to be sorted out soon, but as of now i can only give it 4 star. Overall we had a great time in Barcelona.
We loved our stay at John and Oscars apartment. The apartment was very clean, modern and had a great location. We would stay again if returning to Barcelona.
Parfait. Bien situé, très propre, refait a neuf. Si je retourne à Barcelone je louerai à nouveau cet appartement!

Jon's apartment is situated in a location where attractions are at a walkable distance, and lots of eateries nearby. The place is bright and comfortable, and his recommendations are totally spot on! I also appreciate that he allowed us to check out at a later timing due to our late flight. I totally would recommend this apartment :)

First of all, we have to say that Jon is a very friendly host. We had a late check-in and he waited for our appearance late at night. He gave us a lot of interesting and worth seeing tips for locations, bars and restaurants to visit. We could change our check-out in the last day of our stay without problems. Jon arranged this in an uncomplicated manner.

The flat is very nice and functional furnished. All equipment is very new. The beds have comfortable mattresses in which we could sleep very well. In striking distance you will find bars and shops frequented by residents. Even the view from the small balcony over the roofs of Barcelona is a visit worth. A breath-taking view in Barcelona’s real life!

We recommend this apartment without retention and will rent it again for our next stay in this unique town. Thanks, Jon, for making our stay in Barcelona unforgettable!

Kindest regards from Switzerland
Ivan & Nadine

Nice apartment in good area, apartment is at the back of the block so no street noise and the balcony off the living gets sun late afternoon/early evening.
Easy check in and check out.

Nice place in The center of Barcelona. Mira mar is less than 3 mins walk and you can see the best view of The city.
Good flat and Jon is a fantastic person,
Thank you

Great communication from the start - and host made us feel very welcome on arrival. Local points of interest, restaurants and bars where all pointed out. The place was exactly as it appears in the listing - very clean and new fittings, which kept noise out too. Location is as good as expected. We had a great stay and the host was brilliant.

Great apartment, nice location (close to the old city but away from the busy streets!)  and most importantly great recommendations for very good places to eat (Jon provided a list of recommendations and we loved every single one we went to!). We had a great long weekend break!

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.
interaction: Our team will be there for you whenever you need it. You can give us a call 24/7. If necessary, a member of our team will come straight to the apartment in order to help you with your questions.

host.about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.txt: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.

Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

name: Private Cozy Bedroom in Brooklyn
summary: Your private room is located in our family's lovely 3-bedroom condo, a welcoming space for you to call home while enjoying all that New York's five boroughs have to offer. We are artists and students of culture and will be happy to help with recommendations during your stay. We also have another bedroom listing with more space: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/135393?s=8&user_id=663764&ref_device_id=834476da76042c7d3d85486a5eaac86e8cc4de3b
interaction: We have been hosting on Airbnb since 2011 and have really enjoyed sharing our home with visitors from other cities and countries   Since we don't travel as much now that we have children we love that people from all over bring the flavors of their culture into our home when they come to stay with us.  ;) We are friendly and would be happy to share our love of New York with you during your stay. With our backgrounds as a licensed NYC tour guide and a member of multiple theatrical and performance unions, as well as our own general passions and interests, we are very knowledgeable about theatre, film, jazz, art and science museums, public parks, historical and cultural landmarks and other ins-and-outs about the city, and we would be glad to give you tips on (for example) standby tickets for The Book of Mormon, the best options for Monday night jazz, or how to get discounted entry to the Met and other museums. If our schedules allow and guests have an interest, we welcome conversation over
houseRules: Our apt is 2k. When you arrive, buzz 2k from the lobby! Once inside the apartment, please take off your shoes and leave them by the front door. Whenever you leave our home or return, please lock the front door behind you.  Our home is strictly non-smoking.  Please do not take any showers between 645am and 745am as we need to get in and out of the bathroom to get kids off to school.  If you are using the AC in your room, just make sure and turn it off when leaving for the day. (Unless you'll only be gone a short while. It's just too expensive to cool an empty room!) Also, please turn off lights in your room if you are leaving for a significant amount of time. If you would like to use the washer and dryer, please talk to me first. Our washer uses concentrated soap and the dryer filter needs to be changed before each load. Let me show you the basics (soap, filter, etc.) It'll be quick and easy. ;) (Here's a suggestion, Not a rule ;) If you arrive into JFK or LGA, take a cab not an Uber. U

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Joshua is a writer originally from the Atlantic City area and Karen is an actress,designer,improviser originally from a small town in southeastern Oklahoma. We love film, theatre, music, travel, and nyc and are always up for a lively discussion! We have been hosting on Airbnb since 2011 and really enjoy the opportunity to host such a wide variety of guests!

reviews.txt: The reservation was canceled 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was our second time staying with Karen and her family.  As was our previous experience, Karen was a great host, the room was clean and set up for us.  Karen is super helpful, always offering great advice and her place is very close to the subway. 

We returned specifically because of our great experience last time and we would definitely do it again!
Karen & Joshua are great hosts! Very helpful, easy going, open minded and respectful. The apartment is nice and near the subway. So lovely family! Thank you!!!

We enjoyed our stay at Karen and Joshua's. They had lots of tips and advices about what to do and see.
Placed closed to the subway and Prospect Park, made it a perfect location for us.
The family was talkative, but respectfully to the need of privacy.

Karen and Joshua were great hosts. Eventhough we only booked the room a couple of hours before our check-in, everything was arranged perfectly. Everything is exactly as described. The house was clean, neat and close to the subway.

We were happy we could stay with this lovely family. When we go back to New York we would definitely stay here again! Thank you Karen and Joshua.

L'ambiance du quartier nous a au début un peu surpris mais finalement aucun problème. Nos hôtes on été très accueillant même en arrivant a 1h du matin! 2 charmants bambins et un couple disponible mais pas dans nos pattes ce qui nous a permis d'aller et venir à notre guise !
Merci à eux

Karen and Joshua were fantastic hosts! I staid a short three nights. They were flexible, kind, respectful and reliable. No problem for checking in, even if I was delayed because of the bus. No rush for the check out. The room and the bed were comfortable, clean, quite perfect for what I was looking for. And for sure, having groceries, a train station and restaurants near their place was great. Nothing to complain, I appreciated my stay.

Karen and Joshua were very welcoming, and helpful when it came to information about travel, what to do and our arrival and departure times. Despite being not that close to Manhattan, and being quite small for 2 people, it was perfect for our stay. Having WiFi also made our stay very easy.

I enjoyed my stay with Karen and Joshua. They were both very kind and helped me with directions for getting around the city when I needed it. It was my second time being in New York City and my first time using Airbnb and I'm glad everything worked out smoothly.
Everything was completely fine. Hosts were very hospitable.

name: cozy house and garden in the heart of Montréal
summary: House at the heart of Montréal. Cosy apartment, 2 bedrooms, one living room, calme street, close to Downtown, the Plateau-Mt Royal and Hochelaga. Métro, café and stores 10m away. A HUGE garden. Cat present! :)
interaction: I have placed a special written guide in order for you to feel at home. :)

host.about: Je suis originaire de Roumanie, maintenant à Montréal depuis 8 ans. Je suis infirmière, reconvertie après une mini-carrière dans les festivals de cinéma montréalais. J'aime partager et rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.

reviews.txt:
Teodora was a great host! She contacted me before we arrived to prepare us for the checking in process. She was very accommodating our rushed arrival (we had dinner res.!) and had a great printout regarding any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10 min walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed, to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On a eu un excellent séjour chez (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est jolie et accueillante et elle a tout ce qu'on a besoin...en plus elle est proche de tout!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful listing some great places for us to checkout. Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and great company

name: Sunny appartment on the Plateau
summary: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province!
interaction: I am around mostly in the evenings or later at night...  i  will be happy to share a meal or share with with you my favorite places in town :) Le français est ma langue maternelle Hablo espanol
houseRules: no smoking and no pets allowed

host.about: From Montreal, Sabrina works as a trainer and consultant with non-profit organisations. On a more personal level, she cultivate a secret passion for social change theatre, traveling, yoga, cycling, cooking, harmony and... social gatherings! Marc-André adores sciences but spend the majority of his free time cycling, travelling and enjoying what the city has to offer!

reviews.txt: Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neigborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and I for us to go to such as trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment is in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived she had placed us in the less apealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more then happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom.  She let us use her condiments which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking.  Overall the price was awesome the area was great Sabrina was very cool and so is her decor in her home!  Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in the Montreal downtown. The apartment is in a calm and quiet street. However by 5 minutes walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafe bistros, restaurants, bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying in her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and in a great neighborhood (it is very close to downtown, old montreal, etc.) She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall staying with Sabrina was hassle free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details of places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It is near Park LaFointaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Merci beacoup Sabrina! : )

The apt is very comfortable. I have everything I need even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate, inspiring host. With a art history degree and humain system invention degree, she has extend knowledge of cuture difference which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank a lot Sabrina.

Foi excelente a minha hospedagem no apartamento de Sabrina, ela é bastante acolhedora e foi muito gentil, me apresentou um pouco da cidade e do bairro. Eu não conhecia Montreal e Sabrina me ajudou muito, passeando comigo em algumas ruas e me dando atenção e informações importantes!  
Recomendo a todos (as) hospedarem-se em seu apartamento, o qual é muito limpo e fica em uma rua tranquila.

Isabel Lima - BRASIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apt is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminder or how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and whatnot. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!) Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Mike's House- Uilani Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI.
interaction: I do live on the property and can easily be reached via phone, text, or email.  There is a phone in the house you can use with my contact information
houseRules: No Smoking in House or on lanai’s (You are welcome to smoke outside, please dispose of cigarette butts in the trash) All guests are to park in their designated onsite parking areas provided to them prior to there arrival.  No Loud House parties or gatherings at the house.  House slippers okay in house  Quiet hours  from 9pm - 7am during which time the noise shall not unreasonably disturb adjacent neighbors and other guests staying in the house. No sleepovers of unregistered guests Please rinse sand off before entering house. It clogs our pipes and creates  plumbing problems Please unplug all small appliances in the kitchen when not in use such as  coffee maker, toaster, etc. Coin operated Laundry facility is available on the premises. Please make sure  you shake the sand out of all clothes and towels before putting them into the  washing machine. Do not overload the machine. If there is anything you find lacking in the HOUSE, let us know and we will try to accommodate you. All suggesti

host.about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.txt: Mike's house is a great and budget friendly place to stay, very close to the cool and relaxed downtown of Paia, away from any resort and big tourism area. Best of all Rina is a very nice person who helps you with any question and makes you really feel at home! She helped a lot for our children with many toys and stroller. Now as we are gone our daughter wants to go back to the lanai with the toys. Thanks Rina for everything!

We stayed one week in Mike's House and really enjoyed every second of it. Our room was spacious and nice and the balcony was perfect to have breakfast in the Hawaiian sun. 
The location is great for all kind of trips, and Paia downtown is in walking distance.
Rina provided us with everything we needed, including towels, guides and even a barbecue :)

Thanks again, Rina!!
Rina is wonderful. it is a beautiful place in Paia. It`s the best house to make holiday. Price and service is top!

Our 3-night stay at Mike's House to end our trip in Maui was perfect. Rina is very kind and helping, and the location is great, especially if you want to see the big waves of the north shore or drive the road to Hana. The restaurants and shops of Paia are a short walk away. Our room was well equipped and clean. Thanks Rina!

My husband and I enjoyed 3 nights at Mike's House.  We highly recommend staying there as it was clean, affordable, and walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Most importantly, however, was the Aloha Spirit that we felt from Rina.  Thanks for a great stay.  We'll be back!

Rina was simply a great host. Like supplying some of the little items that make a big difference when traveling. In our case beach towels, beach chairs, back pack, and bag cooler.

The house was clean and well looked after. The friendly atmosphere was also a plus.

Paia is centrally located and close to the airport. It is a young vibrant area.

The only con I can think of was the bed was a double bed and we are used to something bigger.

Bruce and Shelley

Rina was an excellent host and provided everything I needed, and so was the place, great location, plenty of space and all the amenities I needed. Will definitely come to Rina again when back in Paia.

It was very nice to stay at Mike`s House. Rina is very friendly and she does so much that the people feel well at her place. 
I would definitely come back to this place… 
Thank you so much for everything Rina

Der 6 tägige Aufenthalt in Mike's House war sehr angenehm. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen. Das Zimmer war sauber und kann jedem weiter empfohlen werden, sofern einem kleinere Lärmbelastungen nicht stören (z.B. krähender Hahn).

Rina war eine sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Bei unserem Trip auf den Haleakala stellte sie uns sogar Fliesdecken zur Verfügung.

Unser Zimmer verfügte über eine eigene Toilette, Lavabo, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle. Die Dusche befand sich in einem Gemeinschaftsbad. 

Nebst Badetüchern und Strandstühlen waren auch Shampoo und Douche bereitgestellt.

Für Dollar 1.50 konnte man die Maschmaschine inkl. Maschmittel benützen. Gedeckter Parkplatz vorhanden. 5-minütiger Fussmarsch bis ins Zentrum von Paia.

It was nice.  It would have been nice to have an air conditioner in the room though.  It gets very hot in Maui, even at night, starting in early May and on.  The rooster in the neighbors yard woke us up in the morning.  If we had an AC we could have shut the door instead of leave it open for the breeze.

But Rina was great and super helpful.  They had a big fridge in the common kitchen we could use, tons of cookware and stuff.  They also left us some beach towels and picnic bags we used for our trips.  That was super helpful!

name: Large railroad style 3 bedroom apt in Manhattan!
summary: Spacious 3 bedroom apartment. 2 are railroad style (must go through one to get to the next) and the additional bedroom is at opposite end of the apartment for extra privacy. Well equipped open kitchen. Large living room with additional fold out couch. Great apt for a weekend in NYC.  10 min walk to Central Park.
interaction: Anything that you need just call or text us.
houseRules: No smoking tobacco. Not allowed to go to other floors or rooftop.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Spectacular, the host was so kind and his apartment is beautiful, I enjoyed be there, the bed is so comfortable and the apartment is really clean...

Vict's apartment is very nice and the supermarket just next to it! It is very convenient for us to buy anything that we need. The only problem is the apartment is little far from midtown, so if we take Uber to go home, it usually costs a lot.

L.appartement de Vick est très (Website hidden by Airbnb) décoration symphonie et très bien entretenu. Il ne manquait rien pour nous 4 et nous avons passé un agréable séjour et appartement bien situé pour visiter New York.
Vick was very friendly, flexible and welcoming. The apartment has very good connection to the city center (bus, subway) and a shopping mall is in close neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay in NY!

Vick was a great host very understanding and helpful. The place certainly took some getting used as it is quite narrow but the space was big enough for 9 of us. The place had a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom with shower and bath, a mac and a tv with apple tv. The neighborhood was good it was a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station and a short walk to central park.
