Jennifer was also very prompt in her responses and very easy to get a hold of. Thanks again for everything, Jennifer!!! My family & I loved everything about our stay at your place.

We had a fabulous stay. The condo is in a great location with amazing view of sunset across the road, which you can enjoy from the pool and short 10 min walk to a very nice beach. The apartment is spacious and kitchen was well equipped. Jennifer was a very nice host! We will definitely stay again.

name: UWS Brownstone Near Central Park
summary: This spacious one bedroom apartment has a bonus space with two extra beds as well as a fold out sofa.  Close to the park, the subway, museums and restaurants.  This apartment is the perfect quiet getaway in the middle of Manhattan.
interaction: We are not usually around and you'll have the place to yourselves.  We are available by phone and email all the time if you ever have questions or concerns.
houseRules: All the facilities are included ( cleaning , towels , bed linen , heating , WIFI) . Limited to two adult guests only.

host.about: We live in San Francisco and spend time in New York as well.  We also have another place in Northern California in the country we spend time at.  I'm a private pilot and Paul is quite an accomplished ceramicist, though he does non-profit management consulting by profession. I run a retreat center ( (Website hidden by Airbnb) and am a computer consultant some of the time and real estate investor other times.  We have a cat who stays at our house here in San Francisco when we travel.  She is very, very affectionate and easy to care for.

reviews.txt: We stayed in the brownstone for 4 nights and had a lovely time.  The apartment was spacious enough for us (a family of four) and the location was amazing.  You are steps to Central Park and to the 86th subway.  There are wonderful restaurants and shopping nearby if you need that but the small kitchen is fine for quick snacks and breakfast.  It was especially nice to sit on the little patio to eat my toast and tea and even with the NYC humming around you it is lovely to have an outdoor space.  Chas answered all my many questions with great patience and care...he really wanted us to have a wonderful time and went beyond the call of duty by even sending us links to good places to watch big soccer matches.  The apartment was clean when we arrived and had the basic things we needed such as towels and extra sheets.  While not the cheapest option on BNB it gave us all a wonderful bed to sleep in, space to spread out in when needed, and a fantastic location!  We even found street parking for the full 5 days!  Picking up the keys was a breeze and we left a few basic things for the next guests to enjoy from the corner store.   It is a gorgeous street to stay on and felt very safe. Thank you so much Chas!  We hope to return one day soon.

Our stay in New York at this apartment was vastly superior to staying at a hotel.  The location is perfect particularly for those wanting access to Central Park and the museum mile (Guggenheim etc) but it was also a revelation to explore that end of Broadway.  The apartment is lovely and has everything.  We especially appreciated the study nook and ability to use our laptop with wifi access and the well equipped kitchen for easy prep for meals (and deli close by makes it so easy to stock up).  The lounge, bedroom and bathroom are all in good, comfortable condition.  The little balconies and view of the courtyard topped it off.  A great experience and thoroughly recommend.

After a small glitch with the house keys, which was straightened out straight away, our stay was perfect. The apartment is lovely, in a great neighborhood and right by the subway. Even my husband. who is very picky, gave it a two thumbs up ! Our hosts were attentive and gracious over the emails and the whole thing was easy and pleasant. We'd definitaly book again.

It's hard to imagine a more authentic and enjoyable NYC experience than the one we had staying in this UWS apartment. There are so many details -- from the art on the walls to the spices in the kitchen -- that make it feel like a home away from home. The apartment is small but imminently comfortable with high ceilings and patios that make it feel spacious. The unit is off the street (on a courtyard)  so it was very quiet (that  and the comfortable bed made for great nights of sleeping). It's a beautiful street, just off Central Park and just around the corner from the subway. There are abundant restaurants within a 5 minute walk and the best coffee in NY (Joe's) is only about two blocks away. Chas was a great host who was quick to answer all our questions and make our stay as enjoyable as possible. We had our two sons with us (ages 10 and 12) and the living arrangements were ideal for a family our size. Thanks, Chas!

We just spent Christmas week at the apartment with our two daughters (aged 2.5 and 1). The space was well stocked and furnished and the location was perfect. It's not a huge apartment but the lofted ceilings give it a nice, open feel. Central Park, the subway, a convenience store, a wine store, and Starbucks are all within a block or two. When I first booked the reservation I was unsure about the process to get the keys, but it turns out I had no reason to be worried whatsoever. It was very easy and worked out well. Chas answered questions promptly and is a great host. We hope to be back soon!

A great experience - Chas was a good communicator so picking up the key went exactly as planned (a good thing for a first timer!), the apartment was just what we needed and the location (and quiet street) really were fabulous.

I don't think we could of asked for the most perfect spot to stay at while visiting NYC. This home is close to everything we wanted to experience while being in the city.... the park, museums, great places to eat at, major subway lines to take you to midtown and lower Manhattan, etc, etc,.  The apartment was so nice, quiet, comfortable, and cool to come back to after being out and about ( we had a couple of days during our stay where it was very warm ) and that was a plus !  Both Paul and Chas were quickly responsive and accommodating to any questions or needs we had. All in all, if you really want to get a great NYC experience, this beautiful UWS retreat is the way to go.  Thank you Chas and Paul !!

My Mum and I recently spent 11 nights at Chas' Upper West Side apartment. We had not used AirBnB before, but the whole process ran very smoothly. Both Chas and Paul were quick at answering emails and provided us with plenty of information re local grocery shops etc. The pick-up of the keys was also very simple. 
The apartment is in a great location, half a block from Central Park and close to several subway lines. Only up one flight of stairs, which was good because there are no lifts! 
The apartment was very well equipped with everything you need for a stay away from home - bedding, towels, full kitchen etc. It was a bit smaller than it appears in the photos and could do with a lick of paint, but was very clean and had plenty of storage. Also, keep in mind that the beds in the loft may provide a bit of a problem for some guests - definitely best for kids. 
Overall, we had a great time at Chas' apartment and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting to visit New York!
We had a great time in the apartment! Location was great with just steps to Central Park and the subway right around the corner. Would stay here again for sure! Thanks!

Our stay in the apartment on 87th St was really wonderful. The neighborhood was cosy and felt safe, the subway was only steps away and it was close both to the park and to the shops and restaurants on Amsterdam and Broadway. It couldn't have been better. The apartment itself was nice and roomy for being in New York, and had everything we needed. The kitchen was small but well equipped and the beds were comfortable. Chas was very helpful and answered all our questions very quickly. Overall, it was a really wonderful stay!

name: Renovated Modern Apartment with Cathedral Views
summary: Sit with an espresso in the extensive open living space and take in the city through floor-to-ceiling balcony doors. The quiet, sunny flat boasts modern furnishings and sits on the corner of the building with cathedral views.
interaction: Я буду очень рада помочь Вам с вашей поездкой. Могу подсказать интересные места, рестораны и т.д.
houseRules: Dear future guests, Let me know your arrival time as soon as possible so that I may arrange a smooth check-in. Check-in time is from 17:00/5pm; in case of early arrival we will try to store your luggage (depending on availability of cleaning staff and prior groups). Check-out is at 11:00/11am. For your ease, I will meet you directly at the property. There is an additional fee of 20EUR for check-ins after 20:00/8pm; 30EUR for check-ins after 22:00/10pm and 50EUR fee for check-ins after 24:00/12pm (paid in cash). I ask you to treat this place the exact same way that you would want a guest to treat your own home! HOUSE RULES -	I do not host groups who are all 25 years of age or younger. If your group is 25 years of age or younger, please do not place a reservation without written pre-approval from me. Failure to do so will result in termination of your reservation and full charge of your security deposit. -	All guests entering the apartment at any point during the time of your reservation

reviews.txt: Sophie was an amazing guest. We were her first guests ever and her apartment in Barcelona could not have been any better. It was very clean and in a great location. She was incredibly flexible with check in and check out times. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.

A generous and warm welcome from Sophie. The apartment is newly furnished and decorated, light and airy, comfortable and spacious. The kitchen is well-equipped (even a Nespresso machine!) and beds very comfortable. It has some great views of the old city and is perfectly situated for exploring Barcelona - if only we had stayed longer!  Next time...

Appartement fantastique en plein centre de Barcelone, à proximité de la Sagrada Família. L'appartement est vraiment conforme à la description et nous y étions vraiment à l'aise avec deux enfants, dont un en bas âge. Grâce à la réactivité de Sophie, nous avons pu organiser notre voyage en moins de 48 heures. Sophie à aussi été très prompte à régler un petit problème de chauffe eau en quelques heures. Communication vraiment facile. Séjour sans encombres. 

Les jouets, les livres pour enfants, ainsi que le mobilier pour bébé (chaise haute, baignoire, lit parapluie) ont vraiment été la bonne surprise qui nous a permis d'organiser notre séjour en toute simplicité.

Nous recommandons chaudement cet appartement pour une famille. L'appartement était suffisamment grand pour deux enfants/personnes supplémentaires. Nous y retournerons sûrement!

Sophie was very quick with responding and made us feel very welcome. The appartement was fantastic: bright and sunny, very clean and complete. Good beds, enough towels, nice kitchen. Very nice for us, a family with 3 children. The locating was also very good: close to a metro station and the Sagrada Familia. Nice neighbourhood with lots of shops and nice small parks.

Sophie was an impeccable host, and her apartment is by far the nicest I've ever stayed in in Barcelona. It's large, light, well equipped, beautifully decorated and very well located. Sophie also went the extra mile, ensuring that the apartment had a cot and high chair for a our son, and even letting us take the travel cot with us for a couple of nights, as we still needed it. Such amazing hosting! Highly recommended.
Sophie's apartment was a lovely spacious and very clean place with great soft towels! Perfectly situated for walking to the Sagrada and with metro stops nearby a good base for exploring Barcelona.

Спасибо, София! Ваша квартира нам очень понравилась. Бронирование было очень оперативным.
Также отдельная благодарность за то, что когда мы забыли ключи в квартире, София очень быстро приехала и помогла нам. Ресторан который вы нам порекомендовали так же оставил отличные впечатления. Мы с радостью вернёмся в Барселону ещё раз и остановимся в вашей квартире!

Огромное спасибо, София!

Notre séjour à Barcelone s'est très bien passé. L'appartement de Sophie est très bien situé et très agréable. Il ne manque rien. Sophie nous a beaucoup aidé à organiser notre arrivée (parking...). Je recommande vivement ce logement à d'autres voyageurs.
The place was very nice. Spacious and it had all the things we needed in an apartment. Definitely somewhere I wanna stay again

A estadia no apartamento da Sophie foi ótima!
O apartamento era exatamente igual às fotografias e a cozinha estava muito bem equipada.
A Sophie é uma anfitriã muito disponível e atenciosa. Ajudou nos com a reserva de estacionamento para o nosso carro durante a estadia.
Aconselhamos vivamente! 
Obrigada por tudo :)

name: Vela Luxury Apartment HUTB-001280
summary: Spacious 110m2 apartment decorated with designer furniture throughout.  Large living room/dining room area with bay window. 2 double bedrooms leading to balcony & 2 bathrooms. Office area, fully equipped kitchen & safety box. Centrally located, 1 block from Paseo de Gracia, restaurants, boutiques and bars within walking distance. Close to metro stations, bus stops, casa Batllò, La Pedrera etc Ideal for families, groups or professionals. There is a 30€ extra charge for late check ins (after 9pm)
interaction: We will recommend you the best restaurants in the city from the trendiest to the local secrets for foodies. For our lady guests with a soft spot for shoes and handbags, we can organize a visit to Serena Whitehaven's showroom. This is a local brand which is establishing itself worldwide - already has a shop in Miami - come and get pleasantly surprised and let them pamper you !
houseRules: - Only smalll pets allowed

reviews.txt: Lovely apartment in a great location. Everything as expected.

El departamento esta en una ubicación excelente, a una cuadra de la casa Batllo y a media cuadra del Paseo de Gracia
Las fotos del anuncio son super exactas...el departamento es igual a lo que aparece en ellas
Buen espacio y dimensiones de todos los recintos 
Nuestra anfitriona fue muy agradable y simpática
La conexion de Wi Fi funciona muy bien y es muy buena
房子很大,位置很好,床和家具也还不错｡但是油漆味道特别重,感觉像刚刷了没两天,很不舒服｡而且入住时还收了21欧元的租房税,这个费用并没有提前说明｡和房东约好的10月11日的清洁服务当天没有来,改约了12日也没有来…很无语｡
Beautiful apartment, as shown in pictures, really spacious, nice modern bathrooms and kitchen in a great location and a responsive host. Top marks!

Wonderful stay in Vega last October .Apartment design and nicely furnished, well located between Casa Pedrera and Casa Ballto. Walking distance from Catalunya plaza (about 10 min). Heike has been very supportive and nice in accommodating us during the week. 
We recommend this address. It is a bit  noisy as really in the city center but we were not bothered during the night.
Lovely apartment, great design, central location
Great location ,, beautiful apartment .. Neat and clean.. Highly recommended.

The apartment is centrally located in a very safe area of Barcelona with easy access to shops, restaurants and some excellent tourist sights.

The apartment is quite beautiful, very clean with high ceilings, wooden floors, very tall windows and doors and nicely furnished.  We visited over the last week of December and the city's Christmas lights were beautiful. 

The heating system was very efficient and no problems with hot water supply.  Fully double-glazed windows and bedroom windows are double-double glazed so no problem with road noise.  Although only on the first floor there is a small lift for those who may find it difficult to climb stairs with a suitcase.

For those interested, the apartment is directly opposite the Egyptian Museum.

Heike was a friendly and efficient host and solved a problem with one of the keys overnight for us.

We really enjoyed our stay at Vela apartment and would recommend to others seeking a classy apartment in a great location in this amazing city.

central location with great public transport close by.Wonderful ,stylish apartment with all you would want available for a short or long stay..Professional assistance from the owner and always willing to assist .The area made me feel like a local which I liked..

We have used Airbnb for our last few family European holidays, so we have some but not a huge experience with Airbnb. 

The host responded to my booking request very promptly and responded to my initial questions straight away. Communication was very good, which I found encouraging. 

When we arrived we were greeted by Alex who politely and articulately showed us around the apartment and resolved a number of very minor housekeeping issues. We had a slight issue with the internet on day 2 which again was dealt with promptly and efficiently. 

The apartment is tastefully decorated and appointed to a high standard and it was also very comfortable. We felt very much at home. 

On the first night we noticed a little traffic noise  ( as was expected from a city centre location) but this was significantly minimized when the outer shutters and inner ornate shutters were closed. 

The apartment is located in a lovely spot, very central but a block or so away from where the main tourist congregations.  We enjoyed exploring the city away from the bulk of the tourists. 

I would definitely recommend this apartment.

name: Jardim Botânico Gourmet 2 bdroom
summary: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed, 3 single bed), 2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay!
interaction: Estou disponível 24h, indico guias especializados, roteiros de charme, assistência para crianças pequenas, motoristas etc.
houseRules: Respeitar vizinhos e horário de silêncio.  ->>>>>>Desligar ar condicionado e luzes ao sair.  ->>>>>>Qualquer objeto quebrado, manchado ou avariado deve ser comunicado IMEDIATAMENTE ao anfitrião ou através do AIRbnb. • Cuidado com as malas de rodinhas a fim de não arranhar o piso. • SEMPRE usar tábua de corte para não arranhar a bancada da pia! • O número de hóspedes na reserva deve ser respeitado. Não são permitidos convidados ou visitas.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. 
Valorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! 
Além de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. 
O VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. 
Além de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, 
em 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. 
Em 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização. Em 2019 vamos estrear nosso novo maestro com uma bateria inovadora e arrepiante. Vem!

reviews.txt: Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us.

Roberta muito atenciosa,  disponível, tranquila e sensata, aceita conselhos, e isso para mim conta muito...Apartamento super confortável no Jardim Botânico que eu amo, e a posição do apartamento é maravilhoso, tem o que precisamos dentro de uma casa... rua  tranquila. perto de tudo. Espero de voltar logo, e com certeza para o mesmo lugar . Obrigada Roberta pelo carinho e atenção . Bacio

Obrigada Roberta sempre pela hospitalidade e carinho que você cura seus hospedes. Como sempre muito gentil e totalmente disponível com seus clientes, segunda vez que retorno pode acreditar agora será minha segunda casa no Brasil na minha Cidade Maravilhosa, meu ponto de referencia . Apartamento perfeito localização DEZ. Beijo enorme...
Everything as described. Nice location, felt very safe. Everything you need is close. Wifi was a little bit spotty at times, but wasn't a big deal.

Apto super bem localizado em um dos meus pontos preferidos do Rio. Bairro super seguro com acesso a mercados e comércio em geral. Do lado do Jd Botânico, perto da Lagoa e Vista Chinesa. Fácil acesso aos outros pontos da cidade. Da lavanderia vc tem vista ao Cristo Redentor, uma inspiração.
O ap é grande e arejado. Cozinha equipada com vários utensílios. 
Gostei mto e recomendo.
The apartment was in a great location & a friendly neighbourhood with lots of great places to eat.

Cantinho super agradável e fofo no Jardim Botânico! Localização muito segura e de fácil locomoção, além de vários bares e restaurantes descolados no entorno.
Anfitriã muito hospitaleira e prestativa. 
Foi nossa primeira experiência com o Airbnb e adoramos a diferença entre hotel e uma casinha!!! =)

We enjoyed our 4-day stay at this apartment, while we were moving house in Rio. The apartment is cute and stocked with everything you need to actually live in it, which I appreciated - good kitchen. Roberta was responsive and accessible. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!

O apartamento entrega tudo aquilo que promete embora seja um pouco barulhento por conta do ônibus que passa na porta. Mas esse é o preço pela localização maravilhosa.O playground é ótimo , com direito a piscina.

name: Cozy bedroom Sagrada Familia
summary: Cozy bedroom next to the church Sagrada Família a great choice to stay in a residential area away from the crowds while still being at a walking distance to main attractions in Barcelona.
interaction: I'll be glad to give you some tips according to your taste.

host.about:
Hi, I'm from Brazil, but live in Barcelona.
I'm an sportsman, who loves music and is organized.
Really looking foward to a nice deal.
Cya,
Rapha

reviews.txt: Rapha place is so tidy and the dog there is so friendly. I and my friend had a really good time there. Rapha is such a friendly host and he will always give us some suggestions of restaurants or place to travel. The location of the flat is easy to find and it is just next to the metro station and that is very convenient. The hot tourist spot Sagrada Familia is just next to the flat. We can go to the city centre just by walking. Even though at night, we still feel safe to walk to the apartment from the metro.I strongly recommend people to stay there during staying in Barcelona.

name: Single private room(Gray)
summary: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions.
interaction: I am living in the 3rd floor of the same building, so I am reachable in case of any need. If I am not around, you can email me, or text me via SMS & social media anytime you need help.
houseRules: Please pay attention to these simple rules to make life better in our flat ; 1. Please ask permission of your current (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to invite more than 1-2 guests of yours, especially at late hours. Please do not invite dozens of people without asking other people, if you're in urge to do that, please do it with the permission of others at reasonable hours. 2. Please lock the flat door while you're leaving, also please keep your rooms locked when you're away to prevent any problematic situation. 3. Please pay attention to prevent loud noise after 23.00, there are lots of other people in the building who are waking up early and local people in nearby apartments as well. 4. Please do not smoke in the living room, if you're a smoker please try to choose your own room to smoke. Also please do not throw cigarettes into the garden. 5. 2 times per month a cleaning lady comes to clean the entire flat, but please be helpful to your (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) about cleaning of sha

host.about:
Greetings traveller!

I'm 38 years old freelancer, graduated from graphic design. Currently running my own business, renovating and renting private rooms & flats in the heart of Istanbul mostly for incoming visitors since 2010.

I will be glad if I can help for your accommodation need, and if i can make you feel at home!

reviews.txt:
I just booked a room for a night, before taking my flight. So I can't fully describe Dama's House. However, I can say Ali is a very very nice guy, he welcomed me very well. The room was clean, small but pretty and well arranged. Idem for the bathroom. About the location, it's nearby Karakoy's port (from there, you can go to Uskudar etc.) and nearby Istikal, a famous shopping street going to Taksim (a center place to take a bus and to go to the airport for example).
Finally I can recommend Ali and Dama's House ;)

I stayed two terrific nights at Dama's House.  It is in a wonderful location with shops and transportation in close proximity.  The common spaces (i.e. sitting room, kitchen and bathroom) of the house were clean, and my private room was larger than I expected.  Access to the washing machine was a very helpful amenity.

Great place to stay for a short or long term, international people, really comfortable furniture and very polite landlord. I can really recommend this accommodation. Thanks Ali, for make my stay so special in your house.

Dama's House is the perfect location if you want to discover Istanbul on your holidays or if you are there for Erasmus studies. The neighbourhood is really safe and central and the room is clean. But most of all, Ali is a great host who is helpful no matter what you need: a cab, recommendations for food and drinks, just anything!

I stayed for 4 weeks in the Gray Room in Dama's House and loved this place. The flat is very central (next street to Istiklal Caddesi), very clean and comfortable. Ali was was a great and cooperative host. Thank you very much!! :)

Ali was very communicative before I arrived in Istanbul, gave very clear directions to the apartment, and was welcoming and accessible throughout my stay.  The room itself--the grey room--was simple and lovely, in an apartment ideally located in Beyoglu within easy walking distance of everything I needed.  Perfect.  Ali also arranged reliable early morning transport to Ataturk airport for me on the day of my departure.  It was a really great place to stay, private and simple and friendly.  Strongly recommended.
Perfect location and very very nice people. Only problem was that the bed is not very good, my back was hurting when I woke up.

Ali was a great host. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed a week in the Grey Room. After a warm welcome, Ali gave me a street map of Istanbul and a nice present. The Location is just two minutes away from Istiklal Cad., very cool! Thank you Ali, for sharing your place.

Ali was a great host, so welcoming and helpful, he will make you feel at home.
he is ready to help in any situation, I had an argument with the taxi driver who was taking me to Ali's place and even before I meet with Ali in person, I called him to talk to the driver in Turkish since the communications in English was useless, Ali was ready to help and he solved the problem with the Taxi driver.
For the room its good size room, I had a stay in the Indian room as well, You will met nice people in Ali's apartment, the diversity of the guests will leave a great chance for a culture-exchange, and if you're planing to stay for a long period of time, there will be a possibility of making good friends.
Location is just perfect, 3 minutes walking up the hill to Istiklal Street where you can see the Turkish modern lifestyle surrounded by historical buildings and unique gift boutiques, live music, good food and the best part is Galatasary tower just 7 minutes walking .
I also liked the fact that the building has elevator so you don't have to worry about lefting your luggage!
I definitely recommend Ali's place and the best thing about it is Ali himself.

I had a very good experience at Dama house during my holidays in Istanbul. It's very central and that allowed me to walk to almost everywhere. The house is in a quiet street and it has all the facilities, also Ali has been always very quick replying to any questions and very easy person to deal with. I will definitely stay again there in my next trip to Istanbul.

name: Cozy Nest, heart of the Plateau
summary: Come spend a few days (or weeks) in our beautiful and cozy apartment situated in the heart of Montreal's most happening neighborhood! You will share the space with me as, maybe another guest and probably a cute cat or kitten (I sometimes foster cute little furry balls). LGBTQ friendly :) Looking forward to meeting you!
interaction: I am discreet and respectful yet enjoy sharing out stories at the end of the day or advising guests on places to go or things to see!
houseRules: Hi Guest! Hope you will have an awesome stay at our place. Aside from keeping things clean and not screaming after midnight, we don't have many rules. Here are however the things you should pay attention to: 1 - Whenever you leave the house, please make sure the windows and back door are closed and locked. 2 - The front door can be a bit hard to shut so make sure to give it the extra push or pull so that it locks properly. 3 - There is a washer and dryer downstairs in the basement, which you can access through the living room. The basement light switches are on the pillar, situated at the bottom of the stairs on the left.  Our linen closet is filled with extra blankets and bed sheets. it is in the beige closet at the bottom of the basement stairs. 4 - If you use the microwave at the same time as the toaster or electric kettle, it will blow a fuse so try to remember not to do it. If it happens, no big deal, it can be switched back on through the electric panel in the basement. Voilà ! i

host.about:
Hello,
My name is Laura, I am a young and active professional living in Montreal and working for a concert promoter.
I've been living in this apartment for over 12 years now. It holds a very special place in my heart and I am glad to be opening the doors of my cosy nest to new guests!
You will also be sharing the common space with a cat or two as well as maybe another traveling guest.
Looking forward to meeting you and helping make your stay in our lovely city as comfortable as possible.
À bientôt !

reviews.txt: my stay in the comfy private double room was indeed comfy!   it´s not just conveniently in the middle of a great neighborhood, walkig distance from the mont royal and a bunch of nice cafes and bars but the hosts were very easy going, helpful and fun. i´d totally do it again!
An amazing and enormous room and a total bargain at the price. Nice backyard. Great neighbourhood. Friendly and accommodating host. I hereby have nothing bad to say!

I had a FABULOUS stay! The room was enormous and just as pictured. You really cannot beat the neighborhood - walking distance to a ton of great local bars/restaurants/parks and easy access to the bus and the subway. The hosts were so gracious and helpful. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
We had a wonderful stay! The host was very friendly and helpful, the room was exactly like the picture, and the location was perfect.
Lilou was a lovely host - communication was super smooth and she made me nice herbal tea before bed. The room is spacious, and you really couldn't ask for a better location in Montreal!
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'accueil proposé par Laura et Lulu est chaleureux et très agréable. Le quartier est un des meilleurs de Montréal et l'appartement est idéalement située. La chambre est très grande et calme. 
Laura est une hôte remarquable, et très arrangeante ! Merci encore pour ce premier séjour a Montréal !

J'ai passé 5 jours chez Laura, l'appartement est grand et ressemble bien a ce que l'on peut voir sur les photos. La chambre est elle aussi très grande, et le lit très confortable. 
Pour ce qui est de Laura et de Anne, elles sont toutes les deux très sympas et mettent à l'aise tout de suite. En bref on se sent comme chez soit. 
Au final, un super début de séjour à Montréal, encore merci à Laura et Anne.

If I had to describe my stay at Laura's in one word it would be 'AMAZING'! Luckily, I have more space. 

The room is just as the pictures display: huge, clean, and comfy! There's a 2persons bed, a build-in closet, another closet with drawers, a book case, a big desk, and a comfy sofa to relax on. Although the room offers more space than you probably need, you can also just hang out in the cozy living room. But the best place has to be the back yard, which Laura turned in a little green oasis. It's the ideal spot to relax after a long day, enjoy the sun, or have a home dinner. And no need to feel lonely as Lulu - a.k.a. the most adorable cat ever - and his buddies from the block are always around somewhere (especially if you give them some of your ham sandwich or sushi). 

I've stayed at Laura's for several months and I've never felt so at home in another person's house. Laura went above and beyond to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I was new to Montreal (actually I was new to Canada) and didn't know any people other than a few colleagues. Laura embraced me as a friend and made sure I never had to feel alone or get bored, while also giving me all the privacy I wanted. 

The neighbourhood has everything you need. The house is near  shops, supermarkets, cafe's, restaurants, parks (including the Mont Royal), several busstops, 2 metro stations (Laurier & Mont Royal; both 10 min walking distance), and there's and there's always some fun - often free - festival around the corner in the summer. Despite all this the street is actually really quiet and is very safe!

Laura was a brilliant host. The key pick up was well-organized and I felt immediately welcomed into the home. Essentials/amenities were provided for which made it much easier.

She also gave us great advice on where to go and eat. Overall Laura was just an awesome host.

name: Fabulous occasion orange
summary: You are in the epicenter of Porto's life! Monuments as Clerigos Tower, Eifell bridge "D. Luis" and Ribeira, the riverside, S. Bento train station, Restaurants, shops,cafés...everything is just around the corner.
interaction: Always there for you!!

reviews.txt: Passamos uma agradável noite no studio de Dulce, equipado com o indispensável para curtas estadias. A cama, cujo acesso se dá por meio de uma escada, é bastante confortável. A localização é excelente e central. Dulce foi muito simpática e nos acolheu muito bem. Recomendamos!

Dulce was picking us up at the corner of the street. The apartment is in a very central area close to the city center and close to the river. Everything was clean and nice. It is a charming place to stay.
Great place, right in the centre. Had a great time

It is what it is!! A FABULOUS occasion! The situation is ideal. . Dulce is very nice and always answers promptly to questions and/or other needs.. The place is sooo charming!  You cannot have a better location: everything is around you! And the appartement so clean, intimate and simple.. and the price! Just too right.. thank you SO much to offer this nice appartement to people who travels this must see area!  

We wish to come back another time! 

Marie & Billy

Dulce est vraiment une hôte géniale. Malgré un retard d'avion de plus de 9h, elle nous a attendus. Très gentille, arrangeante et disponible, tout s'est très bien passé ! L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel pour passer un long week-end. Également très bien situé, nous avons pu tout faire à pieds, notamment le soir où les bars sont proches. Je recommande vivement Duce et son joli appartement ! En espérant revenir avec le soleil !

Dulce est une hôte au TOP. L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel, très bien situé, nous avons tout visité a pieds il est vraiment au centre de tout, notamment pour les sorties le soir. Je recommande à 1 000% l’appartement en espérant  y retourner prochainement.

Nous avons passés 4 jours magnifiques à Porto dans un logement très agréable : propre et bien équipé .
L'accueil à été parfait , Dulce est sympathique et avenante, elle nous a bien guidé. 
Elle parle bien le français et nous a renseigné sur les adresses utiles : alimentation, métro. ...
첫 에어비앤비 이용 숙소였는데 정말 좋았어요! 집은 한국의 복층원룸식이고 침대가 복층에 있어서 예상과 조금 다르긴했지만, 깔끔했고 두명이 쓰는데는 부족함이 없었습니다. 가장 좋았던건 위치! 상벤토역 바로 앞이라고 해도 될 정도에요. 그리고 호스트도 정말 친절하고 좋았습니다. 포르투에 다시 방문한다면 같은 곳으로 가고 싶어요!

Beautiful studio! Everything was perfect I felt like I didn't want to leave the house lol. Thank you Dulce for being so helpful with all the useful information you have given. Will surely come back to stay there again if I'm back to Porto. Love from Malaysia, June.

Das Apartment liegt mitten in Portos Altstadt und ist somit der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Porto zu erkunden! Es war super sauber und alles entspricht den Bildern. Ein Parkhaus befindet sich nur 20m entfernt und kostet 15€/ 24h. Dulce ist sehr freundlich und wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt!

name: Apart-hotel w/ Wonderful Ocean View - 2 bedrooms!!
summary: It's the perfect spot in Rio! A 2 bedroom aptm. in front of Barra da Tijuca´s beach, fully equipped and with excellent facilities in the building. * Ocean front balcony with hammock and breakfast table; * Bedroom suite with ocean view; * Great beds and shower; * Security and Reception 24 hrs; * Supermarket under the building; * Close to bars and restaurants * Easy access to the rest of the city; * Swimming pool with sea view and bar service; *Buffet restaurant; * Parking;
interaction: I speak english, french, spanish and italian and will be happy to assist you with anything you might need.
houseRules: Smoking is allowed only in the balconies. Please use the bathers entrance to wash your feet and remove the sand before entering in the apartment. Additional guests are not allowed.

host.about:
Hello there!

I´m Aline, and I was borned and raised in Rio de Janeiro. Excepting some periods of my life ( education and working abroad  for a couple of years and a sabatical round the world trip) I have spent all my life in this beautiful city that I´m so proud of belonging to. Please be welcome to my place!  

I enjoy eating, reading, surfing, eating again and for sure...travelling. My time abroad have gave me not only languages skills but also one understanding of how life can be enjoyed diferently, according to each reality. I hope you will have a taste of how shinny and beutiful life can be in Brazil!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
My stay at Alines apartment has been absolutely fabulous. I was alone, working for the TeamNl Paralympics, so a lot of going in and out. Every time that I could come back to the apartment it was a safe haven with beautiful views, nice balconies for my cup of tea, clean, light, perfect bed, super nice deli style supermarket downstairs with good take away and cold beer. Aline is a great lovely host that really wants to make the best Rio time for you as a visitor.  I can really recommend the apartment, location, Rio and host Aline!
Thank you so much. I'll come back with my family.

Aline estuvo siempre disponible y muy atenta. La ubicación es buena, justo frente a la playa. El supermercado de abajo es una gran ventaja. Si bien no es muy variado es de súper ayuda. 
El departamento es tal como en las fotos. Muy acogedor. Éramos dos mayores y un bebé y nos reaultó cómodo.
El vecindario es un poco ruidoso, pero es por su cercanía a la avenida que une toda Barra.
Los servicios del condominio no son del todo buenos, salvo a la pileta dónde se puede pasar un buen rato.
El departamento es para tenerlo en cuenta y volver.
Todo exelente como dice el aviso

Apto otimo , td limpinho e otima localizaçao.
Bem familiar

Obrigada por tudo Aline. Você e sua família nos deram a atenção esperada. O apartamento é ótimo, muito bem localizado e arejado. Agradecemos pela bela estadia e pelos mimos que nos aguardavam na chegada. Abs
Maria do Carmo
O apartamento é ideal e a vista é maravilhosa! Localização ótima incrível disponibilidade da anfitriã! Foi tudo impecável.
Aline é uma excelente anfitriã, está de parabéns, muito atenciosa, gostamos muito, o apartamento é ótimo com uma vista incrível, certamente voltaremos em breve. Um abraço

El departamento de Aline es excelente! Una vista increíble, el lugar súper cómodo y super equipado! Nos recibieron como los dueños de casa y Aline nos preparó una recepción para toda la familia...
Sólo palabras de agradecimiento por prestarnos su lugar por estos días!! Realmente un lugar para disfrutar y descansar... las fotos sólo muestran parte de lo lindo que es todo.
Fuimos con nuestros tres hijos y se cansaron de disfrutar... playa, pileta, juegos... todo de lujo!
Super recomendable!!!
La verdad que todo expectacular, la ubicacion, la seguridad del complejo, los servicios, el departamento muy bueno y sobre todo la atencion de ailin la dueña

Recomiendo 100% este lugar, es excelente. El depto es hermoso, la vista al mar es algo impresionante. La zona de la playa es maravillosa. El condominio es fabuloso, mucha seguridad. La zona de pileta es hermosa con todas las comodidades. Y lo mas practico es que tenes un super enorme abajo que esta abierto horario corrido. Volveria sin dudarlo.

name: listing_id: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) THE BEST LOCATION IN LEBLON
summary: 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen, 1 Suite, 100m2, next to the best shopping malls, restaurants and 600m from the beach. UNBEATABLE! Equipped with cutting-edge TV, WiFi and cable TV, Nespresso coffee maker, full kitchen and service of PERSONAL CHEF under agreement.
interaction: Guests can contact me via email or (Hidden by Airbnb) anytime during your stay.
houseRules: Trata-se de prédio residencial familiar, de modo que não é permitido festas e barulho, especialmente no período noturno. Não é permitido fumar no interior do apartamento.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A Patrícia esteve sempre disponível para nos ajudar, com muito carinho. O apartamento tem localização excelente, perto de shoppings, teatro, ótimos restaurantes e supermercado. Tudo no apartamento estava muito limpo. Enfim, foi uma ótima estadia!

Já é a segunda vez que alugo apto para passar férias em julho com minha família e cada vez gosto mais. A localização é perfeita, o apto super bem conservado e limpo, além de muito bem equipado. Não poderia ser mais adequado às Minhas necessidades.

Very nice place to stay!!!!

Patrícia recebeu minha família de forma muito simpática!!!! O apartamento estava em plena ordem e limpo. Os quartos têm camas confortáveis, com armários. A região é muito tranquila, numa rua particular muito perto da Lagoa e da praia... Recomendo com certeza !!!
A Patrícia, anfitriã, foi muito gentil e atenciosa. Lugar excelente!! Localização maravilhosa! Voltaremos, com certeza!! Recomendo!!

A estadia foi ótima , o apartamento é exatamente como as fotos mostram . E limpo , arejado e muito bem localizado .
A Patrícia é muito gentil e atenciosa.
Excelente!

Agradecida por la hospitaludad, que nos brindo cumplio con todo lo esperado, el dpto esta completo para venir en familia , el lugar muy tranquilo, es amplio el espacio y cuenta con todo en cocina y lavadora, camas muy comodas, es como dice el anuncio tal cual , todo cerca playa, shoping , super , taxi y tranquilidad. 
Me retito muy contenta en mi estadia y regreso pronto a mi pais Chileno.

Apto em ótima localização, limpo e confortável para 6 pessoas.
Patricia é muito atenciosa.
Adoramos a estadia!

Great location near Shopping Leblon, Leblon beach, Ipanaema beach and Lagoa. Felt quite safe there day and night. Leafy streets well lit at night. Spacious apartment for 6 people. View of the Christ Redeemer out of one of the bedroom windows. Master bedroom bed very comforatble. Other double room bed rather old and not so comfortble. Aircons noisy in that room too but fan also available. Kitchen well equipped and good washing machine and drying racks. Lounge had good comfortable furniture and large dining table. Wi-fi worked well. Only issue we had was part of the tiling in the kitchen spontaneously cracked and broke leaving the doorway into the kitchen with a very uneven entrance. Host provided a tarpaulin and offered us two free extra nights which made up for the inconvenience, an offer we were able to take up. Communication with host was through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

A Patrícia é muito gentil, prestativa e carinhosa. Nós nos sentimos muito a vontade, o apartamento era exatamente como o anuncio, super bem localizado com tudo o que era necessário, limpeza impecável. Adoramos a nossa estadia!!!

name: Chic 2BR in The Village by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the colorful decor, fully-equipped kitchen, and en suite laundry facilities. Located in Montreal’s The Village, you’re seconds away from the pedestrian stretch of Ste-Catherine Street and its summer attractions.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.
houseRules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

host.about:
Sonder provides everything you need for an exceptional stay. Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. Every home is equipped with crisp linens, high-speed Wi-Fi, and kitchen and bath essentials. And every experience is one-of-a-kind, thanks to our unique spaces and Neighborhood Guides.

To provide a better Sonder guest experience, we're creating local Airbnb accounts, and moving our listings to those new accounts. If you don't see a property you like here, there may be more on one of our new local profiles. Please reach out for more information!

reviews.txt: This apartment was great for a group of 3 of us. The apartment was very clean and was nicely set up for our arrival with towels toiletries provided. The apartment overlooks the main street which is full of nightlife and restaurants. With the windows open it could be a  bit noisy, but when they are closed it was very quiet so it was not an issue! Having the metro so close made traveling the city very easy. The biggest challenge was parking, if you plan to have a car your only decent overnight options require you to walk quite a bit. Check - in was very easy I would recommend this apartment for friends or couples looking to enjoy the Gay Village and downtown Montreal.
great place, very comfortable and clean, and looks just like the photos.
Great stay! Apartment was perfect.
Excellent appartement. Très propre, très commode, très central, à 1min de l'arret de métro. Parfait.
Great location and lovely suite. If you have a car, the best place to park is under the Grand Bibliothèque.

Lovely condo, looks exactly like the pictures. We had a great stay. The Sonder team are great communicators. Would definitely stay there again.

Keep in mind it is on St. Catherine in The Village, so there is some street noise. Also, the listing doesn't include parking so be sure to make alternate arrangements as the lot Sonder suggested was unattended and difficult to get a hold of.
Great location! Very spacious and cute decor. Bars and restaurants steps away and central to tourist attractions. Would definitely stay again.

My family of 5 (3 teenage daughters) stayed here for our August vacation this year (2017). Great apartment located in the middle of the gay village. Very clean and organized with lots of small restaurants around. The metro stop is on the same block and made getting to the rest of the city very easy.  Great windows and lots of light and views of St. Catherine Street which is pedestrian only in the summer.  Lots of fun. 
There are two long sets of stairs up to get to the apartment so pack lightly.  Also the air conditioner had a hard time keeping the front bedroom cool.
Nice, modern apartment in the heart of the Gay Village. Great amenities and perfect for 2-4 people as the rooms were separated and had everything you need.
The host canceled this reservation 127 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Friendly Apartment, 10m from Manly
summary: A friendly apartment block where everyone knows each other and there is a strong communal vibe. Property has a huge backyard with vege garden and skate ramp. 7min walk to the beach and 2min to buses.
interaction: I will be contactable by phone, housemate is friendly man who love meeting new people. All other apartment tenants are also very helpful and welcoming.
houseRules: This would best suit a down-to-earth, friendly person or couple who want to be near the water over the summer.  Non-smoking, no pets. Please do not have extra guests without notice.

reviews.txt:
This stunning place is definately the best accommodation we've had in australia! They make one feel very at home and let you take part on the good vibes ! It's tidy and very comfi.. I really recomend this place for everyone who likes to be surrounded by good people! 
thanks

Isaac's house was as beautiful as can be, the room had sunlight and was cozy, clean and neat. 
cozy small kitchen comes with the room and a lively backyard with a lovely and very friendly dog that is not shy to say hello to you.

Definitely recommend staying at Isaac's, as he is also very nice and kind..
Staying here is like "going home". You feel part of the family and everyone is really chilled. Highly recommend for those seeking a relaxing time away. Clean and great location.
A very nice Apartment with a Great big garden and so many nice neighbours! Just awesome there! :)

name: Oceanfront Paradise Condo in Lahaina Towne
summary: Do you need a well-deserved break? Come experience our little piece of Hawaiian paradise! Our beautiful, recently-renovated oceanfront condo has everything you need for a perfect vacation in Lahaina, Maui. Right on the ocean, you can fall asleep listening to the sound of the waves, and awaken to see marine life, the island of Lanai and sailboats moored offshore.  Just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more.
interaction: Always available by telephone, text or email On-island Management Company  ChasenRainbows
houseRules: - Rental rules and regulations will be emailed to prospective guests to be signed upon acceptance of terms.

host.about:
Aloha,
I love to do yoga, sail, kayak, walk and travel.  I have two gorgeous granddaughters who live in Vienna, Austria.  They love to visit our place in Lahaina. I have another grandchild on the way in San Francisco.
Though I am currently on a quest to see the world, my travels always bring me back to Maui, which is truly Paradise!
Kerry

reviews.txt: The condo was lovely and exactly as described. The location is unbeatable. Kerry made sure that checkin/checkout was very straightforward and made us feel very welcome.

Kerry's place was perfect for us! We loved the incredible ocean view, the pool for our 4 yr old (and us!), and the quiet community. From the condo, you can walk to to the beach, the grocery store, and a few restaurants. Downtown Lahaina is about one mile south. We appreciated the boogie boards, pool noodles, and beach chairs. Loved having the washer and drier in the unit, too. Very comfortable, convenient, and lovely! Kerry's place is a gem!

Kerry was a WONDERFUL host. She consistently responded to each message quickly and left us with everything we needed. Her condo is adorable, comfortable, clean, and well equiped.  We felt very lucky to have the opportunity to stay in such a beautiful place in paradise. Kerry's condo is literally right on the ocean! The sound of the waves, the sea turtles, the boats, island views, stars at night are just a  few things we enjoyed while staying in her Lahaina condo. We had everything we needed to relax and create wonderful memories in Maui!! 

Mahalo Kerry for sharing your place in paradise with us! We would love to return in the future and will recommend your condo to our loved ones!
Perfect Place in Lahaina, everything in walking distance, beautiful condo, well furnished, safe place, exciting view

Ideal location for the single female traveler!

I didn't even rent a car, took an economical shuttle (Robert's) from the airport and used the city bus (a couple blocks away) to get to other parts of the island. Max $4/day for unlimited bus rides and no parking hassles what-so-ever!  (Read reviews for car rental at OGG and you'll find another great reason for going car-free! Not recommended, however, if you wish to do inner island sight-seeing such as Haleakala or Road to Hana.) There is parking under the building.

Safeway is 2 blocks away and fabulous Baby Beach is a 10 minute walk. BTW, Baby Beach is spectacular. Easily the clearest water I've ever snorkeled in. Swim between circular coral outcroppings to see tropical fish and sea turtles. At low tide, wade out hundreds of yards and the water is not even waist high.  Kaanapali Beach - miles of sand, waves and tiki bars is just a half hour walk north or 12 minute bus ride. Easy to get to Black Rock for more superior snorkeling.

Comfortable Murphy bed in the living room lets you sleep to gentle breezes and the sound of the ocean. Nice (and very clean) pool area overlooking the ocean is the perfect spot to see sea turtles feeding at dawn and dusk. Very helpful manager on site who will take you out snorkeling, if you just ask.

Every appliance and amenity you need for a relaxing vacation.  Can't wait to go back!

An outstanding place to enjoy Maui! Spacious comfortable condo with a pool and an amazing waterfront view— including sea turtles, if you’re lucky. Located close to Lahaina town shops and restaurants, as well as Baby Beach. We got around easily  without a car. Would stay here again any time.

The condo is right on the water with ocean view everyday; all day. Honu(turtles) say good morning from balcony, almost every day. The beds are comfortable. The ice maker is perfect. Kitchen is fully functional. The ocean breeze all night is refreshing. No AC though. The distance to Old Lahaina is perfect! We went for breakfast, lunch and dinner without any problem. The washer and dryer helped to dry out our wet towels. I loved looking at Lanai every morning too as was my honeymooners island. Easy ferry over to Lanai too. Perfect for family of 3-4. Place perfect for sunsets too.
Great location,close to everything. Highly recommend. The pool is a bonus. My family had great time there.
Great views, great location to everything. Very cute condo. You’ll love the sound of the waves.

Thank you Kerry your place was fantastic! The location was great the amenities were wonderful and the view was unbeatable. Absolutely will stay here again when we come back to Maui! Cannot thank you enough!

name: Big, glamorous, 4BR, 3-story house
summary: Our 4-bedroom, 3-story beautiful Brooklyn townhouse is a great place to stay for your NYC trip.   Located in Fort Greene, right in the heart of Brownstone Brooklyn's Arts District and only 10 minutes by Subway to Manhattan.
interaction: Contacts – Next door neighbors (to the right if you are facing our front door) are Martin (pronounced Mar-teen) and Pam.

host.about: We are a family of five with three grade school age children.   We are living out of the US for a couple of years and are happy to rent out our house when we are gone.   Fort Greene is an incredible neighborhood and we always love being able to give our guests a taste of "real life" in NYC.

reviews.txt:
We stayed here for 14 days in August 2013. When we arrived we immediately felt at home. The house is very spacious and cosy, with all modern comfort.
It is located in a quiet street in a very nice and lively neighbourhood with plenty of good restaurants. It is very conveniently situated close to the most important subway lines.
In short, we were very happy to have booked this place !

We enjoyed our stay in Jon's home for 10 days during August 2013.  It was a very clean, well kept, spacious, and beautiful 3 floor townhouse.  It was definitely worth staying there given that sometimes we needed to accomodate more people, and have a nice space for visitors to come over.  Jon was out of town, but he was quite responsive to my emails.

Jons und Lisas sehr schönes und gemütliches Brownstonehouse liegt in Fort Greene in Brooklyn. Wir mochten die Umgebung sehr und haben die vielen kleinen Cafes und die tollen Restaurants sehr genossen. Vor allem WALTERS in der Dekalb Ave.
Im Haus in der St Felix Street haben wir uns von der ersten Sekunde an wohl gefühlt und haben unsere Wahl in den neun Tagen unseres Aufenthalts kein einziges mal bereut. Jon hat uns im Vorfeld sehr viele gute Tips die Gegend betreffend gegeben und hat uns den Schlüssel sogar per FedEx nach Berlin geschickt.
Im Haus selber ist genug Platz, wenn man zu viert anreist hat jeder ein eigenes Schlafzimmer, es ist aufgeräumt und sauber, das Internet funktioniert einwandfrei und in der Küche macht es großen Spaß zu kochen...
all thumbs up!!!

We had a really nice stay in Jon and Lisa's house in Ft Greene (Brooklyn) during the Spring holidays, April 2014  The house is spacious (we were 7 adults) and nicely decorated. You feel as if you were staying in a friend's  house, that's really enjoyable While being a bit away from the busiest and noisiest places in New York, the house is well located as the numerous subway lines can take you to any place in Manhattan or other places in New York quite fast. We  just had a short chat with Lisa as we were leaving and she was just arriving, she is a really nice person.  I can recommend the place quite warmly.  Pierre B , from Belgium

We needed a house for the summer while we renovated our nearby house. Jon's house was perfect. Jon was a great host, very helpful and great communicator. The house was perfect for our family, lots of toys and kids books. 

Everything in the house is exactly as the listing, all the rooms are good size, lots of light and with A/C.  We had a great time and would definitely recommend the house to anyone else.

The neighborhood is truly amazing! The restaurants and parks in Fort Greene are really great. Jon is super-helpful, very friendly, and always available to answer a question. The house is perfect for a family with kids. They have an amazing collection of books, games, and toys. Great living room/dining area. There is a little bit of construction nearby, but it didn't really bother us. We loved our stay here and would definitely return in a heartbeat!

Our family stayed in Jon and Lisa's house for our son's wedding. They have a lovely, comfortable, clean home. It accommodated our family of 8 very nicely. The location is wonderful, near restaurants, subways, and shopping. We will cherish the memories we made while 
staying there. We would definitely stay there again.  
We thank Jon and Lisa for sharing their home with us. 
Linda

We secured the property way before the arrival date as we thought it was a perfect match to our needs - a large group of adults and three kids - , and the property stayed to our expectations, in fact I would say exceed them probably a bit. The pictures were very accurate, so they were no surprises there. This part of Brooklyn is what New York is all about, a real mix, I would recommend it to anyone that is deciding between staying in  Manhattan or elsewhere outside the big apple. Jon has been very responsive throughout the period we secure the property. Even when his oven stopped working - which was a big deal for us - he told us in advance and managed to secure an alternative, which we finally decided not to use (hope that's ok Jon). My only comment that I think could improve anyone's stay in the future is a mini map of the house pointing to where the basics are, what to use and what not to. It is almost self intuitive, but for someone that was using the service for the first time, I had lots of questions at the very beginning. Can I use this?, do you mind if we eat that?, in any case as I said Jon was always very responsive despite being away in the busiest annual holiday of the year.

Overall a terrific experience.  House is very nice and spacious and conveniently located to Ft. Greene shops/park, downtown Brooklyn and transportation.  Jon was  a terrific host -- very responsive and attentive throughout.
Jon was great and very accommodating and a very nice guy.  He went out of his way to make our check in easy and the place was great!

name: Peaceful hometown with perfect sea and forest view
summary: Lovely neighborhood with a beautiful sea and forest view. 10 minutes away from the Ataturk Airport and CNR expo center. 10 minutes to public transportation by walking. 5 minutes away from the one of the best shopping mall of İstanbul(Aqua Florya). The flat is located in front of the forest, there are two markets near-by. Fully equipment 2 kitchen, wifi and tv. 3 bathrooms with shower one of them is bathtub. Very large living room and dining table which is 8 person easily seat. 250 square meter.
interaction: You can reach me by phone or by e-mail.
houseRules: - Since there are families with children in the apartment, please do not make too much noise late at night - There is a place you can smoke

host.about: İletisime acik. Doga tutkunu. Sizleri agirlamaktan memnun olurum.

reviews.txt:
The people is a friendly 
I like this apartment is very nice
Very kind man .. also very nice home .. i was there for 5 nights with my big family .. big house and great location .. good communication good answering .. everything was great
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excellent location - close to airport, big part and seaside. Stylish, quite and luminous place, with excellent view from big balcony on the park and sea. Caner kindly met us at the bus station. Overall we enjoyed very much from our stay at Caner’s place.
Schönes Haus und gute Lage überall schnell erreichbar
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tertemizdi,herşey için teşekkürler
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Caner was very accommodating and his place was better than the pictures showed, clean and stylish.
Very quite street and walkable to restaurants and cafes.
ALLES SEHR GUT UND TOP.....

name: Thriving city location, dining hub
summary: Step out of this 2 bed apartment into the thriving city suburb of Pyrmont. Short walk to the harbour side restaurant precinct and beautiful bay foreshore walks. Walk to Glebe, City Centre and local fine dining, bars, clubs and tourist destinations.
interaction: You'll have the full support of the team at MadeComfy, a Sydney company helping hosts provide the best quality stay even whilst they are away from their home. A team member will organise your arrival and will continue to provide any assistance during your stay.
houseRules: You are staying at a friendly and peaceful neighbourhood area. Your help in keeping noise to a minimum is much appreciated between 10pm-8am. Excessive noise such as amplified music, vocals will cause neighbours to complain to the Building Manager or Council Rangers or Police. This could lead to an on-the-spot AUD200 fine and/or eviction of the property. This can all happen very quickly so your cooperation is very much appreciated. Please treat our home with the same love and care you treat yours. We have the following house rules whilst you stay with us: 1. Please be mindful of sound levels after 10:00PM to avoid neighbour complaints. 2. If you break something please let us know to replace it. Please leave your beds unmade Kindly clean up your dishes and put them away In case you have rearranged furniture, please put it back to the original location We would highly appreciate if you could take out the trash Please ensure all appliances and lights are off and doors and windows are close

reviews.txt: Sabrinas place was very spacious, located conveniently and mostly well equipped. It was perfect for exploring the city since it's connected well to public transport and you could also take a walk into the cbd. The only downside is the missing Wifi (which I was unaware when booking) but I guess this will be fixed soon since they just recently renovated the apartment. The apartment was very clean (only the windows and mirrors not 100%- not so important) Communication with Sabrina was easy and pleasant. Would recommend to stay here, especially a larger group of people or a family!
Lovely accommodation and great location.

Location was convenient to CBD (short cab ride about $10 or nice walk across Darling Harbor Bridge 15 min walk if you stop to watch people and the sites).  Several restaurants are close by along with a larger Coles grocery market and liquor store right across the way.

Great communication from Sabrina about the location, features and checking in.  Sabrina reached out several times during the stay to confirm our stay was meeting our expectations.

Apartment was very comfortable, well appointed and supplied.
I stayed at Sabrina's house with my girlfriend, sister and brother-in-law. Her apartment was spacious, modern and in a great location! Would highly recommend to anybody.

Stayed at Sabrina's place for almost a week.  As I need to checked in early due to young kids, Sabrina was helpful in granting early check-in :) 
The place was neat and clean upon check-in. Initially there was only one heater and request to have extra heaters were met on the same day. Sabrina bought two new heaters and I am very thankful for that.  Another good thing that happened was the new wifi installed ;) 
Location wise is very good. Minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the Central Station Light Rail. Bus 389 is round the corner to take you to the Sydney CBD which is only one stop away. 
Generally we enjoyed Sabrina's place and will go back again.
Fantastic apartment with a great location, a very helpful host, and everything was provided. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

El apartamento es hermoso, es muy cómodo y amplio, tiene una decoración muy moderna. La ubicación es excelente, cercana a todos los puntos de interés de Sydney. Sabrina fue muy atenta y amable, y siempre estaba dispuesta a ayudarnos y brindarnos información para que nuestra estadía fuera inolvidable. Definitivamente volveríamos a alojarnos en este apartamento.

Great host, offered us with late check out, and late check in 1000pm, very professional, easy going and flexible, great location, 10mins to 20 mins walking distance to fish market, darling harbour, China town, with free parking onsite. Highly recommend and will be returned for our next trip to Sydney.

Sabrina was responsive to our questions and very helpful when we met; tea, coffee and milk had been made available on our arrival which was a really nice touch
We arrived by car and they have a private parking bay underneath the apartments which was invaluable and made things so easy 
This is a great location and the description of the apartment and amenities are very accurate and of high quality and we could not fault anything
When next in Sydney I will look to see if this apartment is available as a first choice

Location of apartment was fantastic. Walking distance to The Star, Fish Market and Darling Harbour. The apartment was also very organised and clean. Loved that there was ample sunlight that passed through the apartment. Parking space was a little tight. Recommend to get a smaller car if you intend to rent one. There are certain things to take note, response from host was not very prompt. Asked for late check out several times and only managed to receive a reply after 3 texts and emails. Parking garage was renovating the day I arrived but was not informed earlier and had to pay for parking several hours. Overall, a good experience.

name: 2 confortables habitaciones en el centro de BCN!
summary: Hola! Mi apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Barcelona (Ciutat Vella), al lado de la Rambla, Plaza Catalunya, todos los servicios y algunos de los monumentos más importantes de la ciudad.  Tengo 2 habitaciones disponibles: una con cama doble y la otra con cama individual. Perfecto para una pareja o grupo de 3 personas.  NO SE ADMITEN PERSONAS QUE VIAJAN SOLAS. Os espero en Barcelona. Muchas gracias y saludos cordiales!
interaction: Si no conocéis la ciudad ó tenéis algún tipo de duda, estaré a vuestra disposición para ayudaros en todo momento.
houseRules: - Antes de efectuar la reserva inmediata me gustaría recibir un mensaje informativo sobre el huésped, sus acompañantes (sexo, edad, nacionalidad) y el motivo de viaje. -  No se admiten personas que viajen solas. -  Se ruega mantener limpias y ordenadas las zonas comunes: el baño, la cocina y el comedor. -  No está permitido invitar al apartamento a personas ajenas, que no sean huéspedes. -  Se ruega respetar el descanso de los vecinos y no hacer ruido en el apartamento ni las zonas comunes del edificio (el portal, la escalera, el ascensor). -  Pérdida de llaves por cualquier motivo = 50 euros.

host.about: Я наполовину русская, наполовину испанка. Живу в Барселоне много лет, но выросла в Москве. Работаю переводчиком и риэлтером по недвижимости. Люблю животных, музыку, кино, путешествия.

reviews.txt:
Квартира в 7 минутах ходьбы от Рамблас и это удобно,Хозяйка очень милая
,помогала советами и предоставила полную свободу во всей квартире,Мы остались довольны

Алена замечательный человек, прекрасная хозяйка, она приготовила и научила нас некоторым испанским блюда, обаятельная и привлекательная девушка. Очень уютная квартирка со всем необходимым. У нас был замечательный отдых благодаря Алене. Спасибо большое.

Это была моя первая поездка в Барселону. Мне понравилось. Жила в историческом центре, весьма колоритном. В шаговой доступности метро, магазины, кафе, достопримечательности и море. Хозяйка - очень веселая и доброжелательная девушка. В первый же день сориентировала меня на местности, далее я сама везде гуляла. Дома всегда ждала меня котяра необычная. По сути : комната чистая, уютная, окна во двор выходят, ночью всегда тихо. Если хочется вечером погулять - все безопасно. Рядом с домом всегда работают небольшие продуктовые магазинчики, если в выходной не успели купить поесть. От метро Para-lel (5мин. хотьбы) быстро добираетесь до всех Саград и музеев.На море я пешком ходила, вода отличная была. Если устали можно в кафешке у дома на Rambla del Raval посидеть. Там очень большой поток туристов. В общем, хорошо там.

Staying with Aliona is a pleasure.
Aliona is a nice, cheerful and friendly person, extremely helpful. It gives tips on how to navigate the city.
The apartment is clean and tidy, comfortable bed, clean sheets and towels.
You can freely enjoy the spacious kitchen to prepare meals.
The building has a lift and not have to carry luggage.
The apartment is located in an ideal spot. The main street of La Rambla (we go straight to the green metro line), you can walk in 5 minutes to the port of the same.
To Catalunya can be reached on foot in 10 minutes. Close to the charming Gothic Quarter.
If someone does not like the crowded La Rambla can enjoy a coffee and a bite to eat on the Rambla del Reval - out on the square right out of the apartment.
If I ever return to Barcelona it would definitely be with Aliona.

Aliona спасибо за замечательный отдых с вами.
Małgorzata i Ewa
Мы надеемся, что вы посетите снова когда-нибудь в Барселону и остаться с тобой. большое спасибо
Обожаю Алену, очень гостеприимно, чисто. В пешей доступности все достопримечательности города.

Хорошая и прохладная квартира в отличном месте: рядом метро, рядом набережная и пляж, рядом главная площадь, вокруг полно продуктовых магазинов и, опять же, рядом два огромных центральных рынка и многое другое (магазины одежды тоже близко, целая улица). В общем, когда мы после отъезда анализировали место — пришли к тому, что расположение просто невероятно удобное. Все классно. 

Алёна — отличный и невероятно гостеприимный человек. Район понравился: не обращайте внимание на внешнюю суету и своеобразность, там очень спокойно. 

Спасибо еще раз, Алёна)
Алена, очень уютно встретила и проводила меня со свечами! Мне было спокойно и комфортно. Я получил то, что ожидал и остался очень доволен. Буду в Барселоне ещё, увидимся. Рекомендую всем!

Very nice, comfortable room! The location is amazig, it only takes you a few minutes to get to the centre (las ramblas) of barcelona. Ailona was very friendly and generous, would definitely recommend the apartment!

L'appartement d'Aliona est idéalement situé : près de la Ramblas est d'une jolie place avec de nombreux bars/restaurants ! La plage n'est qu'à 15mn en bus, c'est tres pratique.
Aliona est une jeune femme très sympathique, et très souriante ! Notre séjour fut très agréable, elle est pleine de bon conseils et toujours de très bonne humeur !
Aliona was a great host and made us feel as we were at home. The location is amazing, in the heart of the Raval.

name: Executive Luxury design Apartment
summary: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen
interaction: If you need more ... let me know.   Want a chef to cook an onsite meal for a special occasion - no problem.   Fully stocked fridge pre arrival - no problem.  Roses throughout for your special person - no problem.  Anything you want - dream it and we will create it.  (small print - yeah of course there is a charge - lets talk about what you need and go from there - happy to make your stay enjoyable!)
houseRules: Smoking and pets are not permitted.  We are a quite and friendly neighbourhood so please no large groups and noise.    Due to the stair access we are unfortunately not wheelchair or child friendly

reviews.txt: This apartment is absolutely exquisite. The fittings and furnishings are very high quality and comfortable.  The place is like a beautiful parisian retreat.  The location is close to great cafes, shops and Centennial Park, 10 mins from city and beaches.  It truly is a home away from home.  We are originally from Sydney so we know our areas which is why we chose to stay here.  We used to always stay in hotels but NOW we will endeavour to stay here whenever we come to Sydney.  Louise was wonderful, extremely helpful and timely with all our questions.

An amazing place situated in the heart of Woolahra, it was just perfect for the night of our wedding. Louise was unbelievably  accommodating, allowing us to drop off some things the day before our stay, setting up candles and flowers, leaving us a fruit platter and great provisions for breaky the next morning and responding to a 12am locked out call! She is a gem - thanks again Louise! The French provincial/art deco styled apartment was luxurious with a super comfy bed, relaxed atmosphere and situated 2 mins walk from Queen street's yummy cafes and delis! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested, it is worth every cent and we look forward to staying here again!

My daughter and I stayed at Louise's apartment. It is absolutely fantastic. Great location, nice little cafes and most of what you could need. Perfectly clean and comfortable. A beautiful shaded veranda great bathroom and kitchen. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.

In a word WOW! We loved it here. It had all the comforts of home and more as well as welcoming touches such as fruit and fresh bread.   The amenities were everything you could want and more. The quality of everything was outstanding. We could easily live here and not want for anything. 

Well done Louise on a fabulous abode! Stunning! We will definitely stay here whenever we are in Sydney.

Thank you!

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! From the time you walk up the stairs to this beautiful, fully stocked terrace you feel right at home! The pictures can't even begin to describe the warmth and and comfort of this immaculately furnished, fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment! With on site parking, a laundry, the most comfortable bedding I have ever slept in, an amazingly sunlight filled kitchen and in one of Sydney cutest suburbs this place was perfect for anyone wanting to visit Sydney! Close to shops, cafés and restaurants and only minutes drive from the cbd staying here was one of the best decisions I have made when visiting Sydney! Louise is wonderful and caters to your every need and is easy to contact! I highly recommend staying here to anyone who is wanting to visit Sydney for any period of time!! :)

Louise's apartment is simply beautiful - the only hesitation I have about recommending it is that it will become so popular I won't be able to stay there again!
