My colleague and I stayed there for two nights whilst on business and it was so much nicer that the normal corporate apartment - but still had all the small touches you expect (bath robes, toiletries, hair dryer, etc...). It would also be a perfect place to stay for a pleasure. The location is great - right in the Woollahra village - and close to the city. Louise has exquisite taste and the apartment is decorated with a lot of style and panache.  She was an excellent host who communicated with me swiftly and effectively - our check-in was completely hassle free - and we were welcomed with fresh bread, fruit, and milk. We will definitely look to stay here again and highly recommend it to the airbnb community.

Louise's apartment exceeded all expectations!! Fantastic location, spacious and so tastefully decorated. The most comfortable bed in the world and the bathroom...where do I stop.The welcome bottles of wine, the fruit, movie pass, Louise you are so special. I will stay here every time I come to Sydney. Must agree with another reviewer though, this should be kept a secret as everyone will want to come! Thankyou Louise.

I love staying in this apartment, it really is the perfect position in Sydney, its always spotless and beautifully presented. 
I almost don't want to share a review, just in case its not available in the future..

Queen Street is a terrific location with a vibrant village atmosphere, cafes, specialty food stores, boutiques and more. The apartment is full of delightful surprises and charm. So much more than any hotel room. Louise's 5 star hospitality includes sharing her designer furnishings and collectibles with you, the immaculate presentation of the apartment, her warm communication style and her attention to detail to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay.

Apartment exceeded our expectations. Spacious, clean and with every convenience you might need. Milk, bread and fruit on arrival was an amazing bonus as well as the offer to check out late. Perfect location, easy walk to shops, park, markets and transport. Communication was friendly and prompt. Will stay again when in Sydney.

name: Newly Renovated Studio Midtown East
summary: This furnished apartment is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need!
interaction: We would love to meet you ;)

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: NYC Real Estate licensed broker, property owner and property manager professional with over 20 years of experience  and service.

reviews.txt: Evan & Maria were great. Their studio apartment had been recently renovated so everything was new and fresh. The location was fantastic and so was the service. I would definitely stay here again and I suggest that you stay here too.

4 girls in this studio over 5 days. This was perfect for us. The location is amazing and you have great bars and restaurants in walking distance! Evan and Maria are the nicest hosts I've ever had the pleasure to interact with. Soooo helpful and attentive! Would I stay here again? YES absolutely!!! 5 stars for this listing and the hosts and the location :) exactly as appears in the pictures. Thank you again Evan and Maria!!!

Evan & Maria were great hosts. They answer all my question and always show interested if i had any doubts of anything. I stay at the apartment with my parents and my sister and it was great! Perfect please and perfect location! I'll totally recommend this place for 2 or 4 people!

Great place, and Evan and Maria were very welcoming. This was my first Airbnb rental and I didn't know what to expect but I will be back. I came to NY for 2 weeks of work and found that I prefer the privacy and the availability of a small kitchen over a hotel any day. The studio is within a minute of several restaurants and a well-stocked small supermarket, and in walking distance of major tourist attractions.
From the beginning to the end the process felt really professional, I enjoyed the availability of our host. The neighborhood is great and the apartment was perfect.
The host made me feel very welcomed, wanted to know when I arrived and was there to greet me. The place was better than advertised and the neighborhood was great for someone who is visiting.

Evan and Maria greeted me when I arrived and helped me carry my bags up the stairs to their beautifully renovated apartment. Although it was a tiny bit smaller than I expected, the apartment is very thoughtfully arranged with plenty of storage space.  I stayed in the apartment for 2 weeks and never felt cramped.  In fact I hated to leave!  This lovely apartment is located in a very convenient neighborhood, and I'm certain I will return.  Thanks for a great stay!

Perfect rent in NYC! The renters are charming and try their best to accommodate with your check-in/out hours. The bed furnitures are excellent and the house offers clean and high-end kitchen equipment. Do not hesitate to rent!

I had a late check in and Evan was gracious enough to allow me to do this. The location of the apartment was convenient and the apartment itself was immaculate.  My first time in New York was great, and I would recommend this location to anybody here a stay.  They are a very nice couple and will give you great advice on where to go in the city.

Appartement cosy, refait à neuf et très bien placé.
Evan & Maria ont été des hôtes parfaits, toujours disponibles et très arrangeants.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

name: Ultra Comfy Flat & Perfect Location
summary: This is a spacious comfy garden floor flat with a large kitchen and a small balcony to have fresh air.
interaction: Please do not hesitate to ask our assistance when you need.

host.about: I live in Cihangir and love to meet people and share our lively neighbourhood with them.

reviews.txt: Pelin was an amazing host! We unfortunately lost a wallet and she was very helpful in trying to get it back. She made sure we were taken care of the whole trip and even made bookings for us as some places did not speak English very well. The place is better then the photos for sure. It is a nice big space with everything you need.
Perfect localization, very clean and satisfying stay... we loved the apartment of Pelin.... I definitely come back when I visit Istanbul again!!!
The apartment was nice and spacious. Convenient location for Beyoglu, Sultanahmet, trams & ferries. Great view near to the apartment. Pelin was quick to respond to problems or queries
We had a comfortable stay.
The appartement is ok but it’s in a basemant so any noise can be heard

The flat is comfy and very spacious. It is very furnished and well situated, close to T1, Taksim place, Galata Tower and shops.
Pelin is a very nice and helpful host. I would recommand you this place !

Пелин быстро отвечала на сообщения, подробно описала, как доехать до квартиры от аэропорта. Хотя мы опоздали, она все равно подождала нас, хотя у нас не было связи. За что больше спасибо.
Квартира приятно удивила и оказалась лучше, чем мы ожидали. Она очень большая, оборудована всем необходимым.
Прекрасное расположение в 15 минутах от площади Таксим в приятном районе с маленькими улочками и большим количеством баров и кафе. При выходе из дома открывается потрясающий вид на Босфор!
Надеемся приехать сюда снова.

Pelin is a very open and positive host. Despite some issues with our arrival, she did not say a word of criticism and wait for us patiently. The location is perfect for walks in a central Istanbul, but without crowds of tourists as in Sultanahmet. But you should consider the significant hill, if you are comming with a trolley or a wheelchair. However, the place was comfortable for staying with our 6 months old baby, and we enjoyed it a lot. The last but not the least is the resaurant in 1 minute from the place with a breathtaking view (thank you, Pelin, for the advice!)
We had an amazing stay in Istanbul, thanks to Pelin and it's perfect appartment, wich is very big and ideally situated in this city. I recommand this place !
The flat is spacious, very clean, cozy, with everything you need. Location is also convenient to move around this beautiful city. Can't wait to be back!!

name: Studio on main entertainment street
summary: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal.
interaction: I will be out of town - but always reachable via phone or online communication. I know my place well, so don't hesitate to reach me if you need anything :)
houseRules: No pets, please. Smoking only outside the building.

host.about:
I'm an Australian living in Canada, working for a startup, and travelling when I have time (and money)!

23 countries and counting - get in touch for recommendations, because that's something I can talk for hours about. Over a glass of wine is even better!

South America is my next big dream...

reviews.txt: The studio is nice and comfortable, located just next to rue Saint Denis. Maria was very helpful and responsive. She prepared everything perfectly:) We had no problems with finding the place and move around.

As for location, you can't get any better! It's in the heart of Montreal. A short walk from le Vieux Port/ Old Montreal (1.5km with a slight hill). Be forewarned that since it's in the middle of downtown, it's not going to be quiet.This is no fault to the hostess, just that this city rarely sleeps - which, depending on who you are is a blessing or annoyance. Laundry is 10 blocks away since the hostess isn't in town, the sheets may not be clean so you'll have to do them yourself. Maria is always available via text so very helpful. If you drive, underground parking is a block away. Rental bikes are also close by. I would definitely stay there again for a quick weekend visit to Montreal.
The host left a pleasant note with some directions about the wifi and wished us a great trip. The description matched the room perfectly. The neighbourhood was lively and exciting!
Good home base!
Ultra-quick confirmation, fast communication and the apartment that fits the description perfectly. Great host.

Pros: Great location. Great host. Cozy studio. Bed is comfortable. Clean. Perfect to spend a night or two in.

Cons: Not for light sleepers (loud fridge, loud entrance door that residents tend to slam).
Very convenient and flexible. Thanks maria

We had a great overnight stay here. The location is perfect and Maria had left us with everything we would need for a comfortable stay.  She was very quick to respond when we had a question about parking. We would love to stay at Maria's again next time we're in Montreal :)
Host able to have key ready early thanks

The studio was cute, clean and comfortable. The keys were right where Maria said they would be. The neighborhood, as promised, was within easy walking distance of many bars, restaurants, and other attractions.

name: Rustic Gaudí - Sagrada Família
summary: New, modern, bright and fully equipped. Has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living and kitchen,  a terrace and a balcony. Metro in 1 minute and Sagrada Familia at 5. Speed WIFI. Up to 5 people. Fully refurbished! You rent the whole apartment, not shared.
interaction: We'll get in touch some days before of your arrival, and we'll give you our 24h phone to help you on making your stay in Barcelona unforgettable!!
houseRules: Recordar que esto no es un hotel y que no hay señales ni carteles de ningún tipo en el exterior. Es un edificio en el que vive gente y familias, y donde algunos espacios han sido adaptados para turistas. Es por éste motivo que os pedimos amablemente que simplemente lo tengáis en cuenta! POR FAVOR ENVÍANOS TU HORA DE LLEGADA AL APARTAMENTO por demos adaptae-mail a (EMAIL HIDDEN) para saber cuando esperar vuestra llamada. La hora de llegada estándar (Check-In) es a las 15:00h. La hora de salida estándar es a las 11:00h. Somos flexibles peor si la llegada es mas tarde de las 10 de la noche tendrá un cargo de 30 euros

host.about:
Hi! Me and my husband Cesc, we are both teachers, prouds of our beautiful city. Our hobby? Our city! We try to know always the best places, the best plans, the best tips, ... just what your need to plan a special trip to Barcelona.

We take care of our apartment until every detail, and cleanliness is one of our maximum goals.

We are avid travellers, and is for this reason that we know exactly what you need when you are out of home.

We'll do our best to make your trip unforgettable!

reviews.txt: This nice and cozy apartment is located near Sagrada Familia. It has 2 bedrooms that are suitable for 2-3 people. The owners are really friendly and welcoming. A pleasant, recommended place.
Elisabet and Cesc have a great appartment, comfortable, in a great location. It's well equiped, clean and cosy. Thinking of visiting Barcelona again, it would be my first choice!
They made it realy uncomplicated to welcome us, especially when our flight was delayed an we couldn't be at the appartment on time. The appartment is nice and clean.

Cesc,  Elisabet's helpful and uncomplicated husband, welcomed us at the apartment and introduced us to the surrounding area and to their lovely flat, where we really felt comfortable and at home. The residence is perfectly placed in the centre of Barcelona (near Sagrada Familia, metro + bus stations), it's an excellent starting point for sight-seeing trips. Everything you need is nearby (bakery, restaurants, pharmacy, SuperMarket,  some shops and public transport). The bedrooms are located in the backyard, and were really quite (only at the first night the neighbours were ab bit noisy; the following nights we slept with opened window without problems. The bathroom is small, but cute and functional. In the kitchen nothing lacked to our needs. For 2-3 person and some couple of days/week  it's perfect, we would rent it again.  Everythink went well. Thanks to Elisabet & Cesc, best wishes.
Very nice, comfortable, clean and cosy appartement. Ideal location. Really nice and warm welcome thanks to the owners Elisabet & Cesc!!
Vår värd höll kontakt med oss via mail hela tiden. Helt perfekt. Då vi kom till Barcelona mötte han oss och var mycket hjälpsam och vi kunde nå honom lätt genom telefon under hela vistelsetiden.

Charmant appartement fidèle aux photos
Chambre au calme
Accueil chaleureux
Transports et commodités à proximités
Séjour très agréable

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment, the space was cosy and comfortable. Within walking distance to lots of Barcelona's attractions and super easy with the metro station. The bedroom was quiet for a restful sleep. Elisabet was a friendly host, we would recommend the apartment.

Thank you for sharing your apartment with us! It was very comfortable -- and perfect for our group of three. Elisabet and Cesc were very nice to work with. When we arrived (a little tired from the travel), Elisabet was very helpful in showing us the apartment. I found the larger bedroom great for sleeping -- back from the street and therefore nice and quiet. We enjoyed sitting in the living room together after a long day of walking and sightseeing. This was my first time using an airbnb apartment and I enjoyed feeling I was "at home" rather than at a hotel. I also really liked the neighbourhood. I felt that I was living among the locals and enjoyed picking up coffee in the local pastry shops. Although the apartment is located pretty close to the Sagrada Familia, I didn't feel I was in a touristy area. The apartment is very close to a couple of metro lines, and we used the metro a lot. It was fast and efficient -- and got us wherever we wanted to go in the city.

Great place to be!!!
Very warm welcome at 2am in the morning :-)

name: Cottage in Haiku
summary: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds.
interaction: I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family you might see us at home often or not see us at all; depending on our schedule and your schedule during your visit. However I will be available if you need anything, messaging me via airbnb is best way to reach me. If we see you we will happily chat and "talk story". There seems to be no rhyme or reason to our level of guest interactions some of our guests have joined us for dinner, or just sunset drinks on our Lanai, and some of your guests we never meet face to face. We are very easy going and follow our guests lead regarding interaction. Truly I believe it all depends on guests schedule and our schedule during that particular visit.
houseRules: 1. The premises are to be used only as a private vacation residence for Tenant(s). Tenant will provide the owner with a complete list of all occupants of premises. Tenant will not allow occupancy over that agreed upon in reservation. Tenants will not permit gueuts on peroperty at any time.   2. Reservations are limited to one infant.  3. 100% Smoke-Free Property. Tenant(s) or Tenant(s) Guests cannot smoke anywhere on the property ground inside our homes or outside. We do not rent to smokers. Please do not rent if you are a smoker, even if you plan on smoking off the property. Our daughter is allergic to smoke, and also the residue left on clothing and transferred to our belongings causes an allergic reaction. A $500 extra cleaning fee will be charged for smoking. 4. Please use beach towels at the beach and the bath towels to remain inside the unit. We have beach chairs and a cooler for your use.  5. Owner provides necessary household supplies, dishes, utensils, towels, sheets, And a st

host.about: Lucky we live Hawaii. Friends often describe me as eclectic. I am easy going. Love to play tennis, surf, & hike. I've traveled extensively, for short vacations and long periods of time. I've been know to stay at 5 diamond hotels, my tent, in the open air on my white water raft or in my 88 VW bus in the wilderness. I farm my own land for profit.  You won't find me sitting inside watching TV. I find my peace outside. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread."  Edward Abbey

reviews.txt:
This place was amazing
Kandy was so quick to respond and so accommodating -even when I was a little needy a couple of times (I needed a wine opener and I had one within the hour)
It's a hidden gem and just what we needed to reset life
It had every modern luxury while being tucked away in the jungle and right next to the bay
Thank you Kandy so much for having us
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

From the moment I entered the property I felt at peace, lots of light, tastefully decorated and clean. The place was very quiet and private,and so was the neighborhood , a short walk takes you to an amazing cliff view of the ocean. The steady breeze at night and the fragrent smell of flowers was great . The beds were high quality and comfortable. I enjoyed getting up in the morning and picking oranges from the trees on the property for some fresh squeezed juice.  Our host Kandy was available to help with any needs and made you feel welcome. I would definitely rent this place again on a return trip to Maui .
Kandy and her husband were amazing hosts. I felt like we were part of there family on their property. Would recommend this place to my mother. We will be back.

Ce logement privatif est très bien placé pour se rendre à tous les points de l'île. De plus il possède tout le confort qu'on peut espérer avoir chez soi (cuisine tout équipée, grande chambre, etc.). 
Kandy est une personne sympathique et accomodante avec laquelle vous n'aurez aucun mal pour arranger votre départ/arrivée mais aussi poser vos questions.
Amazing place, very clean and great hosts. It has everything you want and more.

The cottage is in a beautiful and quiet street , in the north shore of the island .
Its for people who want to get away.
If you need food and grocery Paia is not too far . (15-20 min)
We met our host , and she explain us about the property.
That's a beautiful property with verity of trees, and fruits around .
In the morning we enjoyed fresh orenge juice directly from the trees . 
the cottage is very nice and well equipmened .
There is everything you need there .
Towels, beach chairs , cooler and more . 
The place was pretty clean.
All tough it was kind of hard to reach our host.
I text Kandy asking about place to see around, but I got a late response and not much information,
In general , the experience was very nice and we all enjoyed it .

We went to Kandy's for our honeymoon and had the worst airbnb experience we have ever had (and we use airbnb a lot).  She stopped communicating with us and then tried to lock us out of the house one night when we went back. Thankfully we found an open window, got in, evacuated our belongings immediately and had to pay for a hotel for the rest of the honeymoon. Completely outrageous.

Beyond that, the place was disappointing. It smells like mildew and she doesn't have screens on many windows so you're stuck in a mildewy sauna. I would not recommend it and would advise people to be extremely careful with Kandy.
This place was an amazing experience!  you're deep in the jungle but still close to Paia. Extremely family-friendly our kids loved it! I will most definitely visit again

Kandy was very accommodating, and provided such a lovely place to stay. She responded quickly if we had questions, and is very much a professional in the world of home away from homes. The house is quiet, cozy, and worked well for a family with teenagers.

Thank you Kandy, It was a great trip!

We enjoyed our time at the cottage so much, we didn't want to leave! As Airbnb hosts ourselves, we love to be the 'guests' when we can, and Kandy was a wonderful host. She communicated excellently with us leading up to, during, and after our stay, with quick answers to our questions and suggestions for how to best enjoy the property and surrounding areas. We found both a fresh chicken egg and several avocados to enjoy within moments of our arrival - yum! The cottage was very clean, comfortable, and incredibly relaxing. We would certainly recommend!

name: Lovely twin room in central flat
summary: Double room with twin beds. Located in the centre of town, with lovely views of the Roman wall.  Walking distance of all the main sites in the old town, including the Cathedral, las Ramblas and el Born. It is also two minutes walk from a Metro Station. The room has lots of natural light. I'm a quiet and friendly person and I will interact with you as much or little as you wish. I am very knowledgable about the city and can give you lots of tips.
interaction: I know quite a bit about the history of the city so I can give you as many tips on things to do as you wish.

host.about: Soy una persona tranquila y discreta. Me gusta mucho mi ciudad y sobre todo el barrio Gótico que tiene 2000 años. Soy cinéfila y me gusta la buena comida. Tengo una hija que vive en Londres, un hijo en Barcelona, un nieto y otro a punto de llegar. Mi experiencia como anfitriona es positiva porque me gusta conocer gente nueva.

reviews.txt: Maria Es una persona muy amable y cordial, inmediatamente hice reservación estuvo al pendiente de nuestra llegada e indico algunas cosas importantes acerca de la habitación. El Lugar en realidad no hay como describirlo, dormir justo detrás de la popular Catedral de Barcelona y tener todo exactamente en la parte de abajo (puesto que es un departamento muy hermoso por cierto) recomendaria este alojamiento a familiares, amigos y conocidos sin lugar a dudas. Gracias Sra Maria Eulalia Un Abrazo!

Maria jest bardzo miłą i sympatyczną osobą. Od samego początku wszelkie niezbędne informacje przekazywała na bieżąco i była bardzo pomocna. Oferta była zgodna z opisem oraz oczekiwaniami, więc jakość oceniam na bardzo dobrą. Lokalizacja wręcz rewelacyjna - w samym centrum miasta, w niedalekiej odległości od wielu wartych odwiedzenia miejsc. Polecam serdecznie wszystkim osobom, które szukają wygodnego i dobrze zlokalizowanego pokoju.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Fantastic location - could not have had better! The room was great and perfect for what we needed. Very happy to have our own balcony with a great view! Price was perfect for what we got. Maria was lovely, so helpful and very welcoming as well. We will definitely be back here next time we come :) Muchos gracias!

La communication est très mal passée, Maria ne nous avait pas expliqué qu'elle n'était pas à l'appartement et que c'est sa mère qui nous recevait, les explications données ont été trop compliquées. Nous n'avons pas été bien accueillies et n'avons pas eu de code WIFI.
En revanche, la maman de maria s'est montrée tout à fait correcte à notre égard.
María Eulalia fue muy amable con nosotras , el piso está bien ubicado, precio de acuerdo a lo ofrecido muy bueno

Perfect! The most amazing location and the lady was lovely with us whilst we were staying there. It was just me and my friend in the twin bedroom of her huge old style town flat in the old town. Beautiful original design and the most amazing balcony view. Couldn't have asked for more!
Maria is very nice and helpful and flat has awesome location closed to all must seen places. Highly recommended.

The host was excellent, the apartment is lovely and brilliantly located. The apartment can be a little tough to find as there are two buildings opposite each other that have virtually the same address in (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. However when I called the host she was helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

We had a very good welcome @ Maria's, she is a nice and friendly lady. We felt home and welcome, had a private cosy room and everything we needed was there. The infrastructure was a bit older, but we did definitly not pay to much for our stay.
En general todo fue excelente

name: SM71 - 1 minute from beach - 2-bedroom - balcony
summary: ONLY FOR LONG TERM RENTALS! My place is close to Beach, Playa de la Barceloneta. You’ll love my place because it is newly refurbished, full of sun light and has fully equipped kitchen as well as dressing room. My place is good for singles, couples or for sharing. Due to local legal requirements in Barcelona and Catalonia, we are obliged to sign a rental contract with attached inventory for your stay of more then 32 days.
interaction: Contact me anytime on my e-mail (EMAIL HIDDEN) I will reply as soon as possible.

host.about: Owner of several tourist properties in Barcelona, near beach in Barceloneta. I am renting out these properties to anyone who would like to spend few weeks or months in this beautiful city and enjoy great time here.

reviews.txt: Thank you Jirka for renting out your apartment to my girlfriend and I. We liked our stay a lot, the apartment have great facilities and are modern. In addition to that we loved the location. Jirka was an awesome host who always replied on mail. Thanks you!

name: City Center Rooftop
summary: New apartment located 5/10 minutes walking from main attractions, transports, local restaurants, night life, etc. Totally renovated, situated on the 6th floor with access by elevator, it counts with Kitchen and living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace. The apartment as Wi-Fi, and cable TV. If you want to be in the center, in a calm neighborhood to relax, drink a Port wine while enjoying the sun in our terrace, this is the right spot.
interaction: We are a young couple that will be dedicated to provide our guests the best Porto experience possible. We both work and worked in tourism for a while.  Cátia, 26 years old, will be the person that will answer faster to your call. She worked as receptionist and animator in Hostels and Hotels, so she knows how to host! David, 27 years old, will be there for you as well, and he is a Walking tour guide in the city of Porto, so he can help you with any question or curiosity, but most important, A LOT of good recommendations!!!
houseRules: Not a big deal, take care about the house as if it was yours. We put a big effort to create a nice and comfortable space for you and the next person after you. Help us to have the best conditions possible. When you leave the apartment we ask for the dishes to be washed and the garbage taken out. Check in after 15h00/3PM Check in after 20h00/8PM under agreement. Check out 11h00/11AM. In the building there are other people living, so we need to respect the normal noise rules.

host.about: Hi, we are a young couple that loves to travel. But to host as well. Our motto is "be the kind of person you would like to meet."

reviews.txt:
L'appartement est formidable,idéalement situé à 5mn à pied de toutes les animations, une grande terrasse sur laquelle c'est un plaisir de prendre son café le matin. L'appartement est entièrement rénové, c'est agréable d'être dans du neuf. Il est au calme tout en étant dans une zone animée.
David nous a accueilli avec une carafe de Porto et beaucoup de gentillesse et de disponibilité. Il nous a indiqué toutes les bonnes adresses, plan à l'appui, on a tout fait et il a été de très bon conseil. Il est resté disponible par mail tout le temps si nous avions des besoins.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse et merci encore à David et Catia.

Foi o melhor apartamento onde já ficámos através da Airbnb! A Cátia e o David receberam-nos muito bem e foi fácil encontrar o local. À nossa espera tínhamos alguma comida e vinho do porto, bem como muitos guias e mapas para nos orientar pela cidade. Apesar da hora tardia, não hesitaram em dar-nos bastantes dicas para a nossa visita. 
A localização é mesmo muito central e a zona é sossegada. O apartamento é novo, bastante bem equipado e confortável. Acordar de manhã e aproveitar o sol na varanda foi especial. Estava tudo bastante limpo e arrumado. 
No dia da saída, como não entrava ninguém, deixaram-nos ficar à vontade até à hora de apanhar o comboio. Foi mesmo uma experiência cinco estrelas. 
Quando voltarmos, não hesitamos no local de estadia: este rooftop! 
Obrigada Cátia e David pela excelente recepção!
Very friendly. Catia took her time to tell us all the important spots. Apartment was also awesome!

Cátia and David have put a lot of thought into ensuring the flat is nicely furnished and well equipped, plus adding homely touches. They are caring and thoughtful hosts, contacting us before and during our time to check everything was fine. Thank you for remembering my birthday; a very special memory. Cátia provided a comprehensive overview of Porto when we met her at the flat and all her recommendations of what to see, where to go and restaurants to eat at were excellent. We didn't have time for your francesinha challenge Cátia but we'll take it up next time! The flat is in an excellent location; easy walking distance from attractions, but also in an area of great local bars and shops. Many happy times watching the world go by, and the football, at Cafe Java. And of course the roof top terrace is an excellent place to relax and enjoy wine, or beer, after a day of exploring the steep streets and many steps of Porto. We will most definitely be returning. Thank you Cátia and David.

El apartamento era igual que en las fotos. Muy bonito, muy céntrico y con todo lo necesario para la estancia. David y Catia tienen experiencia en tours y te explican perfectamente cualquier cosa que necesites.

Die Kommunikation mit Cátia und David verlief reibungslos. Check-in und check-out waren völlig unkompliziert. Cátia hat uns freundlich in Empfang genommen und uns bei einem Erfrischungsgetränk tolle Insider-Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Da wir eine knappe Woche in Porto waren, war es prima, dass Cátia uns auch Tipps für Portos Umland (tolle Strände etc.) geben konnte.

Die Wohnung ist grundsätzlich sauber, modern eingerichtet und liebevoll dekoriert. Die Dachterrasse ein Traum. 
Alles in allem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt. Jedoch wurden während unseres Aufenhalts unter der Woche Bauarbeiten/Renovierungsarbeiten im Haus durchgeführt, weshalb wir durch eine teilweise starke Lärmkulisse gestört wurden. Am Wochenende haben wir davon nichts mitbekommen. Wenn die Renovierungsarbeiten abgeschlossen sind, steht aber auch einem längeren Aufenthalt in dieser Wohnung nichts im Wege.
Appartement très agréable , parfait pour passer un séjour à Porto

Tout était parfait. L'appartement est propre et la terrasse très agréable ! Bien situé, à proximité de tout. Surtout un grand merci à Catia pour l'accueil malgré le checkin tardif qui a pris le temps de nous donner plein de conseils autour d'un verre de Porto bien sur !

Staying at Catia's place was a dream. 
The apartment is clean, has everything you need and the rooftop is amazing. 
It's really close to the center. 
Catia took time to give us recommendations about Porto. And her addresses were good. 
I loved it !!! 
Thank you !

Catia et David ont facilité notre arrivée et surtout Catia à pris le temps de nous recommander les meilleures adresses de shoping, restaurants et visites. Le verre de bienvenue sur la terrasse est un moment privilégié. L'appartement est très bien situé et calme.

name: Artist Home by the Sea - a 4 minute walk to Beach!
summary: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world!  (Website hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: We are available to you during your stay via phone and email. We have contacts on island to assist if a special need arises.
houseRules: Please treat our Home with Love and Respect as you would yours!  Absolutely NO SMOKING anywhere on property. This is a complete no smoking property, inside and outside. No pets. All guests are required to complete Verified ID with Airbnb. Check in 4:00pm Hawaii Time Check out 11:00am Hawaii Time PARKING: Please use the Side Street to Park that is adjacent to our building. It is close,convenient and private. The custom here is to leave your shoes at the door, so you can enjoy your bare feet! Please rinse off all sand on yourself and beach gear before entering. A hose is at the walkway entry. Enter and leave our home using the sidewalk entry. Please do not walk in front of other people's lanai areas. It is considered private. Please be respectful of the other residents in the complex by keeping noise down at night and early morning.  Please remove trash OFTEN to keep ants outside. Trash bags are provided and the dumpsters for garbage and recyclables are located in the corner of the parki

host.about: Musician and Artist

reviews.txt:
Marilyn's condo is wonderful - best located, very, very clean and lovely! The beach across the street is beautiful and perfekt for snorkeling and watching big turtles! The kihei village is very nice!!!! We had a perfekt, unforgetable time in kihei and in marilyn's condo! 
Unfortunately we didnt meet Marilyn.... But the communication was great! Thank you, Marilyn, we hope to see you soon in Maui!

Our stay in Kihei was great. The apartment is perfectly located.  Marylin was really helpful. She's also a very talented artist and you can see some of her work around the apartment. You can walk to the beach from there if you want or go check out some other amazing beaches. I'd stay there again.

Our stay at Marilyn and David's place was great.  The location in Kihei was excellent and easily accessible to everything.  The condo itself was clean and comfortable.  Beach chairs, towels, umbrella and a cooler was very convenient as well.  We'd stay here again as well as recommend others to stay here.

Marilyn's condo was everything we could wish for for a perfect stay in Maui - just few minutes across the street from a wonderful beach, tastefully decorated with an amazing personal touch, super-clean, calm, but close to all Kihei shops and all island destinations! Besides that, Marilyn is a great host and was always available by mail for any questions we had! Many thanks, Marilyn - we had a wonderful time and hope to have the chance to come back! We can highly recommend staying at Marilyn's place!!
Place was as advertised.  Across the street from what became our favorite beach in Maui.  Comfortable stay.
Marilyn was very nice and the listing was accurate.  Her home was clean and had all of the ammenities my wife and I needed to have an enjoyable stay in Maui.
Great spot, comfortable, very nice stay in Kihei.  Safe environment...feels like home. Marilyn keeps it very clean and organized.  Would def stay again!

Marilyn made us feel welcomed at her condo. She provided us with all the information we needed about her place and quickly responded to of all our questions. 

The listing description is accurate. Her place is clean and nicely decorated. The condo is located in a quiet residential community. The location is very convenient, and I would definitely recommend her place!

Check in and check out was very smooth and easy. I much prefer the location of Marilyn's Condo in Kihei versus the more toursity Lahaina resort section, which is why we selected this location. It is less than 15 minutes to the best beach in the world, Big Beach! A short 25 minute drive to the airport.  the location was also great for our snorkling tour which docked across the street. We only went up the north west side of maui for our luau and parasailing, which the drive is kinda far for that, but not too bad to do twice. Loved the we were able to use the beach chairs and umbrella, THEY ARE A MUST on a sunny day at the beach!!! Only draw back, which is common, was no air conditioning, but we knew that going into it!
The Apartment is very comfortable and clean. Check-in without any problems. Everything was fine. The beach is very near and perfect for swimming. Thank you very much, Mailyn!

name: Ribeira Smart Flat
summary: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station.
interaction: We enjoy sharing tips about interesting activities and events that take place in Porto and show our guests nice and unusual places of this charming city. You will find a guide with a map in the apartment. We have also created a guide on Airbnb: look for the "Guide of Mathieu" on the Airbnb app.  There are amazing place to discover.
houseRules: En accord avec la réglementation locale, nous vous demanderons de nous envoyer quelques informations d'identifications. Ces informations sont demandées par le Service aux Frontières Portugais. Fumeur: seulement sur le balcon Les animaux ne sont pas autorisés. Frais supplémentaire de 20 eur pour check in après 22h00. PAS DE CHECK IN APRÈS 00H00 Nous demandons aux hôtes de laisser l'appartement propre et de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h par respect pour le voisinage.

host.about:
Originally from France, I have always been keen to discover new countries and cultures. I lived 2 years in Australia where I studied at the University of Southern Queensland. After that I headed back to Paris, thinking to settle down there. After some times I decided to change my life and landed in Porto. I have been living here since 2010.
Since then, I did not manage to get back and got in love with Porto. The seagulls, the Douro and the amazing color of the sun set, will without a doubt, make you also fall in love with this beautiful city.
Make sure that you check out the little guide! There is some nice place to visit!

reviews.txt:
4 amis et moi avons loué l'appartement de Mathieu et y avons passé de très bons moments. Les chambres étaient propres et agréables. J'avais des doutes sur le bruit, mais la chambre dans laquelle j'étais étais super calme donc j'ai pu bien dormir. Quant à Mathieu, un hôte super sympa avec d'excellentes adresses (Adega Viuva pour un dîner et la capela incomun pour le reste de la soirée, notamment). 
Un grand merci et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir chez toi!
Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Nous avons passer un superbe séjour à Porto dans cet appartement très bien situé, parfait pour découvrir la ville à pied sans avoir besoin d'utiliser les transports en commun.
Mathieu nous a très bien accueilli. Il a été très arrangeant et nous a donné de nombreux conseils sur les visites et les restaurants.
A recommander!

L'appartement est bien situé, on peut tout visiter à pied, La rue est calme, les chambres sont claires et propres, la salle de bain est par contre assez petite. merci Mathieu pour les conseils et les adresses!

L'hôte a été très accueillant et très arrangeant.
L'appartement est très bien situé.
Je recommande.

En un mot PARFAIT ! Le logement correspondait aux photos, et à nos attentes : à savoir idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto, avec la possibilité de tout faire à pieds. Et en bonus, les conseils avisés de Mathieu qui ont tous fait mouche ! Merci encore !

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVN Studio  v3
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas North timeshare - Pay resort: $8-12/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.
interaction: There are activities programs and concierge activities booking services at this resort.
houseRules: No smoking; No Pets; This property is located in the Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas, so their rules apply. Please call the resort directly to verify details.

host.about: Adventurous couple loves to travel :)

reviews.txt: Amazing room with ocean view!!! We were very impressed with the Westin and the 5 Star service!!! Complete with a full kitchen and washer and dryer!!! Home away from home. Mahalo :)

name: Great location in Barcelona
summary: Hello, if you are looking to stay in Barcelona here is a nice and calm neighborhood, close to the metro Navas, shopping Glories and much more. Here you have the real catalan lifestyle! Air conditioner, supermarkets and train close.
interaction: No estare infelizmente
houseRules: I would be happy if people that stays make no noisy after 22 o'clock, save energy and water for the world and take the garbage out before leaving. thank you all!

host.about: Familia multicultural!!!

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 179 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Malgré l'heure tardive à laquelle on est arrivés, Mickaël nous a très bien accueillis. L'appartement était propre.

name: causeway bay MTR+Tidy Quad room&YT
summary: .Near the subway: causeway bay MTR station (exit E, 2-3 minutes walk; Each room specific independent toilet, hot and cold water bath, independent air-conditioning, enjoy free WIFI Internet bring their own computers, more passengers to provide shower gel, hand sanitizer, shampoo, bath towel. Convert plug, front desk has blown ram and convenient services, the hotel fire alarm, smoke hood detectors, fire extinguishers, fire escapes light fire equipment, etc.
interaction: Special clean the room every day we have to be responsible for the room, clean sanitation, to ensure that the guest every day clean and comfortable accommodation environment. Live in all Hong Kong hotel/hotel, room size/type bed size cannot be specific to each room type bed size/room size. But can give the reference value to each customer. If you have any special requirement, please contact online customer service to confirm. By special tips: many hotel owners and distributed across multiple floors, in which floors arranged by the hotel front desk on the day, to pay to accept
houseRules: No smoking, let we have good air environment; Prohibit party, please don't shout loudly, affect other passengers to rest; Ban altered painting on the wall; Let us together love family, make every hotel can enjoy clean comfortable comfortable!

host.about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡
P.S:如你订好,请留个言给我~O(∩_∩)O谢谢~(Complete payment, please leave a message ~)
During the period of stay: if you are not Chinese, please leave a message directly to me, you need to, immediately to make arrangements for your service
可以加我 (Hidden by Airbnb) (You can add me (Hidden by Airbnb) 
)ID: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

address.street: 铜锣湾, 香港岛, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Pro:
-great location & value
-quick response from the host and very adaptable 

Cons:
-hair and dust in bed
-pictures don't represent the actual apartment layout
-unstable Internet

地點離地鐵站很近,周邊的商圈非常熱鬧｡
集結所有交通條件｡真的是十分便利｡
住宿環境在這交通樞紐銅鑼灣市中心,是安靜的｡
安全性也很不錯,

房東也很熱情,服務不錯｡
彭先生是个很好沟通的房东,第一次到香港,不知道香港的房源这么小的｡总体还可以｡

please check careful who the true owner is. they always have different owner with the one they use in airbnb. even phone number, i had a bad experience about finding the owner about 30mins, no one take my phone until i found out they actually have different owner with different phone number.
算便宜啦
没有烧开水的壶 还是楼下大爷那里灌的
好!就是空调有点老化｡有点杂音
房间位于铜锣湾,一个房间隔出一个独立卫生间,麻雀虽小 五脏俱全,卫生也挺好的,洗脸台没有热水,房间空调噪音比较大,其他都很好
内地来的客户建议可以 (Hidden by Airbnb) 导航,更精准一些｡
与描述相符吧,和爸妈孩子去的,香港寸土寸金这样的不错了,我们是一家人去的地方小点相互克服下,一个淋浴间,全家就只有我洗漱需要比较久的时间所以还好不会赶,如果是朋友去玩的话建议两个两人间的可能会好点｡

name: Twin Room With Window
summary: (2 sigle bed inside,n have bathroom inside,24h hot water,free wifi,Free luggage) All our rooms tidy n clean,free wifi,air-condition,shower room.
interaction: 本公司代訂各機票,澳門船票;出售機場巴士車票,八達通租借,主題公園門票(海洋公園,迪士尼樂園),山頂纜車+摩天塔,杜莎夫人,昂坪360觀光纜車,｡歡迎查詢!
houseRules: 晚上10點後請保持安靜(PLEASE BE QUITE AFTER 10.PM)

host.about:
我是一個熱情好客的人,歡迎與來自世界各地的人交流｡這個賓館是我用心裝修整理的,地理位置優越,臨近旺角地鐵站,購物方便,還有專門巴士去各處的主題公園｡藉助這個機會,更能為客人介紹香港的文化與人情味｡ 
I am the manager of Amigo Inn , my name is Jim, we have 23 rooms , so I guess  one of my rooms can fit your budget
Our inn located  in city center , MONGKOK where is most busiest area n transportation center to any where in hk, as u may know
  Subway/Mtr ---MONGKOK mtr n find the exit E2 which is the nearest exit to my hostel
We also provide discounted theme park  ticket like Disney park , ocean park n peak tram

reviews.txt: 房东人很好,住这非常方便,从地铁口出来5分钟就到,附近餐馆很多,小店也多,吃饭逛街太便利了｡房间虽小但是很干净卫生,性价比高,值得推荐
距离地铁站特别近,出行非常方便,宾馆的阿姨跟前台都特别的友好,给我们讲解路线还推荐美食,我们两个女生买了好多东西在要走的时候有一位宾馆的叔叔还特意帮我们把箱子给抬下去了,真的特别感谢!房间也很好我们特别满意!下次来香港还会订这里!很棒的一次旅行!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

老板人真的很好｡
去香港大部分需要买的东西都可以在老板那里低价买到｡巴士票,迪士尼门票,手机卡,换港币都可以找老板搞定,而且老板也很乐意给大家很好的建议｡
老板很热心,位置也很好
我们在Jim的inn里住了3个晚上,头一个晚上因为房间空调有气味以及漏水睡得不是很好,不过次日Jim遍给我们提供了一个最好的双人套房,并且为我们免费提供水｡ 总体感觉不错｡
We had a great time here, thank you for your instruction about interesting place and food
Jim is always ready to answer your inquiries. Place is nice and comfy. Would definitely recommend this place
房東非常友善我離開嘅時候佢仲送我哋去車站非常感激下次再嚟我會選擇這裏
Jim's place is very convenience for everythings. Jim and his staffs are really helpful and friendly. I'm really sastified with the place.

name: Wan Chai Fully Furnished Studio
summary: Fully Furnished Studio located in the the center of Wan Chai area. 5 minutes walking distance to both Wan Chai and Causeway Bay MTR station. Easy access to Hong Kong Exhibition Center, Times Square, and Sogo. Perfect for bachelor with Bars/Restaurants nearby the Lockhart/Jerreries Road. Building with elevator and 24/7 security guard. Small buy cosy studio with TV, private bathroom, kitchen air-conditioning and a working desk. Free Wifi access. 7-11 and laundry shop right next to the entrance.
interaction: Available prior to and during the stay in order to answer questions. Happy to make suggestions and plan your trip in Hong Kong.
houseRules: 1) Please keep the place as original as possible and clear all the garbage before checking out.  2) Please turn on the water heater around 10 minutes before using and turn it off after finished shower. One of the previous guests has broken the heater so a new one is installed and would prefer the guest to use is more carefully.  3) Please turn on the air con when you need it and turn it off when going out. There has been a few guests leaving the air condition on when check out and wasted a lot of electricity.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Stephen's place is neat, clean and as described.  Size is perfect for single traveller.  Stephen is very responsive.  Location is good with lots of restaurants around. Walking distance to MTR station is about 5 mins, very convenient. I enjoyed my stay very much at Stephen's place.

Small, one person room (size makes it a single room) not really well sound isolated against the neigbours. Recently renovated so fresh bathroom, could be better with something that blocks out the light from the "window" if you are a person that have trouble sleeping if it's to light in the room.

My stay in Hong Kong and at Stephen's flat went very smoothly and without any inconveniences. The flat is in a central location and easy to find as Stephen provided very good directions to the place with pictures and everything.

The room was as depicted in the pics and is suitable for 1 person to stay.

The room is tinier than I thought without any windows out. Another problem was that no cleaning supplies - not even a brush - was provided in the room. If you stay several days in the flat, as I did, it would be comfortable to clean and tidy up a bit every day.
Great location and beautiful room! Had a great time there. Host is awesome!
Good budget room for HK, clean and convenient, but no outside window :) Late check-in was easy and smooth. It's a good deal, at this price it's hard to find better in Wan Chai.
This is my second stay at Stephen's.  It's as good as my last stay.

The place was hard to find for me as the entrance is small and easy to miss. Nice cosy room that's in a central location. Desk and good wifi allowed me to work in the room. Fridge is useful for keeping food and drinks! And I like how there's food places just downstairs and everywhere around the building.

Great location in a reasonably modern building with a lift (which is a huge bonus having stayed on the 8th floor of a building without a lift last time I came to HK). Host was helpful and friendly and the room was clean with decent strength wifi, cold aircon and hot water.

Please note that facilities / amenities are minimal. There is a fridge, a kettle, and some bodywash/shampoo. You will need to supply your own towels plus cutlery and cups / glasses if you wish to eat or drink in the apartment (there are no cooking or laundry facilities either).

All in all, a good budget - if basic - place to stay in central Hong Kong.
It is a confortable room very well located!
Excellent location and great host! Remember to bring your own towle to this place.

name: The Garden Studio
summary: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre.
interaction: I er on the side of privacy but if you feel like a chat or want info about the area or Sydney in general I'm happy to help.
houseRules: No smoking. Would prefer no shoes in the studio. Please take rubbish out when you leave, and empty coffee machine of used pods.

host.about:
I am a professional photographer, based in Sydney. Australia. Covering lifestyle subjects such as Food, Interiors and travel, mostly for magazines and books and advertising clients. Born and raised in Sydney, I do love to travel and I have been lucky to have done a lot of that both personally and professionally. 
I enjoy making things and have always got a project on the go
Cooking is another great passion of mine. Hence the offer of baked goods and homemade jam!
Please feel free to email me with any question you might have.

reviews.txt:
This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

What a wonderful experience staying in The Garden Studio. We arrived and were greeted by the very friendly and attentive Cath - who introduced us to the chickens on the way to the studio. As soon as we stepped inside we felt comfortable. The decor is modern, quirky and stylish, there is a lovely area to sit and watch television, a user friendly kitchenette, a comfortable bed and a clean and modern bathroom. Cath provided us with a lovely array of breakfast and snack options and she even baked a delicious loaf of fresh bread which she left at our doorstep the following morning along with a newspaper. There is a large collection of DVD's to watch and books to read and the studio is in a quiet location with plenty parking - also within easy walking distance of public transport. I highly recommend The Garden Studio to anyone looking for a private, convenient and comfortable place to stay. My partner and I will definitely be returning in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay with Cath.. This lovely garden studio is functional, modern and comfortable.. Delish freshly baked bread and cookies from Cath.. The breakfast hamper is welcoming and generous! Definitely highly recommended!

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !

I had a lovely stay with Cath - the studio is beautiful and her chickens are so cute! She was a fantastic host - friendly, easy going  and kind (baked fresh bread!) but respected my privacy which was great.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.

name: Cosy Private Room best for long stay
summary: The room has a comfortable bed, towels and clean sheets. The room is cozy and comfortable with basic needs like a desk and hangers. We will be ready to help you with any problem at any hour.  Our Place is located in the center of old city called Sultanahmet. We are 2 munites away from Gülhane and Sirkeci Tram station. Our place is close to Metro (Marmaray), Ferry Station and Golden Horn. The best part is, it is close to all main attractions of Istanbul. Nightlife very easy to reach.
interaction: We can help you at any time.
houseRules: - best for long stay in istanbul

reviews.txt: Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und man kann auch ganz leicht zu Fuß einiges entdecken. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel kommt man sehr gut überall hin. Wer keine allzu großen Erwartungen an die Unterkunft stellt ist genau richtig hier. Der Gastgeber ist hilfsbereit und kümmert sich um einen. Würde auf jeden Fall nochmal diese Unterkunft nutzen, wenn ich wieder in Istanbul bin.

Es un lugar barato así que no se puede esperar unas instalaciones de lujo, pero si eres una persona poco delicada es el lugar perfecto. La ubicación es inmejorable, el personal es muy simpático y hay una azotea donde relajarse y disfrutar de las vistas con una cerveza o un té. Lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda.
Все отлично.  Дом,  район супер.

Secondhome is in an ideal location for looking around the main sights of Istanbul. The hospitality was excellent, they were very helpful with our many questions and had great local tips on where to eat etc. I would highly recommend staying and if we visit Istanbul again we would rebook here. Thanks Secondhome!

Excelente lugar con una muy buena ubicación, el hostal se encuentra a unos 800 metros de Santa Sofía, y a unos 10 minutos caminando del puente Galatasaray, además a dos cuadras hay lugares para comer con excelentes precios, puedes llegar animando a cualquier lado. Recepción en inglés y un poco español, sin problemas en la comunicación. Recomendable

Me voy con muchos recuerdos, muchas gracias por alojarme disfrute mucho mi estancia en Estambul, me hiceron la vida mas facil con su hospitalidad y buena ubicacion asi como su buena disposición para las preguntas. Sin dudas lo recomiendo
Good place for it's price. Excellent location. Nothing fancy but very cheap :)

Нам в этом хостеле было очень комфортно, по-домашнему все. Персонал, как радушный хозяин, вежлив, заботлив и улыбчив. Жили на 4 этаже. Номер маленький, но уютный и чистый, постельное белье свежее. Санузел и душ на этаже на 4 комнаты. Гель для душа и бумага никогда не кончились, строго следит за этим персонал. Когда мы замерзли, учтиво принесли очень теплые одеяла)) Если номера и с удобствами в номере, но мы выбрали такой. Курить бегали на балкон на терассу. По вечерам на ней тусовка из проживающих. Но это не мешало особо. Оборудованная кухня, холодильник на 1 этаже. Очень понравилось, что в 20 шагах от  нашего хостел работает небольшой маркет в котором большой выбор и Очень маленькин цены. Покупали продукты, готовили сами.  А еще отличное расположение хостела, метро в 200м, трамвай в 220м, Гранд базар в 700м, мост с морским транспортом в 1км. Вот что еще важно: в отеле персонал говорит по русски! И очень нам рады))
Excellent location and cool atmosphere! Rooms are comfortable, and open spaces are great!

It is a room of a hostel. The hosts are very friendly and provides a lot of tips. Room is clean and towels provided. The shared bathroom was cleaned daily and sometimes it also depends on the other guests. I suggest add more light in the 2nd floor bathrooms. They also provided laundry and printing services. The lounge area is also a good place to hangout and meet other people.

name: Private Entrance - Backyard Summer Dining - Enjoy
summary: If you appreciate the natives in the outer boroughs, we appreciate you as guest.  Brooklyn has become very popular among Brooklynites and new comers.  While visiting NYC, if you are looking for crowds, museums and shopping, visit Manhattan.  Welcome!
interaction: We respect your privacy so will not interfere with your visit. We are not offering a hotel experience, yet a friendly and family environment.  (Please do not bring people to hang out, party or sleepovers - each additional person will be charged a nightly rate whether visiting or staying).
houseRules: No smoking, No pets.  Sanitary napkins, Tampons and Bounty napkins must be placed in the trash, NOT IN TOILET BOWL.  PLEASE DO NOT use hair dye/color.  Turn off lights, air conditioner and television when out enjoying the day.  Be sure doors and gates in front and back are locked when out of the house. Throw out trash and place in recycle bins.  Leaving the apartment untidy or dirty will incur a cleaning fee.  PLEASE RESPECT THE HOME AS IF IT WAS YOUR HOME WITH CLEANLINESS AND CARE OF BELONGINGS!  ALSO, NOTIFY HOST WITH YOUR DEPARTURE TIME - PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE WITHOUT NOTICE.  Departing after check out time (noon) will incur the daily rate.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Easy, breezy and enjoy having fun with friends and great people.  Appreciate a comfortable, clean home.  Favorite past time is reading or a good movie.  Family and my time, most important.

reviews.txt: Michelle was a very considerate, responsive host. The apartment is lovely and very comfortable and was furnished with everything we needed. We had a great stay.

Séjour merveilleux chez Michelle qui est une hôte adorable, le logement etait vraiment super... très propre, , fonctionnel,petit plus le rez de jardin ou l on peux manger et profiter des petits oiseaux car nous sommes à new york , mais vraiment au calme,station de metro à deux (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vraiment cette adresse, nous sommes venus avec nos deux enfants...
Merci michelle de nous avoir permis de passer un si bon voyage,!

I booked Michelle's private Brooklyn home for my retired parents, who were visiting me in LA from overseas and wanted to travel to New York for a few days. My parents returned from New York raving about Michelle, her graciousness and her beautiful home including a private outside patio! The apartment was attractively decorated and very clean with all the key amenities including coffeemaker, TV, internet, and even fresh fruit! The supermarket was conveniently around the corner, and my dad said he chatted with locals as he walked to the bakery to get bread each morning. My parents said it was like home away from home. They highly recommend Michelle as a host, and I can't wait to visit myself. Michelle, thank you for making my parents' New York trip so special. You and your family are welcome to visit us in Long Beach, CA anytime. 

Michelle, ist eine wunderbare und nette Gastgeberin.
Bei fragen und Tipps stets zur stelle und unglaublich hilfsbereit.
Das Appartement ist sehr geräumig und voll ausgestattet.
Die Lage ist erstklassig, U-Bahn und Supermarkt nicht mehr als 150 Meter entfernt.
Wir habe uns sehr wohl gefühlt und können uns nicht beklagen. Es ist jedem zu empfehlen der New York als Stadt erkunden will.
Jederzeit wieder!!

Very nice and big enough basement apartment with two rooms. Clean and nicely furnished with a good wide bed in one room and a sofa in kitchen, with all necessary dishes and coffee machine (Michelle even provided us with coffee for it) That was much more than enough for two persons. Also we used bbq in the court which also was great. Michelle was hospitable enough to meet us in the middle of the night!  We didn`t have any problems at all living in such kind of apartment. Should notice that the connection to Mahattan is a little complicated given the G metro line which is not very frequent. But in general the enviroment is quite ok with nice dominican dely on the corner of the street (highly recomended!)
Michelle was a nice person and really easy to communicate. We had a great time in this big apartment and no problem with to get into the city.

Very nice place!
Michelle is very friendly, helpfull and a nice person to chat with.
The place is very clean, homy feeling. The Subway is less than 100 yards away (about 1/2 hour ride from midtown Manhattan) which is VERY convenient. Neighbourhood ok. At the end of the day is much nicer to come to instead of a "cold" hotel room! The back yard is great for morning / evening coffe or even BBQ (the grill is already there).
Thank you Michelle  :-)
תודה רבה (Hebrew)

Michelle is a fantastic host, she made us  feel very welcome.
The place was clean and perfectly organized,  quiet at night, 4 very comfortable sleeping places, safe neighborhood, we had everything we needed. the subway is literally 1minute walk from the apartment, you get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. There are also buses that take you in no time to down town Brooklyn and Williamsburg. Supermarket is around the corner. Bakery for great breakfasts and deliciuos donuts place at 2 minutes walk from home.
The back garden is also very nice, we were too busy walking all day long, but it gave us a sense of big space, on a nice day you could spend time outside and enjoy a private corner of open air.
If I have the chance to go to New York again, I will surely go back to Michelle!
Everything was great in your apartment. Nice place, nice neighborhood with a subway station very close to the apartment. Thank you Michelle ! :-)

Notre expérience à l'appartement de Michelle fut merveilleuse! J'y suis aller avec mes parents, qui n'avaient jamais mis les pieds à Brooklyn, et ils furent enchantés par la proximité du métro, de l'épicerie, par la grandeur de l'appartement et ses facilités. Je recommande fortement l'appartement de Michelle, et j'y retournerai assurément à mon prochain séjour à New York!
-----
Our experience at Michelle's apartment was wonderful! I'm going with my parents, who had never been to Brooklyn, and they were delighted with the nearby subway, grocery, the size of the apartment and its facilities. I highly recommend the Michelle's apartment, and I certainly return on my next trip to New York!
Yol
Yol

Io e la mia famiglia siamo stati 20 giorni nell'appartamento di Michelle e siamo stati benissimo. Appartamento con ingresso indipendente, pulito, ben tenuto e con tutto il necessario per 4 persone. I letti sono veramente comodi (non si trovano facilmente nelle case per vacanze). Vicinissimo alla metropolitana, si raggiunge Manhattan in poco tempo, e vicino ad alcuni market, per cui fare la spesa è stato facile. La zona è abbastanza tranquilla, si rientrava anche a sera tardi ma non abbiamo avuto nessun problema. Michelle è una persona molto simpatica, molto disponibile e molto discreta. consiglierei sicuramente di passare una vacanza nel suo appartamento. Grazie ancora Michelle ...e speriamo arrivederci!! I love NY

name: The Porto Concierge - White Dove
summary: Beautiful house totally renewed for an excelente stay in Porto! Equipped with everything you might need for a comfortable stay! With 3 independent bedrooms, in excellent location to visit Porto, either by foot (10 minutes walk to city center) or metro (5 minutes walk to metro station).
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by Concierge Service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun.

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda  os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

address.street: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.txt: Everything was fine
Felt very welcome, great house, good location, very clean, lots of information about Porto. Overall a great few days.
We were really happy with the place. It was close to everything but still separated so we could have our own place. The terrace is huge and sunny. I would recommend the place to everyone!

Logement conforme a nos attentes , le séjour s est relativement bien passé , 2/3 petite chose sont a améliorer comme mettre a disposition un ballet , une serpillère ou bien même un parasol pour la terrasse extérieur qui est génial mais en heure de chaleur on ne peut pas en profiter sans parasol ... Une bouteille de vin nous attendait a notre arrivé , ça nous fait très plaisir en arrivant après le voyage ... Sinon que dire d autre parfois quelques odeurs de canalisation d égout , c pas très agréable mais ça dure pas longtemps généralement , sur ce les chambres étais vraiment bien , très confortable et avec clim ... La cuisine est fonctionnelle et il ne manque rien ... Le salon est agréable également , le logement a donc contribué a notre très bon séjour a porto ...

La casa es preciosa, pequeña, pero bien equipado; cuenta con una gran terraza y está en una zona tranquila. Justo al lado hay una estación de tren, desde la casa se oyen los trenes, pero no molestan demasiado a la hora de dormir. Aunque la casa contaba con garaje privado, tuvimos problemas para dejar el coche en él, por lo que el dueño acordó pagar el gasto en wl párking de la estación de tren cercana (3'50€ al día). Nos dejaron una botella de agua y otra de vino como obsequio de bienvenida. Si quieres conocer Oporto y alojarte en una zona tranquila y cercana, es una buena opción
Quartier proche de l'activité (15 min à pied des quais de Porto)

La descripcion de la casa es perfecta. Muy buena situacion y zona muy tranqyila. Al lado de la casa esta el tren y un parking muy economico. El tranvia pasa a 1 minuto caminando.
Como megativo decir que el baño de la habitacion tienen que arreglar el tema del olor, hay que cerrarlo que no se soporta.
Deberia de tener una escoba y recogedor. Por el resto todo genial.
I think Jose does not exist, the guy who came did not know the place at all. The place was clean and just renovated. The neighbourhood doesn't feel really safe but we did not have any problem at all.
Good location, really nice apartament, convenient for families with children due to lerge terrace. The only minus is the paid parking place. Recomended.

merci pour la bouteille de vin !
spacieux, clean, bien équipé et très grande terrasse.
super logement.

name: Quiet Stylish Mosman Apartment
summary: My 3br ground floor apartment is close to Balmoral beach, buses, city, parks, harbour foreshore walks. You'll love the room as it has its own private courtyard. Lift access.. Comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
interaction: I'm in and out but love talking to people so if I'm home happy to interact or if guests would prefer to be left alone that's fine with me. I'm always happy to give advice on how to get around, things to do in the area and tips on places to eat and of course where the best coffee is.
houseRules: Only the person or people who book are allowed to stay in the room.

host.about: I am a retired property valuer. I love to travel. I usually do houseswaps but Airbnb is also a good way to connect with the community and far better than staying in a hotel.

reviews.txt:
Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Again we had such a lovely experience staying with Krythia. She is such a wonderful host. 
Krythia make you feel like your right at home. 
Highly recommend this apartment. 

Many thanks 
Mark and Rebecca

My wife and I had a really fantastic stay with Krythia. The apartment is super homely, cosy and private. The bedroom we stayed in was really nice and had a private courtyard attached to it. We also had access to our own private bathroom. Everything was really comfortable and clean, and we were able to do our own cooking too. Krythia herself is a lovely hostess. We had several interesting conversations with her and she made us feel welcome right from the start. The apartment is just a few minutes walk from the bus stop, with it being very easy snd convenient to get into the city from there. Highly recommend this apartment, especially if you're a cat lover - Krythia's cat Cindy is super friendly!

We stayed at krythias apartment for four nights. The apartment and the room is as you can see it on the pictures. Modern and nice looking. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfy. Krythia is a really nice lady and we had some great short conversations with her. We felt very welcomed. The only thing we like to mention for the apartment that is located in a really nice area of Sydney, is that you can only reach it by bus (5 stops) - so there is no tram nearby. The last bus we were able to find to the direction of the apartment left the city at 8:30 pm. That was sometimes a little bit early for us and we had to take an uber (which costs around 20AUD). Everything else was really awesome and we can recommend to stay there for sure. Thank you Krythia for the amazing stay in Sydney.
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.
Very good house, very clean room and private bathroom, very lovely cat and one very kindliness host. Spend a nice week with Krythia
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.
Very clean and comfortable,

name: Catete's Colonial Big Hause Room B
summary: Old floor, intirely reformed, destined to receive people in a very harmonious and welcoming place. Located at Catete's neighborhood, with a very easy access to the metro station, a lot of bus lines, next to a excellent trade and things to do around.
interaction: Sou geógrafa, gosto de arte e cultura. Moro neste endereço (porém em outro espaço, que não o casarão) com meu companheiro Carlos Henrique, que é músico, farmacêutico e acupunturista, meus filhos Pedro, estudante do ensino médio e Estevão estudante de antropologia . Somos todos os três responsáveis pelas hospedagens e manutenção do Casarão. Sejam bem vindos! Estaremos com total disponibilidade para ajudá-los.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
A Beatriz foi bastante atenciosa e respondia as minhas dúvidas muito rapidamente antes da viagem. O bairro do Catete tem uma localização boa, conseguimos ir para a Lapa à pé e também para outros lugares como o aterro e a praia do Flamengo durante o carnaval. A estação de metrô também é perto e tem várias opções de alimentação muito próximas à casa. O layout da casa assemelha-se à um hostel, o quarto que eu fiquei tem tamanho excelente para 4 pessoas e tem ar condicionado, o que faz muita diferença com o calor que está no Rio de Janeiro. Existem 4 banheiros, que são suficientes para o número de pessoas que cabem na casa, entretanto durante todos os dias que passei lá, o banheiro não foi limpo nenhuma vez, por sorte os hóspedes estavam mantendo-o em condições de uso, mas seria importante limpar o banheiro de vez em quando. 
Outro ponto importante é que os quartos são ligados por uma porta que não tem fechadura e é bem fina, ou seja, a privacidade não é garantida e o barulho de um quarto pode ser ouvido perfeitamente no outro.
O preço é justo pelo que é oferecido, seria importante apenas melhorar a limpeza e verificar se é possível fechar a comunicação dos quartos.

name: montreal monalisa
summary: Cozy apartment located in downtown, very near from public subway station(200 meters), many nice restaurants and cafés around. One free parking in back yard.
