reviews.txt: The Host made us feel very welcome , we were six of us. Everything was clean and spacious and the neighbourhood  was right in downtown with all the amenities and resturants. Although it rained we still had a good time.

The apartment was lovely and in a fantastic location in Montreal. 

Just as described. 

Kenny was welcoming and helpful. He made our stay very pleasant and accommodated our arrival and departure times.

We had the most wonderful experience at Kenny's spot! It's in an awesome location central in the Plateau and a quick 10-15 min drive or cab into downtown.

It is cute, clean and he leaves you towels and other nice additions that really make you feel comfortable! 

The property is set up through an entry code so no key exchange makes everything so seamless and efficient.

We will definitely come back to stay here again!

Although we didn't meet our host in person he communicated with us via text and promptly replied to any of our exchanges. We arrived in the evening and the lights and airconditioning were on for our comfort. Fresh flowers were on the table and the apartment was clean and stocked with all necessary supplies. The apartment was spacious enough for our family of six. Great location, close to shops, clubs, and restaurants. We would definitely come again.

L'appartement est très bien situé, sur le plateau du Mont-Royal, tout près des resto et des commerces.
Kenny était très prévenant et a tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe bien.
L'appartement est comme sur les photos, avec 3 belles chambres et une terrasse.
Nous recommandons vivement.

Very nice place with three proper bedrooms and a sofa, kitchen and living room. There were four of us and we were perfectly comfortable. In a great central location, easy walk or short drive from many Montreal destinations. Kenny was very accessible. Thank you!
It's my first time in Airbnb, overall it is a nice house!

Kenny's Airbnb was very spacious and unique. Everything was clean and the location (Plateau) was really good. Close to many bars and restaurants without the noise and crowds of the downtown core of Montreal (which can be reached by foot in 20 - 30 mins or easily via subway)

Check in / check out was convenient using a keycode. The apartment had a dishwasher, AC unit, a washer, and dryer. There's also a TV box with Netflix, a nice added touch.

Provided free parking in the back of the house was VERY helpful. Finding parking in Montreal can be a huge headache.

I would definitely stay here again!

Cute place that sleeps 3 singles comfortably (although we were only two). Loved the quirky decor. There was coffee, sugar cubes and a French press which was nice. No hair dryer though, so ladies - bring your own. :)

Très bien organisé

name: O charme de estar em frente à praia
summary: Apart-hotel em frente a praia. Aconchegante e com um espetacular amanhecer e entardecer. Varanda ampla para poder realizar as refeições aproveitando a vista da praia e das piscinas. Lindo! Pertinho das melhores praias do Rio de Janeiro, shopping, cinemas, excelentes restaurantes e barzinhos.
interaction: Sempre que for solicitado, deixando-os à vontade para realizar contato quando precisarem.
houseRules: Respeitem as regras do Apart. Após as 22h não é permitido barulho com risco de multas previstas nas regras do condomínio, além disso durante o tempo restante respeite o seu vizinho, ele também poderá estar de férias e querendo descansar. É permitido fumar nas áreas abertas do prédio. Utilizem o ar-condicionado com consciência ecológica, desligando-o sempre que não estiverem no imóvel. Mantenha o imóvel sempre limpo e cuide dos móveis e demais utensílios com cuidado. Esta é também a minha casa e gostaria que tudo fosse cuidado com carinho. Não é permitido exceder o número de 4 pessoas no apartamento, sendo 2 adultos e 2 crianças. Quaisquer multa geradas pelos hóspedes no período de sua permanência devido ao não cumprimento das normas internas do condomínio, deverá ser paga antes do check-out.

houseRules: Leave it as you found it! Clean :)

host.about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.txt: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!

name: Luxury Style Space: ideal for short or longterm!
summary: This beautiful space is like a mini-apartment in my apartment. The huge 12'x16' room was converted from my living space using a professional room converter. The bed is topped with memory foam for extra comfort, the windows are huge, couch is comfy. Just a dream of a stay! [FYI: no (further) discounts. I do have a weekly/monthly discount auto-installed for my listing already, so please do not ask]
interaction: I truly appreciate my privacy..... I typically stay to myself and I like to give my guests as much privacy as possible.... All are welcome, but I do have a preference for people with a similar lifestyle to mine: young artist/creative.
houseRules: CHECK-IN TIME : is anytime between 1pm - 10pm on check-in day, and must be confirmed with me 24 hours  prior to your arrival.  CHECK-OUT TIME : is 10am on check-out day.  Cleanliness : NO SHOES, NO SHOES, NO SHOES!!  (please bring house slippers if necessary, but please do not wear shoes in the house at any point, not “just on ur way out”, not “just on ur way in”, please respect my wishes and do not wear shoes in my home).  I expect my guests to be clean/neat, (especially in the bathroom). Please leave the bathroom tub/sink clean and free of your body hair. Since this is a space where I live as well, please be cognizant of my comfort as well as yours; clean up after yourself. MEN: toilet seats stay DOWN in my household lol. Please be courteous/respectful and keep your room how it was found. NO GARBAGE OR DEBRIS SHOULD BE LEFT BEHIND.   Conduct : guests should mind their noise levels  after 11pm. Cigarette smoking is STRICTLY prohibited. Just don’t do it. Keys: once booking this space,

reviews.txt: Dellasie was a very nice and gracious host. The room was huge, clean, and looked precisely as pictures. Her home was very conveniently located near transportation (train/bus/cabs), food... Anything you might need. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone coming to NYC!"

My stay in the house was perfect. The house was very clean, and comfortable. With so many space. I feel like in home. She was genial. The place was in the middle of Broklyn, so many local stores (food, clothing...) good located to the subway and bus station. I recommend this place to have a good time in NYC.
The space was comfortable, convenient, and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Dellasie was a great host, was friendly and kind, gave us our privacy when needed but was always up for a chat. The flat is very nice, the neighbourhood is nice and lively, it is located very close to transport links, and you can be in Manhattan in 40 mins. A great place for anybody visiting New York! We would definitely stay again

Dellasie is a very prompt, helpful and easy-going host. Everything was set very promptly and prepared for my stay. The underground is cca 3 minutes walk from the apartment. Good choice for a short NYC trip!
Very clean and comfortable space. Separated from the main apartment area by a thick curtain. The apartment is close to the subway and very easy to access by car.

Dellasie was very warm and friendly - I felt very welcome in her home. The room is right in the center of her apartment but she was careful to make me feel like the space was my own private room. The neighborhood is great and one of my favorites in Brooklyn. I felt happy wandering around on foot in the day and the subway station is very close by with useful links. And the bed is SO comfortable!

The bed is in a large space which is on the living room of the apartment. Privacy is provided by large black curtains. Dellasie was really friendly and stayed out of your way. The Kingston metro station is just a couple of blocks away. It was a good deal for a short stay.

I had a very good experience here Dellasie was a good host and very kind. The place was clean and it was nice and quiet but most of all its in the middle of all the best places to go so no where is too far. Thank you Dellasie I would definitely come back.

I loved staying at Dellasie's place! She was very friendly and so helpful with any questions I had to ask. The room was just as described. I was perfectly comfortable the entire time and I felt right at home! I spent one day being lazy in the apartment recovering from my rough travel day and she even brought me a bunch of movies to watch. Great host!

name: New Furnishings! Very Private! Great Deal! GC 137
summary: Fabulous value in Wailea resort! If you want the perfect and spacious 2 bed/2 bath condo that is tastefully decorated, complete privacy and serenity and a lanai surrounded with lush shrubbery, THIS IS IT! Bright and airy, this unit is located in a quiet, ground floor, private location on the cul de sac. Tile throughout the dining to living areas and carpeting in the bedroom. Check out the recent pictures of the slide show listed on this AirBnb. Hawaii Tax ID #: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
interaction: We are available 24/7 during your stay for any questions, concerns, or emergency issues. We are also happy to help you plan some fun activities during your stay!
houseRules: *PLEASE NOTE: AirBnB is unable to charge the required Hawaii State Tax, so please be aware that there is a tax of 14.42% on the nightly rate. This will be due prior to arrival and you will receive a separate invoice from our company with all taxes included.

reviews.txt: Best AirBnb experience so far! No issues at all. Everything was fine.

We had a fabulous and comfortable stay at Grand Champions! The unit was accurately depicted (actually looked even better in person) with beautiful furnishings and equipped with all the essentials for added comfort and convenience! It is private and in an excellent location within the GC community. A beautiful gift basket was awaiting our arrival. Check-in is a breeze. The lanai faces an amazing garden with views of the mountain and a peek-a-boo view of the ocean. Kitchen is well stocked for cooking if you so choose. The master bath has an amazing walk-in shower. The pools are beautiful and the grilling areas are kept clean. Some very nice beaches nearby and a great central location to get around the entire island by car. Host Amanda represents the best of hospitality; friendly, responsive, and professional! Will definitely recommend and come back again.
Amanda was great! We loved the grand champions villas and was surprised by how close it was to everything.
Very nice condo with 2 full baths and walk in shower!  Gift basket on arrival was an unexpected nice touch.   The wall mirror makes the mail room look really big.   We will be back soon!
The hosts were very responsive.  Unit was very quiet.

Beautiful place very clean and more that we expect very convenient with beach chair umbrella and beach towels. 
We will comeback and stay in the unit #137 . Very close to everything and Amanda is a very nice host ! My friends really love it !
Overall a great place
G

Excellent location, close to shops and great beaches.  We had a minor cleaning issue when we arrived, but CBI was very responsive and addressed it promptly.  The unit was well equipped with furnishings that met our needs.  The pool access, parking, and check-in was seemless.  We enjoyed our stay.

Thank you to a wonderful host! The place was immaculate and beautiful decor nice island touches. The master shower is so spacious. Location was ideal close to shopping and beaches and easy to explore the island. Looking forward to our next vacation!! Mahalo!

name: Contemporary Remodeled Ocean View Villa in Kapalua
summary: Experience the Kapalua  lifestyle by staying at our tropical, spacious and contemporary remodeled townhouse style villa. Our romantic retreat is situated in a quiet and well appointed cul de sac at the top of The Ridge at Kapalua. Enjoy imposing direct views of both the Pacific Ocean and the internationally famous Kapalua Bay golf course. Please note these nightly rates include the 14.4% hawaii tax.
interaction: I live on island and I am available for any questions regarding the condo and area

host.about: This was our home and we loved living here, however we have extended our family and now have a little boy so we decided to move into a slightly bigger house on Maui.

reviews.txt:
This house is wonderful! 
It is one of the best Airbnb experiences ever. 
Beautiful neighborhood, very nice apartment (big, elegant and comfortable) with everything you may need. 
Everything was perfect: car park, easy access, beautiful views, two fantastic bathrooms, garden and terrace, etc. 
Definitely top!

Leila's place is truly amazing. A very clean, well equiped and beautiful place for our stay on Maui. The view from the terrace was great. I would recommend friends to stay here and if ever be back in Maui, I would reach out to Leila again!

A truly piece of paradise. Lovely decorated and very clean.

We hope to happily return one day. :-)

Mahalo

Albert & Maya

Hi! Staying at Leila's condo in Lahaina was my first ever AirBnB stay! Leila was accessible. She responded to any questions I had very quickly. She was always helpful! Her condo was amazing! Very clean, just as described, and I loved the location! Woke up to so much sunlight! A great view of the ocean! Had breakfast on our patio everyday! There is a cool breeze that will make you never want to leave! As for drive, it was less than an hour from Kahului Airport and the drive to several beaches were less than 10 minutes, I would highly recommend staying at Leila's!! It was a great experience!!

Thanks again, Leila!

Can't speak highly enough of the house, great location.
House was immaculate, owners were helpful and got in touch with us to make sure all was ok. 
Great value for money and would highly recommend!
Beautiful lovely house! We really enjoyed our stay and believe it is perfect for everyone looking for a beautiful quite place on the west side of maui.
Beautiful contemporary place with everything you would need and the location was great being a short walk from Kapalua bay (swimming snorkeling) and many great restaurants and a grocery store.

The views from the bedroom
And great room are wonderful - hard to leave!   The location is perfect for us because we think Kapaluna is the best at
Area of Maui

Leila was an excellent host. We had a delayed flight and did not arrive to the condo until 1:30am. Easy to find. Easy to access. Excellent amenities. Beautiful view! Quiet. 
Very responsive to any questions. 
Location is awesome! Walking distance to beaches, restaurants, etc. or easy & FREE shuttle (5-10 minute wait) in the Kapalua area.
We are looking forward to working with her again in the near future.

We stayed here on our first trip to Maui and we couldn't have had asked for a better place to vacation. From the spacious living areas to the modern decor, Leila's condo is located in a prime spot with spectacular views of the Pacific Ccean. After staying at her place, I wanted to highlight 4 great things about our experience: 

1) Resort amenities- there is a complimentary shuttle that can take you between the Ritz Carlton and Montage resorts from your villa, along with other places in the Kapalua resort. This is great, especially for trying the top rated restaurants at the resorts without having to pay for parking...plus you can have a glass (or bottle) of wine and let someone else worry about the driving :) Or you can walk!

2) Accessibility- Whether you are looking to take in a nice stroll along the beach or play a round of golf, her villa is nestled right in the heart of the Kapalua Resort. Even in the rain, you can enjoy the nice pool with a covered eating area! And I need to mention that the views from her condo are breath-taking, so if you fancy a night in, hers is the place to do it!

3) Her Condo- I've stayed at hotels and resorts before, but I have to say that her villa exceeds anything you can find at a high end resorts. The wi-fi was strong and fast - able to be used among multiple devices. And the entire space was so clean! We had the security of knowing that the crew didn't just do a once over and be done, but actually took the time to make sure that it was ready and prepped for us, as if no one had stayed there before us. I'm a stickler for very nice bedrooms and beds, and hers was not only comfortable, but also offered me a great night's rest after a day of beach, beach and more beach :)

4) Leila & Dan - They have been a gracious host, allowing us to stay at their condo. They were quick to respond, always providing us with best in class service, and were able to provide some great recommendations on activities and events to do on the island. 

I want to thank you for taking the time to read my review. Our experience staying at Leila and Dan's condo was great, and we truly enjoyed the time we spent on Maui. I cannot thank them enjoy for allowing us this great and special opportunity, and for giving us a chance to experience this beautiful island in a way that like no other. For this we are very grateful! 

We wish you all the best in booking your stays through AirBnb and hope you have the opportunity to stay at Leila and Dan's condo... we hope to as well very soon! 

Mahalo!

name: Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow
summary: Located close to the beach-just steps to the water, you’ll love our optimal quiet location& newly renovated comfortable bungalow with oversized loft, large tropical lanai for lounging& paddle board, surfboard, boogie boards & beach gear for play. Ride your bike into historic Lahaina in just s few minutes, or stay on property and play in the 3 pools, tennis court, beautiful club house, surf breaks or wander the 30 acres. TAXID: TA-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
interaction: I should be available by phone or email, and we have a property manager on Island to help with any issue that might arise

host.about: Bozeman, Montana- mother of two adorable boys-  I love to travel and explore this amazing world we live in

reviews.txt: Great communication as well as an superb property and location!

When we where at the entrance from Puamana we already had a good feeling. When we where entering to the place from Elise the Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow we felt like at home. The place is even better as shown on the picture. It is very clean and tastefully furnished. The kitchen has everything you need to cook. And all the bedrooms are very nice. You got even surfboards or bikes to use. We had every morning our breakfast on the porch which was always a very nice start into the day. From the house you will get in approx. 30“ to the ocean where you can enjoy every day the moast romantic sunsets. Its just fantastic. Puamana Ocean Breeze Bungalow is located close to Lahaina where you also find a lot of nice restaurants and grocery stores. And from Puamana you also can do realy nice daytrips like going snorkeling or do the road to Hana, to Wailea Makena or you go to Haleakala where you have a nice few on 10000 Feet over Maui (if the weather is nice) And if you just feel like relaxing than the ocean pool from Puamana is the perfect place just to calm down an enjoy the beauty of the pacific. Right in front of the club house are two surf spots where my son and daughter went surfing every morning. We just can highly recomand this beautiful place and we are still overwhelmed. Thank you so much Elise for having us. You have been always so nice and flexible and did respond very quick to our e-mails and answers. We had a realy great time and we will miss this quiet and romatic place. We just love Maui and all the other Hawaiian Islands. 
Mahalo for everything. 

Lajos and Family

This was my first time using Airbnb and it was perfect!   The bungalow is very comfortable, in a beautiful setting and within walking distance (one mile) of shops and restaurants.  Elise had everything available for us and we felt right at home.  If we ever return to Maui, we would love to stay here again.   Thank you Elise!!!

We spent a week and a half at the Ocean Breeze Bungalow in Lahaina and it was absolutely perfect. The house was well appointed, extremely clean and  Puamana is centrally located to everything Maui has to offer. We had everything we needed to feel right at home. The complex is within walking distance of Lahaina. And a 30 minute drive to everything else. You really can't find a better place on Maui.
Elise was an ideal host and we had great communication from her and her onsite manager. 
One note - If you are looking for more of a party scene or a place to get a little wild this is probably not a great choice....if you want a sweet peaceful place that's not a pretentious resort, this is for you.
Lovely Place and quiet community

Elise was fantastic - quick and responsive to all communication.  She sent a very detailed e-mail with all the necessary check-in information. Her place was exactly as described and the photos were accurate.  It was, neat, clean, comfortable and well appointed. The kitchen had everything necessary to cook and prepare meals. The neighborhood was awesome - clean and safe.  It was an easy walk into town and located close to many of the activities we had planned.

Fantastic location with many amenities and easy walk to all the shops, restaurants and activities that Lahaina has to offer. Limited sand on the beach at location (December), but plenty of activities for the whole family to enjoy. Elise is a pleasure to work with; outstanding communication and information shared!

This is a wonderful property, private, and walkable to the town of Lahaina. Good for family or couples getaway. Elise was readily available for any questions we had! We loved hanging out on the back porch in the beautiful Maui weather!

Great location! Just a nice walk down Front street brings you to the heart of Lahaina. A beautiful Airbnb steps away from the ocean and in a very nicely maintained community.

Elise is very very responsive. The guests before us left the place in a mild disarray breaking various items but she let me know as soon as she found out and attempted to fix what she could in one day. She sent us a lovely basket of Maui-an goods to make up for the honestly very minor inconveniences, which was a very nice gesture. Check-in instructions very clear and easy.

The house has a lovely back deck, while although not entirely private as you can see the other neighboring decks, was a nice place to enjoy some meals.  She offers many of the essentials such as a SUP, snorkels, watershoes, boogie boards and a outdoor shower, which made going out to explore the beaches hassle free. The rooms are nicely appointed and we really had everything we needed. Could not have asked for a better place to stay.

Great location and very comfortable.  Comes with everything you need for a beach vacation including boogie boards, paddle/surf boards...  we watched the sunset every day from the pool/clubhouse area.  Elise was wonderful and very responsive.  Mahalo for a wonderful vacation!!!

name: Appartment 5 minutes walk from the beach
summary: The apartment is composed by one bedroom, one bathroom, a living room with an open kitchen and a nice terrace. It is located 5 min walk to the famous Bondi Beach and footsteps from the door to great cafes, restaurants, bars and shops.
interaction: Please contact me to arrange receiving the keys - you will have your own set of keys to enter the property. Check in and out times are flexible, just let me know and we will try and accommodate. We will not be in the property for your stay, it is all yours. We will be available to contact 24/7 Close to everything you want and need in Bondi!
houseRules: • No parties or events • No smoking Please leave the property as you found it, and respect our home. Please do not smoke inside and on the balcony. Please no parties. We are all for having a good time but please be respectful of the neighbours.

reviews.txt: Gwen was a fantastic host. She was very accommodating of our late arrival and very early departure. The apartment was exactly as we imagined with a lot of natural light, sleek "beachy" decor and only a 5 min walk to the beach, everything you need for a perfect weekend away. I would definitely stay with Gwen again.
Great location, lovely helpful hosts.

Gwen is very sweet! met with her briefly and she gave me good tips. The flat was cozy and clean, 5 mins walk to the beach and amazing restaurants: I loved BrownSugar right in front of their place. Staying here depends on what you are doing in Bondi. If it's to party and enjoy the nearby festivities until the wee hours of the night then this is perfect for you. I have to say that this place was a little too loud for my taste. Loud music from neighbors late at night and the busy street wasn't all that fun for an early sleeper like myself dealing with jet lag but it's out of Gwen's control so I just put my earplugs in and hoped for the best. Other than that, their place is perfectly located in safe area, and very close to the beach. Like I said it all depends on what you want out of your stay!
Great location, very close to the beach. Gwen and Jim were very helpful.
Great

Best location, the apartment was lovely and super close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Would recommend  Gwen's apartment to anyone and everyone that's wanting to go somewhere funky and fun! Gwen was super helpful with places to go, things to do and with questions and communication was great. Thanks Gwen for the best weekend!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Gwen and Jim's.  Both were great communicators and made our 11pm arrival a breeze!
Good little place in an amazing location, only very short walk to the water.  Thanks for having us!

House is really close to bondi beach to walk! And many restaurants are near to house;-) 
Host is also kind! She explained about nice places to visit!

Gwen and Jim went out of their way to provide me with information on the apartment and neighborhood. They were fast to reply to communication and did everything they could to make sure my stay was comfortable. 
The location is out of this world. Close to good restaurants and bars and a 5 minute walk to the stunning Bondi Beach. 
The apartment is easy to access and comfortable. I would definitely stay here next time I am in Bondi.

Gwen provided great information regarding the apartment and also the surrounding shops and cafes. 10/10 

Was also contactable 24/7 as described. :)

name: Affordable and close to the city!
summary: Comfortable room in a modern apartment near city.
interaction: My boyfriend and I work Mon to Fri so are usually not at home during the day. We can easily be reached on our mobiles if you need any assistance during your stay.
houseRules: No smoking or visitors in the apartment.

host.about: Sydney has been my home for almost 8 years now and I’m still loving this beautiful city.  Glenn grew up here so he’s as local as one can get. We both work full time and enjoy spending the weekends doing outdoor activities or just chilling at home on a wet rainy day.

reviews.txt: Irene is a lovely and very helpfully host with a very nice place, tidy and clean. Recommended!
It was a great stay in Irene's place! The apartment is clean and cozy, located within walking distance from a train station as well as bus station. Both Irene and John are very helpful and welcoming.
Lovely apartment great location Irene was very friendly definitely would recommend
Perfect place to stay a couple of days to visit Sydney ! Irene is an amazing host !
Very clean and comfortable house. Location is  very close to city . The house lady is good to us when we stay there. Lovely Sydney.
The reservation was canceled 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Beautiful condo next to downtown/ Condo bien situé
summary: Mon logement est proche du du fleuve st-laurent, Restaurant Wellington, Brasserie McAuslan, Station Lasalle, Griffintown, Marché Atwater, Downtown, Old Montreal, Bixi, Food store, Liquor store, beer store, Pharmacy. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour le lit confortable, le confort, le BBQ, la proximité de tous les attraits touristiques et les restos. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo, les voyageurs d'affaires et les familles (avec enfants). 10 min du centre-ville
interaction: Phone and email anytime
houseRules: This is my home, so please respect it as you would your own home :) There is no smoking inside or outside.  No pets allowed.  Keep noise to a minimum please (to respect the neighbours). There is absolutely NO PARTYING allowed and NO OUTSIDE GUESTS permitted. Please do not download excessively; my contract is not an unlimited one. Check-in is at the earliest 5 pm.

host.about: Voyageuse dans l'âme, chargée de projets en communications pour pouvoir me payer ces voyages, amoureuse de la nature et des sports particulièrement ceux qui se pratiquent à l'extérieur (ski alpin, hiking, camping, canot, kayak, etc.)

reviews.txt:
This was a great listing and an amazing place to stay. Sofia's place is clean, well decorated and just the right amount of space for 2-4 people. The space felt cozy and we loved it. We were only a bit disappointed that we found out at the last minute that there was no AC (as listed) but Sofia was very understanding and compensated us based on our experience. 

Sofia herself is a great host who is very attentive right from the first moment we wanted the place. She kept in touch by email and text and even checked in with us daily. The instructions she left were clear and she was available to help when we needed anything. The neighbourhood was nice and quiet as well. 

I would definitely stay at this listing again!

Sofia's place was exactly as advertised. It was really clean and her directions were very clear. Sofia kept in contact with us to make sure everything was ok. Her restaurant recommendations were good as well. I would definitely stay at Sofia's place again. I really liked her condo and the neighborhood. The building was very quiet and we enjoyed staying there. 

Thanks again for everything Sofia!
The apartment is great, clean, modern, easy to find, and with all the amenities we needed

We had a beautiful stay. The pictures represent the apartment perfectly. Sofia is a sweetheart and was a pleasure to deal with. The apartment is conveniently located near the highway & the metro. Will definitely try to stay here next time we're in town!
Un logement parfait. Très propre et très  tranquille. On se  sent comme chez soi. On retournera, si les dates sont disponibles. Le contact avec Sofia a été facile.

Place was exactly as advertised. Just outside downtown Montreal and a quick drive into the heart of it. Owner was more than helpful, was available to answer any questions we had for the entirety of our trip. Would highly recommend staying here if you are looking for somewhere close to downtown without paying downtown prices.
Good

Honestly, this is one of the best airbnb experiences I've had so far! Sofia's place is really close to public transit, and she lives in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Although I didn't get to meet her, she made sure everything was ready and easy for us. Check-in was a breeze. I'd definitely try to stay here again whenever I plan another trip to montreal!
Tres beau sejour

Clean place, good owner. :)
Spacious apartment.

name: Beautiful Barra da Tijuca beachfront apart-hotel !
summary: WEEKLY AND MONTHLY DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE (please contact host for calculation over the announced prices) Please note that price is for two occupants at a time (3rd and 4th guests pay 50% of the period rate each). Complimentary: Wireless internet at Reception & Swimming Pool areas; Full gym; Heated swim pool; Sauna (dry & steam); Hot tube; Playground; Game room; Beach towels & umbrellas. Rates for Holidays, Christmas and New Year's require minimum occupancy. Please ask for details.
interaction: Fluent Portuguese, Spanish and English telephone guest support, as needed. Especial assistance by experienced international airline personnel available upon request.
houseRules: A 2 day advance notice for booking is not mandatory, but preferable.  Offered rates are for two occupants at a time, with price increasing 50% for each extra guest. For your safety and comfort, this is a No Smoking place. Enjoy your stay.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Barra da Tijuca - Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil

reviews.txt: O ap é muito bom, recomendo a todos, conversei pelo whats o tempo todo com o anfitrião e nao tive nenhum problema, obrigado por tudo

Excelente comunicação com o anfitrião e sua esposa, bem como, a recepção no Barra Leme Hotel Residence, o qual possui piscina aquecida, hidromassagem, serviço de praia sem custo, academia, salão de jogos, cabeleireiros(custo adicional) e o melhor lugar da praia da Barra (entre o Posto e Posto 2). Local seguro e agradável, com preço muito justo. Parabéns aos anfitriões e obrigado.

name: A lovely cozy apartment near HKU
summary: A very lovely cozy apartment with high profile equipment and property management. Super convenient to everywhere in the city and quite close to HKU university.  PS: The fat cat is excluded so she will be not at home during your stay :)
interaction: I'll try my best to offer any necessary assistance and revert any of your queries soon as possible
houseRules: Maintain its serenity and do not disturb other neighbors.

host.about: After many years of working, travelling and living in different places, I come to understand better of the society and nature. I’m still on the way to know more of my self.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Lucy is a great host. She is so helpful and responds quickly.
Her place is compact with all amenities which I needed. 6-8 minutes to the underground and plenty of good local restaurants around .
Condition of the washroom needed to be improved.

name: Most laid back-quiet place in HK
summary: Welcome to the most convenient yet quiet place in HK. Kennedy town MTR and buses are min away but yet you won't be bother by the noise of the city.
interaction: - Any advice on travel during stay including the best dim sum in town nearby! - Free welcome coffee and towels
houseRules: House Rules Check-in time is 11AM. No smoking No petting & noisy party but feel like home

address.street: Kennedy Town, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Really nice room with good location. Both the host and roommate are friendly and eager to help. I love the dim sum restaurant Felip recommended which is near by the apt. I love the food in HK so much that I plan to visit again. :) Btw, be careful of the mosquitos in HK when U visits in the summer time.
Nice place. Close to the down town. Would stay again :)

Hola a todos! Hemos pasado una semana en casa de luis y su compañero de piso, Camilo. Ambos muy simpáticos, receptivos y nos han ayudado con todo siempre. La casa está cerca del metro Kenedy Town, del tranvía y de numerosos autobuses que pasan por allí. La zona tiene muchos sitios para comer y supermercados. 
La habitación es tal y como se muestra en las fotos, pequeña pero con un colchón cómodo y aire acondicionado. El baño, completo y hemos utilizado incluso la lavadora y la cocina, nos hemos sentido en casa. Gracias chicos! 
Pilar

因为是去探访朋友和欣赏风景所以交通便利对我来说很重要 罗湖口岸出关之后地铁和巴士都很便利,从地铁站出来大概需要步行三分钟就可以到达,期间需要经过长长的台阶,拿着行李可能会劳累一些,房子很好找位于三楼,房东会很详细的安排与介绍,并留下钥匙,浴室很清洁,屋内虽小但五脏俱全,房东还贴心地准备了两个转换插头｡居住的五天确实温馨舒适,如果下次来香港的话我觉得我还是会选择住在这里｡要注意的是房间内两个屋子一个给旅客使用另一个是房东住,有时可能会带gf回来,介意的谨慎选择｡

Great location. Right next to the backside of Victoria Peak so if you're looking for nature you've found it. Very quiet and serene surroundings. Luis is very detailed in how to get here, just follow the instructions he sends you. 
Also right next to the Kennedy-Town MTR stop. Luis is a great guy, very friendly and outgoing and we very much appreciated his hospitality. Hope to stay with him again soon! Thanks!
Close to HKU and Kenndy Town. Nice roommate. Host is quite helpful.

Simply the best for its price among the dozen Airbnb offers in HK I have tried so far. 

The location: very close to MTR station; 7/11 store just down the street (free wifi), a couple of great local restaurants (one offers an awesome 2-person dinner for only 120 HKD, with free wifi), easy access to banks and supermarkets, all within 5-10 minutes walking distance. 

The room: very quiet, clean bedroom and air conditioner (I'm amazed there is no smell at all), comfy living room with kitchen, washing machine (you need that during summer time), and a First aid kit. And you could even find a copy of Animal Farm on the shelf, LOL. This really is what airbnb should offer in the first place, not some small and smelly hostel rooms without a window.

The host: quick response, easy communication, friendly permanent roommate. 

To summarize: awesome place, would definitely come back and also recommend to friends.



在香港住过不下十家的Airbnb平价旅店里,Felipe是我目前的最佳选择｡地点便利,步行五至十分钟可达坚尼地城地铁站｡楼下就有7/11便利店(有免费wifi),数家粉面店､茶餐厅(120闷二人晚餐好超值),Watson､百佳､惠康超市｡Felipe的房间安静､干净,空调无味｡起居室有沙发很舒适,附带厨房､洗衣机､冰箱｡书架上还有动物农场和其他一些书,不知可不可以拿来看｡｡｡与房主沟通很好,回复很快｡永久室友(真*房东)也很友善｡总之,远远好过无窗劏房小旅馆｡强烈推荐｡

Following the instruction that the host send me in advance, I have no difficulty finding the place. What a lovely and cozy home! I really enjoy my trip here. Thanks a lot!
看到中文评价很少,所以我用中文详细介绍一下哈*^_^*这里离坚尼地城地铁站和机场巴士站都很近,步行五分钟左右｡周围社区很安静,晚上可以休息得很好｡屋主细心的准备了液体蚊香,不用担心被蚊子咬｡关键是周围很多好吃的!攻略上有的太兴茶餐厅､新兴食家､源记甜品､德记潮州菜等等都在附近啊,吃得特别开心!推荐大家来啊,屋主很贴心很热情很友善,特别特别温暖!再次感谢!
Was a nice place to stay. In a fairly quiet section of Hong Kong, very easy to get to off the train and airport bus. About 15 minutes to Causeway Bay.

This Airbnb is what this site all about. You get a proper feel for living amongst the locals. The flat was well laid out with everything you need and the instructions from the host were super clear. 

The neighborhood is really friendly, on a rainy day we even got to borrow an umbrella from the downstairs neighbors (using sign language as we don't speak Cantonese) and the food in the area is sublime. Definitely go to the dim sum place they recommend!!! Our best meal while in HK.

name: Beautiful Apt, Tropical Resort, Steps to the Beach
summary: Our nightly rate includes already the mandatory Hawaii State Tax of 14.42%. Spacious 2BR/2BA Vacation Rental Condo in a Beautiful Resort with well-manicured Japanese zen garden. directly across the street from the beach.
interaction: After booking, we will send you all of your check-in instructions via email. We are available during your stay via email and cell phone.
houseRules: 1) CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT:   Check-in time is 4:00pm and later, check-out time is 11:00am or ealier on your departure date. You will receive an email with the check-in instruction of the unit once the reservation is complete. 2) CHECK-OUT PROCEDURES:    Upon check-out please  a) put all perishables and food items in the First aid kit.  b) turn off all lights, fans and air conditioners.  c) place all trash in the trash cans.  d) lock all the doors and leave the keys on the kitchen counter and put the key from the lockbox back into the lockbox. 3) DAMAGES:  Please notify us immediately of any damages to the property. Guests agree that any of her/his group members, including children, and or those who are legally allowed onto the property, shall pay a replacement value and or repair cost for any furniture, fixtures and or fittings being damaged during the term of their stay.  4) NOISE:   Please keep in mind that you are in a long and short term neighborhood. Noise carries easily and we ask

host.about:
Anke Kirchner, R(S) & Property Manager - Next Maui Vacation LLC/ A Division of SRH Inc.

Aloha, I'm Anke, Realtor, surfer, runner & kiteboarder living on Maui. I specialize in buying and selling homes and condos on Maui and I love what I do! 

Love, Live Aloha!

reviews.txt: The codo is very nice, beautiful and spacious. Two bedrooms, which both stayed a decent temperature at night. Also has 2 AC units. Pretty cool balcony. I enjoyed staying on the balcony on my laptop and watching the sunshine or the rain falling. Washer/dryer were nice to have. Anke was extremely responsive to my calls, and even brought over garbage bags when we ran out. I also enjoyed the pool. The condo is within walking distance of a beach, which is nice.

Anke, 
Your place was wonderful for our family. The kids used the pool every day, my parents participated at the ukulele jam session at Keolahou Church, and my wife and I loved running by the beach.  Thank you again for making our stay memorable. 
Aloha, 
jason

We absolutely loved the place! It has everything you might need during your stay. Close to the beach and a short driving distance (~10 minutes) to a number of good restaurants. Anke was super nice and helpful. I highly recommend this place for staying in Maui.
Everything was great!

This condo is amazing and perfect for a one week plus stay. It's very spacious and, with the two AC units plus the ceiling fans, can stay cool despite the hot weather. It's right across the street from the beach and kitty corner to 2 parks. It's also really close to a lot of good eats! It has a full kitchen and comes with cooking utensils which allowed us to cook and prep meals for extended days out (i.e.  Road to Hana). To our surprise, the condo came equipped with beach chairs and a boogie board which we took full advantage of.  It also comes with in-unit laundry and dryer as well as soap and dryer sheets! The resort is very quiet and the people who live there are respectful of quiet hours. You get to meet fellow travelers and residents in the pool / jacuzzi area which is also a plus. All in all, we enjoyed our stay. Just don't forget to bring your own soap and shampoo!
Everything was as described! A very beautiful and clean condo directly at the beach in Kihei. Anke was also very responsive and helpful, would love to come back any time!

Anke communicated very well with me prior to arriving.  She sent me documents that gave me clear directions to the condo.  Once I arrived I noticed that I did not need anything as everything I could possibly need was at my finger tips.  I will definitely stay at this condo again.   Thank you Anke.

Our stay at Kihei Resort was wonderful. The place was perfect for the 4 of us. The place was spacious, clean, comfortable, quiet and well located. The condo had many amenities such as the community pool and free guest parking and was situated 5-15 mins drive from many eateries and stores. The beach is walking distance away across the street and Wailea is only about a 10-15 drive away as well. Anke was a great host giving us all the necessary information we would need as well as checking up on us via message during our stay to make sure all was fine. Definitely recommend this place for travelers! In the heart of Kihei and close to the airport and other attractions.

This is a beautiful place by a beautiful beach with great amenities, like hot tub and swimming pool. You probably don't need them though. Just walking across the street, you can snorkel in waist deep blue water, where I saw five turtles and a lot of fish. It is very safe for kids or people don't swim. 

The place provides enough towels so you don't need to pack them. Washer and dryer is conveniently located in the unit - not those coin operating ones. 

Anke is very nice too. We got a box of chocolate as gift when we arrived :)

Everything was exactly as described and we were made to feel welcome immediately with a nice little care package and local tour guide notebook!

The Kihei resort is amazing and very private and low key and relaxing.  The spa and pool area is great at the end of a long day of adventures.

I would recommend Anke and her property to anyone!

name: Double Suite, with private bathroom.
summary: Beautiful sunny apartment  decorated with a vintage style in one of the best areas of Barcelona, well located,  close to the center but in a quiet neighborhood.
interaction: We let you go by yourself...but always we can go out and take a beer together.
houseRules: No drugs  No smoke No partys

host.about:
Somos Mario y Eva, vivimos en Barcelona desde hace seis años, y nos encanta esta ciudad, podemos recomendarte sitios, y ayudarte para que tu visita en Barcelona sea lo mas placentera posible.
Nosotros estudiamos y trabajamos, nos gusta el arte, la cultura, la naturaleza, conocer personas nuevas, y compartir.

reviews.txt: Il nostro soggiorno è stato molto bello, lei è stata molto disponibile. L'appartamento era molto pulito e in una posizione abbastanza centrale (a una quindicina di minuti dalla rambla a piedi). Ottimo!

Ottima posizione e in una zona tranquilla e sicura. Molto vicino alla metro e a tante attrazioni turistiche che si possono raggiungere facilmente a piedi (massimo 25 minuti). Ho davvero apprezzato la pulizia degli spazi! Ottimo in tutto!
Zona tranquila. Muy bien comunicada. Nos movimos caminando a todos lados.

name: Bundeena Garden Studio near beaches
summary: Light and stylish self-contained studio, perfect for that out-of-town break. Just 1-2 minutes walk to pristine beaches, close to Royal National Park bush walks. Located in Neil St, very close to Gunyah beach. Spacious and comfortable bed-living room (4x6m), kitchen and bathroom, shady deck with lush garden outlook. Please note that current construction work on an adjacent block may cause some noise on week days 7am-5pm. 10% discount for stays of 4 nights or more.
interaction: We live in the main house on the same property but guests have their own access through the garden and do not need to interact, however we are available to answer any questions.
houseRules: House rules for Bundeena Garden Studio: Please read this carefully before your visit so you know what to expect. If you need anything at all or have any other questions, please don't be afraid to ask – we want to make sure you enjoy your visit ☺  • CHECK IN/OUT  Please advise of your time of arrival by text message or email. Check in is usually after 2pm, check out is normally before 12pm (noon), but these can be negotiated if there are not adjacent bookings. • KEY You can pick up the key from us in the main house, or will be advised where to pick up if we are not at home. Ensure when you leave the studio that the doors are locked. • YOUR ROOM Sheets are changed for each visitor, but not the bedcover and cushion covers, so please keep them clean. The room is not serviced during your stay, so please hang towels for re-use. • FACILITIES A broom is provided – a mop and vacuum cleaner available on request. There is a clothes airer in the kitchen, and also retractable washing line under the

host.about: I have lived with my husband Chris in Bundeena for 28 years, bringing up our two sons who have now left home. We are artists and educators. We love photography, music, food, movies and travel, and believe you are never too old for the next adventure.

reviews.txt: Belinda and her husband were warm and friendly hosts during our stay and the clean, beautifully designed and cosey but spacious studio was everything we could have wanted for a quiet weekend away. We enjoyed watching the sunset at Port Hacking, a lovely dock across the road from Belinda's home and driving further south through the National Park. Highly Recommended for a relaxing weekend trip just an hour away from Sydney.

Bundeena is beautiful. The perfect spot for an easy weekend away from the constant noise of the city. And Belinda and Chris' Garden cottage is a fantastic place to spend time. Stones throw from the beach and beautiful coastal walks, but completely private in a little garden oasis. Birds everywhere. The cottage is fitted out beautifully, with thoughtfulness and great taste. We would love to return. And next time we're hoping for better luck spotting whales!

Bundeena and Royal National Park is a wonderful getaway from Sydney. Belinda and Chris' garden studio is separate from the house. Staying there was perfect -  It was cosy and inviting, well-equipped and had everything we needed. The porch overlooking the garden was peaceful while having a morning coffee, birds chirping... We walked along Jibbon's Beach the first day, and then to Marley Beach the second day - sighting migrating whales along the way! Very ideal for exploring Royal National Park, and a short walking distance from the ferry. Belinda was a wonderful host, friendly and available whenever needed. Thanks for having us!

Belinda and Chris are lovely people and very welcoming hosts. They were friendly, prompt in their communications, and provided us with a warm, quiet and cosy space for a winter getaway. Their studio is private, very well decked out, and closely situated to the beaches and bushwalks in Bundeena. Thanks for the wonderful weekend away :)

Belinda was vibrant and welcoming. The studio is lovely, private and decked out with everything you need for a cosy weekend away - there was even a fire pit which Belinda generously allowed us to use. The location is gorgeous, Bundeena is so relaxing, I didn't want to leave!

The Bundeena garden studio was a delight to stay at. Beautifully renovated, it is light and spacious. It has a very comfy bed in a peaceful environment. A lovely place to wake up to. 
Belinda is lovely and friendly and made the stay easy and comfortable.
An easy place to holiday and one we will be recommending to our Bundeena-bound friends!
I look forward to returning one day soon.

We loved our stay at Bundeena! Belinda's cottage was beautifully presented with quality comforts, privacy and has all the amenities you could need; perfect for a couple's getaway. The location is ideal just a short stroll to the beautiful beaches, bushwalking and dining. We fell in love with the area and look forward to returning there many times. Thank you for having us, we had a wonderful weekend!

Hi All, for those wanting a hideaway with the options of city experience if needed, then a cosy bungalow in Bundeena is a must. It was a lovely warm space with the fresh air or Bundeena and modern facilities. The kitchenette and bathroom were easy to use and made my life so easy. With private access it leaves you free to enjoy the environs on your own terms. The beach is a stones through away. I would love to have stayed longer. It is a quiet refreshing space in which to contemplate. A ferry ride to Cronulla is available if one needs to re-quaint once self with urban life, with the addition of train to CBD if needed. I highly recommend for those who have the time to relax and enjoy. Cheers, Brendan.

We've stayed at a few AirBNB places now and this has been the best so far. Everything was as promised and more. The cabin is a renovated artist's studio at the back of the garden, secluded and private behind trees. Belinda, the host, was lovely and welcoming and gave us some advice for how to best take advantage of the natural surrounds and events that were on in town.

The amenities were clean and exactly like the photos. We were impressed with the host's taste in DVDs and books provided for our use. 

We caught the ferry to Cronulla for the day ($12.60 return for an adult, must have cash to pay on the boat - a bit steep but worth it) and had a wonderful time enjoying the spring fair.

All in all, the host's made our stay extremely comfortable and gave us the privacy we needed to fully enjoy our stay.

Thank you Belinda and Chris!

Hi Belinda, I'd like to thank you allowing us to stay in your beautiful studio. It had all the necessities and was in an amazing location near the beach. Just perfect for our little weekend away! Your artwork is very fascinating as well, I will get in touch with you about those shortly :) thanks again and hopefully we will come back again in the future!

name: João´s beach house
summary: Amazing apartment by the beach, excellent for vacations or work.  Recently renovated with everything you will need.  Cleaned and sanitized by a professional. Next to restaurants, bars, shopping, sport activities.. Free pickup from the airport, train or BUS station.  Free early check-in and late check-out, due to availability from other reservations. It´s a great space in a great neighborhood. I love it and I hope you will too! Check new apartment in the same building: https://abnb.me/9HC720e97L
interaction: I live very nearby and I know my way around. You can reach me - call or text - just about anytime with needs or questions.
houseRules: I kindly request you not to smoke inside the house, but you can smoke in the balcony outside.

host.about:
Hello
My name is João, and I'm from Porto, Portugal.
Love to travel but always happy when I get back home.
Surfer for the last 27 years and IRONMAN finisher ;)))
I´m looking forward to receive you in my house.
También hablo español.

reviews.txt:
Hôte très sympathique.
Appartement avec une vue magnifique.
Séjour agréable.

DEFINITIVAMENTE LA EXPERIENCIA HA SIDO AGRADABLE Y FANTÁSTICA EN PORTUGAL, EN CUANTO A SU ATENCIÓN DE NUESTRO ANFITRIÓN A SIDO 100% ATENTO. NOS FACILITO MUCHA INFORMACION SOBRE LOS PUNTOS MAS TURISTICOS .
SIEMPRE ESTUVO PENDIENTE DE NOSOTROS DURANTE NUESTRA ESTANCIA EN PORTUGAL, NO NOS HIZO FALTA NADA.
TIENE LA MEJOR COMUNICACIÓN DE TRANSPORTES EN AUTOBÚS AL CENTRO.
SU CASA TIENE LAS MEJORES VISTAS AL MAR TAL Y COMO SE VEN EN LAS FOTOS, PERSONALMENTE ME FASCINO... SI OS ENCANTA LA PLAYA OS RECOMIENDO QUE RESERVEN CON JOAO!!
MUITO OBRIGADO POR HACER AGRADABLE NUESTRA ESTANCIA Y FACILITARNOS TODO, E MUITA SORTE JOAO !!

Soggiorno fantastico! Siamo arrivati verso le 7 di sera con un ritardo di 3 ore rispetto all'ora stabilita e Joao si è messo a disposizione venendo a prenderci alla stazione e portandoci direttamente al suo appartamento. L'appartamento era pulitissimo e dotato di tutti i comfort, in più Joao ci ha fatto trovare già molto cibo all'interno dell'appartamento e ci ha descritto tutti i posti da visitare migliori spiegandoci anche tutti i mezzi di trasporto da utilizzare.
L'appartamento è a dir poco spettacolare con una bellissima vista sull'oceano.
Dalla posizione di Joao possiamo raggiungere in 20 minuti il centro di porto in bus ed in più subito sotto casa sua c'è un ristorante sushi che è buonissimo e di ottima qualità più moltissimi altri ottimi ristoranti e bar dove fare un buon aperitivo.
Joao è una persona disponibile e ad ogni evenienza ti risponde subito dandoti una mano.
Per finire in bellezza, l'ultimo giorno ci ha anche offerto il taxi per andare all'aereoporto.
La sua ospitalità ha superato in ogni modo le nostre aspettative. 
Esperienza assolutamente consigliata e da ripetere!
Un saluto e un grazie a Joao dall'Italia.

It was amazing from the moment we walked in. João was an amazing host and the apartment was an absolute delight. The views from the balcony were just gorgeous. The apartment had everything that was needed and more. It was a slice of paradise. Really enjoyed our time their and look forward to going there again in the future. I would highly recommend it to anyone. A pure delight.

João is an excellent Host in true Portuguese tradition. The house in modern and adapted for everyones requirements. I had spent some time with my Grandparents at his house and even though they are nearing 80, accessibility was as easy as home. Complemented by his service was the well thought out location and layout of the house. Stunning beach views and a stones throw away from relaxation in the sun.

Apartamento cômodo e acolhedor, vista maravilhosa, anfitrião simpatico...
Experiência a repetir...
Obrigado

A very nice stay in Porto and in Joao's flat. The apartment was very big, clean and à lot of utilities and equipments. Moreover, the view on océan is fantastic and Joao gave us a lot of advices and useful tips. Thanks a lot again and à nice place to go
We loved our stay at Joao's beach house! He is an awesome host. So helpful. And it is an amazing spot. Hopefully we will be back some day soon!

Perfect hosting and view to die for.
It's a modern 5th floor apartment looking out to the port and end of the beach. Lots of ships coming and going to view.
Joao makes every effort to make hosts comfortable and is very available for enquiries. We felt we were treated royally. 
The apartment is well equipped for self catering and a well stocked larder.  Joao made some very good local restaurant (many in close proximity ) recommendations too. Major Supermarket other end of beach so handy to have bikes as transport. 
Everything made available from washing machine to bedding. Massive walk in wardrobe. Hot water reliable. 
His knowledge of Porto and provision of maps and information including travel cards was very helpful. There is a bus stop very close which takes you into the city in about 40 minutes for only €1.85. Matosinhos is a 20 minute walk away where you can pick up Metro, visit a market or eat at the many fish restaurants (fresh from fish market adjacent).
We made good use of the bikes and this saved us time and expense also.
We took the brilliant cycle way (no hills!) along the coast for about 20 km (Vila do Conde and beyond). Beaches and cafes all the way so a great escape for the day.
Unfortunate the lift not always working but we survived and our fitness improved. 
Probably true of all apartments of any height, you do get some road noise and barking/ howling from local dogs.
Happy to return to what became home away from home for nearly 2 weeks.
Thankyou Joao for making it possible.

Joao is a great host! He met with us at the apartment and help us bring the luggage up. There was food for us to use at our arrival so we did not have to run at the convenient store right away. Everything is just as explained, very clean and modern. We walk on the beach and used the bikes to go to Porto! We loved our stay!

name: Beautiful Ensuite Room -Easy access to city
summary: The house is big, clean and spacious, with all modern amenities,multiple living rooms, and large courtyard w/ bbq.  Ensuite Room with private balcony, walk in wardrobe & TV . It will feel like staying in a hotel room  :) Express buses to the city and 1 stop to central on the train.
interaction: You will interact with me. I'm always available to offer help if needed on getting around or showing the best cafes and bars in the area.
houseRules: Please treat the house as if it were your own.

host.about: I'm new to Airbnb and so far I'm loving the experience as I've met some gorgeous people. I'm an outgoing friendly person who enjoys travel, great wine & food and meeting new people.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 186 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Midillis 202 (Double Room)
summary: A double room with its own ensuite shower and bathroom. One of four rooms in our premesis. We are located 5 minutes away from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia at the center of Sultanahmet, Istanbul's major tourist area. From here you can easily take the tram to explore other areas of Istanbul.
interaction: We run a travel agent from the same premises so can offer you the best advice for how to see the sights of Istanbul, suggest tours and trips in Istanbul and farther afield. We also run a coffee shop from the premises.

reviews.txt: The house is really near to the main sightseeings of istanbul old city, with a nice terrace. The hosts are confortable and polite. I had really good time and was glad choosing Kamuran's flat.

Kamuran is very kind host. She gave us full information and support us all the way from airport to the end of our trip. Apartment looks smaller than on photo but it's very clean and light. Looks like new shower installed in the room.  Absolutely unbelievable  view from terrace: one side is Blue Mosque, another is seaside. This apartment lefts only positive emotion for us. Just 2 min walk and you are in the heart of the Old sity. Very suitable for peoples who first time in Istanbul. 
P.S. Be ready for morning praying  in the Blue  Mosque )

Nice and simple room. Good central location in Sultanahmad. Just a short walk to the blue mosque and Hajia Sofia through a nice bazar. The rooms facing the street side are a bit noisy from the street traffic, so if you want a quite room, get the ones facing the garden. There is a washer and a small kitchen upstairs that you can use, and it connects to a terrace. Kamuran welcomed us when we got there and showed us our room. She's usually in the travel agency office downstairs so you can reach her easily if you need anything and get some recommendations on what to do or where to go. Word of advice, don't use their airport transfer car because it's more expensive then just getting a taxi from the airport (taxis run about 50 TL to Sultanahmed and their car transfer is 20$ which is about 72 TL ). We also had to wait 30 minutes outside the airport for the driver to pick us up.

Все было круто, расположение отличное, единственное что полотенца за 3 дня ни разу не поменяли и дверь тонкая, что если кто то ночью ходил- я просыпался. А так за эти деньги просто супер, уютно было очень, все очень чисто, в ванной все выбелено было. Женщина очень приятная, разрешила багаж оставить у нее, пока мы полдня гуляли по городу. Спасибо ей огромное!)
Molt correcte! Hem estat molt cómodes. I el servici per part dels anfitrions ha estat mol amable. Habitació recomanable 100%

We booked this room for 5 days because we wanted to split our visit to Istanbul between the Sultanahmet area and the Taksim area. But as soon as we got here, we knew that this is where we wanna be and so extended our stay. The emplacement of this place is just PERFECT. We have walked all over from here, the metro stop is also close. There is a small kitchen and laundry place on the roof, which was great. Also the view is beautiful. ONE small inconvenience would be the morning noises from the street, but that didn't keep us from having a great stay here. I recommend it, and would certainly stay here again if I ever visit Istanbul again!

We had an amazing time at one of the rooms rented by Kamuran , when we saw the place for the first time we were surprise by the view on the blue mosque and the sea from the roof terrace ,we were having our breakfasts here and enjoying a beer/ wine in the night. The room was very clean we had everything ,even a shower gels and hairdryer, iron,washing machine,we could stuck over food in the fridge that was very useful. During our stay it was very hot in Istanbul so air-conditioning was a life saviour. For all the questions we had about where to go and how to get we got the most detailed explanation,me and my boyfriend couldn't imagine best host then that. All the problems you might possibly have with the room will be solved in a blink of an eye! Location was more then just great, Sultanahmet is the best district to have all the points of interest around you, Hagia Sofia 10min,Blue mosque 7 min ,tram station 8min,lots of place to eat around, only be weary Turkish people(sellers/restaurants) cheat the whole time ,don't order a beer in the restaurant without asking the price ,don't pick up a brush from the shoe cleaning man when he dropped it,in Istanbul is a lot of scam is going on!

Location is just awesome, it's really 2 min walk to Blue Mosque. Many shops, cafes, markets are nearby, which is so much convenient. Approximately 7-10 min walk to tram stop, also so cool. And it's a magnificent atmosphere there. We already miss this place. Host are so nice people, which will be glad to help you with everything. The view from the top is amazing. The room is small, but very clean and cozy. There are candles in rooms which make chill and warm atmosphere. Highly recommend to my friends and will definitely cone back again!
Great location. Easy to walk to many areas of Istanbul

Es war einfach richtig schön und vor allem richtig sauber!! 
Ich würde immer wieder dahin gehen. 
Auch in der Straße, die Menschen sind sehr Freundlich und man wird immer begrüßt wenn man aus dem Haus geht.
Wir hatten alles in der Nähe und konnten auch zu der Bahn in dem wir nur 3 minuten gelaufen sind.

name: Your spot in Copacabana
summary: Having a large airy living room. The apartment is well divided. Fully furnished and cozy. The building has a 24h doorman and camera services in the corridors. It is very well located, close to the beach, restaurants, pubs and several shops and supermarkets. And it offers a good mobility being close to the subway.
interaction: I am available to assist and answer questions regarding the use of the apartment and everything we can to make your stay a success!
houseRules: Espero que você sinta-se em casa, e cuide do meu apartamento como se fosse seu.  É proibido fumar, trazer animais de estimação, trazer pessoas não autorizadas( que não sejam os hóspedes previamente informados), fazer festinhas  e fazer barulho após as 22hs. Por motivo de segurança, desligue luz e ar condicionado sempre que sair do apartamento.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Tenho muito prazer em fazer novos amigos, com outras culturas, informações e vivências. Gosto de ser uma anfitriã atenciosa e disponível. O que estiver ao meu alcance tenha certeza que será feito, para tornar sua estadia no Rio inesquecível.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Ana Lucia made us feel right at home with fresh fruit and snacks! The apt is blocks away from the beach, near tons of great food (Go to Amir and Galeto Sats, thank me later) and plenty of places to hang out with locals (Bip Bip). Highly recommend staying here for your visit to Copacabana.
Ana Lucia foi muito prestativa, nos recebeu super bem, apartamento bem equipado e bem localizado, próximo a praia, transporte público, restaurantes...superou todas as nossas expectativas!!
Ana Lúcia foi super atenciosa, rápida nas respostas e flexível com meus horários de check-in e check-out. O apartamento é ótimo e super bem localizado!
muito bom
Ana Lúcia nos atendeu muito bem e tirou todas as dúvidas da estadia, além de nos orientar em algumas questões. Parabéns pelo ótimo atendimento!
Adorei!
Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado e em ótima localização

Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado, limpo, confortável. Localização perfeita, muitos comércios na redondeza, perto da praia.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela anfitriã que foi bem flexível com o horário de checkin.

name: Stylish Flat in Center of Fashion
summary: The apartment is just 5 min.s from Tesvikiye mosque, the metro station is 15 min.s away by walking. Nisantasi is surrounded by trendy cafés, restaurants, nightclubs and luxury shopping, the apartment is located in the in the most prestigious neighborhood in Istanbul. It has one bedroom, one living room very bright that related to an open kitchen.
interaction: I'll be available to help my guests during their stay.
houseRules: no smoking. no pets. no party.

host.about:
I have an accessories brand called as Tukutukum.
I love travelling, art and fashion.
Never be bored of discovering new cultures.

reviews.txt: The appartment is great! We visited with 3 people and really loved the appartment. At arrival we where received very friendly. Communication was quick and easy with Tugba. Beşiktaş is nice neighborhood with lots of small shops and cafes.
Tugba was an amazing host, very cheerful and warm. We felt at home in her flat that has a great location, close to nice cafés and restaurants. Thanks a lot.
It was a great stay, and Tugba is a wonderful host. Thank you!
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tugba's place was great and as described.  It's a small, but very nice and comfortable one bedroom in a great location.  Though it says Besiktas in the listing, this place is central Tesvikiye/Nisantisi and the walk to anything you'd need is extremely short.

The apartment is really cozy and exactly as described and shown in the pictures. There are a lot of nice bars, restaurants and cafes in the area - walking distance from the apartment. We got a very warm welcome with fruits and drinks and recommendations. Would come back!

Nisantasi, Istanbul'da ulasim acisindan cok avantajli bir yer. Tugba'nin evi de Nisantasi icerisinde cok avantajli bir yerde. Bircok aktivite ve ilgi cekici yere yurume mesafesinde. Taksi ile ulasim cok kolay. Asansor ve klima olmamasi biraz caninizi sikabilir ancak bu bilgi zaten onceden veriliyor.
Thank you! I like this apartment so much!

Great people! Very hospitable and helpful! We had a great experience at her place! The place is very clean and very beautiful! It exactly the same as in the photos. It is in a very nice area to. I highly recommend this place! Tugba is a great host! Thank you Tugba!
Tugba hanima tesekkur ederim.

name: Merkez'de Ferah BAHÇELİ DAİRE ! Sporsalonu/ 1+1
summary: Şişli merkezi konumda sakin bir mahallede Otoparklı Dairedir. Dairenin 1+1 , kendine ait özel bahçesi bulunmaktadır.
interaction: Misafirlerim gerek Ev gerekse genel herhangi bir sıkıntı olduğunda bana telefon ile ulaşabilirler. Elimden geldiğince yardımcı olmaya çalışırım.

reviews.txt: Ev fotoğraflarda gördüğümüz gibiydi. Yatak odasında ki yatak ve yastıklar rahat değildi. Temizlik olarakta eksikleri vardı. Bina otoparkı kullanılabilir yazıyordu, fakat otoparkın dışarıdan kullanılamayacağını söyledi. Onun dışında kalınabilecek bir yer.

Thank u!
For sure will be there again :)
Irmac is a great host. Very nice and pleasant and always responsive.

name: 20% off - Cozy Studio Near Subway with Wifi LT4
summary: Please contact me before booking :) Location, location, location!! Only 1 block to Sai Ying Pun MTR Station and a few minutes ride to Macau Ferry Terminal, Airport Express HK Station and International Finance Centre (IFC). Nearby Buses to IFC, ICC, Airport express train.   Building has doorman and an elevator.
interaction: Let me know if you would like a local tour. My best friend Olivia used to work for Expedia and now running her own local tour startup.  Happy to introduce.
houseRules: Contact me before booking : )

host.about:
I've often thought that one of the best things about traveling the world is getting to meet new people with exciting stories and backgrounds. Hosting on Airbnb gives me the chance to do that every day! 

I love traveling, playing guitar and drums, playing all kinds of sports, cooking, going to the beach, learning about everything I can, and pursuing new business ideas! And traveling! 

Let me know when you are coming to Hong Kong and I will do my best to help make arrangements for you! This an amazing city, and whether you are coming for the first time or the fiftieth, you can always find something new! 

See you soon and safe travels! 

-Mark

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Mark is very helpful n friendly! The location of the accommodation is perfect, close to Soho n central. Not to mention the tram station is just opposite the building n the mtr is nearby!
Really cozy and awesome apartment on a really convenient and authentic location. Easy check-in/check-out with no keys required -> really handy. And my favorite coffee shop now is just 2 mins away :)
Very nice service, welcoming environment, communicative owner.
本次和太太旅行對這個小公寓很滿意,環境舒適,交通便利,門口就有港鐵和叮叮車｡Mark的服務很周到｡唯一的遺憾就是電視無法觀看,可能是遙控器問題｡

I had a very good time at Mark’s studio . The flat is very well located in Hong Kong . Only two subway station to Central . There is also the tram line to discover the island . The area is quiet if you compare to busiest area in HK . It is also a good mix of Chinese culture (restaurants,shops) and trendy western venues ( good eateries,bars). Mark is a great host always answering any request or question I had . Overall a great experience in this city and a great stay .
Quemeneur Philippe
Enjoyed staying at Mark's place. Amazing host!
Very good!
Mark's studio is modern. It is very close to MTR, tram and bus stops. There are lots of nice restaurants and bars close by. He also is good at sending information

When you're not used to Hong Kong, this place is of course small for a relatively high price, but in HK this is not at all unusual. The quality of the place is very high - it is nicely designed, in a great location, well taken care of, and I found it quite comfortable. I loved the feeling of being in the middle of Hong Kong when you step out of the door and the fact that it is a modern apartment but in an older building means that it is comfortable, yet feels very local. The size is really small, but the way the space is used is very clever.

There are multiple units and not all of them seem to have windows. Mine did, with a nice view of opposite flats and Des Voeux Rd.

I would definitely recommend this place.

name: Family Matters | Historic Centre
summary: Designed to be suitable for couples, individual adventures and families (with kids).
interaction: I'm always here for my guests!  You can contact me during your stay through the Airbnb platform, cellphone, email, iMessage, SMS and (Hidden by Airbnb) .
houseRules: - The apartment will be cleaned before the arrival of each guest;  - On leaving, the guest must leave the apartment without waste, all the lights turned off and windows closed;  - Always maintain the front door of the building closed;  - Check-in from 3pm and check-out until 11am (other hours may be agreed when possible);  - Report if some incident happens;  - The furniture of the apartment should be left in the same places where you found them-

host.about: I have always lived in Porto, for me it's the most beautiful city in the world. I also like to travel and meet new people. Like good food, radical sports and motorcycling. One day I'm going to do the Dakar.

reviews.txt: The flat is really lovely as seen in pictures. It's new, clean and well located, close to the centre, shops and restaurants. We had a great time staying there. Tomas was very nice and incredibly helpful introducing the main attractions in town. He made sure we had everything we needed, welcoming us with complementary tea and biscuits. He was a wonderful host and genuinely cares about the property and people renting it out.  I recommend this place!
Tomás no pudo estar presente el día de la entrega de las llaves, pero una amiga suya quedó con nosotros para darnoslas, así que todo perfecto, nuestra estancia fue corta pero muy buena.

It was an amazing stay at Tomas's. Really beautiful apartment, right in the middle of the centre. Communication 1A!
Will def. come back-
Nous avons été très bien accueilli à Porto, l'appartement se situe au 3 ème étage. Si vous aimez le réveil des mouettes c'est idéal. Rien à redire hormis le petit problème de colonisation de fourmis.

Clean, attractive remodel, comfortable sleep accommodations for at least five people. Tastefully decorated, fun and funky. Great location, near top sites and restaurants, cafes. Tomas was very responsive and accommodating; he forwarded a helpful info guide, and in the flat had an even more helpful book full of suggestions and commentary on local restaurants and sites. The part of town can be noisy - especially the seagulls! - and lots of sound leakage from other flats, so earplugs may be helpful at night. Though that's true of most central city accommodations.
