Fantastic host, great apartment.

Logements très bien situé dans un quartier agréable.  Le métro est cependant un peu loin.
Hôte sympathique et discrète.

name: Charming Spacious Park Slope Studio
summary: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants.
interaction: We are a family of three living upstairs (with a cat who is not allowed into the rental apartment), so while we are of course busy with our daily routine, please don’t hesitate to contact us by phone, text, or e-mail if there are any problems, items missing, or other questions. If by chance you are staying while we are out of town, we will give you the contact information of someone who can help.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt:
Ildiko and her space were nothing short of great.

I had rented out the space under unusual circumstances, likely out of the ordinary compared to most Airbnb reservations. Ildiko was super accommodating and understanding throughout our time in her space.

Ildiko met me at the apartment and personally showed me around the space. The apartment is quite a bit larger than the photos made it seem, and I was very comfortable here. It's also on the first floor, which is nice if you have heavy suitcases (it gets difficult lugging stuff up three flights of stairs). Even though it's on street level, the street is a quiet / residential one, and the entrance is some distance from the sidewalk—so noise is not an issue. There are very nice restaurants and cafes less than a block or two away. Ildiko went the extra mile in stocking the apartment with essential items, including a fully stocked first-aid kit(!). Although I had office space in Manhattan, I spent all of my time working from home, because I didn't want to leave the house or this neighborhood. Prospect Park is also very close, which makes for a nice place to go for a walk and clear the mind. Definitely one of the nicest and most pleasant airbnb experiences I've had so far!

This was a spacious, clean apartment in a great neighborhood. The area is quiet, but with many small shops, restaurants and cafes. The owner was friendly and available if needed, and checking in and out was a breeze. I highly recommend staying here.

A fantastic place and the perfect base for time in New York.  Downtown Manhattan is but 25 minutes by the F train (a four minute walk from the apartment) and Ilkido could not have been more helpful.  A really lovely space and I'd highly recommend it - next time I'm here, I'll be checking this place out first!

Apartment is excellent! Good space and very clean. Bathroom is very quite comfortable. The location is very good if you want to wonder around Park slope and other areas of Brooklyn. 

Ildiko was always attentive and helpful.

My wife and I enjoyed staying at lldiko's apartment. It was quite comfortable for us although we did not spend a lot of time there. It was very convenient to come and go and we appreciated the privacy and independence. Ron Walker

Ildiko est très accueillante ! Le quartier super , l appartement très confortable avec les commodités a porté de mains  ( restorants , métros ) 
Une adresse a ne pas manquer  !

My mum had wonderful time at this lovely suited apartment in Park Slope. It was her first airbnb-booking and she loved it. The spacious rooms were clean and tidy. The kitchen and dining area are huge and the whole apartment can easily be used by more than one people. Ildiko was very helpful with every step of our journey and easy to talk to. We highly recommend a stay at this apartment.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! Very spacious, looked bigger than pictured, very clean and had everything I needed. It also had an outside patio, which I thought was great. It is located in the nice Park Slope area, which is very quiet, safe and has a lot of nice restaurants nearby.  Ildiko  personally welcomed me and showed me everything, she was constantly checking to see if I was comfortable. Such a great lady! Overall perfect experience, wonderful host! Definitely will be staying there next time I am in NY.
the apt was very nice decorated and spacious. very clean. bed was comfortable. neighborhood is great. the host is very nice. I def recommend this apt to enjoy brooklyn!

name: Artist Garden Duplex Ft. Greene - 2.5 Bedroom
summary: Beautifully renovated Brownstone garden duplex - BEST BLOCK in Ft. Greene (S Portland Ave). High end renovation: full kitchen, private entrance, master bedroom with Queen bed, glass partition, study (extra bed - the "half bedroom"), glass doors to patio/garden. Living room sofa opens to Queen. Cellar: TV room, extra sleep quarters (3 twins or  king), bath w shower . Perfect for 1 - 2 couples or families.  5 minutes to BAM, subways, restaurants, park, farmer's market. Superb base for NY vacation.
interaction: I'm happy to help either before you arrive or once you are here! I live upstairs and own the Brownstone.
houseRules: The house can't accept pets and no smoking except outside. No extra guests.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Beautiful place, would definitely come back!

Great apartment, great location! The flat is newly remodeled and everything is brand new and clean. It is very spacious- perfect for our group of 2 adults, 2 small children. The location is a very safe neighborhood, beautiful block and very near restaurants, parks. Miriam was readily available and her list of restaurants, shops was helpful. The check in/out was seamless. We will definitely stay there again- hopefully for longer.
Our family of 4 enjoyed staying at Miriam's. Very close to subway or trains, it is a nice and calm location if you wants to visit NYC (20 mins from Wall St) and Brooklyn wich is a very nice aera.

Miriam was excellent. It was my first time using airbnb and it was for work colleagues of mine.  I can only go by what my colleagues said and it was  absolutely awesome. They were able to cook dinner and save us money instead of having them eat out everynight. They loved the space and wanted to stay longer.  It was nice and convienent to our marina on pier 5!

I used to live in the neighborhood and can attest Miriam's place is on a top notch street in an amazing location! She did a great job furnishing the apartment and making the place comfortable for a family stay. Miriam was also very accommodating and didn't hesitate to turn up the heat for our unseasonably cold visit. We'd love to stay here again on our next Brooklyn visit!

Miriam ha estat una bona amfitriona. La comunicació sempre ha estat immediata i positiva. Ha estat molt respectuosa amb la nostra intimitat i ens ha obsequiat amb diferents detalls.
L'apartament ocupa la part baixa d'una típica casa "Brownstone". Disposa d'un jardinet al darrer ideal per les èpoques de temperatura suau.
La ubicació és immillorable. Hi ha moltes línies de metro a tocar de l'apartament. En 20-25 minuts s'arriba a Manhattan. Està ubicat a un barri de Brooklyn molt ben situat. L'ambient és molt bo i està ple d'opcions al voltant.
Cal tenir en compte que disposa d'una habitació doble per allotjar a dues persones i que la resta s'hauran d'acomodar en un sofà llit i en uns futons a terra en el soterrani de l'habitatge. En el soterrani, sense finestres, s'ubica la sala de màquines, canonades, un traster i un petit bany.
A la penúltima nit hi va haver una inesperada fuita d'aigua al soterrani que Miriam i la seva família van resoldre molt ràpidament.

Hem estat 12 dies a l'apartament i, en general, ha estat molt positiu.

We had a wonderful stay at Miriam's apartment in Ft. Greene.  She made us feel perfectly welcomed from the beginning and throughout our stay.  The apartment was perfect for our family of 4 as it was clean, comfortable, and spacious. Miriam was also very flexible in allowing us to have a small celebration for my 40th birthday with friends and family at the apartment.  The apartment proved to be perfect for our gathering because of its amazing location (especially with its proximity to the park, playgrounds, and other local businesses) and its spaciousness and comfort.  We would happily stay at Miriam's apartment on future trips to Brooklyn and strongly recommend it to others.  Thank you Miriam!

Míriam is a marvelous host. 
Also her apartment is amazing! We rented there for 10 days. 
Everything is exactly what she described, and more. 
If you want to experience the Brooklyn life style, here you will have it!  Beautiful markets, facilities, subway, neighborhood.

We made this apartment our Christmas Central gathering spot. The kitchen is very well equipped for cooking as well as serving-dishes and glassware enough for our crowd. The little things were appreciated-enough hangers in the coat closet to stow our coats, dishwashing detergent under the sink, so we didn't have to buy that at the market. Really nice linens on the beds, plenty of towels, good lighting. Amazing main bathroom shower-we took pictures of it! 
Great closet space, again with coat hangers. Off of the main bedroom, there is an away space-office type room. My husband used it to meditate, but it'd be great for any kind of quiet space. We didn't use the courtyard, but it would be so nice to utilize in milder weather. 
We didn't see Miriam, but she was very good at communicating by email.
Great host and excellent communication.

name: A Casa Alegre é um apartamento T1.
summary: Para 2 pessoas. Vista de mar a 150 mts. Prédio com 2 elevadores. Tem: - quarto com roupeiro e cama de casal (colchão magnetizado); - cozinha: placa de discos, exaustor, frigorifico, micro-ondas e torradeira; casa de banho completa; - sala e varanda.
interaction: Terá à sua disposição um prospeto turístico da vila.
houseRules: Espero que tratem a minha casa bem, respeitando os objetos que ela contem e dos quais vão usufruir. Não fumar. Não são permitidas festas. Não se aceitam animais. Não é permitido fazer barulho depois das 23 horas e ate às 8 da manha.

host.about:
Sou uma pessoa que gosta de viajar, conhecer museus, visitar exposições e cinema.
Também gosto de passear pelas zonas históricas das cidades e contemplar as suas edificações.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Manuela was a great host! She and her son even picked us up from the airport. Her son travelled with us in the subway to bring us to the apartment.  This was really welcoming. He showed us the apartment, which was perfectly clean and felt right away as a comfortable home. 
In the fridge Manuala left us milk and her husband picked out an outstanding local port! 
The ocean is less than a two minut walk and there are some great (fish) restaurants around the corner. 
Thank you for everything Manuela, when ever we come back to Portugal we will make sure to visit your lovely apartment!

Bom dia.... adorei o apartamento,o sítio... tudo foi bom.. a simpatia as comodidades tudo otimo... pretendo voltar a repetir. .. Obrigada por estes dias que foram maravilhosos.... atenciosamente. .. 
Até a próxima. ...

Manuela a été très accueillante, très attentionnée. Le logement répondait à toutes nos attentes. Très bien situé avec une belle vue sur la mer, commerces et restaurants à proximité.  Nous le recommandons.

Très bon accueil de Manuela.Elle est venue nous chercher ,avec son mari, à l'aéroport.L'appartement est semblable aux photos et description du site,il est rustique mais très propre.Balcon avec vue sur la mer dommage qu'il ne soit pas ensoleillé.Bouteilles de vin et porto en guise de bienvenue.Manuela a également jouer le rôle de guide pendant une après-midi dans la très jolie ville de Porto, nous la remercions encore pour ces explications éducatives et sa disponibilité.
Um muito obrigado a Sra Manuela pois nos recebeu com muita simpatia, estava tudo dentro das expectativas recomendo vivamente pois a paisagem é magnifica obrigado  mais uma vez.

Hieno huoneisto lähellä merta. Kauppa ja leipomo vastapäätä. Porton metroon pääsi kätevästi vartin kävelyllä.
Ja vieressä meri!

Apartamento bem localizado, funcional e limpo, tudo 5 estrelas. O único aspecto a melhor é a agua quente, que se escasseava rapidamente, mas nada de problemático. Realço a simpatia e disponibilidade da Manuela, que teve a amabilidade de nos deixar fazer o check-out mais tarde que o suposto. Recomendo vivamente!

Appartement propre, tres agréable et bien situé, Manuela est très accueillante.
Sylvie, Oscar
Recomendo vivamente este espaço tudo cinco estrelas.

name: Copacabana Studio -  5* Reviews, 5 mins to Beach
summary: IMPORTANT: CARNIVAL - MINIMUM BOOKING 4 NIGHTS. Great location/AirCon/Strong Wifi/24 hr Doormen/Breakfast Pack/5* Service Beautifully-designed studio 5 minutes walk to Copacabana beach in tree-lined residential street with personal touches and high quality finishes.   We really understand our guests' needs and will help you have a memorable experience.  You'll receive our detailed written guide to Rio, welcome food, benefit from our local knowledge and feel at home before you even arrive!
interaction: Before your finalise your reservation we are available to answer any questions you have, and then are in close contact helping you prepare your trip sharing all our local knowledge as you wish, and also sending our written guide which covers great places to eat and transfer arrangements etc.   Our welcomer is Hugo who is a close, multi-lingual friend of ours and we are always available at any time during your stay to help with questions.
houseRules: No visitors - the 24 hour doormen will not allow non-guests to enter the building.

host.about: We're a happily married Scottish couple who fell in love with Brazil when we lived in Sao Paulo a few years ago. We love Rio so much we decided to buy a little studio here so we could spend some months a year in Copacabana, working from here and enjoying the city.  We sometimes rent it out when we're not here.  We hope you enjoy Rio and living in our studio as much as we do.  We'll do as much as we can to make your stay easy and memorable.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
This is a great little apartment on a quiet tree-lined street about two and a half blocks from the beach.  It is close to everything including the Siqueira Campos Metro stop which is a big plus if you need to get to downtown Rio. There are parts of Copacabana that are quite a trek from the Metro. There are all sorts of restaurants within a block in all directions and of course the beach a 5-minute walk away.

Everything is brand new and the apartment feels modern and cozy at the same time. It is however quite small. I was there by myself for 4 nights and it was perfect. Great for a couple as well if you get along really well. I wouldn't try to put 3 people in this place. When the bed is unfolded there is very little floor space left. The little space there is actually feels a lot bigger because it is very organized. It is easy to keep tidy since there is really only one place to put each thing. The handy apartment guide shows you where things go, how to unfold the sofa into the various configurations, and has some tips on the area. 

There is both wired and wireless Internet which was fast and worked perfectly for me. There is a nice little flat screen TV with satellite channels and easily accessible hdmi ports so you can hook up your laptop and play your own content. Sometimes wall-mounted flat screens make it really hard to get to the hdmi ports, but not in this case.

Note that power outlets in Brazil come in about 4 different flavours and you can never really be sure whether it is 110V or 220V. So bring adapters and make sure anything you plug in won't be fried by being plugged into a 220V outlet. In this apartment all (and there are surprisingly many) the outlets are IEC-906-1 type plugs at 220V. It is 3-pronged but still 2-prong Europlug compatible so if you are coming from most of Europe you won't need adapters. If you are coming from North America, bring some regular US-Euro adapters.

The view of Cristo Redentor (Christ the Redeemer statue) is especially nice at sunset and in the evening when it is lit up. There is a shot of it at sunset taken from the window of the apartment here: (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Alan and Catherine were lightning quick to respond and made the process extremely smooth.

All in all this was a perfect and relaxing 4 nights in Copacabana for me.

Hola a todos!! Estuvimos en el Studio Apartment de Catherine y Alan a fines de junio de 2011 con mi marido. Fue una excelente elección, gracias Alan y Catherine!!
La UBICACION del depto es ideal, ya que estás cerca de todo (queda en Capacabana) y te podés mover en omnibus a todos lados sin problema.
La ZONA es muy seguro, tranquila y con lugares para comer y comprar comida cerca. Siempre nos sentimos MUY seguros.
El DEPARTAMENTO está buenísimo! Es tal cual las fotos. Todo nuevo, impecable y con diseño- Está todo pensado hastá el mínimo detalle! Tiene todo lo necesario y más!  El wifi anda perfecto; la pantalla plana es GRANDE, no como dice el comentario de Marcus. El sillón camo es muy cómodo, tanto como sillón tanto como cama(más cómodo que muchas camas de hotel). El baño está impecable!!! El depto está buenísimo para ir con pareja o con un amigo.
Tiene SEGURIDAD LAS 24HS.
ALAN y CATHERINE son muy organizados y amables. Siempre contestaron rapidisimo y nos dieron datos para la llegada que nos sirvieron mucho,  MUCHAS GRACIAS POR COMPARTIR SU CASA EN RIO CON NOSOTROS!!!
LES RECOMENDAMOS a todos los que quieran conocer Rio, quedarse en el Studio Apartmente de Alan y Catherine!!!
Saludos,

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Patricio & Mercedes

The studio is really nice and comfy, modern and well-equiped in a nice building, in a great area of Rio - its location, a few meters away from Copacabana beach, is really central and convenient. There are a lot of shops, coffee places, bakeries, restaurants etc. nearby, and the area is really safe.
Alan and Catherine have every thing prepared to make of your stay a great time - all you have to do is to enjoy!

Pase mucho tiempo buscando por AIRBNB algún lugar en el cual pudiera pasar mis vacaciones. En cuanto vi las fotos del Studio, me di cuenta que era un lugar agradable y acogedor. Cuando me puse en contacto con Alan & Catherine, me di cuenta que eran personas muy amables y atentas. Siempre se mostraron dispuestos a resolver mis dudas y ayudarme a encontrar sitios en Rio de janeiro. El Studio es muy bonito y muy comodo, me gusto la vista que se tiene del Cristo Redentor desde la ventana. Muy recomendalbe el Studio! muy simpatica Lelita y muy cordiales los Porteros! Rio es una ciudad magnifica su gente es muy agradable!

My rating is 5 out of 5!!!!! This studio is simply amazing!

Alan and Catherine's studio is a beautiful place to stay. The creative design and artistic details are inspiringly put together. It is also wonderful because it is situated in the heart of Copa. Very close to the shops, the beach, the metro, and major tourist attractions. Location and design are the perfect combo to make your stay comfortable and rewarding!

Alan is such a kind, polite and thoughtful person! I will not forget his kindness. He went above and beyond to make my stay a happy one. In fact, he went well and beyond my expectations of a land lord. He even helped me organise a taxi to leave and booked it for me. Alan also arranged to get the apartment cleaned mid-stay. I did not ask him to do this. In sum, you could not want nicer person to deal with! Alan is a rare gem! He responds to emails in a timely manner and is a generous, helpful and wonderful!  He thinks of everything to make your stay a happy one!

The apartment building is nice and the couple that work at the door and look after the cleaning are such warm, kind and beautiful Brazilian people!!! They helped me so much with many things. When I arrived my luggage was missing, so they rang the airport and even offered to drive me to the airport! They even helped me go shopping for electrical goods so I could use my computer. Outstanding kindness!!!  It was a joy to come and home and say hello to them on the way to the elevator. I will miss them very much!

The apartment is comfortable because every last detail has been very well considered. Coming from Australia, I found the internet speed very fast and easy to connect. The cable TV is excellent and nice to watch after a long day touring Rio! The kitchen is perfect and is a delightful place to make yummy breakfast etc. The bathroom is very well designed. While the living room and bedroom is a joy to be in due to the artwork and beautiful use of form and light. The use of colour in the studio is visually sophisticated and joyful. I really loved the use of design to create atmosphere and mixed with Brazilian art, this is a real treat to enjoy! Loved it!!!

I really enjoyed dealing with Alan and Catherine. They are perfect hosts and I will be coming back to stay again for sure! Thank you so much Alan and Catherine for letting me stay in your beautiful home. I had the best time and will always remember how lovely your home and your wonderful kindness! 

Thank you!!!!!!

The pictures really shows what you get: a modern and cozy studio. At first may look tight and small, however the decoration work done by the owners are very smart and find for every single free space an appropriate use. The location also could not be better. Just one remark: the street is very peaceful, but Rio de Janeiro is a very noisy place. And the studio is placed between two very busy streets. Finally, Alan,  Catherine (the owners) and Lelita (the maid) are extremely friendly and attentive. The will do whatever they could to help your stay to be the best.

Perfect ! The studio is a a Little gem In Copacabana In a quiet tree-lined street NeXT to The métro. Very tastefully decorated  
Communication with Alan and Catherine was great. They are perfect hosts. 
100% recomended

Pasamos una semana maravillosa en el studio de Alan y Catherine. Realmente han pensado en cada detalle para hacerlo funcional, cómodo... y muy bonito!! Tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar al máximo. 
Además esta ubicado en el mejor rincón de Rio, en el centro de Copacabana, con todas sus tiendas, restaurantes, transporte y vida urbana, pero en una calle tranquila y silenciosa. Un lujo.
Comentamos varias veces durante nuestro viaje la suerte de haber encontrado este lugar para quedarnos. Alan y Catherine fueron siempre muy atentos y accesibles por mail, excelentes anfitriones a distancia. Recomendamos 100% este studio!!!!!

I had such a lovely experience here. Alan and Catherine were extremely helpful and quick to respond to any questions. Everything was IMMACULATE and looked exactly like it does in the photos. Although the space is small, the furniture and set-up made it very comfortable for two people. Such great use of the space. Loved the location...short walk to the beach. Neighborhood was friendly and felt very safe. Alan and Catherine provided suggestions for places to visit and also stocked some key items in the fridge. Amazing!  If I return to Rio I would love to stay here again and recommend it to everyone.

We stayed at Alan and Catherine's studio in November for 6 nights and had wondeful time.  From the point of booking, Alan and Catherine made sure that we were prepared for our stay in Rio.  They shared their thoughts and recommendations with us, this helped us enormously.  The studio is exactly as described, and the location is great. We are more than happy to recommend this studio to our friends and family and we will definitely stay again when we return to Rio.

name: 2 Bedroom Ocean Front Condo in Honokowai - Sleeps 6 - Hale Mahina #B404
summary: This elegant 2 bedroom, loft style unit has its semi-private master bedroom and bathroom upstairs and guest bedroom downstairs. Features bamboo flooring in the loft bedroom, tile in the living areas and carpet in the guest bedroom. The guest bedroom has a stall shower only, no bath tub but there is a shower-tub in the master bedroom.
interaction: Chase N Rainbows is located in Lahaina Town and is open 7 days per week: M-F 7am to 5pm, Sat/Sun 8am to 4pm. There is also an agent available for after hours emergencies.
houseRules: This Rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is entered into by the undersigned guest (“Guest” or “you” or “yours”) and Chase ‘N Rainbows Real Estate, Inc. (“Manager”). You understand that Manager is the designated agent of the owner of the Unit (“Owner”) and is signing this Agreement as the agent of the Owner, and on behalf of and with authority from the Owner. This Agreement incorporates by reference the terms and conditions set forth in your Deposit Confirmation Letter. House Rules: A full listing of the House Rules pertaining to your condo/property is attached to this rental agreement and is also located in the red binder left open on the dining table when you enter the unit upon check in. Please review these house rules as there may be warnings followed by penalties if violated.  This reservation is for quiet residential vacation accommodations only. Therefore, parties, receptions, luaus, events, and gatherings of any kind are strictly prohibited. No additional people beyond the maximum oc

host.about:
Chase ‘N Rainbows (CNR) Real Estate, Inc. is a Maui-based, family-owned company established in 1980 with two divisions: vacation rental management and real estate sales. For the past twenty years, CNR has been offering visitors and Kama’aina alike, affordable and luxury accommodations at a very competitive price. All of its vacation rental units are carefully selected, meticulously inspected, attractively furnished and well maintained to the highest standards. CNR is committed to providing the finest product and unsurpassed personalized service in the industry. These condominiums come highly recommended by leisure, business, and family travelers with distinctive tastes. A significant number of satisfied, return guests speak for the company’s service commitment and quality product. Chase ‘N Rainbows is a proud member of the Hawaii Visitors & Convention Bureau (HVCB), The American Society of Travel Agents (ASTA), Maui Visitors Bureau (MVB), Hawaii Association of Realtors, Maui Chamber of Commerce, and Vacation Rental Managers Association (VRMA).

*Please note we are a licensed and bonded professional management company and we DO NOT advertise on Craig s List

reviews.txt: Everything was exactly as promised or better. This was a wonderful location in a family friendly setting.  We would stay here again for future visits.

name: MODERN CONDO WITH VIEW - GRIFFIN
summary: Enjoy your stay in Montreal by relaxing in this brand new condo with a lot of great amenities in the building :) You will love the view, the balcony, and the free coffee/tea in the morning ! Feel free to borrow a travel guide and go explore the city!
interaction: During your stay, you can reach us by phone for any question
houseRules: - Please leave the place clean after you, do your dishes.  - No guests or animals are allowed (max 3 p. in th condo and the common areas) - No smoking - Do not be too loud

reviews.txt: My sister and I just got home from an amazing weekend away in Montreal! This was the first time we used airbnb and Manon was a wonderful host. She was prompt to answer any questions we had. The condo was spotless and beautiful and looked just as the picture described. The neighbourhood was lovely. Was only abou a 7 minute drive to downtown and we used uber! It was a locked and secure building. We have only amazing things to say about our stay and the host. Thank you again Manon!

name: Charming StanleyBeachFlat w/rooftop
summary: A charming,funky cool 1 bdrm flat in older walk up bldg close to Stanley beaches,mountain trails. A huge shared BBQ rooftop. No lift, 4 floor stairs Light,airy floor/ceiling windows. Buses at door,cafes.shops.wireless.full cooking kitchen.great spot!
interaction: Marcos is always available to help host and answer guests needs.
houseRules: Please No crazy parties as we have nice quiet neighbours. No extra guests staying overnight eithout advance notification..take care of artwork in flat...turn off aircons and lights when not in flat

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Marcos had been most helpful, trying his best to make my stay a pleasant one even when he was away on holidays. The apartment was very cozy, the bed was especially comfortable and the place was warm even in the winter. Just opposite the busstop, with plenty of restaurants around.

It was the second time I was renting a flat from Marcos. No surprise. Marcos is a great host. Always available if you need anything and making your stay as nice as possible.
The flat is of perfect size with its separate bedroom and good living room space. The walk through dressing room is also very convenient. Plenty of room to put your stuff (which is not always the case in Airbnb flats in HK).
Stanley is great, you'll meet people easily just by going down at one of the bars. I recommend Verns for their beers and Smugglers for the atmosphere. ;)
Marcos's flat is in a good location. It is easy to find and very convenient to go to downtown. I like Stanley very much and will stay in his place again in the future.
很方便的地點,很舒適的屋子!

We found the appartment as advertised on airbnb. The place is cosy, clean (for long time visitors: the cleaner comes once a week), and the location could not be better (5 minutes walk to the beach, restaurants, shops, Stanley market; half an hour by public bus to central Hong Kong).

Marcos is a very nice and helpful person. He answered all our questions quickly both before and during our stay. He even came up with a few beach toys for our children and offered them participating in a tennis lesson for kids free of charge.

Perfect appartment offering value for money, perfect host, perfect stay - thanks!
It's such a nice place for a holiday, the location is great and the beach is just 10 mins walk, Macros is very nice and helpful, we had a good time at Stanley.

Very nice flat, in the heart of Stanley village. Home away from home, the flat is very cosy. Thank you Marcos for your welcoming and your advices about Stanley. We could not have gas in the kitchen, but that was a minor problem given all the very nice restaurants around very very close, eg in Stanley plaza.

Marcos gave very specific instruction on the location of the flat before our arrival via phone and message.  Altough we made some misunderstanding about "the room on left side of the stair" , no one answered while knocking the exact door (with TV noise). And we found a key in the running shoe for the other room as instruction. That confused us.  But he is warm and very nice after all.

Except the air condition is a little noisy, the room is as comfortable as our home and extremely convenient, close to the bus station and shopping area,with a wonderful rooftop.

Marcos' place was terrific. A comfortable 1-bedroom, an incredibly comfortable bed, and an awesome location right next to Stanley Market. It was the second time Marcos was kind enough to host me. He's quick to respond, and has an easy-going personality as well. I'd highly recommend a stay there. Thanks again, Marcos!
Really good place to stay. Great host

name: Barra da Tijuca: cobertura ESPETACULAR
summary: Localizada em bairro nobre do Rio de Janeiro, totalmente mobiliada, com sauna, em um condomínio contando com diversas facilidades (piscina, academia, portaria...), disponível pela primeira vez para locação. TUDO NOVO. Super caprichado!
interaction: Estou sempre disponível para os hospedes, seja para um pedido especial, seja para esclarecer duvidas e/ou fornecer dicas seja por msg, wpp, email ou celular.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Localização ideal. Apartamento novo. Preço justo.

name: New apartment - 1 room
summary: New and cozy apartment with 1 room available.
interaction: I'm available in person or by phone. I'm available in person or by phone.
houseRules: Trate a casa com carinho. Carinho é sempre recíproco. É proibido portar ou usar qualquer tipo de droga.  É proibido trazer acompanhante para o quarto sem prévio acordo. É proibido colorir, riscar ou escrever no papel de parede do quarto É proibido trazer animais de estimação. Não é permitido usar grill ou churrasqueira portátil na varanda. Somente é permitido fumar na área de lazer do prédio. Solicitamos que respeitem o horário de silêncio do condomínio após às 22 horas. Pedimos que mantenham os ambientes e utensílios que utilizarem limpos e secos. Pedimos que estendam as toalhas molhadas no varal da área de serviço ou no banheiro.  Pedimos que apaguem as luzes e desliguem os aparelhos elétricos ou eletrônicos quando saírem ou não estiverem utilizando. As taxas são baseadas em 2 pessoas no quarto. Esperamos respeito e boa conduta durante a estadia. Treat the house with care. Affection is always reciprocal. It is not allowed to carry or use any drugs. It is not allowed to bring guest to

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Oi! Sou Gabriela, administradora de Belo Horizonte. Moro no Rio de Janeiro há 10 anos, e estou alugando um ótimo quarto. Gosto de livros, cinema, arte, ginástica, e claro, de viajar!

Hi! I am Gabriela, a brazilian administrator from Belo Horizonte. I live in Rio de Janeiro for 10 years and I am renting a beautiful bedroom in Rio. I'm addicted in books, movies, gym and, of course, travelling.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: O apartamento da Gabriela é incrível. Super bem cuidado. Estava organizado, limpo e ainda recebi um kit de boas vindas :) Me senti muito bem acolhida. A localização é muito boa. Recomendo.

name: Porto.arte downtown apartment 3PAX
summary: This Porto´s typical apartment, on a classical house, has recently been restored and is fully equipped (including Air Conditioning and Wifi). It was decorated to comfortably accommodate couples and travelers (up to 3 people), either on recreation or business. The atmosphere is warm and serene, with a remarkable natural light in every room. The location is privileged, in the city center, the designated "Arts District", which is a quiet pedestrian area with everything at a walk distance.
interaction: I do not live at this building, but very close to it. Thus, I am able to quickly  assist the guests and also provide flexible check-in/check-out schedules.
houseRules: Taxa Municipal de 2€ / pessoa / dia. Cobrada no momento do check-in.

host.about:
I am a citizen of Porto.
I have lived in other places and knew different cities in the world, but Porto is the place that attracts me to live the most.

My basic background is in applied mathematics, subsequently I took the option to continue the family business in the area of restoration and trade of antiques, activity that I still keep. 
Interior decoration is also an area that interests me.

I have no training on the tourism sector, so, my interpretation in this project, is to welcome and host according to the traditions of Porto, while sharing a characteristic family house and its pieces of art.

reviews.txt: Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Maria. Il a été rénové il y a très peu de temps. Il est encore mieux que sur les photos!!! Bien situé dans le quartier des arts (très beau quartier), même si un peu loin du métro (10 minutes). Maria est très accueillante et souriante, et parle français ! Nous repasserons par cet appartement si nous revenons à Porto!

Both Maria and her husband were very nice and caring hosts. The Apartment is beautiful, quiet and nevertheless close to Porto's Center and sights. We had a great Porto experience - and hope to come back soon!
everything was great

This apartment is amazing. It is clean, bright, well-equipped and on a delightful quiet street 15 minutes from downtown. Maria is an excellent host and if we return to Porto, we would definitely stay here again.

Apartamentos seguros, confortáveis, e muito bem localizados...Maria do Céu e Antônio foram excepcionais anfitriões e formamos novos amigos no Porto...esperamos voltar em breve e desfrutar do conforto oferecido. Obrigado por tudo...já estamos com saudades....
Maria est très gentille, l'appartement est fonctionnel et bien placé.

Maria's apartment is one of the most beautiful spaces I have stayed at. It is located on a beautiful quiet street, in a renovated old house, but carries the spirit of old times. It has a small garden where you can have lunch and relax. The apartment is equipped with everything you need and is great for a couple, friends or a family. It is bigger than it looks like on the photos, very bright and clean. Maria and her husband are very very helpful and kind. They met us, gave us recommendations where to go and where to eat. We usually walked to the center because it is a nice, downhill walk and took a taxi back - just 5 euro or so. There is a nice park right behind the corner, a supermarket 5 minutes of walking away. Thank you Maria for everything!

O apartamento é lindo: exatamente como está nas (Website hidden by Airbnb) não for mais bonito. A região é ótima. O prédio tem um espaço atrás que minha filha brincou bastante. Maria é muito simpática e esteve sempre preocupada se precisávamos de alguma coisa. Muito cuidadosa conosco e com o espaço. Recomendo muito. Se voltamos a Porto, com certeza nos hospedaremos lá.

Everything was perfect.
Location, decoration, hosts were perfect.
Maria was so kind.
She made us comfortable.
I really appreciate it.

정말 추천합니다~

We fell in love with Porto.  Maria's place is so beautiful and exactly as described. It is very convenient to all of the sight. Maria is warm and so helpful. There are many personal touches. We hope to stay again.

name: Gorgeous Boutique Hotel Room in Taksim #8
summary: This double room with a private bathroom is a great option for travelers who look for a central and comfortable stay. Based in a building which is restorated in January 2017, this room is designed for your comfort.
interaction: We personally take care of each and every guest, who choose to stay in our apartments. You will be greeted on your arrival, helped with your questions and provided with useful information of the neighbourhood and the city. Most of the daytime, we will be available in the house and if you need further assistance you can reach us by phone 7/24.

host.about: We love travelling and we take the best ideas from each apartment  we stay at when we are furnishing our own houses.  We want to offer fellow travellers a similiar experience to the best apartments we have been to in years.  We hope you enjoy Istanbul during your visit.  Send us a message and let us know if we can help you in any way!!

reviews.txt: The place is really good! nice location and very pleasant host) highly recommend!

name: Cozy Apartment near Charley Young Beach in Kihei
summary: Enjoy the convenience of this cute apartment near the beaches! Hosted by an experienced Superhost, this comfortable one-bedroom first-floor apartment is a 1-block walk to Cove Park Beach and a 2-block walk to Charley Young Beach. Surfing, shopping, dining, bars, grocery stores are all just blocks away. The apartment's location is a convenient home base for many activities you can walk to in Kihei or drive to elsewhere on Maui. Includes AC, free Wi-Fi, free parking spot, full size washer & dryer!
interaction: Your experienced Airbnb Super Host ensures that apartment is ready for you prior to the check-in time, so normally there is no need for the host to interact with guests in person.  The host for this apartment is on call and available via text messaging or phone calls or Airbnb messaging for any issues that arise before, during, and after a guest stay.

host.about: Thomas is a longtime resident of Maui and enjoys providing guests with comfortable vacation rentals in Kihei on the sunny South Shore of Maui. He is an experienced Airbnb Superhost who operates several vacation rentals all near the Charley Young Beach area of Kihei, Maui, each of which have earned a lengthy set of positive reviews from pleased guests.

reviews.txt:
First of all, Thomas is truly a Super Host! He is communicative, polite, and detailed with the itinerary. Thomas answered all of our questions quickly and made sure everything was good. We stayed in his lovely apartment for the weekend after extending our trip a couple more days. His home is clean, nicely decorated and a 5 minute walk around the block to Charlie Young Beach. He provided beach chairs and towels. I love that his apartment feels like you're staying in a hotel! 

The apartment is also close to restaurants and stores in Kihei. Thomas was very kind enough to send his personal favorite list of places to visit/eat in Maui! If you want a home away from home, this is the place to stay.
Good place to stay, Thomas made sure we were confortable and satisfied!

Sehr gute Ausgangslage für Ausflüge auf der ganzen Insel. Die Wohung war perfekt für 2 Personen und sehr nahe an einem tollen Strand.
Supermarkt sowie Bars und Restaurants gut zu Fuss erreichbar.
Reservierter Parkplatz direkt vor der Wohnung.

We enjoyed two wonderful weeks in this well equipped, great location apartment in Kihei. Thomas is an excellent and attentive host. Communication from the very start was fast and detailed. Every question was answered, and our request to start our trip a little early was accommodated without any fuss. He also sent us a PDF guide with lots of pages on tips for restaurants, beaches, snorkeling, driving adventures etc. A lot of them we followed.

The apartment itself is exactly as advertised. Comfortable, well equipped with all the essential kitchen appliances and accessories. Air conditioning in the main living room, and portable air conditioning in the bedroom which worked a treat during our stay. The added extras such as beach chairs, beach mats and a drinks/food cooler was very much appreciated, and used every day. Parking is right at the front and easy to access. 

The location is to die for. Having explored every part of this amazing Island we agreed that our favourite location was Kikei. The locals were very friendly, access to restaurants and supermarkets was just minutes away, and many of the Island learn to surf clinics (highly recommend doing this!) were run from a beach 5 minutes walk along the street. Every day we swam with turtles at the beaches immediately in the area of the apartment. You can literally walk out of the apartment, across the road and watch the sunset over the ocean every day. Amazing!

I highly recommend this apartment and Thomas as a host.

The apartment is really nice and perfect for a couple or a small family. Perfect location within walking distance to Charlie Young Beach (children-friendly) and Cove Beach (Surf Spot). Grocery store (Foodland & others), restaurants and markets are also within walking distance. Would definitely return here.

The flat is in a great location, clean and with all you need to have a comfortable stay. I didn't meet Thomas in person but he is for sure a great host.
Thanks for you space Thomas!

Great location, apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Loved the list of local attractions to visit while in Maui. 
Thomas was very helpful, he came to help us find the apartment the night of arrival. Thank You!

Thomas was an excellent host - from responsive, quick communication before our visit, to the nice little touches and treats in the apartment, all the way through our stay. 

His apartment was magnificent - very chic and nicely furnished, with a great kitchen and dishes, pans, and tupperware for making meals and cooking up local farmer's market produce. It's in a terrific location in Kihei with reserved parking, in close walking proximity to two great beaches for easy sunset viewing. He also sent us wonderful tips and .

Service above and beyond the norm: Thomas was even willing to receive a package and hang onto it when I realized I'd left ordering a bit late for it to make it all the way to the mainland before our trip. Truly outstanding service!

Thomas, thank you for your outstanding hospitality and beautiful space. I will be wholeheartedly recommending your apartment to friends!

What an incredible find:?)  Close to the beaches, very clean, plenty of amenities (laundry, well-stocked kitchen, comfy king sized bed and a private lanai!)  Thanks to our host, Thomas for accommodating us on short notice!  Your hospitality and aloha will not be forgotten!

If you are looking for a great place to stay with an excellent location to multiple beaches, dining, and shopping look no further! Thomas was a great host and his place was super clean and up to date with everything we needed plus more.

name: Condo tout équipé, 2 ch., paisible, près du métro
summary: Mon logement est à moins de 10 minutes de marche du métro Radisson, de la place Versailles (centre commercial) et d'une immense épicerie et société des alcools. Vous apprécierez le condo pour la luminosité, la tranquillité, la climatisation, le lit confortable et l'équipement complet incluant laveuse sécheuse. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo, les étudiants et les voyageurs d'affaires.
interaction: Je suis disponible en tout temps par courriel, texte ou téléphone.
houseRules: - Fumer est permis sur le balcon couvert à l'arrière. - On demande aux occupants de respecter la tranquillité des lieux en évitant toute musique forte ou bruits excessifs après 22h00. - Smoking is permissible on the covered balcony at the back. - Out of respect for the neighbors and in line with the peaceful environment, we kindly require that you avoid loud music or excessive noise passed 10pm.

host.about: Je suis une Québécoise d'origine, infirmière et chercheure de formation, spécialisée en cardiologie.

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Spacious, welcoming apartment that feels like home.  Very comfortable bed, and a great place to relax in and/or make your home base while visiting Montreal.  Clean, with anything you might need to cook - laundry, wifi, close to metro and shops and very quiet.  

Natalie was a very accommodating host, was very easy to communicate with and was available to answer questions and make sure everything we needed was there.  Will definitely book again!
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed here for a month, and the place was great, just like in the pictures and even better.
Nathalie is a great host, responsive and ready to help.
5 star review with no doubts.

name: Kowloon Mongkok 1812 Twin Room A, near station
summary: Located at center of Mongkok. 3 mins walk to Mongkok railway station & the biggest shopping mall of the area – Langham Place. Clean & tidy room with free wifi. Free luggage storage service: starts from 9:30am on check in day / until 6pm on the check out day.
interaction: Please feel free to ask if you want to explore Hong Kong in local way, I have many suggestions for restaurants and places to go.
houseRules: Please keep quiet after 11pm. Thanks

host.about:
I am from Hong Kong, I love travelling to explore something new. I am a web-editor of a women website in HK, i also have a personal blog, and i love to share my travel experience with my readers and friends.

as a host, i have private rooms to rent (where in Mongkok), and i am familiar with food & beverage & beauty products, please feel free to contact me for suggestions on dining and shopping. hope that i can help u to enjoy more during ur stay in Hong Kong. =)

reviews.txt: athena is a good, sweet and very helpful host. I had a change of plan of 4 times, but she was all patience with me and even help me to get a additional room at the very last min, given me a list of eatery and shopping guide, and even help me book a place for resturant. despite she wasnt ard when i checked in, she even left a gift. The room is as what shown in the picture. Location was ard a 5min walk to MRT and very convience with lots of eatery right behind. The staff there is also helpful and much more polite than those hkg hotel that i had stayed previously. Must say i had a very good stay at athena place. my 1st choice for my next hkg trip.

Our experience overall was great. the host was so kind, generous and hospitable. We love our room so much.. very clean and cozy, and most importantly very affordable.Everything was there: free personal care supplies, hot and cold shower, etc. Moreover, the place is very strategic; its along the business district and near MTR stations. I love to go back there very very soon. So those who planned to go to hongkong please try this place and I am pretty sure you wont regret it.

Direction to our room was clear. Mr. Keith is very helpful. Answer all of our calls even at wee hours. Never had a problem. Linens are crisp and clean. I asked for another pillow and he gave me for no extra charge. The room was small though but clean. I would recommend this place for back packers.

Athena was very helpful as she provided us various information that makes our trip to HongKong wonderful. Although the room is quite small, it is very clean and it is located near the MTR so its very convient. Overall, it is really a nice place to stay at if you are looking for a budget place to stay.

Our experience was good as Mr Yiu and Ms Luk were excellent in facilitating our check in and answered all our queries during our stay. They even provided us with a local SIM card and ended our trip with a sure win lucky draw prize!
The room was small but cosy and clean. Shampoo, shower gel and toothbrush with toothpaste are provided. Towels are available on request. 
The location is right in the middle of Nathan Road. You can choose to walk to either Mongkok and Ya Mau Tei MTR and both are just a 5-7 mins walk away.
Overall, a good convenient place to stay for short trips.

We knew our 3 nights stay got off to good start with warm welcome from Mr Yiu :) Very near to Mong Kok MRT station which is made it very convenient for us to explore Hong Kong. Room fitted the description listings and daily room service in tidying up our room was definitely a plus point. Ms Lok and Mr Yiu also are very helpful in accommodating our request for our early check out. Will recommend this place to our friends and we will be back to stay at this place again if we visit Hong Kong again.

Yes! The room did look like from the pictures- the beds came in single twin beds, and even the comforter sets, the bedsheets were exactly like in the picture too! (even the curtains). 

I've to commend the room's cleanliness. One of the first few things that I noticed about the room when I stepped in was its clean floor- spick and span, I did not spot clumps of hair or the floor being covered in dust- that was one of the strengths of the room. 

Secondly, the toilet's floor was clean and there was no hair lying about the floor, or murky stains spotted about the toilet (not that I dared inspect every corner dilligently- but I stepped into the toilet barefooted, assured that it was clean)

They only provide basic body foam and shampoo, which are put into wall dispensers. I found the body soap to suffice but the shampoo was abit drying and so you might want to bring your own shampoo perhaps. 

Cleanliness-wise, I give the sleeping area room + the toilets a 3.5 / 5 stars as I did not spot any dirt that irked me, the floors were clean enough to walk barefoot and they looked without dust. 
Perhaps, the only area which I did not walk barefoot much on was the doorway area as we were wearing shoes in and walking on it, during our first day. 

Space-wise, it may be small, but mangeable for 2 people. I would say that it is just nice- roomy for 1 pax but just nice- slightly tight (depending on how spacey a room you are used to) for 2 people. Hong Kong is known for small room sizes though, so I thought this small room space is common.
The toilet is quite small though, and the places to hang your clothes/towels might not be as luxurious as hotels but we managed alright ultimately. There's not much space to move in the toilet. But its cleanliness and the reasonable price topped the space constraints! Bedroom wise , space is alright for 2 people.

Perhaps, the room window was the only difficult thing managing as it was abit hard closing it and some slight dust.

Towels and linen smelt fresh! Bedsheets felt clean!
You need to request for towels. 
Host was very obliging, VERY, in answering all my many questions! I emailed her TONS. 
Keith & Joey were on duty when we were there and both are helpful, obliging people. Joey was very friendly and helped us to check which Karaoke places were cheap and the night bus to the airport! Their guesthouse is quite systematic I feel, with either Keith or Joey(lu xiao jie) on duty at different times of the day and they give you the number to call them with a phone hung outside the reception door. 
Keith answered any questions we had too! 
They even provided us a SIM card with internet!
THANK YOU Athena, Keith&Joey! 
For this price&cleanliness, it's worth.

3박4일 일정 중 첫날을 제외한 이틀을 머물렀으며,
첫날 묵었던 숙소와 비교하자면
창문이 있어 답답하지 않았고,
전체적으로 깔끔하고 깨끗했음. 그리고 첫날 숙소에 없던 헤어드라이기, 콘센트변환기 등이 잘 구비되어있음.
난방, 에어컨도 양호함.

以香港寸土寸金來說這間價錢小而美
雖然不像五星旅館雄偉壯觀
但是對於想要深入了解香港的自由行旅客
想把錢花在香港美食和文化而非交通的話
這間旅館是不錯的選擇!
離旺角地鐵站非常近周遭生活機能很完美

房東非常熱心
有有疑問在詢問都可以迅速地得到解答
房東在各方面的協助都非常細心仔細
這次因為遇到中秋連續假期所以問了一些當地特別活動消息
房間也快速的把相關資料給我們參考
就連在一開始check in的時候還借我們一本很有內容､非廣告類別､台灣出版的香港旅遊書說可以從裡面找到更多訊息

房間內乾淨且安靜
清潔人員也很和善
就算到了需要提早check out也不需要擔心不方便找房東

真的非常推薦!
房间比较小,打开箱子就比较麻烦了,不过基本设施都挺齐全的,挺干净的｡

name: Penthouse with stunning 600 sq ft roof terrace
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
interaction: I am happy to give you dining tips in the neighborhood and always free to have a coffee.
houseRules: No smoking inside the flat as there is a balcony and roof terrace. No more than 2 guests. No loud music on the roof terrace after 11 pm as the police will attend. No parties.

host.about: Ex investment banker, headhunter and now tech start up entrepreneur.  Multi lingual and well travelled.  Loves HK, enjoys cooking and good food, passionate about martial arts, hiking and long evenings with great friends especially when there is music!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Barbara was a most gracious and generous host.  She went out of her way to make me feel comfortable and (in effect) have a home away from home.  Her apartment is nothing short of amazing.  It is a great size for Hong Kong, incredibly comfortable, spotlessly clean and elegantly furnished.  The apartment is an an oasis from the hustle & bustle of Hong Kong.  It is perfectly situated on Hollywood Road, in the thick of a great selection of restaurants & bars and parks and is walking distance to Central & SOHO.  The apartment is open and airy, filled with natural light and is perfect for the business person that needs space to work out of or just to have a breather from the Hong Kong pace (a real luxury for Hong Kong).  The rooftop garden is a real bonus.  What a wonderful and unique experience.  I highly recommend this to any business person and discerning traveller.  I hope to return there soon.  Thanks Barbara! :-)
Luxurious and spacious penthouse in a trendy neighborhood; the pics really don't do it justice. Smooth communication and check-in. Would definitely recommend. Thank you for a great stay!

Barbara's place is fantastic and she is a wonderful host! We stayed for 10 days and felt at home as soon as we walked through the door. Really enjoyed the neighborhood - it was fairly quiet at night, but just a few blocks to walk to the shops and restaurants along Hollywood Road (the art/artisan shops at PMQ were our favorite). The kitchen is well equipped and there are two grocery markets within a few minutes walk (one Chinese-style and one English-style), so it was easy to make breakfast each morning, open up the balcony doors, and listen to the birds chirping in the park across the street. Barbara was very helpful with suggestions on dinner places - she gave us 6 suggestions within a 5 minute walk; we made it to 5 and had a great meal each time. The Sheung Wan area is very convenient to Central and it's easy to pick up taxis, trams, and the MTR within a few blocks of the apartment to get anywhere in the city. We'd definitely book Barbara's place again if we return to Hong Kong.

A very beautifully furnished space in a very trendy area roughly equidistant from Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan MTRs. Lots of cool cafes, restaurants and bars surround the flat. Check-in was easy and communication with Barbara was fast and effective. The doorman (particularly a charming gentleman by the name of Albert) gave tips to travelling around the area and it was always a nice feeling to see a familiar face when returning to the apartment. Will definitely stay in this space again if I get the chance!

AMAZING - the Penthouse in real life is 10x better then the images, PLUS the rooftop is so amazing and has such an amazing view it's all to your self with enough furniture to have 8 friends up there ( though I was by myself ) 

The community is amazing there's a MUST go to coffee shop right next door ( I forget the name ) 

Wifi is great 

Bed was super comfy 

Barbara is super helpful and I couldn't recommend the place enough, was worth every penny!
A real gem, beautiful apartment, well located we loved staying here. Barbara is a great host and was super helpful. Would highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay at Barbara's house. It was very clean and Barbara has a great taste of designing the house. The kitchen, bathroom, dining area, all of those are very well decorated. The location is very convenient, and it was a great experience exploring this side of the Hong Kong island. There was a great combination of modern and histories.

Barbara’s place is wonderful and perfect, it’s very comfortable and have a great design, totally same with the photos who shown. 
And the place really bring us a cozy home feeling when our staying, and the environment is quiet and peace, and also nearby the convenience store. 
The location is convenience too, if you’re familiar with the tramway, it’s so much easy to roam around the central.

A wonderful location and a beautiful studio nest to come home to, what more could one ask! You can find endless places to explore within walking distance, and a range of simple cafes to hip restaurants. So different from staying in the usual hotels. Highly recommended for the discerning Airbnbist.

Amazing apartment in the most stylish central area of hong kong. It is close to all the shops and restaurants that you need on your holiday and even for your longer term business trip. Highly recommend.

name: Ranch Abode Loft in Bushwick
summary: Simply appointed and centrally located 1st floor apt with 20 ft. ceilings, a loft bed, and exposed brick in the bathroom.
interaction: I'm available any-time via phone if you need me.
houseRules: - Enjoy yourself and please ask any questions you may have!  - Please be respectful of the neighbors and community. This is their home.  - Turn off lights and heat or AC when you are out of the apartment and make sure to turn off when you leave:)

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Hello! I am a Brooklyn based film, television, video producer and director. I am originally from a small town in New Mexico. I travel all of the time and have had a wonderful time renting to other traveling airbnb'ers! Looking forward to meeting you!

reviews.txt: Shannon's apartment was left lovely and clean with plenty of towels and bedding, the place was huge and it was a pleasure to stay there.

Shannon was very helpful and flexible, available for questions whenever I had them. Her apartment is gorgeous, just as described and very clean and spacious. The apartment complex is also really cool, and we were lucky enough to meet some of the other lovely residents during our stay. The location near the myrtle JMZ train station was so convenient. We had a fantastic time here.

I only hope that every airbnb host is as friendly and efficient as Shannon. We couldn't have asked for a better stay in her lovely apartment. It was clean, spacious, fully stocked with linen/bathroom supplies and super close to the JMZ train line. Thanks so much Shannon, it made the trip that much easier.

we spent a great time in the appartment of shannon. everything we needed was there- perfect kitchen, lots of fresh towels and sheats, very interesting building with billiard, ping pong,etc.downstairs. perfect subway station to everywhere nearby. nice delis around. perfect for a new york brooklyn trip - not the snobby one.
thank you shannon

Shannon is so cool ! And her loft is conveniently located for almost everything. Very close to the subway station,bars.restaurants,and delis. She helped me,and my girlfriend to find things to do nearby, She also took good care of us. I would stay at her place again and again.
Wonderful apartment, great hostess.
Great space in an amazing area. Very unique.

Appartement très bien placé, au carrefour de Brooklyn (Bushwick-Williamsburg) et Manhattan. Très bien déservit par le métro et les bus.

Ce qui nous a plu est la vie de quartier très populaire sans aucun souci, gens sympathiques toujours près à aider ou renseigner (comme partout ailleurs à NYC )

I had a really great time at Shannons Apartment. Everything was perfect and everything was there to feel like home. Shannon is a very nice person and i hope to be there very soon again. Thank you for all.

Shannon's Appartment is amazing. 

The place is in a great location within walking distance from two subway lines, great restaurants, 24 hour fresh produce and deli, close to good clothing shops and a quick 15minute subway ride to everything manhattan has to offer. 

The bed is comfortable, the kitchen is well stocked, the games room is good fun and the rooftop is jaw dropping. 

Shannon is a great host, she had plenty of good recommendations to help us get the most out of bushwick and it's surrounding neighborhoods. And she was incredibly accommodating towards our crazy 2am arrival! (Thanks for waiting up Shannon!)

If your looking for a more unique stay in New York, away from the swarms of tourists in Manhattan then this is the perfect place to base yourself. 

10/10 could not fault the place.

name: A bedroom far away from home
summary: NOTES: BEFORE BOOKING, PLEASE KNOW THAT WE ARE LOCATED ON THE 3RD FLOOR OF A WALK UP BUILDING (3 SHORT FLIGHT OF (Website hidden by Airbnb) IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE CLIMBING STAIRS, BE ADVISED, THANKS! THE CHECK-IN TIME IS STRICTLY BETWEEN 1PM-10PM.. AND CHECK OUT IS 11AM THIS LISTING IS ONLY FOR A BEDROOM AND NOT THE ENTIRE APARTMENT.
interaction: one of us will try to help you in your needs through out your stay.
houseRules: No shoes allowed inside the apartment. Be polite, and we will get along :)

host.about:
Hello. I am a very passionate person with whatever I do. I love adventures and travelling. 
I love meeting and talking to people of any race, color and gender. I think I can learn something from every person I meet and I value learning so much that  

Hope to meet new friendships on my travels.

reviews.txt: It was exactly as the descriptions states: "a comfortable stay". I just stayed for one day and everything was nice. Comfortable private bedroom. Lane and her sister helped me in everything I needed at any time. I definitely recommend it for a short stay close to the JFK airport!! Thanks for everything Lane!

Great host. Was very nice, clean, quiet apartment.
Really appreciate the hosts, friendly people.
Will be staying again!
That's a wonderful stay in New York. Lane and her sister is helpful for our stay and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can cook  and get everything as our want.

I had a nice time in a peaceful atmosphere. Clean place and quiet area, even if it's located in Jamaica Queen. 8 minutes walk from the f and e lines that go downtown. A perfect stay if you are on a budget and really good hosts.

I stay in many an AirBnB, and most I judge on the accommodations alone.  This time it was Lane's warmth and hospitality that stood out.  The place was exactly as described and Lane was wonderful.  I hope to stay there again.
Amazing host, very welcoming and great communication.

Had a one day layover in JFK and wanted to see Queens! Close to airport and train to the places in NE Queens I wanted to visit, then continued on to Manhattan and eventually made it back to JFK. Laney was helpful and made sure I got there alright and followed up with me the next day. Great place to get some sleep and be ready to explore in the morning. About a $20 cab ride from JFK-- was easier than navigating train later at night after long day.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lane was very responsive to my messages. Lane's sister was very friendly during my stay and made sure I had everything I needed. The room itself is quite comfortable, and I slept great! Quiet and clean apartment in a nice neighborhood. Train is just a short walk away. Just be sure to bring your own towel and soap. Well worth the money,  5/5 would stay again.

We had a great stay here! From the moment we (My 4y/o Godson and I) arrived we felt welcomed and very accommodated. Annette made sure we were comfortable and even texted to check on us when we didn't come back one night. She is the best! Its clean, has a nice kitchen, and its in a nice neighborhood... a quick walk to the subway. She made me feel like I was a part of their family and that meant a lot because I am here alone. I wish we could've stayed longer and will definitely return if need be... Thanks so much, Ladies!!

name: Suíte TOP frente Mar Barra posto 4 + Café da Manhã

A cozinha fica também, de forma compartilhada, à disposição caso queiram cozinhar. Você sempre vai encontrar a cozinha super limpa e arrumada e apenas deve mante-la organizada e limpa como encontrou.
houseRules: Check-in e Check-out no Quarto no horário do anuncio. *(Bônus)  Se precisar nós permitimos chegar *antes ou sair ** depois, vocês podem deixar suas coisas aos cuidados de sua anfitriã e permanecer no condomínio até o horário de entrada no quarto / partida (* 09 às **18 Horas) caso queira aproveitar a manhã do primeiro dia e a tarde do último. Porem no dia da sua partida o quarto e banheiro devem ser devolvido até no máximo 11 da manhã e no dia da sua chegada só podemos garantir o ingresso no quarto após as 13 horas. Durante o período que guardarmos suas bagagens vocês poderão utilizar os banheiro masculino e feminino e usar os chuveirões unisex que ficam junto à nossa sauna no pavimento térreo (chuveirão sem portar, deve usar roupa de banho). *Solicite sempre na sua reserva o "late check out" se for sair depois das 11 horas, e por favor informe se vai chegar mais cedo que 13 horas para tudo estar perfeito na sua chegada! (*Sujeito à nossa aprovação prévia, para garantir o ingresso ou p

host.about: Busco um atendimento 5 estrelas para quem quer se hospedar no Rio de Janeiro. contratar uma de minhas acomodações é sinônimo de satisfação. Conte  com compromisso, limpeza e fidelidade das informações anunciadas além de um excelente suporte com as dificuldades comuns de pessoas que vem de fora para se hospedar no Rio. Conte também com o suporte do Corretor de imóveis Israel Fagundes que ajuda a organizar os espaços, regras, e condutas do bom anfitrião. Tanto a trabalho como a lazer venha ser feliz de verdade no Rio de Janeiro nos nossos espaços. Estamos te esperando!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A estadia com a Fátima foi maravilhosa!! O apartamento é muito bem localizado, a suíte estava em perfeitas condições, havia uma cama super confortável, um excelente café da manhã e ainda ganhamos um mimo em nossa chegada! Eu e meu namorado ficamos bastante satisfeitos! A Fátima é um amor de pessoa e fez de tudo para que nossa estadia fosse boa! Seu filho Israel também foi muito simpático, nos explicando os detalhes do (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza quando voltar para o Rio procurarei pela Fátima! Quem estiver precisando de uma hospedagem pode fechar sem medo de errar! Não tem como se arrepender!

..Foram sem dúvidas as melhores mini férias que já tive!!A Fátima nos recebeu com aquele sorriso no rosto e  uma simpatia carioca que só ela tem rs tivemos uma estadia maravilhosa,o quarto é perfeito,cama super confortável,a suíte TOP e todo restante do apartamento uma graça..literalmente: Me senti em casa e com certeza voltarei em breve!!Além de ter passado ótimos dias na barra,o condomínio é super organizado e seguro e a localização perfeita!!Ahh dica SUPER ÚTIL: Usem o aplicativo UBER ao invés de táxi,muitoooooo mais em conta e o serviço prestado é ótimo!!Já estou com saudades dessa fofinha que nos acolheu tão bem!
Fátima foi muito solícita e muito preocupada em fazer com que seus hóspedes se sintam bem.  A localização é muito boa. Um excelente custo benefício.

Amamos a hospedagem na casa da Fátima! Super atenciosa, gente boa, prestativa.. Nos sentimos em casa! Foram realmente maravilhosos dias que já nos deixou saudade! Quarto Mt bom, apartamento Mt bem localizado! Recomendamos de olhos fechados! Vale a pena conferir! Esperamos voltar em breve...

Olá quero deixar meu feedback sobre minha estadia. O anúncio cumpri com o que descreve. Ótima localização, tranquilo e confiável. 
A anfitriã foi super educada nos deixou a vontade para entrar a sair. Ela nos deu suporte em tudo o que precisávamos  inclusive no café da mãe. A casa é muito higiênica e nos atendeu para o que queríamos. Água quente no chuveiro e tolhas e roupas de cama em perfeito estado e inclusive com direito as alguns mimos ( drinks no frigobar e docinhos welcome) Obrigada por tudo.
Fátima nos recebeu muito bem ! O apartamento fica bem localizado e o quarto é muito confortável ! Adoramos nossa estadia!
Everything was perfect I felt just at home :)

Ótima localização, a anfitriã deixa o apto praticamente para os hóspedes, pois ela fica em 1 cômodo separado, a cozinha é bem equipada e oferece um ótimo café da manhã. 
É muito simpática e deu algumas dicas de roteiros.
No frigobar havia algumas bebidas não alcoólicas de cortesia.
Piscina aquecida muito apropriada para a época do ano (julho).
Condomínio de alto padrão sem burocracias.
Muito bem recebido, tudo conforme descrito, só tenho elogios. Pretendo voltar novamente.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e a Fátima, uma anfitriã muito solícita, simpática e acessível. Foi uma estadia curta, somente uma noite, mas voltaria em outra oportunidade, com certeza.

name: * Room Taste of Real İstanbul
summary: This is a cozy private room with ensuite bathroom, located in the quiet part of Sultanahmet area. You can easily reach the main square within 5-6 mins on foot, and have the chance to visit all the major attractions of the Old City. We serve local style breakfast plate in the mornings at our rooftop terrace. Also, we have a 24/7 front desk agent to assist you with anything you might need.
interaction: Me and my colleagues at the front desk are always available for your assistance on directions, calling a taxi, ordering food through restaurants’ delivery, sightseeing tour arrangements, etc. It will be sufficient to stop by the front desk.

host.about:
Greetings from Istanbul :) This is Alihan, born in 1986 in Tarsus/Mersin. I have been through many areas of tourism business and currently engaged in both being a travel consultant and a host here at Airbnb. At our various rooms in Sultanahmet area, I'd be delighted to guest you at one of our accommodations ;) With years of guest satisfaction and understanding of hospitality, I am sure you will be enjoying your stay with us.. I am currently working as Travel Expert on Efendi Travel Istanbul and Reservation Manager at Deniz Houses Hotel and Naz Wooden House Inn Hotel in Istanbul. 

I, myself, like to travel single and explore on my own without any hassle, taste different things, travel to quiet locations and get away from the crowds much as possible. In Istanbul, whichever type of traveler you might be, you can always find an aspect suitable for yourselves. Just come over here and discover this beautiful city..If you would need any suggestions, I and my colleagues at the accommodations will be happy to assist you ;)

reviews.txt:
удобно добираться, рядом со всеми интересными местами, чисто, все есть. 
Не дорого. есть завтрак

This amazing place is the best! It is very close to everything I need, old city Sultanahmet (Mosques and everything) just few minutes walk. All amenities are around the hotel and easily accessible. Although it is in the heart of tourist spot, it is in a quiet street and really give a nice cosy place to sleep.
As a lone traveler and woman, this hotel give me a sense of security. It feels safe.  The staffs are extremely helpful and friendly. 
I left my wallet in the lobby area, the staff helped secure it. I need to go to airport, the staff who were on the way somewhere, brought me along and dropped me in the nearest metro station, saving me the trouble to drag my bagage around....and it was for free.
If I come back to Istanbul, i will stay in Sultan's inn again.
Как всегда, все супер. Спасибо!
Helpful host, many tips and arrangements for transportation. The place is 2-3 mins walk from Blue Mosque, 5-6 minutes from tramway.

My trip to Turkey means a lot to me. Alihan and his team helped me with everything I needed which I appreciate so much. The place is affordable and decent and everything is walking distance. Beautiful city. Definitely recommend.
Very good location, clean, comfortable - when you need only a place where you you want only to go sleep and whole day you spend outside the hotel it is a good choice.

Expérience très positive. Emplacement idéal dans un quartier agréable et touristique. Une femme de ménage qui passe tous les jours et remet le nécessaire de toilette. C'est une petite chambre d'hôtel mais c'est idéal si vous visitez la ville toute la journée et venez seulement pour dormir. Dommage qu'il n'y ait pas eu des bouteilles d'eau dans le frigidaire, par contre. Je recommande ce logement.
This was a great location to stay at in Istanbul I would recommend.

Очень удобное расположение для тех кто решил посмотреть достопремичательности.Подходит для одиночных путешественников и пар.Мне достался номер с недостаточно убранны сан узлом.А так хорошее соотношение цена качество.
Sultan Ahmet is a great area. Everything is in the neighborhood and if you're up for it.. just a walking distance away (tram is recommended)
