We are french's students, we traveled some days in Porto, this space was good and we can cooking easly. It was rainning so we eard every time the water fall to the ground in the street when we sleeping. But It was cool and or was well received by Ana et Gonçalo

We had a spledid time in the old centre of Porto.
The appartment is very well situated next to the old Ribeira square. It's perfect to have such an appartment to your disposal, you feel home, and have a place to relax between the exploration of this very nice city.
We thank Ana & Gonçalo, and we hope the appartment is free when we go back next year. Porto is charming original.

Ana and Goncalo were very helpful and accommodating. When they were not available they put us in touch with their nephew who was equally as helpful. The flat was as described, neat and tidy. The weather was quite cold, but thankfully A&G left us with extra blankets and electric heaters to use. Location was great. Outside the flat there was a slight smell of the river/ sewage, but in all honesty it did not come into the flat, and once you go down the road it doesn't carry on. This may also have been down to the very wet weather we had while there. All in all, very happy and would definitely recommend.

The hosts were very accommodating and agreed to meet with my parents as they were arriving before us. Communicated very well and always responded in a very timely manner. You couldn't have asked for a better location of this apartment and the place was identical to the pictures in the in the listing.

THE PLACE TO BE, l'appartement est situé au milieu de la Ribeira , tout peut se faire à pieds c'est l'ideal,l'appartement est très bien agencé et équipé.
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans ce duplex avec beaucoup de charme .
Accueil très chaleureux de Ana et Gonçalo, ils ont pris du temps pour nous indiquer tout ce qu'il y avait à faire sur Porto et répondus  à toutes nos interrogations en terme de commodités.. Merci..

We had a great time in Porto. Ana’s & Goncalo’s apartment is located right in the heart of the Old Town and is great value for money. You really are at the centre of things and it’s the perfect place to get swept away in the hustle and bustle of Porto. Ana and Goncalo were great hosts.

Ana and Gonçalo were very welcoming and made a lot of information about Porto's sights available. It was very clean, very beautiful and the location was superb. It does have a lot of restaurants around it, so it could be a bit noisy for us at night but otherwise  great location. We would stay there again.

Super appartement très bien placé, au cœur de l'animation de la Ribeira !
Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto !
Toutes les informations données par Ana et les documents laissés nous ont bien aidé à organiser notre séjour.  Nous avons (presque) tout fait à pied ! Le parking Ribeira est proche et bien utile pour garer le véhicule.
Merci !!!
Philippe

The appartment was great, it is really nice and cosy, and it is situated at a perfect location. Ana and Goncalo were very friendly, they were very helpfull during our stay. We had a great time during our stay in Porto!

name: King Size Private Bedroom in Surry Hills
summary: Welcome to Surry Hills! Private room with a King size bed close to the CBD, Oxford Street, Central Station and Hyde Park. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the location and the homeliness. There is a fully equipped kitchen with Nespresso machine and breakfast essentials. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
interaction: I live in the house and I'm a professional working in the city so you have the place to yourselves during the day. I'm friendly and easy-going and I'm happy to give you ideas for things to do whilst in this great city.

host.about:
Hi, I'm Hayley. I moved from the UK to Australia in November 2015 with my boyfriend and we love living in Surry Hills.
I'm very active; I enjoy the gym, running in Centennial Park and exploring all of the great walks around NSW and beyond. I volunteer for a women's charity and I'm also a Girl Guides leader.
I love to cook but with the variety of amazing restaurants on our doorstep it's hard to not eat out all the time!
As both a guest and host I'm polite, considerate and tidy. I like for our guests to feel at home when they stay with us - so if there's anything you need, just ask.

reviews.txt: We had a great stay here. Hayley was very easy to communicate with prior to our arrival. The room was spotless and comfortable and the breakfast/coffee was very much appreciated. The central location was perfect for our weekend in the city.

The room was just as described, and was in a perfect location in the heart of Surry Hills.  Getting to the CBD, or walking around the neighborhood were so easy from the apartment.

Hayley and Jack made my stay really pleasant, with lots of amenities and insights into the neighborhood and Sydney in general.  They even went out of my way helping me get to my next location.  Couldn't recommend them enough.
Comfortable place to stay, good kitchen facilities, easy access to transport and nearby supermarket, places to eat etc.
My boyfriend was in Sydney for a job interview. Hayley was a great host. The location was perfect as well.
Clean and comfortable lodgings, the hosts made me feel welcome. It's a relaxed household and I'm a returning guest. My preferred place to stay in Surry Hills.

This is a cute little cottage in the heart of Surry Hills close to Oxford Street and Central Station 
Hosts were friendly and made me feel very welcome with brekky provided in the mornings 
All necessary info was given to me before hand and  any questions I had were promptly answered
Arrangements were made to provide a key for my arrival when they could not make themselves available
Jack and Hayley were great hosts. I felt welcome, the room was comfortable. No problems at all.
Hayley and Jack made me feel very welcome. Everything about the listing was accurate and it was a great location and neighbourhood.
Jack and Hayley are awesome. Down to earth. Welcoming. Made us feel at home. Would def stay there again.
Hayley & Jack we're very easy & friendly hosts who I would stay with again.

name: FloresRooms 3T
summary: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Tem disponível Internet por wireless e TV por cabo, como maquina de café , frigorífico e micro-ondas.
interaction: A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre disponível para o receber e dar-lhe algumas dicas sobre a vida da cidade.
houseRules: Se fumar, só pedimos que o faça na varanda.

reviews.txt:
A casa está otimamente bem localizada, perfeito para quem quer conhecer a baixa da cidade a pé. O apartamento está como novo e, apesar de próximo dos locais mais frequentados ao fim de semana, é muito sossegado.
Recomendo e com certeza que vou voltar.

Excelente experiência!
Voltaremos de certeza :)

A localização do apartamento é excelente! Tivemos duas noites muito sossegadas, não houve mesmo barulho nenhum no prédio. A cama é confortável, a casa de banho é decente (há secador). A limpeza impressionou-nos imediatamente!

Muy buena elección!!andreia esta pendiente en todo momento y te hace sentir como en casa, el apartamento en el centro de Oporto y todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en la ciudad, tal y como aparece en las fotos, para dormir no se escuchaba un solo ruido y todo muy nuevo. 100% recomendable!!

Andreia foi muito amavel e disponobilizou tudo que necessario no apartamento. O Apartamento é moderno, impecável e no centro do Porto . Sem duvida recomendo. Andreia was very helpful and had everything you need in the apartment. It was modern, impeccable and right in the city centre. Highly recommended!

El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, muy limpio y acogedor. Con microondas, nevera, cafetera nespresso y había café, fruta... Andreia trabaja en la cafetería que hay debajo por lo que es fácil encontrarla si hay cualquier problema. La calle en la que está el apartamento es peatonal con tiendas y cafeterias en pleno centro pero lo bueno es que la habitación da a una zona interior por lo que no se oye ningún ruido.  Lo recomendamos sin ninguna duda!
Nos encantó el apartamento, céntrico, muy limpio y Andrea se porto muy bien con nosotros. Gracias por todo

Recomendo a todos se hospedarem com a Andréia.
Muito simpática e receptiva. Excelente apartamento e localização.

This is a small and very comfortable apartment. The location is excellent. It is just one minute walk to metro and train station. And it is located in a central area. Andrea is very nice and helpful. She responses every email I sent very quickly and provides all the information I need. I would choose to stay at this apartment again next time if I travelled there.

Andreia es una muy buena anfitriona, el departamento es justo como se muestra en las imágenes, está en el centro, muy cerca de una estación de metro, nos encanto hospedarnos allí, Andreia nos proporcionó una hoja con los lugares más representativos de Oporto, nos atendió muy bien !

name: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay) Sunny Aprt'
summary: Quiet, light apartment. Suits 3 people (couple + single). 4th Floor walkup. Countless nearby eateries are scattered in this quaint, quiet area which a blends 'old' & 'new'. A supermarket is downstairs. Easy access to trains, trams & buses to all areas. Reviews are in listing 389017 Please note: this is my home and only available to book when I am away. My belongings are in the apartment - it is not an empty apartment.
interaction: I am happy to advise and chat with guests about the many options of things to do in Hong Kong. Hong Kong is a vibrant and busy city and guests will find they have easy access to areas of Hong Kong. I am happy to help to make your stay as comfortable as possible - to either share my 'local' knowledge of the city or to let you explore with maps and a sense of adventure.
houseRules: Appreciate no smoking inside the building. I've never had a problem in my 8 years of hosting this apartment - all guests have been extrememly respectful of the space and items in it. Few details to help maintain the 'pest free' and comfort of my home: 1. Please keep the 3 sink holes covered & closed when not in use.  I have no cockroaches etc and ask that drains remain covered to ensure my home remains this way. 2. Walter filter. Water is drinkable from the tap. If you choose to use the filter - please ensure it is only filtered with COLD water. The hot water ruins the filter. 3. Hot water: please leave OFF when not in use - prevents high power costs. It is electric so it'll need 3-5 minutes to hear prior to a shower  4: When going out for the day, or leaving, please ensure the following is turned off: water heater, air-conditioners, lights & coffee machine. (& sink holes closed/covered) 5. When leaving, please ensure the door is locked (seems crazy, but many forget this!)

host.about:
I'm a Kiwi now living in NZ
I have spent time living, working and travelling in Hong Kong - experiences that have built my love of travel.
I work as a counsellor in a school and in an agency.
I enjoy walking, biking, going to the theatre or movies, enjoying a good coffee and spending time with my family (whom I actually like) and my friends (whom I also like!).

address.street: Tai Hang (Causeway Bay), Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Very comfortable apartment, perfect for what we needed.  Lots of good local amenities, good location, easy for buses, taxis and 5 mins to Tin Hau MTR (Metro).  Causway Bay is only 10 mins walk for lots and lots of shopping. We had both rooms, everything was as you need it, a home from home.  Su gave us lots of information and was always available during the booking process.  Thank you Su!
2nd time booking. Everything is perfect!
Clean ! Good!
It was a great time living here. The loction is convenient. Close to the subway and bus station. Householder was patient to answer  and explain questions.
지하철역에서 가깝고, 집앞바로 슈퍼가 있어 좋았습니다.

Su's appartement was a very nice choice for us.
The neighbourhood is plenty of small shops and food stalls or fancy restaurants and bars... you will find whatever you want.
Not to far from an important bus hub and metro station, but incredibly quiet.
We three slept like babies.
The house was super super clean and tidy.

Happy to have discovered such a nice place in HK.

We will definitly come back
Lovely flat in a hip neighbourhood. Recommended
Lovely place in a fantastic location . Host very friendly

Su’s apartment is in a great local neighbourhood close to lots of shops, restaurants and the MTR. The apartment itself is bright and clean with enough space for a comfortable stay. Su is very well organised and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended.
值得推荐

name: Renovated 2 Bedroom/2 Bathroom Apartment P0305
summary: All of our apartments include free wireless internet, air conditioning/heating, satellite TV, a phone with free US/Canada calls, one outdoor parking space, and weekly cleaning services. Extra rollaway bed available!
interaction: We are always available to answer any questions and to help guests throughout their stay.

host.about: Je vous propose une location de vacances au Sunset Suites, le choix parfait pour le temps libre des voyageurs qui veulent le confort d’un atmosphère a la maison loin de chez eux avec les services d’un hôtel. Mes appartements totalement équipés sont situés, dans la Ville de Mont-Royal, un secteur dans le centre de Montréal. Proche du centre commercial Rockland et a quelques minutes en voiture de l’aéroport et du centre-ville de Montréal. Sunset Suites satisfait principalement les voyageurs de longue durée (7 jours ou plus), mais je fais de mon mieux pour héberger les voyageurs recherchant un séjour de 3 jours minimum.

reviews.txt:
I would strongly recommend Maya's suite to any one whether you are by yourself, with friends, or family. It is very clean , supplies in abundance, WIFI is strong. The only thing I would suggest to Maya is to try to get in touch with client upon request. I did try even emailed her but vainly.


I had a great time. I felt like home.
Maya was very welcoming from the beginning of our stay to check out. She was very willing to help us and even called us an uber for our travels. She was very kind and made our stay very pleasurable.

name: In Sisli. Walking distance to Taksim,Nişantaşı.
summary: At the center of Istanbul,Sisli.  You can arrive “Osmanbey” Subway Station in 3 minutes by walking:)  5 minutes to Taksim by subway, 15 mins to Taksim by walking.  Walking distance to Mecidiyeköy & Nişantaşı.  Only for females.

host.about:
My name is Gokce. I am a clinical psychologist and a pHD student :)
I of course love traveling !! :)

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Brick House: Unique Garden Apartment! King Bed!
summary: *Please keep in mind  before you decide to book that this is my home, not a hotel, so basic courtesy is appreciated and expected *Please be informed that I am connected with local law enforcement so read house rules *Contact Before Booking Brick House is a renovated open floor garden apartment nestled in the heart of the Bedford Stuyvesant enclave of Brooklyn, NY. Brick House is located 2-12 minute walk from 5 train stations (mass transit) A, C, J, and L train
interaction: I am as available as you need me to be and as scarce as you want me to be...
houseRules: 1. If you have more people staying then agreed upon your reservation will be canceled 2. If you have a party, gathering, or anything other then a residential stay your reservation will be cancelled without refund and I won't haggle over the meaning of residential stay 3. If you smoke marijuana and/or do other illicit drugs your reservation will be cancelled 4. No Smoking inside, but there is a park across the street.  5. DO NOT Use towels to remove make up. 6. If you move around  furniture in the apt. Please make sure return the apt to it original layout when you check out. 7. Only toilet paper can go in the toilet. Place all other items in the garbage can. This can damage the pipes, your deposit will be nonrefundable 8. Separate garbage from recycling (boxes, paper, plastic and glass containers) and put garbage and recycling to curb after 5pm on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. 9. Any damage done to any property or items missing, will be your responsibility  and deducted from your deposi

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I have a love of travel and people and am excited when I get to meet good people and explore the world.  I have lived on 3 different continents and am eager to spend time on the other 4.  Thankfully, Bnb allows me to continue to travel the world through the people I have the pleasure of hosting.

reviews.txt: Exactly as pictured. If you're gonna be in Brooklyn with a loved one, this is the place.

Aswad our host was very professional and friendly, he met with us when we arrived at check-in and gave us a tour of not only the apartment we booked, but of all the other apartments at the building. 

The apartment is EXACTLY as pictured, its such a wonderful space. I would recommend any of Aswad's apartments as places to stay while visiting New York.

Thanks again Aswad.

Literally a home away from home!  Very spacious and accommodating. Definitely comfortable. The neighborhood was fairly quiet and nice. In a great location that is close to the nearest shops and restaurants. The host was awesome!  He was very polite and very knowledgeable of the area.  I will be back!

The place was not as it appeared in the picture and my guests had to move out the next morning into a hotel. The location was not good either and it wasn't clean. There was no drinking water in the apartment. I have always stayed in air b and b's and never had a problem. This was a first time issue which was quite shocking for me.

Fabulous! If I could give this place 6 stars, I would. Super clean, very close to trains. Aswad is an excellent host. I'm a repeat guest here and am never disappointed. This is my go-to spot whenever I'm in NYC. If you're looking for a clean, comfortable place that's conveniently located with a super friendly host - this is the place!
Hermoso y cálido, buen anfitrión, muy claro y amable. Todo salió muy bien.

I can't say enough good things about this place. Aswad's home was beautiful, clean, spacious and comfortable. He was such an accommodating host, allowed me to check in and out based on my flight times. The neighborhood is a wonderful breath of fresh air. It's perfect for those who are trying to get a taste of real life as a New Yorker. I will definitely be returning!

Aswad is friendly and professional guy good with communication. and helped us check out late , flat was clean and like the pictures ... it had good local spots to check out connections to trains very near a real Brooklyn experience
Aswad's place is awesome! It has character, is clean and in a very nice neighborhood. Would def come back!
Clean, great location, cozy.

name: YÜZME HAVUZLU VE DENİZ MANZARALI
summary: Adalar ve Marmara Denizi manzaralı, stüdyo,1+1 ve 2+1 tarzındaki 60 misafir odası ve 200 yatak kapasitesi ile odalarında hızlı internet erişimi, HDTV ve Vazo Özel Uyku Deneyimli yatakları ile lüks ve şık bir İstanbul deneyimi yaşatmayı vaat ediyor.  Vazo Suite Anadolu yakasında iş merkezlerinin yanı başında olan Maltepe bölgesinde otoyol bağlantısı, boğaz köprüsü, Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı, Maltepe Sahil, E-5 ve Metro İstasyonuna yakınlığı ile sizlere bölge ulaşımlarında kolaylık sağlamaktadır.
interaction: 7 /24 RESEPSİYON HİZMETİ, 7 /24 GÜVENLİK

host.about:
Ne türde bir seyahat planlıyorsunuz? İş seyahati, turistik gezi, şehir gezisi…. 

Evinizden uzakta geçireceğiniz seyahatlerinizde sizin için en iyi seçim Vazo Suite olacaktır. Vazo Suite konum olarak İstanbul adalar, alışveriş merkezleri gibi birçok yaşam alanlarına komşudur.

Hayalinizdeki ev konforunu yaşayabileceğiniz Vazo Suite, özgün mimarisi, deniz ve adalar manzaralı odaları, açık ve kapalı yüzme havuzu, sauna, jakuzi ve fitness salonları ile isteklerinize cevap vermek için sizleri bekliyor.

reviews.txt: Otel olarak güzel bir mekan, eğer kendi eviniz gibi hissetmek istiyorsanız tavsiye etmem. Karşılama ve diğer hizmetlerin tümü otel gibi hizmet verilmekte.
orta üstü
Tres bon hotel avec belle vue !! Emplacement pas mal pour avoir accès au moyen de transport, seul remarque est que le service menage laisse a revoir !

name: MODERN DESIGNED STUDIO APARTMENT IN TAKSIM PLACE
summary: A glowing trip to Beyoglu and exotic history of Pera  Luce Di Pera is a boutique hotel enviably located in the heart of Istanbul -  Taksim, Beyoglu of the historical Pera region;  right in the center Beyoglu’s most popular attractions. The boutique hotel has 9 large, design and elegant rooms provide a refreshing night’s rest in the city that never sleeps. Our staff takes great pride in consistently offering an exceptional experience to our guests.
interaction: ıt is in the hearth of taksim . It is very close to metro , public transportation, istiklal street, galata and all shops and historical places even these factors it exactly in the silence area.

reviews.txt:
Отличное место! Очень хорошее расположение в богемной части Стамбула. Рядом с самой известной барной улицей города, но в тоже время очень тихое и уютное. Рядом веселые бары, отличные галереи, очень вкусные уличные места с едой. 
Прекрасный владелец, с которым обсудили все детали перед приездом. Перед приездом составили план каждого дня. Идеальное расположение, чтобы увидеть весь Стамбул: туристический, богемный, калорийный и странный) Мы обязательно вернёмся! За маршрутами и советами обращайтесь)

Very much enjoyed staying here. Very friendly & helpfull staff, really good location, nicely furnished, clean.
Enjoyed The Complimentary tea coffee in the foyer. Great 24hour reception.
I’m so glad to spent my vacations on this place!

We stayed 3 nights, but when my girlfriend checked out she didn’t realize at the time she left her ‘make up bag’ full of make up in the room, which also has some jewelry in it. She called the mgr a couple days later, and the Mgr said she should have called same day bc it’s gone even if they did find it, it wouldn’t be there anymore... as hotel staff there’s gotta be a place for lost and found at least for a week or something.

What a wonderful place! What wonderful people....
Brilliant safe location - just off the busy Balik market and Istiklal Caddesi so it was quiet at night but just a step away from the hectic excitement of the street-life, and only a 5 minute walk from the Taksim or Sishane  metro stops, making to very accessible for exploring the rest of Istanbul.
Our room (22) was great - perfectly clean and tidy with some beautiful touches and the most amazing, powerful and hot, if uniquely shaped, shower.
The friendliness and recommendations from our hosts were spot-on and added to the incredible experience that is Istanbul. Definitely recommended. Thank you Pelin for your hospitality.

5 Harika gün geçirdik! çok güzel ve güleryüzlü bir karşılama ile karşılandık. Oda beklediğimiz gibi çok güzeldi, resimlerle aynıydı. Konumu İstiklal caddesinin tam ortasında yani mükemmel bi lokasyonda. Sadece odada giderlerden kaynaklı küçük bi koku sorunu vardı bunun için ellerinden geldiğince bu sorunu çözüp bize yardımcı oldular, hatta odamızı değiştirdiler :) Her zaman çok (Website hidden by Airbnb) çok memnun kaldık. Bir daha ki sefere görüşmek üzere.
Sevgiler :)

Location is fantastic and room bedding is romantic fabricated, colors and design. 
Room size is decent compared to other hotels of the same category. 
Will come back again :-)

Everything was great, we had a good time 
The staff were really helpful 
I would stay there again
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

It’s on a very good location easy to reach everywhere. The hotel was so nice it was perfect for my honeymoon! The staff was very kind and friendly on a professional level. The hotel was very clean also. I will return here again thank you very much.
See you guys again !!

name: Ideal para famílias!Muita segurança
summary: Meu Apto fica em um condomínio que fica dentro de outro condomínio. Fica a 150 metros de uma delegacia, 350 metros de um chopping, e 5 minutos de caminhada da práia. Muita segurança e comodidade para quem deseja curtir o Rio de Janeiro sem Trânsito!
interaction: Estou à disposição a qualquer hora para elucidar qualquer dúvida e prestar auxílios para meus hóspedes.
houseRules: 1) Checkin 13:00,  2) checkout 11:00 3) silêncio após as 22:00 horas 4) animais de estimação até 5 kg 5) reponha tudo o que quebrar 6) reservar com antecedência de pelo menos 7 dias as seguintes dependências do Condomínio : sala de jantar, salão de festas, churrasqueira, sendo que estas dependências estão sujeitas á aprovação da Adm do condomínio.  7) equipagem de praia ( colchonetes de praia) deverá ser entregue limpa, ou será cobrada uma taxa extra de R$ 30,00.  8) não sujar paredes 9) seja feliz!

host.about: Fácil trato e sem frescuras.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Apartamento ótimo...perto dos principais shopping da zona Oeste da para ir andando ou brt.. praia próxima da para ir andando ou uber 8 reais ate praia da macunba e pontal ... a vasta opção dentro do condomínio mais vale atenta as regras do condomínio ...segunda-feira piscina não funciona demais dias até 17hs... mais no geral fiquei satisfeito.

Ótimo atendimento, levamos a nossa cachorra que é uma labradora e pela atenção especial do Augusto o condomínio recebeu ela muito bem, apartamento igual as fotos, limpeza e recepção ótimas, não faltou nada para a hospedagem. Fácil acesso às praias mais isoladas e também a avenidas com muito comércio, local muito seguro.
Estadia maravilhosa. O Ap super limpo e aconchegante. Cozinha prática e com todos os utensílios que precisamos.
Augusto e um anfitriao de primera classe.
Casa perfeita para família, limpeza impecável, anfitrião atencioso e preocupado com o bem estar do hóspede. Bairro muito tranquilo, próximo a Shopping e praias.
Boa tarde minha estadia com Augusto foi tudo bem, muito atencioso. Ap com vista maravilhosa bom espaço e local  tranquilo. Recomendo. Maria do Carmo

Passamos dias maravilhosos no apartamento do Augusto!!!! Desde a Isabel, que fez nosso check in, até o pessoal do condomínio, todos foram muito agradáveis e receptivos. O apartamento super limpo e organizado, muito bem equipado. As praias próximas são lindas, há ótimos restaurantes e um shopping ao lado. Recomendo a todos. Adoraremos voltar e nos hospedar novamente em seu apartamento! Muito obrigada.
Apartamento ótimo! Bonito, limpo e com uma varanda incrível. Fica dentro de um condomínio com piscina. Fomos para a praia de uber pois achamos meio longe para ir a pé.
Gracias Augusto por el servicio.  Muy atento.

name: Adorable Garden Gingerbread House
summary: Romantic hideaway! This property has the lush beauty and privacy of Hana, without the drive! Only 15-20 minutes to the airport, 10 minutes to beaches, 2 minutes to restaurants and shops...on a private gated property with organic nursery. BEAUTIFUL!
interaction: We will greet you and orient you to the property and live on the adjacent property so can be there in less than a minute if you need us...but we also respect that you sought our property for privacy. We are available to guide you, answer questions and give you a tour of the farm if desired.
houseRules: This property is a "drama-free zone" so please respect the peace and serenity concept.... Our biggest rule is that you respect the land, people, plants and animals on it...and yourselves as well! Please note check in is after 3:00pm and Check out is 11:00am. Changes to this need to be planned well in advance to coordinate with cleaners. Thank you. Otherwise, the cleaning crew will be showing up promptly at the check out time of 11. We welcome children but ask that parents monitor them while in the yard....this is "real nature" with a seasonal stream, slippery rocks, etc. and we do not want anyone hurt. Please take 100% responsibility for your safety and that of your children. Quiet hours are 9pm-8am. Noise projected beyond the property during quiet hours is not allowed. This is a working nursery and farm so please know that we do work and live here. It is very private however, others are on the property. It is a LARGE property.... We appreciate respectful, responsible people who are ca

host.about:
We are friendly, fun, hardworking people happy to share our beautiful piece of paradise with you. We are writers, photographers, gardeners/farmers, divers, entrepreneurs, animal lovers, artistic, creative people dedicated to living peaceful, drama-free lives. We have been together for over 20 years, and on Maui longer than that. 
This property is the cure for "Nature-Deficit-Disorder"....let us give you a tour of the farm and garden, teach you about coffee production and tropical plants....then make a smoothie (or other delicious tropical beverage!) from fresh banana, mango or likikoi!

reviews.txt:
We had a great time at your brand newly upgraded cozy, little gingerbread home! Eve and Steve (Jeff Bridges twin brother LOL!!!) are amazing hosts. This is a beautiful location, very lush, wooded garden with a nice river in the back of the cabin. Eve has an awesome sacred garden located on the property. It is very unique, peaceful, serene, excellent for relaxing and meditation. The gingerbread is close to a cool little beach town called Paia and the Baldwin Beach Park. Thank you for letting us enjoy your beautiful property. We definitely recommend the Gingerbread House for couples!
P.S. Don't bring an alarm clock, the roosters will be happy to wake you up in the morning!

This was a great place to stay and a great experience.  There are interesting grounds and the amazing plant nursery to explore, and there is also Eve's Forbidden Fruit Stand.  The Gingerbread House is truely unique.  It is very interesting and has been recently remodeled.  A beautiful place inside and out.  The grounds offer a variety of fruit trees and it is set in tropical rain forest.  It was a most pleasurable base for our adventures on Maui.

Eve's enchanted jungle cottage was amazing! It was just what we needed! The seasonal creek behind the house was flowing, the tangerines were juicy and ripe, and the succulent garden was spectacular! Eve has really created a special place with her creativity and green thumb! The labyrinths arranged on the property were fantastic for clearing the mind so we even bought a book Eve wrote about labyrinths. Thanks for the beautiful accommodations! Bodhi the dog is super chilled out and cool to have around too. Very private but not overly isolated. Perfect place!
We love this place and this house. It's a small paradise. Eve is a great host and woman.

Eve's place is sweet, cozy and a complemented our Maui experience. Nestled next to a stream with trees laden with oranges, lemons and bananas, the Gingerbread House delivered all the comforts and ease of home, while providing great views of the tropical trees towering above us. Morning chickens would cluck near our door and the friendliest dog in the world, Bodhi, always gave us a nuzzle. The house is on property shared with Eve's plant nursery -a beautiful setting that completes the picture.

We loved this cozy little cottage!  It was close to the airport, and only a few miles away from Paia, a happening little town.  The Sacred Garden was pretty amazing. The grounds were quiet, and we loved the rain at night falling on our rooftop.  It was a very peaceful and relaxing place.  Thanks Eve for letting us stay.  Hoping to come back and visit again one day. Mahalo!

Eve and Steve were really outgoing and helpful -- and the cottage was fantastic. The place is situated in a beautiful landscape with lots to explore. Inside it's cozy, clean and the sort of place you want to tuck away inside for a few days to relax. There's a great little kitchen and big bathroom so there's no "roughing it" about this place. Highly recommend this spot as Eve and Steve have clearly thought through all of the details to make it a great place to stay in Maui.
This beautiful, clean, comfy cabin is located in a gorgeous haven called the Sacred Garden.  It was everything we hoped it would be!!

Eve's Gingerbread House really is adorable and the grounds around it is so beautiful. There's even a stream running close by which you can hear from inside the house. The place looks even better than the photos. Wifi and cellular reception can be spotty, but what a great location to explore this part of Maui! Makawao and Paia is a five to fifteen minute drive away with restaurants and hiking trails close by. I highly recommend staying here. The place is charming, comfy, and cozy!

As there are so many comments in English we decide to serve the German speaking customers with a comment in German:
Die Lage von Eve's Gingerbread-House für die Erkundung der gesamten Insel ist optimal. Das GB-House befindet sich auf einem tropischen Grundstück mit einem Bach, dessen Plätschern einen angenehm in den Schlaf sinken lässt. Bett, Kitchenette mit Kühlschrank und Sofa bilden den Wohnraum. Das separate Bad hat eine tolle Dusche. Das gesamte Cottage ist sehr gepflegt und sehr sauber.  Das Bett ist typisch "amerikanisch bequem".  Der Internetzugang im Haus klappte während unseres Aufenthaltes nicht, war aber bei Eve möglich.  Eve ist eine herzliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt und können das GB-House empfehlen.

name: Greystone Apartment 2
summary: Hi my name is Julie and ı am originally from the UK. I understand when traveling the importance of comfort and cleanliness. We wish for you to Feel at home in one of our stylishly decorated Greystone Apartments. Tastefully renovated, with winding marble staircase, set amidst the hustle and bustle of Bohemian Beyoglu. Relax on your own private terrace. Bed linen and towels provided. Fully equipped kitchen, WiFi, TV, air-con in bedrooms.  5 min walk from Taxim square and metro stops.
interaction: We personally greet our guests to hand over the keys. We spend quality time with every customer explaining where you are and what is local. we have specially made a brochure of things to see and do seen through the locals eyes. We can offer our guests the choice of an organized private taxi and local travel cards are also available.
houseRules: Our apartments have been designed for couples who want to relax in our quiet apartments. Children under the age of 13 are not usually accepted. ıf you contact us with personal requests we can discuss this. One older child or adult is charged EUR 30 per person per night in an additional bed. We provide a futon with all bed linen. cash /Visa ,  The hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival.

host.about:
We are an Anglo Turkish family run business, renting out refurbished apartments tastefully decorated to a high standard. 

Our 19th century apartments are situated among 18th century Armenian architecture, where churches and mosques mingle. You can feel the energy and pulse of this unique area. As a person who enjoys photography this is the area for you to explore and wander. Staying at our apartments you have a range of amenities right on your doorstep. Taksim underground metro station is within easy walking distance, putting the whole of Istanbul at your disposal.

We would like to offer our guests a comfortable and cultural stay with either long or short term agreements in the historical Tarlabashi district in the heart of Istanbul.

reviews.txt: Great flat, Nice host, good location!

The flat is finished to a good standard and is the perfect size for a couple having a long weekend. The location is excellent where you can walk to bars, restaurants, and all the main tourist sites. You can also easily get taxis from the main road.

Julie was a wonderful host, giving us local advice about Istanbul and what to do to get around. When I fell ill and had to go to hospital she went above and beyond, accompanying me to hospital so she could speak to the Turkish doctors. We want to come back to Istanbul soon so that we can stay with Julie again!
l'ost e' stato molto gentile e (Website hidden by Airbnb) ha fornito molte indicazioni su tutto, il posto corrispondeva esattamente alle nostre aspettative

L appartement est confortable,joli et tout équipé et comme sur les photos et très proche de la rue piétonne principale et à 10min à pied de taskim! Il se trouve cependant en limite d un quartier assez délabré mais qui est en pleine transformation. Pas de problème de securité et ce n est pas gênant car l'immeuble est en tres bon état et dedié à la location!Julie et son employé sont sympas disponibles et serviables! Tres content de mon sejour! Merci

Julie personally welcomed us at the apartment and informed us about all the important things including places to visit and all the necessary stores around the apartment. She was very friendly and always available for help during our stay.The apartment is located in the middle of Beyoglu (10 Minutes away from Taksim Square), a district where you can hardly find any tourists. (which is great if you want to feel like a real person from Istanbul). The apartment is exactly like shown in the pictures. It is very clean and you have everything you need. All together it was a very nice stay and i can just highly recommend this apartment ! We will definitly book this apartment again if we come back to Istanbul!

Our trip to Istanbul was brilliant, made even better by the beautiful and well-maintained apartment as our base. It is perfectly situated to the bustling nightlife and great places to eat, and to get the team over to the historic district. Julie had left lots of useful information in a pack, which we used - including booking a great local luxury Hamam - and she also arranged taxis for us to and from the airport, which really helped. Great service, lovely apartment. Perfect :)

Die Fotos des Apartments entsprechen der Realität, gut eingerichtete Stadtwohnung, Balkon mit Abendsonne mit Blick auf das Strassenleben der Nachbarschaft. ( Apt 4 ) Das Haus liegt knapp ausserhalb der Ausgangsszene von Beyoglu in einem lebendigen Wohnquartier im Umbruch. Für uns war es ideal, wir würden die Wohnung wieder buchen.

It was a wonderful time we had at Greystone! Great place! The interior is amazing and we enjoyed the nice terrace...
The recommendations of Faruk were great and we enjoyed the best turkish food we ever had with a Raki ;-)

Unfortunatelly we haven't had the chance to meet Julie. But she always helped out if we had any questions!

The only think was that we didn't expect to pay extra for a third person when we arrived... But we managed in the end.

I would definately recommend that place!

Julie's apartments are a great place to stay in Istanbul. We loved the comfortable rooms and especially the big balcony (Apartment 2)...although we didn't really use it as the weither was a bit rainy. Julie was a great help explaining our confused taxi driver where the Greystones Apartments are located and arranging a ride back to the airport on very short notice. I can highly recommend this lovely place in the heart of Istanbul!

The neighborhood was very authentic, felt like we lived there. Great proximity to main artery of the city, shopping street. Apt was clean, modern, beautiful, spacious, shining, awesome shower. Beautiful little touches. Julie was welcoming, kind, gave us a homemade guidebook. I would recommend! :)

name: Private Room with perfect location in Bostanci
summary: The house is the perfect choice for travelers who wants to discover and experience local side of Istanbul. . It's located at the heart of the Asian Side ''Bostanci'' where you can find all the transport possibilities for traveling all the sites.  The location of the apartment is very quiet, silence and safe. The flat is fully equipped for your comfort.
interaction: I can show around the city historical places, If I am available. During your stay, you can contact with me anytime you want by mobile phone.

host.about:
Hello,

I am an easy going person. I love to travel, learning different cultures, meeting with new people from all around the world. I have travelled around 40 countries. I would like to travel more.

I love to enjoy having quality time with people. I love to explore new experiences. I like going out with friends, tasting different food, participate concerts. 

I am a finance professional. I work for a multinational retail company.

reviews.txt: I had to sleep on a couch instead of private room which I booked before and paid for it. Because there were another couple who have booked room before and wanted to extend their accommodation after booking room from Airbnb. So also he was renting house to people after meeting with them on Airbnb and not keeping his promises. Entering house was horrible because he gaved room another people there were no enough keys, I had to wait for them on the door for long time and it happened couple times. Bathroom was not clean and in the shared living room which I had to sleep was noisy and dirty smelled. I am sorry that I couldn't be able to write a command about room that I've booked..

Engin's place is located in very nice neighborhood, near to all amenities, personnaly! it was a big pleasure to meet Engin, he made us to feel such as we are in our home, he's helpful, and a cultivated person! I hope I could get another trip to his beautiful city. Thank you Engin.

Engin fue muy amable y flexible con nosotros. Tuvimos una buena charla sobre la vida. Su casa es muy grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hospedarse.
Muy recomendado

Anadolu yakasında işiniz var ise yer anlamında ve fiyat/kalite anlamında tercih edilesi bir konaklama. Bina eski fakat evin içinde bir dökülme söz konusu değil. Banyo/tuvalet, mutfak ve yatak odası hem temizlik açısından hem de malzemeler (tuvalet kağıdı, sabun, duş, kahve, bardak, su, temiz çarşaf, havlu ve battaniye vs.) anlamında yeterliydi.

name: Inner City Spacious Loft- City View
summary: This beautiful, sunny loft room is on the top floor of a three storey free-standing terrace in Redfern. The room is very spacious, private, quiet and open. We are a family of 4 adults and will give you as much privacy or company as you would like.
interaction: We're happy to discuss your travel plans or provide ideas for things to do during your stay but recognise too that you're likely to be a technological whizz with all information just a click away and in no need of advice
houseRules: Our neighbourhood is quiet, friendly and respectful and we expect you to be mindful of that as we are.

host.about:
I am a retired solicitor living in our home with my wife Judith who is a high school French teacher. Currently two of our three grown-up children live with us and we have a spare room. We have always had guests in our house since the children were very little and it is something that we would like to continue doing as I believe connecting with other people and learning about different cultures is wonderful. 
We love film, food, travel and music. This is a very musical household. Sport is also a very big thing- you will always find somebody watching the tennis/cricket/football on the television or going for a wok or bike ride. 
We ourselves love Airbnb and have used it all over the world in recent years. In Canada, France, South America and of course all around here in Australia. 
My life motto: you could die tomorrow so live life to the full!

reviews.txt:
Besides the location is very convent not only near the city center but also surrounded by 2 Coles market. This is the most fantastic and lovely experience I ever had.
Paul and his family are very good at taking care of their guests, they prepare milk, honey, orange, cereal for us. During the 2 weeks, they just treat us as same as a part of the family, inviting us to their festival dinner, introducing us to their best friends. Every morning they would ask if it was a good sleep. Every evening, they would say good night before we go back to the room. 
If ever I will go back to Sydney again, this would be my only choice. 

这是我在Airbnb中最最满意的一次住宿体验｡
不仅仅这个地理位置很好,去市中心,悉尼歌剧院,门口的公交车直达｡而且周围的配套设施齐全,十分方便｡
Paul一家人待客非常之好,如若对待家人｡一直给我们买牛奶,橙汁,谷物,蜂蜜等等｡尽可能地提供信息帮助我们｡
只要去悉尼,对于住处,这永远会是我的第一,也是唯一的选择｡

Paul, Judith et ses enfants nous ont très bien reçus, la maison est agréable, le jardin également. La chambre est spacieuse, lumineuse et au calme. Le quartier est bien desservi en bus et proche de cafés, restaurants. La famille nous a très bien conseillé sur Sydney et ils sont très attentionnés. Nous avons même eu de la baguette au petit dej! Merci encore de nous avoir accueillies, c'était très bien!
I had a lovely stay at Paul and Judith's beautiful home. The house is in a great area and as hosts Paul and Judith were extremely hospitable.

Paul and his family were incredibly welcoming, hospitable and really helpful as I started to find my feet in Sydney. The room was lovely and spacious with a very comfy bed. The family were always happy to chat and share a meal but likewise you could have your own space if needed. I cannot recommend this Airbnb more highly.

Paul was not there to receive us , however he got his son, Tim to help us with the check in procedures. Both Tim and Nicole are very helpful and friendly, sharing with us food places around the vicinity.  

The city is easily accessible from the place.
There are lots of food choices in the location as well. 

The room and toilet is true to picture, it was really comfortable and spacious. We enjoyed our stay there.

We especially love the two dogs; really friendly and cute:)

We had a wonderful time at Paul and Judith's lovely, spacious and peaceful home. We were well looked after by Nicola and Tim in Paul and Judith's absence and enjoyed having their home for us alone. We felt very much at home, enjoyed a cosy room upstairs and the location was perfect for my work and close to some wonderful cafes and bakeries in Redfern and Surry Hills. Paul and Judith were especially kind to send me something that I unfortunately left behind. Truly generous hosts and we can absolutely recommend anyone to stay at their beautiful home!!

Paul and his lovely family were very hospitable and more than accommodating. Everything from the room to the kitchen to the rest of the house had personality, charm and above all, a wonderful homey atmosphere. The best part about our stay was Judith's (Paul's wife) excellent selection of coffee and of course, their two very friendly dogs.

Beautiful house in a great location of Sydney. The room was very nice, clean and tidy, in a private spot of the house on the top floor. Also, guests have their own bathroom.

My mom and a friend stayed with Paul and his family and I also had the pleasure to meet him one day.

Paul is a great host, very hospitable and absolutely helpful, it was great staying with him! 

Thanks so much for letting them have a great time in Sydney :)

A lovely family,  very friendly and welcoming. We felt comfortable as being in our home. Excellent location with good transport connections. City centre and Airport 15 minutes faraway. Wonderful dogs, we loved stay with them because they are easygoing and affectionate
Judith and family were wonderful hosts. Great location and very comfortable room .

name: MySweetHomePT
summary: Apartment in prime area of the city, easy access to major points of interest in the city of Porto, fully furnished and equipped.
interaction: In the reception you are presented with all the space and are clarified the doubts that may arise. I provide relevant information on bars and restaurants as well as places of social and cultural interest of the city.

host.about: Olá, o meu nome é Alexandra Cunha, abraço este projeto pois para mim é uma mais valia conhecer pessoas de todo o mundo e culturas diferentes, penso ser muito enriquecedor. Sou sociável, mãe, amiga, comunicativa e divertida. Espero que o meu espaço seja tratado com respeito, tal como se estivesse em sua casa. Espero que todos os meus hóspedes se sintam confortáveis, acarinhados e em casa. Quanto a mim, farei os possíveis para que tal aconteça e para que aproveitem ao máximo o que a cidade do Porto tem para oferecer. Obrigada.

reviews.txt: The apartment was great!! Even better than in the pics. Communication was extra smooth with Alexandra. We loved the location, walking distance to the city centre of Porto. Parking and aircon were awesome. Recommendations on restaurants were wonderful, plenty of local choices very close to the apartment. Safe area and comfortable bed. Strongly recommended. With no doubt we'll stay there when we go back to Porto. Obrigada!!!!

De las mejores experiencias con airbnb, el apartamento esta genial, muy acogedor limpio y no muy lejos del centro. 

Alexandra es una chica encantadora que nos ha tratado muy bien. 

En general una experiencia estupenda. 100% recomendable!

The apartment is great, very comfortable and better than the pictures. Location is good, 10mins walk from the port. Communication was easy. 
The host and especially her husband were Amazing, they agreed to meet us at 4h30 in the morning for the check in because we had a flight delay, they even offered to give us a ride from the train station!
Amazing people and amazing apartment, we had a great time.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

Alexandra and her husband were wonderful hosts! They went above and beyond in every way possible! They left detailed maps and went through with me step by step which roads to take, buses to travel on, places to see. They left many suggestions for cafes, restaurants, etc. They were prompt, extremely helpful and communicative both in person and via email and text. The place is exactly as it is photographed and is in a very central and accessible location.
Accueil très chaleureux et très attentionné. Alexandra et son compagnon nous ont donné beaucoup d'informations, d'adresses, de guides et ont été force de proposition tout au long de notre séjour.

Alexandra, Rui and Francescita are  charming with nice attention If you are looking for a very nice apartment extra clean and well located , do not hesitate . The days in Porto went by so fast , We.will return one day
Definitely at the same apartment 
Marlene and Charles

The stay was great. Host met us right outside their house. And was very accommodating. Gave us a full tour of the house. Provided many local places to check out. 
After we were provided some must see sites of Porto which were great as well. Recommend this house for anyone going to Porto. The house is clean, and the friendly accommodations make it a place to visit multiple times.

Alexandra, es una mujer muy amable. Me atendió muy bien, con las explicaciones con todo detalle. El apartamento es luminoso y muy bien edificado. La seguridad es absoluta con parking privado que esta incluido en la estancia.  Una autentica experiencia en Oporto. Para repetir. Gracias Alex.

Le jour de notre arrivée nous avons été très bien accueilli aussi bien par alexandra que son mari. Ils ont pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y avait à visiter et comment s'y rendre, de plus une petite bouteille de vin  était à notre disposition ainsi que des fruits pour nous souhaiter notre arrivée. Enfin, l'appartement est très bien situé à deux pas du centre ville et tout est bien desservi aussi bien en bus, commerces et les plages ne sont pas bien loin non plus, un séjour parfait merci à vous deux

Apartamento nuevo con buenas vistas y garage
Alexandra nos recibio y dio todo tipo de explicaciones
Esta a 15 min del centro 
Muy buena experiencia

name: Spacious bedroom with a trundle bed in Botafogo
summary: A bedroom for two in a beautiful colonial style home built in the early 20th century. Located in Botafogo in a quiet village with lots of vegetation just minutes from one of the landmarks of Rio. The neighborhood features many leisure activities.
interaction: I wish my guests have the best experience as possible. I will be available to help with whatever you need. I can give you many tips on amazing places that will add to the traditional tourist itinerary.
houseRules: Espero que você se sinta à vontade como se estivesse em sua casa. Desta mesma forma desejo que os hóspedes sejam cuidadosos e zelosos para com o uso da casa. Respeitem a convivência harmoniosa entre os vizinhos. Não leve pra dormir em casa outras pessoas que não forem as combinadas. Use com consciência a água e a energia elétrica.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Olá!!
Seja bem vindo!
Eu adoro conhecer novas pessoas, compartilhar ensinamentos e pontos de vista. 
Amo a natureza, respirar um puro ar e me sentir conectada a energia da terra.
Me sinto muito feliz em receber convidados simpáticos que desejam experimentar ótimos momentos no Rio e desfrutar das alegrias e belezas deste lugar que eu tanto amo.
Botafogo é um bairro  onde a vida histórica e contemporânea convivem com charme a harmonia. Rodeado por montanhas e ruas arborizadas, viver em  Botafogo tem custo mais baixo que os outros bairros da zona sul, aqui é repleto de restaurantes, bares, feiras, museus e eventos culturais que acontecem com muita frequência, o bairro fica a poucos minutos do centro do Rio e dos principais pontos turísticos. A vila onde a casa está localizada foi construída há quase 100 anos, tem muitas árvores que recebem a visita de adoráveis animais da Mata Atlântica.
  A poucos minutos de caminhada  você encontrará a "Praia de Botafogo" que compõem uma das vistas mais incríveis do Rio, se preferir pegue o caminho oposto e dê um pulinho na Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, de lá aproveite pra curtir o por do sol no Arpoador.
  Durante muito anos o Rio de Janeiro foi a capital do Brasil, então imagine passear entre as centenárias ruas de paralelepípedos do Centro do Rio, rodeado por prédios memoráveis de  belíssima arquitetura do século 19. 
  O bairro da Urca, onde abriga o bondinho do Pão de Açúcar, está a menos de 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
  O Cristo Redentor  pode ser visto da janela  e você pode chegar a subida do Morro do Corcovado em apenas 15 minutos de ônibus ou táxi.
 Será um prazer compartilhar todas as dicas e lugares especiais que conheci ao longo dos meus anos de vida nesta cidade maravilhosa.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Fue una experiencia increible, Ana siempre se comporto amable, disponible, siempre ayudando a facilitar mi viaje, aconsejando como llegar a lugares a los cuales queria visitar.

El lugar para dormir es super comodo, super limpio y super tranquilo, buena onda. 

Estoy muy feliz de haber quedado en esta casa.

Muchas gracias.

Fui muito bem atendido pela Ana Rita e muito bem recepcionado pelo Sr. Mauro. A residência fica em um condomínio muito bem localizado, o quarto é limpo, espaçoso e confortável, além de ser bem silencioso. O bairro é muito bom, tem metrô próximo e conta com comércio bem diversificado. Recomendo!

Simplesmente me senti em casa! A Ana é uma pessoa agradabilíssima e como anfitriã, se mostrou sempre prestativa e com ótimas dicas sobre o Rio. A casa é um charme e o bairro de Botafogo muito tranquilo e cheio de natureza. Tem uma visão privilegiada do Cristo Redentor. Quanto a segurança, me senti muito segura ao andar pelas ruas do bairro. O comércio também é muito diversificado e atende as necessidades de um "viajante". Foi uma experiência ímpar e espero podê-la repetir, uma próxima vez, com mais tempo para aproveitar tudo o que o Rio tem à oferecer!!!

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Ana Rita's apartment for ten days during the Olympics, and it was definitely the best Airbnb experience we ever had.

The flat is very well located, Botafogo metro station is about 10/15 minuts walking. The area is full of markets, bars and restaurants, and above all is very safe.
The apartment was perfectly clean at our arrival, and the room equipped with a double bed, a big drawers and a closet.
Ana Rita (and her father too) was friendly and very helpful since the beginning of our stay. During our vacation in Rio we lost our credit cards, and her help was fundamental to get them back. She also suggested us a lot of good places to eat :)
We could use the kitchen and also do the laundry, which was quite necessary since our stay was long.

I can certainly recommend Ana Rita and her flat, you will have a great stay there!

Iza nos acompañó en cada uno de nuestros días de estancia,muy afectuosamente nos ayudaba con cualquier duda que teníamos. Ana Rita fue muy amable y cortez.el barrio nos pareció muy seguro aunque un poco alejado de las playas.

name: Rent All Apartament (100m²) netx to BRT station
summary: Apartamento com um quarto com frigobar, sala moderna com home theater e TV de tela grande, are gourmet de café,  cozinha moderna com gelada e freezer. Mesa de sinuca, área de leitura e um amplo bar. Ônibus Público e estação de BRT próximo (3 min) One apartment with fridge, modern living room with home theater and large screen TV , gourmet coffee area , modern kitchen with cold and freezer. Pool table , reading area and a large bar . Public buses and BRT station near ( 3 min)
interaction: Sim, estarei disponível a qualquer e eventual ajuda para proporcionar uma melhor viagem.
houseRules: Manter qualquer objeto e cômodo em ordem durante a estadia. Qualquer avaria será ressarcida pelo locatário.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
I was in Brazil for the Summer Olympics as a volunteer and I needed to be close to the Olympic Stadium (Engenhão). This home was perfect only 25 min by bus.

Kayanh and his family were awesome. He was great in making me feel at home, I left feeling like family. He took me on a tour of Rio on my first day and showed me everything to do in Rio. He was so accommodating and made me feel at home when I first arrived. Kayanh far exceeded my expectations. The home is so beautiful (I called it the tree house). The bedroom has everything- TV, fans, zoned air conditioning. The bathroom was awesome too. Everything was very well decorated and very clean. The neighborhood was great. It was in a very private, quiet neighborhood, close to the BRT and the area is very convenient, everything is in a walkable distance if you like walking. 

Kayanh home is 35-40 min from the airport by car and 1 hour from Centro Brazil, if you do not mind travelling by public transportation all the tourist areas are accessible.   

Kayanh and his family are the best hosts that you could ever ask for. I only speak English, and Kayanh spoke Portuguese and English which was a tremendous advantage. 

Kayanh and his family are 5 star hosts.

name: 1BR COZY, SPACIOUS, NEXT TO METRO FLAMENGO, RIO
summary: Large and spacious 1 bedroom, full kitchen, charming apart an eclectic neighborhood where “Cariocas” live, eat, drink, play live music at Praça São Salvador. Walking distance to everything, just steps away from restaurants and transportation to Corcovado. No car needed when staying at this apartment. The Subway/metro is very close, 5 min walking distance. Perfect for 1 person or couple comfortably.
interaction: You'll be booking the entire apartment for yourself, and I'll be available to assist you at anytime. You are welcome and hope that you respect this apartment like it's yours! The obvious considerations of keeping it clean and tidy would be appreciated :)
houseRules: You are welcome and hope that you respect this apartment like it's yours! The obvious considerations of keeping it clean and tidy would be appreciated :) 1) Family building so please keep quiet after 10pm; 2) We have a non smoking apartment. We request smoking outdoors. 3) Please turn off the lights and electronics when you leave the premises; 4) Any extra person will be charged a daily fee (R$50 BRL); 5) For security reason the names of all guests occupying the apartment must be registered prior the check-in. 6) Extra housekeeping service available upon request (R$170 BRL); 7) Sand can damage the floor, please rinse off and wipe your feet before coming in the house.  You'll be booking the entire apartment for yourself, and I'll be available to assist you at anytime.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: I am a freelance web and graphic designer. I was born in Rio but have lived in San Francisco/CA for a long period. I love travelling: new sights, culture, unfamiliar food and I know how important it is to "feel home" at where you stay. I look forward to being your host during your stay in Rio and I can definitely recommend some great spots, good food and a tour around the city.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: A hospedagem foi incrível. O apartamento é lindo, bem decorado e aconchegante. A localização é super central, perto de tudo e fácil deslocamento para vários lugares do RJ, seja de metrô, ônibus, táxi ou Uber. Os porteiros também foram bem atenciosos. Iremos voltar, certamente. Experiência sensacional. Super indicamos.
Parabéns pelo apto!! Mto bom, excelente localização.. Super agradável e bacana!!
It was a pleasure. Great apartment in Flamengo.

As fotos fazem jus ao apartamento, que é mesmo aconchegante e prático. O prédio é antigo mas o apartamento foi bastante reformado. Fica no início da Rua São Salvador, portanto longe do barulho que pode vir da boêmia Praça São Salvador, dois quarteirões adiante, mas suficientemente perto de serviços de todo tipo (banco, mercados, correios, metrô, etc.). Os funcionários do prédio são simpáticos e, quando tivemos uma pequena reclamação de barulho em relação a um vizinho, o porteiro rapidamente resolveu-o, sem sequer ser necessário fazermos contato com a anfitriã a respeito. Só sentimos que uma parte da cozinha não condiz com o restante do apartamento, mas penso que a anfitriã deverá resolver isso em breve. O banho de chuveiro é excelente, os eletrodomésticos da cozinha e a máquina de lavar-secar são novos e muito bons, a iluminação é linda e o ar condicionado no quarto é bastante potente (talvez o suficiente para refrigerar o apartamento inteiro, mas não há como isolar a casa da área de serviço com tanque, que é aberta). Acabamos não conhecendo a Sonia, pois chegamos e saímos em horários inusuais, mas a chegada e a saída foram tranquilas mesmo assim e o contato (por (Hidden by Airbnb) ) correu de forma fluida e sempre que necessário (de ambas partes). Ficaríamos aqui de novo e recomendamos para quem queira um apartamento de quarto e sala confortável numa zona agradável, central e não cara do Rio de Janeiro.

Sonia's been an amazing host from beginning to end of my trip to Rio! She was very welcoming and full of good tips about how to enjoy my stay in the city. The apartment is very cozy and had all I needed to feel at home! Very clean, comfortable and perfectly located, a few blocks from the subway and surrounded with a fun nightlife! 
My next visit to Rio will definitely be with Sonia again!

El sitio es fantástico!! La casa, el barrio, la ubicación, las conexiones, todo. Sonia fue de gran ayuda para todo lo que necesité pero la casa está muy bien equipada y puedes tener una estancia tan independiente como agradable. Sin duda volveré. Muy recomendable.

2つの地下鉄駅から徒歩5分ほど｡静かな住宅街です｡ﾌﾗﾒﾝｺﾞﾋﾞｰﾁへも徒歩圏内｡
部屋は天井が高く､南向きの窓も多く､とても清潔です｡
乾燥機付き洗濯機も､もの干場もあり､ｷｯﾁﾝは4つ口のｺﾝﾛにｵｰﾌﾞﾝ､電子ﾚﾝｼﾞと長期滞在に向いています｡
5泊しましたが､去るときに引っ越しするようで､とても寂しく感じました｡またﾘｵに来る時は滞在したいです｡
Great location :)

O apartamento confortável é muito bem  localizado, próximo aos meios de transporte, numa rua tranquila, próximo dos comércios e restaurantes.
Para quem vem a trabalho ou a passeio, recomendo.
Um apartamento muito bem localizado, perto do aeroporto, metro, onibus numa rua tranquila, perto de tudo.

name: Oporto Central Flat
summary: Flat with a complete bedroom for 2, a living.room with more 2 twin beds. Independent kitchen,hall, wc,marquee, balcony. Apartamento C/1 quarto completo para 2 dois e 1 sala/quarto com 2 duas confortáveis e  grandes camas individuais . Esta sala possui também 5 sofás p/ um bom relax e  área para refeições. Um wc completo, cozinha equipada,marquise  para fumadores, fazem também parte deste apartamento, servido por dois elevadores.   A 1 min. (pé) do supermercado,farmácia,bus e táxis à porta.
interaction: Os hóspedes poderão contactar-me via sms,  ou email para qualquer apoio ou informações. Poderão também obter transfers pessoais, refeições típicas caseiras confeccionadas no apartamento,  tours diurnos e noturnos na cidade ou arredores, consoante disponibilidade e taxa a  acordar.
houseRules: Regras: lavar a louça;  Despejar o lixo diáriamente; Fumar apenas na cozinha e marquise,  Check in disponível com aviso prévio de 3 horas, uma vez que não dispomos de recepção.  Animais de pequeno porte grátis, após consulta e só admitidos para reservas do apartamento na totalidade. Não são admitidos animais  em  reservas de quartos privados. Apenas aceites nas reservas de apartamento na totalidade.

host.location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

reviews.txt:
The apartment is located 20 minutes away from Boavista square on foot, and 2 minutes away from bus stops to downtown (15 minutes). In the neighborhood you can find everything you need: tobacco shops where you can buy your bus pass (andante), grocery stores (e.g. Lidl), pharmacy, etc. A taxi from downtown at night is between 6-8 euro. In short, it is a very convenient location.
The apartment is exactly what you see in the pictures. There is no access to the main bedroom, but the two single beds in the living room were comfortable and the apartment was really clean.
The host canceled this reservation 134 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La acogida ha sido correcta, en todo momento nos ha ofrecido lo mejor para que la estancia se cómoda y que el viaje lo disfrutemos al máximo. Todo lo indicado en la descripción de la casa es tal cual al verla en persona. Todo muy bien

Hizo que en todo momento la estancia en el apartamento fuera agradable. Nos dio muchísima información acerca de medios de transporte, cosas que ver, actividades culturales, sitios donde comer o tomar algo.
todo como se esperaba y se describía. Atención e indicaciones sobre la zona muy buenas. Una ciudad para conocer y seguro que volveremos.

Everything was as we expected, Natalia was really nice and told us good spot to visit!
Obrigada!
Tranquilidad y sosiego  después  de un día de caminata. Muy bien  equipado el piso y Natalia te ofrece mucha información

Wir hatten eine wunderebare Zeit in Porto. Natália ist eine hervorragende Gastgeberin! Sie hat uns immer auf den neusten Stand gebracht was kulturelle Aktivitäten in Porto angeht, hatte gute Tipps für Ausflüge oder Restaurants und war schnell zur Stelle wenn wir Hilfe brauchten (z.B. bei Wegbeschreibungen). 
Das Appartment entspricht genau dem was auf den Bildern zu sehen ist sowie einer perfekt ausgestatteten Küche, also eine nette, kleine, sehr saubere Wohnung mit Stil und ausreichend Platz für 2. Es liegt ziemlich genau zwischen Altstadt und Strand und beides ist gut mit dem Bus (ca. 10 Minuten) oder einem längeren Spaziergang zu erreichen. Die Umgebung ist ein eher ruhiges Geschäftsviertel mit guten Einkaufsmöglichkeiten für den alltäglichen Bedarf. Ein tolles, nettes, portugiesisches Restaurant/Imbiss ist direkt um die Ecke. Wir hatten einen tollen Urlaub! Der natürlich zu kurz war.
Everything was even better than we expected, so beautiful cozy apartment in a really good place with such a nice owner, thank you so much!!

Laurinda y su papa son muy lindos, nos dejaron frutas del campo a nuestra llegada, un refri con varias cosas para cenar ya que llegamos tarde, que linda bienvenida!
El piso esta ubicado como 10 mns del centro en taxi (no esta caminable) y solo tiene 1 habitación. Tiene todos los comercios al lado. Esta perfecto para dos amigos ya que tiene dos camas individuales, máximo 3 diría.

name: Charming apartment in Plateau Mont Royal
summary: The apartment is in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal, at the border of the Mile-End. All the cafes, restaurants, and boutiques you'd hope for are nearby. The place is also at a 2 min. walk from the Laurier Metro Station, which will take you downtown in minutes. The Parc Laurier is 10 min. away. The place is comfortable, homy, and welcoming, ideally located in a central neighbourhood. Good for couples, small groups, solo adventurers. Families (with kids) are also welcome!
interaction: You have the whole place to yourself, but I will be nearby. Don't hesitate to contact me if you need anything, regarding the appartient or cool spots to explore in the city!

host.about: I’m a bilingual (French/English) Montrealer passionate about social justice, anthropology, playing the piano, and meeting cool people from near and far.

reviews.txt: Really great place ! Super close to the metro station and many restaurants. Host was amazing with communication and check in was smooth.

On a passé une merveilleuse experience dans l’appart d’emilie. Endroit magnifique avec beaucoup d’espace et un balcon ensoleillé et tranquille. Emilie est très arrangeante. Merci! On reviendra avec plaisir!
Super apart bien placé
Emillie was very kind and hospitable, great stay!
Appartement tranquille, bien situé c'était parfait !
I highly recommend Emilie's place. Its super convenient and 10 min drive to downtown. If you are lucky you can find a parking spot right by her apartment. Its clean and comfy.

Our stay was great! 
Emilie's apartment is the true Montreal experience (I used to live there). The classic walk-up, the original details: hardwood floors and crown mouldings, the quaint balcony to sit and enjoy your morning coffee. Her place is incredibly close to the metro station and the location is incredible, it has all you need for shopping, eating, drinking, sight-seeing, you name it. Emilie was a great host, and it was very easy and quick to communicate. Our check-in was a breeze :)
Clean and cute space in a beautiful location
Le logement est idéalement placé pour visiter Montréal.

Really homey, classic Montreal vibes. Balcony was very enjoyable. The door was a bit of a hassle as well as there was no toilet paper however for the cost it was well worth it! Great location too close enough to pretty much everything but residential enough to find some calm in the city!

name: Premium Exclusive house & garden Rua Almada
summary: In the historic center, this XIX century exclusively renovated house keeps the traces of historical Porto. Brightness and design make it an exceptional place. Terrace and garden are a haven of peace in the vibrant city center, at the top of Almada street. It has a sunny and elegant living-room, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a terrace and access to a private garden. In the 2nd floor, two suites provide the comfort for a perfect stay. A premium place for an extraordinary experience!
interaction: The house is managed by Alexandra Oliveira which will organize your welcome. She will provide you with valuable information to make your stay in Porto a memorable trip.
houseRules: Availabe in the house

host.about: I'm a publisher and an author based in Paris. I have set up and managed the French office of Lonely Planet during 10 years. Beside the 6 years I've spent in New York where I worked for the United Nations, among other things, I have travelled all over the world. Especially in Asia. Three years ago, I fell in love with  Porto where I bought my house and renovated it. I love to go there whenever I have a chance. What makes me really happy ? Travelling, cooking, books and films and share time with my friends.

reviews.txt:
Dès notre arrivée, et l'accueil chaleureux d'Alexandra, on se sentait "chez nous". Elle nous a donné des instructions facile à comprendre sur tous les gadgets (wifi, sound dock, television et lecteur de dvd, machine à laver et sèche linge ) suivi par les bons tuyaux pour profiter de la ville en peu de temps, où manger localement (Mundo deli ---top) et comment se rendre à la plage en metro. 
La maison sur deux étages est superbe. Nous avons aimé le mélange de la pierre et des parquets en bois. Tout est neuf.
Elle est équipée avec tout ce que l’on peut vouloir. La cuisine est fantastique. Elle se prolonge par une terrasse où l’on peut prendre le petit déjeuner ou déjeuner. Cette terrasse donne sur un petit jardin plein de plantes et de petits arbres.
Tout est décoré avec goût. C’est sobre et élégant. Tout ce que nous aimons. Des lampes et des meubles design ou vintage dans chaque pièce. Un salon immense, haut de plafond avec des volets intérieurs, donne la sensation de l'espace mais reste intime. 
Nous avons aimé la possibilité de manger ou prendre un verre dans le salon, ou la cuisine, ou le terrasse ou le jardin. 
Confort des chambres et les salles de bains: simplement parfait. Et les draps sont si confortables que je pensais être dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. 
Située en pleine ville la maison reste tranquille et bien placée.

Nous avons passé un moment merveilleux à Porto. On peut voir que cette ville est en pleine ébullition. Et la maison était comme une oasis de paix à quelques minutes du centre-ville. Tout d’abord, la rua do Almada, où elle se trouve, est une rue passionnante. Des boutiques vintage ou design, sont à côté d’autres endroits qui vendent des produits électriques pour artisans comme nous n’en voyons plus à Paris. Nous avons été si bien accueillis par Alexandra qui s’occupe de la maison. Elle parle un français parfait et l’anglais aussi. Elle nous a donné plein de bonnes informations pour profiter de Porto. La maison, elle-même est magnifique. Elle vient juste d’être rénovée. Nous avons adoré la pierre que la propriétaire a sauvegardée sous les fenêtres et autour des portes et les volets typiques à l’intérieur. La décoration est très soignée. Là aussi, un mix d’objets très design, comme la superbe lampe dans la cuisine ou dans le salon et des petits meubles vintage un peu partout, très beaux. La cuisine est un bonheur. On pouvait prendre notre petit déjeuner sur la terrasse qui donne sur un petit jardin adorable où l’on peut descendre par un large escalier. Nous avions un grand choix de vaisselle magnifique. Les chambres sont aussi très confortables. Chacune avait sa salle de bains. Mais le must, c’est les draps. Nous avons eu l’impression de dormir dans un hôtel 5 étoiles. Douillets et soyeux à souhait. J’aimerais avoir les mêmes chez moi ! La bibliothèque du salon contient plein de livres intéressants et une bonne collection de dvd. On s’est senti chez nous, avec un certain luxe en plus ! C’est sûr, nous reviendrons à Porto et dans cette maison qui nous a touchés. Le séjour était trop court, comme toujours…

We loved staying at Zahia's place.  Alexandra welcomed us very warmly and gave us good tips about Porto. The house ist very well furnished and there is nothing at all we were missing. More – we loved the design and everything  including the dishes of villeroy & boch. We felt like at home! 
Everything is new and clean. Also the beds are very comfortable - in addition it's a quiet neighborhood and we slept very well. We were very lucky to find a place like this and can recomend it to everyone. 
We'll be back...

This was the best house we have stayed so far for the Portugal/Spain trip. Zahia house was really very neat, tidy, spacious and tastefully decorated. Her friend was there for the check in. He was such a great help and host. I highly recommend Zahia house if u and your friend are in Porto and would like to do some cooking and enjoying by the backyard with wine.  Also not to mention, u can walk by foot to a lot of places from Zahia house between 15-20mins, and a lot of eateries just 2-3mins walk from her place.

The appartment is very well located, very conveniet, fully equipped.
We have been welcome, and provided with lot of tips (best locations to have lunch, to go shopping or to enjoy pasteries and drinks.  So much that we preferred not use the kitchen so as to enjoy the portuguese food (even the vegetarian!).
We warmly recommend this location.

I would return to Porto just to repeat the experience of my visit to Zahia's home in the old city of Porto!

Every step of the process, from making first contact to sadly having to say goodbye, was a pleasure.  Such beautiful energy and style. Thank you so much Zahia, Alexandra and Diogo for your kindness, care and assistance. Also very much enjoyed meeting some of your lovely friends in the neighbourhood at Mondo Deli. 

A word of warning though when staying at Zahia's home, her beds are so comfortable, they will wrap their silky sheets around you and not want to let you go  : ) zzzz

Could not recommend more highly to visit Porto and Zahia's home.

Obrigado

: ) errol

Exactly as described. Communication was excellent and host was flexible with check in & out with regard to leaving our bags at the house. V clean in general with a very well equipped kitchen. Great location for exploring Porto.

Wir waren zu dritt, zwei Erwachsene und ein Kind. Es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer. Das Haus ist traumhaft! Genau so grosszügig und wunderbar eingerichtet wie auf den Fotos. Es hat uns an nichts gefehlt und Alexandra hat für uns vorab sogar einen Parkplatz um die Ecke reserviert. Wir wurden herzlich mit einer Flasche Wein empfangen. Danke an die Gastgeber!

Zahia and her wonderfully helpful friend Alexandra provided the most fantastic welcome via their friend Diogo. He gave us all the best restaurant tips and was so helpful. The house itself was absolutely gorgeous, and in a fabulous area, close to the city. The garden also was a lovely place to relax in. Would wholeheartedly recommend staying in this memorably beautiful home!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Alexandra, qui nous a donné d'excellents conseils en matière de lieux à visiter et de restaurants sympathiques. Elle a été toujours facile à contacter durant notre séjour. Cette maison de ville est agréable et très bien située dans le quartier historique de Porto. La maison était très propre à notre arrivée. Sa situation permet de visiter  la ville à pieds ou en transport en commun facilement. Porto est une belle cité qui monte et descend en permanence.   Très bon séjour, nous recommandons cette jolie maison à qui veut visiter Porto.

name: Casa S. Miguel 6 - The Yellow House
summary: The S. Miguel 6 House is a traditional Porto's building located in the UNESCO World Heritage area, surrounded by a charismatic and authentic atmosphere, open the window and breathe the soul of Porto! N. Registo 27164/AL. Near Station Sao Bento Cleaning fees included in the price.
interaction: I am always available to respond to any queries, and of course to greet you at your arrival.
houseRules: Please don´t smoke indoors; please use the balconies. Our community is very quiet, please respect our neighbor's. Please leave the house as you found it: take the waste out, turn all lights and heating off and close the windows. At your arrival I will require to see your passport, in order to complete the Portuguese Immigration and Borders Service (SEF) form.
